target: ❄ 永昼之地
source: ❄ Everbright

target: 永昼之地是一个永昼却很寒冷的维度，这里生活着许多厚皮目哺乳动物和类似于魂灵的奇异生物。在这个维度，你要时刻注意你的身后。暴风雪带来的浓雾会隐藏怪物的行踪，它们的数量远超过你之前所遇到的。随着您的探索，您将遇到召唤师所在的惑乱高塔和以及星熠破灭之树所在的自然城堡
source: The Everbright is a realm of eternal day and frigid cold. Home to large beasts and ethereal mobs, you’ll need to keep an eye on your back as you traverse through this world. Be sure to watch out for snow storms that bring thick fog and more enemies than usual. As you explore, you’ll encounter the Summoner’s Blinding Dungeon and the Nature Dungeon, home of the Starlit Crusher.

target: 访问维度: &2永昼之地
source: Visit Dimension: &2The Everbright

target: 🌅 恒晓之地
source: 🌅 Everdawn

target: 恒晓之地是一个永远处在黎明之时且炎热潮湿的维度，这里生活着许多爬行类动物和体型巨大的昆虫。在来到这个维度之前你需要准备好药水和光源（曲逸：这里的雨有那么一点小，如果你在森林点了把火记得自己灭了，这里的雨是没办法扑灭火的），因为这里的大部分生物会使你着火或中毒。穿越这个再也无法被照亮的维度，寻找惑乱高塔，诛杀炼金术士，最终进入幽咽蛛王所在的猛毒地牢，拯救这个世界（曲逸:也许吧，听说模组要更新新boss了）
source: The Everdawn has its sun forever rising. With this being a much more humid and warm world, insects and reptiles flourish. Before entering, it’s worth preparing for poison and fire as many parts of this world may inflict those on you. Venture across this diverse landscape to uncover the Alchemist’s Blinding Dungeon and then the Poison Dungeon, lair of the Arachnarch.

target: 访问维度: &2恒晓之地
source: Visit Dimension: &2The Everdawn

target: &c通量网络
source: &cFlux Networks

target: Mod的关键制作成分
source: The key crafting ingredient of the mod

target: 这是将红石粉转换为通量粉尘的默认方法。
source: Here is the default method of converting Redstone Dust into Flux.

target: &lStep 1:&r 找到基岩.
source: &lStep 1:&r Find some Bedrock.

target: &lStep 2:&r 在基岩上方第二格放置黑曜石。
source: &lStep 2:&r Place some Obsidian above it, leaving one block space in between.

target: &lStep 3:&r 在基岩和黑曜石之间投掷一些红石粉。
source: &lStep 3:&r Throw some Redstone Dust in the gap left by the Bedrock and Obsidian.

target: &lStep 4:&r 左键单击黑曜石，黑曜石会将红石粉压碎在基岩上，并创造通量粉尘！
source: &lStep 4:&r Left-click the Obsidian. The Obsidian will crush the Redstone Dust against the Bedrock and create Flux!

target: &l每次可放置的红石粉没有数量限制.
source: &lThere is no limit to the amount of Redstone Dust you can use each time.

target: &f&l能量网络配置器
source: &f&lFlux Configurator

target: 能量网络配置器也可以连接到网络
source: The Flux Configurator can also be connected to a network

target: ● 它可用于随时随地访问，编辑，删除网络。并且与连接器共享相同的 GUI。
source: ● It can be used to access, edit, delete networks on the go. And shares the same GUI as connectors.

target: ● 它还可用于在连接器之间复制/粘贴设置。
source: ● It can also be used to copy / paste settings between connectors.

target: &l复制设置:&r 按住 Shift 键并右键单击连接器以复制其设置，然后右键单击要将设置粘贴到的连接器。如果右键单击不是连接器的内容，则会显示网络 GUI，并且还可以编辑配置器将粘贴的设置。配置器也可以在此处重命名，并带有名称字段。
source: &lCopying Settings:&r Shift-Right Click on a connector to copy it's settings and then Right Click on a connector you wish to paste the settings to. If you right click something which isn't a connector you'll bring up the Network GUI and also you'll be able to edit the settings which the Configurator will paste. The configurator can also be renamed here, with the name field.

target: &f&l能量块
source: &f&lFlux Block

target: Mod的其他关键制作成分！
source: Other key crafting ingredients of the mod!

target: &f&l基础能量存储器
source: &f&lFlux Storage

target: 用于在网络中存储能量
source: Used to Store Energy in the network

target: 能量存储器用于储存多余的能量。只有当每个通量点获得足够的能量时，它才会被填充。
source: Flux Storage is used to store excess energy. It will only be filled once each Flux Point has received enough energy.

target: 这种能量只能通过用通量点去除能量来获得。
source: This energy can only be accessed by removing energy with a Flux Point.

target: &7&l这种能量只能通过用通量节点去除能量来获得。
source: &7&lThis energy can only be accessed by removing energy with a Flux Point.
&bEnergy Capacity: 1,000,000 FE

target: &f&l能量接入
source: &f&lFlux Plug

target: 用于向网络添加能量
source: Used for Adding Energy to the network

target: 您可以同时从任意方向添加能量。
source: You can add energy from all sides simultaneously.

target: &f&l能量接出
source: &f&lFlux Point

target: 用于从网络中移出能量
source: Used to Remove Energy from the network

target: 您可以同时从任意方向移出能量。.
source: You can remove energy from all sides simultaneously.

target: &f&l能量网络控制器
source: &f&lFlux Controller

target: 激活时需要 &lCross-dimensional inventory charging
source: Required to activate &lCross-dimensional inventory charging

target: ● 可以在“无线充电”选项卡中配置库存充电
source: ● Inventory charging can be configured in the Wireless Charging Tab.

target: ● 一次只能将一个控制器连接到网络。
source: ● Only one controller can be connected to a network at one time.

target: ● 控制器的“输出”是指通过无线充电从网络输出的能量。
source: ● The controller's 'Output' refers to energy outputted from the network via Wireless Charging.

target: ● &3&l网络不需要能量网络控制器即可运行。
source: ● &3&lNetwork's do not require a Flux Controller to operate.
&bEnergy Capacity: 8,000,000 FE
&bEnergy Capacity: 128,000,000 FE

target: &f&l通量网络
source: &f&lFlux Networks

target: *通过完成 &b&l&o钻石镐&r 解锁任务*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oDiamond Pickaxe&r quest*

target: 通量网络使您能够构建无线能源网络。它允许您自定义这些网络并管理整个世界的能源流。
source: Flux Networks gives you the ability to build Wireless Energy Networks. It allows you to customise these networks and manage the flow of energy across your world.

target: 无需将电缆连接到任何地方，从而减少延迟并节省您的时间。能量还可以跨维度传输，使能量管理变得简单。
source: Removing the need to have cables going everywhere, hence decreasing lag and saving you time. Energy can also be transferred across dimensions making energy management simple.

target: &f&l能量核心
source: &f&lFlux Core

source: Other key crafting ingredients of the mod!

target: &9&l欢迎来到懒人厨房！！
source: &9&lWelcome to Cooking for Blockheads

target: *完成任务&b&l&o食物&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oThe Food&r quest*

target: 这个模组为Minecraft增加了一本烹饪书。
source: This mod adds a cooking book along with a functional kitchen to Minecraft.

target: 他能显示你背包食材能够烹饪的食物。可以通过简单的点击直接使用背包里的食材合成食物。
source: Use the book or the Cooking Table to find out what you can cook with what ingredients you currently have available, and start cooking immediately through a single click.

target: 厨房是模块化的，可以通过额外的单元进行升级，允许扩大存储空间，使水槽提供无限的水，或使烤箱高效的烹饪。有些人甚至抓了一头牛放在一个奶罐里，为他们提供无限的牛奶!
source: The kitchen is modular and can be upgraded through additional blocks, allowing for expanded storage, infinite water for crafting provided by the sink, or efficient and delicious cooking with the oven. Some people even went as far as capturing a cow in a jar to provide them with infinite milk!

target: 厨 具（或厨房用具？
source: Kitchen Accessories

target: &9&l无限的牛奶（无限奶
source: &9&lInfinite Milk

target: &5&l欢迎来到神秘农业
source: &5&lWelcome to Mystical Agriculture

target: *通过完成 &b&l&o魔法肥料&r 解锁任务*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oMystical Fertilizer&r quest*

target: 神秘农业是一个基于用作物种植资源的概念的mod。使用农作物来种植用于制造材料，生物掉落，工具，盔甲甚至更多的东西的精华！
source: Mystical Agriculture is a mod based around the concept of growing your resources with crops. Use crops to grow essences used to make materials, mob drops, tools, armor and possibly even more!

target: &9&l欢迎来到PSI
source: &9&lWelcome to PSI

target: *完成任务&b&l&o磨粉机&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oPulverizer&r quest*

target: Psi是一个神奇的科技咒语编程mod，灵感来自Mahouka。如果这没有任何意义，请不要担心。
source: Psi is a magical tech spell programming mod inspired by Mahouka. Don't worry if that doesn't make any sense.

target: Psi的核心是一个系统，您可以在其中创建要在世界上执行的动作序列（“咒语”）。
source: The core of Psi is a system where you can create action sequences (\"Spells\") to be executed in the world.

target: 这个系统之后是一个升级系统，其中包含游戏内文档和各种概念和棋子的教程。该mod利用了基本的数学概念，例如其系统中的Vectors，这使得法术可以做什么有很大的灵活性。
source: This system is followed by a leveling system containing ingame documentation and tutorials of the various concepts and pieces you'll get. The mod makes use of basic mathematical concepts, such as Vectors in its systems, which allows for great flexibility on what spells can do.

target: 如果您需要教程，请使用以下链接：
source: If you need tutorial use the link below:

source: &9&lThe CAD Assembler

source: &9&lThe Armor Set

source: &9&lThe Sword

target: &7潘马斯农场
source: &7Pam's HarvestCraft

target: &c&l美味蛋糕
source: &c&lDelicious Cakes

target: &a&l欢迎来到潘马斯农场！
source: &a&lWelcome to Pam's HarvestCraft

target: *完成任务&b&l&o烤箱&r以解锁 *
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oOven&r quest*

target: 潘马斯农村2是一个minecraft模组，添加了食物物品、食材和食谱到游戏中。
source: Pam's HarvestCraft 2 is a Minecraft mod pack adding food items, their ingredients, and recipes to the game.

target: 它是潘马斯农村的继承模组。通过食物核心模组作为前置与作物，树木和食物扩展等作为可选添加。
source: It is the successor to HarvestCraft. It consists of the Food Core mod with the optional additions of Crops, Trees, and Food Extended.

target: 食物核心为minecraft添加了许多的食物，拓展模组也添加了许多新的物品。其中大部分与潘马斯农场1相同，不过也有一些在模型或制作配方上有所不同，甚至有一些是全新的，如全新的厨具擀面杖。并非所有的潘马斯农场1的物品都被添加到潘马斯2中，但作者预计会添加更多全新的物品。
source: While the Food Core mod adds recipes to the vanilla Minecraft food items, the other mods add new items. Many of these are identical to those of HarvestCraft 1, but some also differ in appearance or crafting recipe, and some are new altogether, such as the new utensil Roller. Not all items of HarvestCraft 1 have been added to HarvestCraft 2, but more are expected to be added.

target: *完成任务&b&l&o熔炉&r以解锁 *
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oFurnace&r quest*

target: *完成任务&b&l&o熔炉&r以解锁 *
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oFurnace&r quest*

source: &e&lYogurt Mania

source: &f&lCooking Utensils

target: *完成任务&b&l&o烹饪桌&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oCooking Table&r quest*

target: &9新生魔艺
source: &9Ars Nouveau

target: &6&l欢迎来到新生魔艺
source: &6&lWelcome to Ars Nouveau

target: *完成任务&b&l&o低级机器框架&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oPity Machine Frame&r quest*

target: 新生魔艺是一个魔法mod，允许玩家制作自己的咒语，创造魔法神器，执行仪式等等。
source: Ars Nouveau is a magic mod that allows players to craft their own spells, create magical artifacts, perform rituals, and much more.

target: 有了新生魔艺，你将学会利用注入一切事物的魔力来施放强大的法术，驾驶神秘的机械，通过强大的魔法机器与可爱的魔法仆人自动化你的基地！。
source: With Ars Nouveau you will learn to harness the mana infused in all things to cast powerful spells, drive arcane machinery, and even to empower some cute friends along the way.

target: Mana是新生魔艺中每个咒语和神秘装置背后的驱动力
source: Mana is the driving energy behind every spell and arcane device in Ars Nouveau

target: 从制作一个魔力冷凝器和一个魔力罐开始。制作他们所需的魔力宝石可以从奥数矿石中获取。所以请留意紫色的奥术矿石，你可以在任何深度找到他们。
source: Craft a Mana Condenser and a Mana Jar to begin. The Mana Gems required can be found while mining at any depth. Keep an eye out for purple Arcane Ore.

target: 要开始凝聚魔力，请先将魔力罐放置，然后将魔力凝聚器放在其上。魔力来自三个主要来源：
source: To begin condensing Mana, place the Mana Jar and then place the Mana Condenser on top of it. Mana is drawn from three primary sources:

target: ● 作物进入生长阶段
source: ● Crops advancing a growth stage

target: ● 繁殖动物
source: ● Breeding animals

target: ● 杀死生物
source: ● Killing mobs

target: 考虑在这些地方附近设置一个罐子和冷凝器。它可以在大约10-15个块半径内检测此类事件，具体取决于事件的类型。如果自动化，大型农作物农场或基本的暴民农场可以相对快速地产生魔法值
source: Consider setting up a jar and condenser nearby such places. It can detect such events in a roughly 10-15 block radius, depending on the type of event. A large crop farm or a basic mob farm can produce mana relatively quickly if automated.

target: 并非每个人生来便拥有有绿拇指。但值得庆幸的是，法力自然会从熔岩中流出，逃逸到空中。这个装置有助于收集这些微量的魔法值，以便它们可以被使用。（这样你就能拥有绿拇指了！（确信）
source: Not every practitioner is born with a green-thumb. Thankfully, mana naturally trickles out of molten lava, escaping into the air. This device assists in collecting these trace amounts of mana so they may be put to use.

target: 结晶器可以将周围的魔力凝聚，从而形成魔力水晶
source: Arcane Crystals can be crystallized directly from the surrounding mana.

target: 尽早建造结晶器吧，这可以帮助你获得很多有用的魔力水晶。
source: Build a Crystallizer early on to help obtain more of these very useful gems.

target: &6&l魔符压印
source: &6&lGlyph Press

target: 魔符压印器只接受两件物品;特殊种类的粘土和魔力试剂（就是法力）
source: The Glyph Press will accept up to two items; a type of clay and a reagent

target: 先放粘土，再添加材料，即可在魔源罐满足条件下，合成符文。。
source: Both are consumed along with a fair amount of mana from a nearby Mana Jar to create new Glyphs.

target: 可以通过右键符文来学习它们。它们将出现在你的咒语书中，用于创作新的咒语。
source: Glyphs can be learned by right clicking them. They'll then appear within your spellbook for use in crafting new spells.

target: &6&l魔法粘土
source: &6&lMagic Clay

target: 通过将魔力宝石和粘土混合，可以使它拥有魔力核心，从而变成魔法粘土，这将有助于你获得更大的力量。
source: By working Mana Gems into Clay a focus can be formed which will aid an aspiring magician in harnessing greater powers.

target: 为了学习新的咒语，你可以使用这种魔法粘土（或者其他拥有魔力的粘土：比如神话粘土）在魔符压印器中合成符文。
source: In order to learn new spells, this Magic Clay and its variants may be pressed in a Glyph Press along with some other reagent to form a focus.

target: 以下咒语可以作为前期的一种飞行方法
source: A simple early form of flight can be crafted using the following spell:

target: ● 发射 > 腾跃 > 缓降
source: ● Self > Leap > Slowfall

target: 通过这个顺序使用符文可以推动玩家朝着他们所面对的方向前进，同时能为最终着陆提供缓冲。
source: Casting this propels the user in the direction they're facing, while also providing some cushioning for the eventual landing.

target: &6&l非凡粘土
source: &6&lMarvelous Clay

target: 非凡粘土可以解锁2级法术创造。不过二级法术需要法师的法术书（真叫这个名字）来施放。
source: Marvelous Clay unlocks the creation of Tier 2 spells. These also require an Apprentice's Spellbook to cast.

target: 通过这两种魔咒你可以选取（指抛射）一个矿石，对它进行熔炉，然后远程把它收入囊中
source: For example, a spell can be made that will smelt a ranged block, break it, and bring it to your inventory.

target: ● 射出魔符（咒） > 熔炼 > 破坏 > 拾取
source: ● Projectile > Smelt > Break > Item Pickup

target: 你同样可以使用这些符咒来精准采集，就比如将沙子熔炼成玻璃，再收入背包（可以不用熔炉力！！）
source: Adding an Extract augment after the Break will apply Silk Touch, allowing the above spell to create Glass from Sand.

target: ●  射出魔符（咒）> 熔炼 > 破坏 > 提炼>拾取（曲逸：我没搞懂）
source: ● Projectile > Smelt > Break > Extract > Item Pickup

target: 以下搭配会将时运魔咒应用于破坏后可掉落的方块，并将掉落物传送到您的物品栏中。非常适合开采那些难以触及到的钻石。
source: Similarly, the following will apply Fortune to the broken block and transport the result to your inventory. Great for those hard to reach diamonds.

target: ● 射出魔符（咒） > 破坏 > 时运 >拾取
source: ● Projectile > Break > Fortune > Item Pickup

target: &6&l神话粘土
source: &6&lMythical Clay

target: “神话粘土可以解锁了3级法术创造。当然，三级法术需要大法师法术书才能释放（本模组最高级符咒）。
source: Mythical Clay unlocks the creation of Tier 3 spells. These also require an Archmage's Spellbook to cast.

target: &6&l附魔装置
source: &6&lEnchanting Apparatus

target: 要想使用附魔装置，请在其3格内放置任意数量的奥术基座，并在其上放置物品。之后，对附魔装置使用试剂物品即可开始合成。附魔装置下方需要放置一个奥术核心，否则它不会运行。
source: To construct the Enchanting Apparatus, place down the Arcane Core with the Enchanting Apparatus on top of it. The Pedestals can be placed anywhere in an 11x11 area centered on the Core. A Mana Jar with mana must also be present nearby.

target: 需要先放周围基座上面的物品，最后拿核心物品右键附魔装置激活，成功激活后会有粒子效果。（作者写的教程好奇怪，一般人看不懂，我给你们改下）
source: To work with it, place the reagents in the pedestals and the focus in the Enchanting Apparatus itself, then Sneak Right Click the Apparatus with an empty hand.

target: 魔符饰品
source: Curious Charms

target: 法师之花种子生长于世俗与魔法世界的交接之处l
source: The Mana Bloom sits at the border between the mundane and the magical

target: 它可以像其他植物一样生长，但是种植它需要在附近的农艺魔源通道提供额外的魔源。
source: It grows as any other plant, but its roots reach through the veil, soaking in more of the mana that infuses the earth. Growing these will serve two purposes to a budding practitioner.

target: 魔源中继器为魔力流过提供了一个受控的通道，而不会消散到空气之中。魔法中继器可以链接到其他中继器以及源质罐，以提供从一个地方到另一个地方的安全传输。
source: Mana Relays serve this purpose. They provide a controlled channel for mana to flow through without dissipating back into the world. Mana Relays may be linked to other relays as well as jars to provide safe transit from one place to another.

target: 准备法术羊皮纸，在法术书中设计咒语，然后将法术羊皮纸放在抄写台上。右击装有法术书的桌子，将选定的咒语转移到法术羊皮纸上。
source: To prepare a Parchment with a spell, design the spell within your spellbook, then place a parchment on the Scribe's Table. Sneak Right Click the table with your spell book to transfer the selected spell over to the parchment.

target: 要使用符文粉笔，请首先在地面上画一个圆圈。现在右键单击带有准备好的咒语羊皮纸的圆圈。有效的咒语羊皮纸必须以触摸表单开头。
source: To use Runic Chalk, begin by drawing a circle on the ground. Now right click the circle with a prepared Spell Parchment. Valid Spell Parchments must begin with the Touch Form.

target: 任何走过符文的生物都会受到法术的效果。（这教程就和没说一样，建议看书）
source: Any creature that walks over the rune will receive the effect of the spell.

target: 更先进的魔法中继器，能够从多个位置获取魔力并且发送到多个位置。
source: A more advanced Mana Relay capable of pulling from and sending to multiple locations.

target: 自动魔法
source: Auto Magically

target: 如果魔术不能全自动，那还有什么用呢？
source: What good is magic if it cannot be made to work for us without constant intervention?

target: 附魔法术炮塔是一种增强的装置，用于通过红石脉冲按需施放法术
source: The Spell Turret is an enhanced apparatus used to cast spells on demand with a redstone pulse

target: 就像符文粉笔创建的简单符文一样，通过右键带有符咒羊皮纸的设备，可以为它提供准备好的符咒羊皮纸。与符文不同，它可以使用触摸和投射形式。
source: Like the simpler runes created by Runic Chalk, it can be provided with a prepared Spell Parchment by right clicking the device with the parchment. Unlike runes, it can use both Touch and Projectile Forms.

target: 召唤水晶是用附魔装置制作的，所有的符咒都是用附魔装置制作的。
source: The Summoning Crystal is crafted with the Enchanting Apparatus, as are all Charms.

target: 一个简单而紧凑的农作物农场可以用一个法术炮塔制作：&9Touch > Grow > Harvest&r.
source: A simple and compact crop farm can be made with a spell turret: &9Touch > Grow > Harvest&r.

target: &9星辉魔法
source: &9Astral Sorcery

target: &d&l该激发星辉的力量了！星辉魔法！
source: &d&lWelcome to Astral Sorcery

target: *完成任务&b&l&o魔力工作台&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oMagic Wokbench&r quest*

target: 星辉魔法是一个专注于利用星能和星座的力量的魔法模组。探索世界和你上方的天空并通过星光，建造多方块祭坛加强自己或改造周围的世界。
source: Astral Sorcery is a Minecraft magic mod focused around harnessing the powers of starlight and the constellations. Explore and discover the world and the sky above you; focus starlight to your will, strengthening yourself or enhancing the world around you.

target: 加入本模组后进入游戏会得到一本星芒宝典，星芒宝典将指引你如何发展并进行研究
source: The mod itself has an ingame guide in the form of the Astral Tome, which will guide you through most of the mod if you read it carefully. Certain structures in the world are required for proper progression.

target: 星辉合成台 必须放置在一个露天的地方才能工作。当你打开星辉合成台的GUI，它的底部有一个星能条。它充能（和效率）的多少取决于星辉合成台被放置的高度以及世界时间。在晚上，你的星辉合成台会比白天获得更多的星能。
source: The Luminous Crafting Table must be placed somewhere open to the sky to work. This table has a “Star Light” meter at the bottom when you open it. This will fill up depending on where the table is placed and the time. In the middle of the night, your table will have higher levels of Star Light than during the day.

target: 将星辉合成台放置在离天空更近的地方(y轴为120)会得到更多星光。如果你靠近聚能水晶（浮动水晶）或在一个星能高度集中的区域，你将获得更高的星能等级（指星能增长的更多更快）。这个星能等级也受到月亮的位置和你在世界上的坐标的影响(因为它取决于桌子可以看到什么星座)而在白天，你几乎看不到星光，所以你无法通过天空来获得星能
source: Tables placed at a higher elevation (max Y-level 120) will also get more Star Light. Higher levels can be achieved if you are near a Collector Crystal or in an area of high Starlight concentration (more on this later). This Star Light level is also affected by where the moon is and where you are in world, as it depends on what Constellations the table can see. During the day you will get next to no Star Light.

target: 星辉合成台也可以作为普通合成台使用(合成与星辉魔法无关的物品)，但是当你要合成任何星辉魔法的物品时，你需要使用共鸣星杖。不像普通的制作桌，你可以直接合成你需要的东西，你必须在放置配方后退出合成台，然后用共鸣星杖右键单击合成台。然后一束月光会照耀在星辉合成台上，然后你所要合成的的物品就会出现在桌子上。
source: This table can also be used as a regular crafting table (for crafting things related to Astral Sorcery) but when crafting anything for Astral Sorcery you will need your Resonating Wand. Unlike a normal crafting table where you can just pull out what you have crafted, you have to exit the table after creating the recipe and then right-click the table with the Resonating Wand. A beam of moonlight will shine on the table and then the crafted item will appear in the world on top of the table.

target: &d&l辉光 \\& 暗夜
source: &d&lLight \\& Darkness

target: 辉光或暗夜
source: Illuminate or Obscured

target: &b&l辉光粉&r:
source: &b&lIlluminating powder&r:

target: 用少量星能，萤石粉和海蓝宝石，你可以制作辉光粉。它可以用来制作一些特殊物品。除了用于合成，辉光粉还有一些其他用处，你可以在地面上右键它，它将像火把一样照亮该区域。和火把不同的是，它没有碰撞箱。让它消失的唯一办法就是用方块遮盖住它。
source: With a little bit of Starlight, glowstone and aquamarine you can craft Illumination Powder. It is very useful on its own but it's far more useful when used to craft other items. Once crafted you can right-click it on the ground and it will light up the area. Unlike a torch, it does not have a hit box. The only way to put these out is to place a block over them.

target: &b&l暗夜粉&r:
source: &b&lNocturnal Powder&r:

target: 使用暗夜粉你可以创造一个暂时的刷怪区块。当右击地面时，它会产生一个约四分之一个区块大小黑色的烟雾，并持续约12秒，这里面会生成大量的怪物（大概10只）。生成的怪物名单将根据所在的生物群落和安装模组而变化。如果烟雾中的怪物以某种方式离开烟雾(例如被杀死或自己走出去区域)，更多的怪物将在烟雾中产生!
source: Using the Illumination powder you can also create Nocturnal powder. When right-clicked on the ground it will create a dark patch which will eventually disappear leaving behind a group of mobs. The mobs spawned will vary per biome and the mods installed. If the mobs inside are somehow continuously removed (e.g. killed or pushed out of the area), more mobs will spawn inside the smoke!

target: 使用共鸣星杖可以在地下y轴为 - 4级或更深的地方找到水晶石(上下浮动几级)。挖掘它需要一个钻石镐(只要挖掘等级为黑曜石即可)。警告:水晶石矿石只能由距离它10个格以内的玩家开采，其他任何机械开采(如数字型采矿机)都不会掉落。
source: Rock Crystal ore can be found deep underground at Y-level 4 and below (give or take a few levels up or down) using a Resonating Wand. It requires a Diamond pickaxe (this could be different depending on other mods installed; needs to be able to mine obsidian) to harvest. A warning: Rock Crystal Ore can only be mined by a player standing within 10 blocks of it, anything else (like a quarry) and the ore will drop nothing.

target: 你未来需要更多的水晶石。而且这些水晶石并不容易得到的，所以要谨慎使用。如果你希望从水晶石制作一把剑或一把镐子，请考虑以下几点:
source: You are going to need more Rock Crystals. These are not always easy to come by so use these sparingly. If you wish to make a sword or a pickaxe from Rock Crystal take the following into consideration:

target: &b&l尺寸:&r 代表耐磨性/耐久-越大越好，这将提高工具/武器的耐久。
source: &b&lSize:&r Grindability/Durability - The bigger the better, this will increase the tool/weapon Durability.

target: &b&l纯度:&r 纯度越高，透镜的光线衰减越弱，且打磨时尺寸的减少量越低。这条属性也会影响你的工具和武器，使其更加坚固.
source: &b&lPurity:&r Power of Starlight if used to transmit Starlight, and resistance to loss of size when grinding. This will allow you to sharpen the tool/weapon to make it even stronger.

target: &b&l工具效能:&r 影响对应工具的伤害和效率。
source: &b&lCutting:&r Damage/tool speed

target: 你可以使用普通的水晶石，你也可以增强它们，让它们尺寸变大。将水晶石放入星能液中会增加晶体的总尺寸（最高400）。这个过程很慢，需要一点时间，因此在这一过程中，你可以继续使用磨石。
source: You can use normal Rock Crystals but you can enhance these to make them more powerful. Throwing these into Liquid Starlight will increase the Crystals overall size (up to 400). This is a slow process and could take some time so while that is happening you can move onto making a Grindstone.

target: 现在你应该有了大量的液体星能（星能液桶），是时候合成你的下一个必备物品了！汇星共振器。你需要一桶液体星能（星能液桶）和一个金锭。当然，这必须在星辉合成台上合成。
source: Now that you have a good amount of Liquid Starlight it's time to create your next item, the Fosic Resonator. This will require a bucket of Liquid Starlight and a gold ingot. This must be crafted on the Luminous Crafting Table.

target: 这个小东西可以帮助你找到更高浓度的星能聚集地(如果你需要更多的星能用于制作，那么它很有用)。手持这个小东西，你会发现地上有一些蓝色的斑块。（你只能在晚上看见）如果你飞得太高或太快，你可能看不到这些斑块。
source: This little device will help you find higher concentrations of Starlight (useful if you are having problems with getting enough Starlight for crafting). With this in hand you walk around your world and find patches on the ground that are blue. This needs to be done at night and you may not see these patches if you are flying around too high or too fast.

target: 如上图所示的深蓝色块表示有中等浓度的星能。
source: Dark Blue patches like the one above mean there is a medium concentration of Star Light.

target: &d&l天辉水晶石
source: &d&lCelestial Crystals

target: &d&l聚能水晶
source: &d&lCollector Crystal

target: &d&l增强聚能水晶
source: &d&lEnhanced Collector Crystal

target: &d&l彩色透镜
source: &d&lColoured Lenses

target: &d&l仪式基座
source: &d&lRitual Pedestal

target: &d&l星辉祭坛
source: &d&lStarlight Crafting Altar

target: &d&l星门
source: &d&lCelestial Gateway

target: &d&l共鸣祭坛
source: &d&lAttunement Altar

target: &d&l观星台
source: &d&lObservatory

target: &d&l天辉祭坛
source: &d&lCelestial Altar

target: &d&l群星映射台
source: &d&lStellar Refraction Table

target: &d&l星能注入器
source: &d&lStarlight Infuser

target: &d&l五彩祭坛
source: &d&lIridescent Altar

target: &d&l纳星圣杯
source: &d&lContainment Chalice

target: &d&l仪式锚
source: &d&lRitual Anchor

target: &d&l更替之星
source: &d&lShifting Star

target: &d&l灿芒之星
source: &d&lIrradiant Star

target: &d&l璀璨棱镜
source: &d&lResplendent Prism

target: 聚星缸需要在星辉工作台上制作，需要一些水晶石。现在，鼠标对着水晶石并按住“潜行”键时，你可以看到水晶的一些特性，比如大小、纯度和抛光。在制作您的聚星缸时，最好选择纯度最低的水晶石，因为之后你将需要纯度更高的水晶石。所用水晶的纯度对聚星缸没有影响（但对其他的一些物品有影响）。
source: The Lightwell needs to be crafted in the Luminous Crafting Table and requires a few Rock Crystals. Now when you hover over Rock Crystals and hold sneak you can see some properties of the Rock Crystal such as Size, Purity and Cutting. When crafting your Lightwell make sure you pick the crystal with the LOWEST Purity, because you will need the higher Purity crystals later. The Purity of the crystal used has no effect on the Lightwell (but does for some other crafted blocks).

target: 将聚星缸放在开阔的天空下，然后手持有效物品右键聚星缸，物品就会在聚星缸上生产星能液。物品无法从聚星缸中拿下，会一直生产星能液，直到它们破碎。
source: Put the Lightwell down under an open sky, then right-click the Lightwell with a valid item in hand to create Liquid Starlight. These items can’t be removed from the Lightwell, and will continue to generate Liquid Starlight until they shatter.

target: 有效物品（星光生成率由低到高，破碎概率由高到低）：
source: Valid items starting with the (lowest to highest) starlight generation and (highest to lowest) shatter chance:

target: - 海蓝宝石
source: - Aquamarine

target: - 共鸣宝石
source: - Resonating Gems

target: - 水晶石
source: - Rock Crystals

target: - 共鸣水晶石
source: - Attuned Rock Crystals

target: - 天辉水晶石
source: - Celestial Crystals

target: - 共鸣天辉水晶石
source: - Attuned Celestial Crystals

target: 最好在傍晚就开始这个过程，以便最大限度地生产星能液，因为白天你几乎得不到任何东西。请记住，聚星缸最多只能容纳两桶星能液，因此您需要在附近摆放一个液体容器，以便在生成期间将星能液放入其中。
source: It is best to start this process at the beginning of the night in order to get the most out of your items as you will get little to none during the day. Keep in mind that Lightwells can only hold up to 2 buckets of Liquid Starlight so you will want a liquid container nearby to put Liquid Starlight into during generation.

target: 星能液是流体。它比水流动得快，当你站在里面的时候，你会获得夜视效果，当它水接触时会结冰。与其他MOD一起使用时，它会被判定为寒冷液体。
source: Liquid Starlight behaves similarly to water. It moves WaterMills, flows a lot faster than water, gives you night vision when you stand in it, and it will freeze when in contact with water. When using it with other Mods, please note that it is considered very cold. If you try to extract this liquid via Thermal Expansion Fluid Ducts they will break (you will need to use Reinforced Liquid ducts). Liquid Star Light can be pumped out from the bottom of the Lightwell.

target: 星辉锭是烧炼星辉矿石获得的，没办法通过正常采矿获得。要形成这种矿石，玩家必须先制作连接器，并且需要有一块暴露在天空下的漂浮水晶。
source: Starmetal is the outcome of smelting Starmetal Ore which is unobtainable through mining and must be formed by a player. To form this ore a player must have obtained the linking wand and must have a floating crystal exposed to starlight nearby. (Can be found at Ancient Shrines).

target: 首先，用连接器右键单击浮动晶体，然后单击放置的铁矿石。
source: Start by right clicking the linking wand onto the floating crystal and then onto a placed block of iron ore.

target: 天辉水晶石是水晶石的增强型。是通过将星尘和水晶石扔进星能液中形成的天辉水晶簇长大后形成的。一段时间后，天辉水晶簇会完全长大，用镐子挖掘就可以收获。但不能猴急，因为在一个天辉水晶簇长大之前打破，要么会给你一个低质量的天辉水晶石，要么啥都没有
source: Celestial crystals are enhanced versions of the regular rock crystals that can be mined deep underground. They are created by throwing stardust and a rock crystal into a pool of liquid starlight where a Celestial Crystal cluster will form. After a while the Celestial Crystal cluster will become fully grown and can be harvested by simply mining it with a pickaxe. Don't be hasty though because breaking a cluster before it is ready will either give you a low quality Celestial Crystal or nothing at all!

target: 你可以随意放置/挖掘这些精心制作的聚能水晶（这与你在大型神殿中发现的水晶不同）。这些水晶可以由共鸣天辉水晶石制成，让它成为可用的最大的星能源。使用天辉水晶石而不是水晶石的原因，是因为天辉水晶石尺寸更为庞大。
source: You can place/break these crafted Collector Crystals at will (in contrast to the ones you find in large Shrines). These can be made from Attuned Crystals with high stats to become the most potent sources of Starlight available. The biggest motivation to use Celestial Crystals over Rock Crystals, or to refine the Size, Purity and Cutting of any Crystal, is to make powerful Collector Crystals that you can link to your Celestial Altar. This could allow you to craft at noon, craft in the middle of a rainstorm or for accelerated transmutation.

target: 思考水晶石的属性如何影响聚能水晶的性能的最佳方法是进行类比。但归根结底，如果你只关心产生的星能量，所有数据都很重要。
source: The best way to think about how a Crystal’s stats affect the performance of a Collector Crystal is to use a jeweler's analogy. In the end, all stats matter if you’re just concerned about producing the most Starlight possible.

target: &l大小&r - 晶体的尺寸越大，它可以收集的星能越多。
source: &lSize&r - the larger the size of a Crystal, the more Starlight it can gather (the more surface area it can collect light from).

target: &l纯度&r - 纯度如果很低，是最难具有惩罚性的数据之一，但如果很完美，也是回报最低的数据之一（纯度为90%与100%时，星光差异仅为5%）。它是最难达到最小值和最大值的属性，但反过来说，也是最不需要的属性。
source: &lPurity&r - You can gather all of the Starlight in the world, but it won’t do you any good if the Crystal is occluded or cloudy. Purity is one of the most punishing stats if low, but also one of the least rewarding if absolutely perfect (a purity of 90% versus 100% leads to only about a 5% difference in Starlight). It is the most difficult stat to min-max, but conversely, also the least required.

target: &l抛光&r - 最后，抛光决定了从水晶中射出的星光的最终焦点。你可以收集水晶的所有星光，通过透镜重新聚焦，但如果抛光不高，光线聚焦效果就不会很好。
source: &lCut&r - Lastly, Cut determines the resulting focus of the Starlight coming out of the Crystal. You can gather all the Starlight in the world and redirect through the purest crystal, but if the Cut isn’t good, the light won’t be focused.

target: 聚能水晶这玩意最好还是用天辉聚能水晶，用这玩意要给他摆个多方块结构，具体结构星芒宝典里有，摆了多方块结构就能在白天产星能了。聚能水晶是星辉的星能体系里最重要的。1.16没有这个不行
source: To put it into relative terms, the amount of Starlight produced by Celestial Collectors with strong Crystals, let alone an Enhanced Collector, can allow a player to craft with an Iridescent Altar at noontime or in the middle of a thunderstorm. The amount of Starlight produced renders minor bonuses from elevation close to negligible, but if you still want to min-max, then feel free. As for the Enhanced Collector Structure, it allows a Collector Crystal to be somewhat performant throughout the night, even if its Constellation isn’t in the sky, or during the day. When it comes to Astral Sorcery’s Starlight network, it’s a spectrum of things that affect Starlight production, rather than an on/off switch. Night vs day, Rock Crystal vs Celestial, regular vs enhanced, poor stats vs. perfect stats, Constellation in the night sky, elevation level, Starlight concentration, etc.

target: 这些透镜主要用于他们的效果，而不是聚集星能到祭坛。
source: These should mainly be used for their effects rather than moving Starlight to your altar. Simply right-click a Coloured Lens on to a Lens you have previously placed down.

target: 您可以通过潜行+右键来拆除彩色透镜。每个彩色透镜具有不同的效果：
source: You can remove a Coloured Lens by sneak-right-clicking the Lens. Lenses are also used for crafting. Each Coloured Lense has a different effect:

target: &l破坏（黄色）&r - 破坏方块。破坏时间由方块硬度决定。
source: &lBreak (Yellow)&r - Breaks any block in front of the beam of light. Takes longer to break obsidian.

target: &l生长（绿色）&r - 加速植物和作物生长。
source: &lGrowth (Green)&r - Will encourage plants and crops that are in front of the beam to grow.

target: &l伤害（红色）&r - 会伤害怪物。这是魔法伤害，不会伤害玩家。
source: &lDamage (Red)&r - Will damage any mobs in front of the beam. This is Magical damage and will not hurt players.

target: &l再生（粉色）&r - 会治疗怪物和玩家。不能与再生效果叠加。
source: &lRegeneration (Pink)&r - This will heal mobs and the player. It will not add a regeneration effect.

target: &l抗拒（浅蓝色）&r - 推开物品和怪物。
source: &lPush (Light Blue)&r - Items and mobs will be pushed along by the beam.

target: &l幽芒（紫色）&r- 允许星能穿过固体方块。
source: &lSpectral (Purple)&r- Allows you to project Starlight through walls.

target: 这要在它下方建造一个多方块结构。查看你的星芒宝典获取完整说明。一旦建成，你就可以把你新获得的共鸣水晶石扔进去。一定要照亮多方块结构，这样雪就不会堆积在方块上，取消仪式。
source: This will require a structure built below it. Check your Tome for full instructions. Once built, you can throw in your newly acquired Attuned Rock Crystal. Be sure to illuminate the multiblock structure so that snow will not accumulate on the blocks and cancel the ritual.

target: 这个基座就像一个信标。根据共鸣水晶石的星座，每个效应区域都会有所不同。可以覆盖多达20个方块半径，并且效率取决于您使用的水晶石的大小和纯度（切割属性并不重要）。您可以通过潜行加右键将共鸣水晶石从基座上移除。
source: This Pedestal acts like a beacon. Each area of effect will be different depending on the attunement of the crystal. This beacon can have up to a 20 block radius and is dependant on the Size and Purity stats of the crystal you use (the Cutting attribute does not matter). You can remove the Attuned Crystal from the Pedestal by sneak-right-clicking it.

target: 这是可行的，但是有一种更好的工具来绘测剩下的星座。
source: This works, but there is an easier method to discovering the rest.

target: 如果你能绘测更多的星座，那么你可以在你的星芒宝典中查找这些星座的相关信息。
source: If you are able to discover more Constellations then please do. Looking these Constellations up in your Tome will give you a bit more information on them.

target: 它使你能够制作更强大的物品。为了合成星辉祭坛，你将需要大量的星能和材料(看看你的星芒宝典)。当你在星辉合成台里摆好配方后，用你的共鸣星杖右键单击它，你的星辉合成台将会升级。这需要一些时间，所以一定要在夜晚（大概刚天黑有星星时）做。确保您有正确的材料(一定要注意大理石的类型)用来升级星辉合成台。
source: This will enable you to make more powerful items. To craft this you will need plenty of Starlight and a few materials (please check your Tome). When you have all of these in the Luminous Crafting Table right-click it with your Resonating Wand and your Luminous Crafting Table will upgrade itself. This can take a little while so make sure you do this in the middle of the night. Please ensure that you have the correct materials (pay close attention to the types of marble blocks) to upgrade the Luminous Crafting Table or you may find that you need to craft another Basic Crafting Table to craft Marble.

target: 当你的星辉祭坛升级完成时，你会发现它无法使用。这是因为它需要一个特殊的平台才能使用。如果你看下星辉宝典，它会告诉你如何建造这个平台，以及你需要什么材料(建议使用六分仪来检查结构是否建造完成)。
source: Once your Starlight Crafting Altar is done you will notice that it no longer works. This is because it needs a special platform in order to work. If you look in your Tome it will show you how to build this platform and what materials you need (use the Sextant to help with the layout).

target: 你会发现你的星辉祭坛有一个更大更长的星能条。这个祭坛也需要露天放置，就像使用星辉合成台。这将使星辉祭坛的星能等级跟容易达到full。这会使合成等更加容易。你可以用光波增幅器包围祭坛来使祭坛更容易达到星能满级。
source: You will notice that your Starlight Crafting Altar has a much bigger Starlight Meter. This altar also needs to have access to the sky, just like the Luminous Crafting Table did. It would be beneficial to get the Starlight Crafting Altar’s Starlight Level to full. This will make crafting and other activities easier. You can surround the altar with Spectral Relays to help boost the altar’s Starlight Level.

target: 现在你可以制作一个天文望远镜并将其放置在高处（远离建筑物和树木）。这可以让你更方便的测绘星座。
source: Craft a Telescope and place it down in a high place (away from buildings and trees). This will enable you to look at the stars and find other Constellations. The telescope will let you draw out these Constellation without needing to sneak and will let you scroll left and right without having to look around.

target: 这需要一个水晶石，但不需要看它的属性。然后要为星门建造一个多方块结构。具体可以在星芒宝典找到。
source: This requires a Rock Crystal but there is no need to worry about its attributes. You also need to build a structure for the Celestial Gateway to sit on. The design can be found in the Tome.

target: 一旦多方块结构完成并放置好星门，你的星门周围会出现特效。进入这个区域后，一个黑暗的圆顶就会出现在你周围。您可以在您的世界（和其他维度）中构建更多星门，它们会相互链接。
source: Once the base is complete and the Celestial Gateway placed down, your Celestial Gateway should light up around the black blocks. Once you step inside this area a dark dome appears around you that stops at ground level. This is a teleportation pad. You can build more of these in your world (and other dimensions) and they will link to each other.

target: 当您建造了多个星门时，圆顶上将出现一颗金星，代表其他星门。这些星星出现在圆顶中，所以你不管在哪都能够找到它们。如果路上有任何东西（如一棵树）遮挡，您可能无法完全看到整个圆顶。
source: When you have built more than one, a gold star will appear in the dome indicating the other gateway(s). These stars will be above ground level you so you will always be able to find them. If there is anything in the way (such as a tree) you will may not be able to see the whole dome.

target: 您可以在铁砧中重命名星门，这将创建一个名字显示在星星上，这样方便您区分不同的位置。如果你站在星门上，潜行右击一颗金星，你会被传送到那个金星代表的星门位置。这些也适用于地狱、末地和mods添加的其他维度。
source: You can rename the gateway in an anvil which will create a small caption appearing on the star while looking at it, allowing you to differentiate between different locations.If you stand in the middle of the dome and sneak-right-click on a gold star, you will be teleported to that location. These also work in the Nether, End and other dimensions added by mods.

target: 这将允许您指定您能够获得的晶体或能量。让望远镜靠近天坛。你不仅要制作一个共鸣祭坛，还需要为这个共鸣祭坛建造一个多方块结构。这玩意可以在星芒宝典找到。
source: This will allow you to specify the Crystals or powers that you are able to attain. Keep your telescope close to the Celestial Altar. Not only will you need to make an Attunement Altar but you will also need to build another altar for this to sit on. This can be found in your Tome.

target: 当你看到共鸣祭坛周围的地面出现特效时，就证明共鸣祭坛可以使用了。还要一些星辉转继器，然后要选择一个对应星座来共鸣（星座属性可以在星芒宝典看到）。拿一张星图在手上。在共鸣祭坛周围地面上，你会看到一些蓝色粒子特效（只能在晚上看到）。
source: You will know the platform is right when you see lots of little sparkles on the ground around the Attunement Altar.You will also need a few Spectral Relays and you will need to pick a constellation to attune yourself to (these can be found by sneak-right-clicking your Tome).Take a Constellation Paper and put it in your off-hand. While in the Attunement Altar you will see little blue swirls on the ground that match the Constellation (you can only see this at night).

target: 在有蓝色粒子特效的地方放下星辉转继器。成功后，星辉转继器会连接出对应星座图形。
source: Put down Spectral Relays where the swirls appear. Once successful, the lines will connect and look like the Constellation. You can put more Relays down for other Constellations but remove at least ONE Relay from the previous Constellation (only one complete Constellation can be active at once). This will save you time in the future because you will just need to put one Relay down for a Constellation rather then all of them.

target: 为了共鸣星座，你需要绘测对应星座，而且它在共鸣当晚必须出现在天空中。这过程有可能要几天时间，也要靠运气。如果你选择的星座没有出现，那就不能共鸣。你任何时候都可以通过改变星辉转继器的摆放来改变你想要共鸣到的星座。
source: For this to work you will have needed to discover the Constellation in the sky and it must also be in the sky on that night. This process could take a few days and relies on a little luck sometimes. If your chosen Constellation is not in the sky then this process will not work. You can always change what Constellation you want to attune to by changing the Relays.

target: 一旦你需要共鸣的星座出现天空中，进入共鸣祭坛。共鸣完成后，就会解锁“星能力”。
source: Once your Constellation is in the sky, step into the Attunement Altar and wait. Once the process has completed, you will have unlocked “perks”.

target: 有些比较暗淡的星座，只有通过观星台才能发现，因为它们离我们很远。当把观星台放下后，你可以右击进入观星台。进去后，你可以看到夜空。移动鼠标来移动视角。寻找和绘制星座就像使用望远镜一样。
source: These are Faint Constellations and can only be found with the Observatory because they are further away. When placed down, you will be able to get into the Observatory by right-clicking the seat. Once inside you will be able to see the night sky. Moving your mouse around will scan the night sky.Searching and drawing out the constellations works just like the looking glass.

target: 这些新的星座是紫色的，当被你发现后，就可以在夜空中看到。
source: The new constellations are purple and can be seen in the night sky once found.

target: 你也可以用观星台去寻找其他你还没有找到的星座。
source: You can also use the Observatory to find any other Constellations that you have not found.

target: 制作天辉祭坛需要很多星能和材料。祭坛本身也需要有一个物理升级（指改造平台），就像之前的升级星辉祭坛一样，你将材料放入星辉祭坛中，用共鸣星杖右键单击它，然后等待奇迹的出现。
source: This requires a lot of Starlight and a few materials. The Celestial Altar also needs to have a physical upgrade, but this can be done once the altar block itself has been upgraded. Just like the previous upgrade, you place the materials into the Starlight Crafting Altar, right-click it with your Resonating Wand and wait for the magic.

target: 在构建新的结构时，确保你查看了星芒宝典，并旋转图像，查看方块应该放在哪里(或使用六分仪)。
source: When building the new structure, make sure you check the Tome and rotate the image to see exactly where blocks should be placed (or use the Sextant).

target: 当祭坛的正确建造完成后，你会注意到有更多的合成格用于合成。
source: Once the Celestial Altar has been built and upgraded you will notice there are even more spaces in the crafting grid.

target: 当把这个台子放下后，用一块聚能玻璃（注星玻璃）右键它(记住，这种玻璃是有耐久的)。打开映射台后，UI会改变。映射台还需要羊皮纸。映射台内部可以容纳一组羊皮纸(右击放入)。（作者的死亡语序）（所以增加下百科的注释：先将聚能玻璃与羊皮纸右键放入映射台，然后打开GUI，将发现过的星座拖入中央的羊皮纸，拖入3个星座并尽量使较多的星上下重叠。此操作可能失败，失败只消耗羊皮纸，聚能玻璃会保留；成功后聚能玻璃变成蚀刻玻璃。）
source: Once the Table is placed down, right-click it with a single piece of Infused Glass (bear in mind that this glass has a durability). Once in the Table the UI will change. The Table also requires Parchment. It can hold about a stack of Parchment (right-click with it to insert).

target: 当玻璃变成蚀刻玻璃时，你就可以放入待附魔物品（须具有附魔能力）或水瓶。得到附魔物品（具体魔咒与物品种类和蚀刻玻璃属性有关）与药水星之酿（Stardew），前者若是盔甲、武器或工具，则会附带一定的属性增益。此操作会消耗蚀刻玻璃的耐久。
source: The basic idea behind this is that once you have inserted your glass and Parchment, you can then add up to three Constellations to the Parchment. Then you can etch the Constellations you selected to the glass. Once the glass has been etched you can take the Parchment away and insert items, potions or books. Over time these will become enchanted. This is heavily dependant on what Constellations you have found and what Constellations are currently in the sky. This table also does not work if the moon is too low to the horizon (early evening or early morning).

target: Here is a step-by-step:   （往下翻
source: Here is a step-by-step:

target: 建造这个多方块结构，比以前所建造的祭坛更复杂，因为它需要大量的星能液体。 （12桶）
source: This requires a structure to be built and is a bit more complicated than previous altars because it requires Liquid Starlight.

target: 这个祭坛需要在它周围建一个新的建筑。这只需要在祭坛顶部放置少量的方块。建成后，它将为你的祭坛添加一些新的功能。当水晶出现在你的祭坛上方时，你就会知道五彩祭坛已经完成了。 （若玩家在升级到五彩祭坛的过程中，中间的祭坛方块没有被移动过，那么搭建五彩祭坛结构时就可以在原有的天辉祭坛结构的基础上从第五层继续搭建，只需另外消耗 28 个大理石砖用于建造。玩家正确建造五彩祭坛结构后，祭坛结构最高层中间会出现一个有光芒特效的天体水晶模型，这是纯粹的视觉效果，任何实体都可以自由穿梭，而且不会发光。）
source: This altar will need a new structure around it. This only takes a few blocks around the top of the altar. Once built it will add a few new features around your altar. You will know this is done when a crystal appears above your altar.

target: 这是一种流体容器，比聚星缸容量更大，体积为 1 格高，能储存 64000 mB 流体。
source: Right-click your altar to begin the crafting process. As the process goes on, you will notice the relays will have a “Ghost” image of the item that it requires. Right-click the item into the relay.

target: 如果附近放置了存有不同流体的杯子，当两种流体能发生反应时，杯子周围会生成对应的掉落物。比如水和熔岩会生成圆石、水和星能液会生成冰、熔岩和星能液会生成沙子或海蓝宝石砂岩。
source: These Chalices do not have an inventory so the Ice will drop on the ground until they disappear or get picked up. Another great thing is that the ice created does not use up a whole bucket of each liquid, so 24 buckets should net you a few stacks of ice.

target: 如果杯子附近有聚星缸，则缸内的流体会被抽取道杯中。杯子会自动为它下方的万象泉补充星能液，并且从周围的万象泉抽取流体。杯子会增加它附近的星能聚合器的工作速率，并自动补充星能聚合器消耗的星能液（而且这样比手动补充更节省星能液）。
source: You can also put 2 Chalices filled with water and Lava next to each other and have the same effect but instead of ice it will form cobblestone, smooth stone or obsidian at random.

target: 一对仪式锚可以让你移动仪式基座的效果区域。
source: A pair of Ritual Anchors will enable you to move the area of effect of your Pedestal’s ritual. An example would be if you wanted to have Aevitas above your home, far away from your Pedestal.

target: 首先，把你想要效果的星座对应水晶石放进仪式基座。然后在仪式基座上方五个方块位置放置一个仪式锚。把第二个仪式锚放置在很远的地方，绑定两个仪式锚，仪式效果会在第二个位置起作用。
source: First you must place your desired Attuned Rock Crystal into the Pedestal. Then you need to place a Ritual Anchor five blocks above the Pedestal. When the second anchor is placed in a remote location, bind both of the Anchors and you will notice that the ritual effect works in the second location.

target: 在绑定时将连接器拿在手中（不要换成其他物品）。可以用于任何数量的不同星座。
source: Ensure that you keep the Linking Tool in your hand while binding these (don’t change to another item). This can be used with any number of the different Constellations.

target: 长按右键使用，会清除你的星能力。这会清除你所有的星能力等级。这些等级将需要一些时间来重新提升，所以确保你100%确定想要清除星能力。
source: This can be used just like a bow (it will draw back and then break) and will clear your Attunement. This will undo all your progress with that attunement. Some of these attunements will take some time to progress through so make sure you are 100% sure you want to clear your attunement.

target: 如果你星能力选择了错误的星座，或者你选择了你不想要的星能力，那么你可以重置这些，重置后会让你保留星能力点数，并让你再次使用它们。
source: Now if you have selected the wrong “Root” (constellation) or you have selected perks you don't want then you can reset these, resetting these will still keep any perk points you have earnt and let you spend them again.

target: 你有五种灿芒之星可以选择，使用其中任何一颗都可以使你保持对应共鸣，并移除其他。
source: There are 5 stars you can use, using any of these stars will KEEP the attunement you want and remove the others.

target: 这个小玩意将增加你主手或副手中佩戴或装备物品的对应附魔等级。璀璨棱镜将添加最多3个不同的（随机）附魔。这也适用于由其他MOD添加的附魔。
source: This Bauble will add levels to random enchants on the items you are wearing or have equipped in your main or off hand. The Prism will add up to 3 different (random) enchant levels. This can also apply to enchants added by other mods. It is also very important to know that levels are added to EXISTING enchants.

target: &9血魔法
source: &9Blood Magic

target: *完成任务&b&l&o活石&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oLivingrock&r quest*

target: 它增加了一个以血液获取的生命源质为基础的魔法系统，包括仪式，献祭，召唤，炼金术和法术创造。在血魔法中，玩家通过献祭自己的生命值或生物的生命值来收集生命精华（通过用献祭匕首剌手指或者献祭刀砍人来获得生命源质），从而推动自己血魔法造诣，最终成为真正的血魔法师。
source: It adds an expansive life-based magic system which spans rituals, sacrifices, summoning, alchemy and spell creation. In Blood Magic, the player collects Life Essence by sacrificing their own health or the health of mobs to power their Blood Magic creations on their quest to become an Archmage.

target: &4&l我该怎样开始？
source: &4&lWhat do I need to get started?

target: 好吧，只要你有一些红石、铁、金、青金石和一些钻石，你就可以开始你的第一次。但深入钻研mod的花费就相当……贵了。
source: Well, you can really get your first start as soon as you have some Redstone, Iron, Gold, Lapis Lazuli, and a couple of Diamonds. But delving deeper into the mod can get quite... expensive.

target: &4&l血  魔  法
source: &4&lWelcome to Blood Magic

target: 一级血之祭坛
source: Blood Altar Tier: I

target: 血之祭坛会将自身容量上限的10%LP吸收到它内部一个不可见的流体槽中，这一流体槽可从祭坛提取出LP或是向祭坛提供LP。
source: The Blood Altar has an internal storage buffer of 1,000 LP that must be filled before crafting can occur. The altar can be expanded into a multiblock structure in order to access more powerful tiers of transmutation. Currently there are six tiers of Blood Altars, although only 5 of them can be made in survival mode since there is no way (by default) to craft the Crystal Clusters needed for the last tier. Some packs allow Crystal Clusters to be crafted using custom recipes with a config option enabling the recipes.

target: 最简单的一层熏香祭坛只需要将熏香祭坛摆放在任意地点，即可以在熏香祭坛约五格范围内获得一个静谧效果。初始的静谧效果会让你物品栏中的牺牲匕首发生一些显而易见的变化，同时变更你使用这个匕首献血的机制（这个变化只维持一次，你可以靠近祭坛来重新获得效果）。获得静谧效果的牺牲匕首在使用时会直接抽取使用者当前生命值的90%，并提供一定的加成后注入到附近的鲜血祭坛中（多出的能量会浪费）。一层的熏香祭坛可以提供20%的能量加成，而想要提升这个数值，你需要使用不同材质的路面扩大祭坛的规模，并且在规定的区域内放置一些能够提供静谧值的方块或是液体（也包括作物）。各种材质的路面都有两种纹理，如何搭配并不影响祭坛效果。但是你需要保持四个方向的规模是一致的才能发挥出想要的效果。虽然熏香祭坛分成5层，但事实上，你每向外扩大一格，都会有一定的效果提升。同样的，每一圈路面可以在内圈路面的上下五格之内放置（血染知书中这么说到），但是同一圈路面需要保持水平。
source: The Sacrificial Knife transforms into the Sacrificial Dagger when the player is within 6 blocks from the Incense Altar. The Dagger cannot be used unless it is within 2 blocks of a Blood Altar. It drains 90% of current health and applies bonus LP depending on the bonus given by the Incense Altar; use a Divination Sigil on the Incense Altar to see its Current Tranquility and Current Bonus.

target: 静谧方块：静谧方块就是能够提供静谧值的方块（液体和植物），而足够的静谧值可以提高熏香祭坛对能量转化的加成值，这个值对应每一层都有其上限。
source: For the Altar's tiers described below, intercardinal directions are used for tranquility blocks and each tier requires extra area. The path blocks can be placed within a vertical difference of 1 block from the previous level, but all cardinal directions require the same pattern. Tranquility spaces can be placed at most two blocks higher than their respective path blocks.

target: 牺牲匕首为血之祭坛产生LP的两种方式之一
source: The Sacrificial Knife is one of two ways to generate LP in the Blood Altar

target: 创造模式下，在血之祭坛旁shift右键牺牲匕首可以把血之祭坛填满。
source: By right clicking the Sacrificial Knife next to a Blood Altar, the user will lose a full heart and place 200 LP into the altar. This amount can be further increased by placing Runes of Self-sacrifice around the altar.

target: 通过手持其右击投掷射中除自身外的目标有1/4概率使他们获得BUFF（此BUFF显示的粒子效果为白色），然后杀死他们你将获得他们的‘恶魔意志’（获得的‘恶魔意志’均为随机）.
source: Right-click to throw it at a mob. If the Snare connects, it is bewitched for a few seconds (displayed by white particles). Killing the mob under this condition causes the mob to drop Demonic Will.

target: 有志者事竟成。
source: Where there's a Will, there's a way​

target: 最普通的恶魔意志当玩家使用灵魂投网扔向怪物后，击杀怪物可以获得。
source: The Demonic Will is an item, which can be gathered with the Rudimentary Snare or Sentient Sword from monsters. Every monster can only drop one demonic will with a randomly generated amount of willpower, which is displayed in the inventory. The Demonic Will is required for some recipes in the Hellfire Forge. The player can also store the willpower into the gems for an easier transport, because the Demonic Will are not stackable and can not be recharged.

target: 空白石板是一种制作材料，主要用于符文创造
source: Blank Slates are a crafting ingredient that are primarily used in rune and sigil creation

target: 用于制作狱火熔炉、空白符文、速度符文、炼金术桌、原始燃料单元、原始水化单元。
source: Blank slates are used in the creation of Sigils.

target: 二级血之祭坛
source: Blood Altar Tier: II

target: 三级血之祭坛
source: Blood Altar Tier: III

target: 四级血之祭坛
source: Blood Altar Tier: IV

target: 用于参与部分合成或是存储LP至玩家的灵魂网络中。
source: The Weak Blood Orb is a Life Essence (LP) storage method within Blood Magic

target: 参与合成的时候不会消耗气血宝珠，比配方需求更高级别的气血宝珠均可参与合成。
source: The Weak Blood Orb converts the Life Essence contained within an altar into a stored form of energy for items such as the Lava Crystal and the various rituals. This stored Essence cannot be turned back into a physical liquid, and will be stored to the owner's network. This tier of orb is capable of storing up to 5,000 LP. This number can only be raised by using higher tier orbs, or by placing the Rune of the Orb around the Blood Altar.

target: 右键气血宝珠会与气血宝珠绑定，然后通过损失3点生命值给灵魂网络存储200LP。
source: To use the Weak Blood Orb, it must first be bound to the owner. To do so, right click while holding the orb. Once bound, it will raise the owner's network storage to a total of 5,000 LP. It will also allow the user to right click while holding it, consuming a full heart and adding 200 LP to the owner's network. If the player is a Vampire, their blood will be drained rather than their health.

target: 这是血魔法第二级的气血宝珠
source: The Apprentice Blood Orb is the second level of blood orbs within Blood Magic

target: 它能存在25,000LP
source: This tier of blood orb allows the owner to store up to 25,000 LP in their network.

target: 这是血魔法第三级的气血宝珠
source: The Magician's Blood Orb is the third level of blood orbs within Blood Magic

target: 它能存储150,000LP
source: This tier of blood orb allows the owner to store up to 150,000 LP in their network.

target: 这是血魔法第四级的气血宝珠
source: The Master Blood Orb is the fourth level of blood orbs within Blood Magic
This tier of blood orb allows the owner to store up to 1,000,000 LP in their network.

target: 用于创造炼金矩阵，最大可用20次。
source: The Arcane Ashes is used to create the Alchemy Array, which is needed for the new way to create the sigils

target: 通过炼金矩阵合成其他物品或是执行仪式。
source: The Arcane Ashes are crafted in the Hellfire Forge with one Redstone, Bone Meal, Gunpowder and Coal. To perform the process, a Demonic Will or one of the gems are needed.

target: 在血之祭坛的3*3范围内攻击生物可以秒杀他们，并提供一定的lp。
source: The Dagger of Sacrifice is a weapon used to sacrifice creatures for Life Essence

target: 献祭量：敌对（中立）生物<被动生物<村民
source: The amount varies per creature, and can be further increased through the use of Runes of Sacrifice.

target: 以下是没有被献祭符文增幅的献祭刀所给予的lp量。
source: The Dagger of Sacrifice must be used within about three blocks of the Blood Altar. When used on a valid target, the target will instantly be killed and its Life Essence will be drained into the altar. Creatures that are considered children cannot be sacrificed. The amount of essence varies per creature:

target: 敌对（中立）生物每次献祭的量约为其生命值（不是最大生命值）的22.5~27.5倍之间。（玩家召唤的铁傀儡属于这一类）
source: - Animals (Cows, sheep, etc.) = 250 LP

target: 被动生物每次献祭的量约为其生命值的65~100倍左右。（狐狸不算被动生物）
source: - Hostile Mobs (Creepers, Zombies, etc.) = 500 LP

target: 村民每次献祭的量固定为1900lp。（流浪商人不算，算在敌对那一栏）
source: - Villagers = 2,000 LP

target: 通过使用地狱魂石中的恶魔意志对物品进行合成
source: The Hellfire Forge is a device, which requires Demonic Will or a Tartaric Gem in the right slot that has enough default will to meet the required minimum will. All recipes are shapeless, and ingredients can be in any slot.

target: 每个合成配方都有预设的最少意志和消耗意志，且消耗意志永远小于或等于最少意志。只有当地狱魂石中恶魔意志大于等于最少意志时才能合成。
source: The drain amount will be subtracted from the stored will. The Demonic Will/Tartaric Gem will not be lost. Both minimum and drain will amounts can be seen in JEI when hovering over the arrow.

target: 用于储存恶魔意志，以便在狱火熔炉合成其他物品。手持地狱魂石右键可将恶魔意志转移到其他地狱魂石。不同的地狱魂石能存储的原生意志不同：
source: This demonic will can be gathered with the Rudimentary Snare or Sentient Sword and is automatically stored into the gem, when the player picks up a Demonic Will. The Petty Tartaric Gem is required for some recipes in the Hellfire Forge and can also be used as source for demonic will for the special attack of the Sentient Sword.

target: 感知工具的基础攻击速度：4，攻击伤害1点。其他效果均和对应的铁制工具相同。
source: This Raw Will is automatically added to the top left most Raw Will Tartaric Gem in the player's inventory. If all available Raw Will Gems are full, mobs will drop Demonic Will. It is capable of being enchanted. It can also be repaired by using a Demon Will Crystal in the Anvil.

target: 用于放置意志晶体或地狱魂石两者之一，将它们蕴含的恶魔意志散布到当前区块中。一个区块最多可以释放100点恶魔意志。
source: Right clicking with a Tartaric Gem or Demonic Will Crystal will insert it into the Demon Crucible and transfer the will of the source into aura stored inside the chunk. Each chunk can hold 100 Will at a time and will type is preserved.

target: 用于生成恶魔意志晶簇
source: The Demon Crystallizer is a device used for growing Will Crystals Clusters by draining the chunk's Aura, created in a Demon Crucible

target: 当区块内的恶魔意志大于0时将在恶魔结晶坛上生成晶簇。
source: Each Crystal Cluster can have 7 crystals maximum. A default Raw Will Aura has a 90% chance of Demon Will Crystal Cluster and 2.5% each for Corrosive Will Crystal Cluster, Destructive Will Crystal Cluster, Steadfast Will Crystal Cluster, or Vengeful Will Crystal Cluster. All other Aura types will only grow new Clusters of its own type. Once formed into a Crystal Cluster, only Raw Will or the Aura of its type can be used to grow additional crystals. Raw Aura is significantly slower at growing clusters of different types.

target: 区块内的恶魔意志越多，生成速度就越快。
source: A Will Crystal Cluster can be broken with a pickaxe, yielding one Will Crystal per crystal. A single crystal can also be harvested by right clicking with an empty hand while holding a Tartaric Gem with over 1024 Raw Will total across gems. Right clicking will not remove the last crystal in the cluster.

target: 恶魔意志结晶
source: Resonance of the Faceted Crystal

target: 不同的意志晶体通过破坏对应种类的意志晶簇获得
source: With Demonic Will Crystals in hand, the careful process of separating out their base essences may begin.

target: 可用于合成大块地狱魂石，原始共鸣器；同时可以反向合成为对应的意志晶簇。
source: Prepare another Demon Crystallizer and construct the Resonance of the Faceted Crystal ritual. Place the Crystallizer atop the Master Ritual Stone and begin pouring Will into the chunk by way of a Crucible.

target: 不同种类的意志晶体可用于在部分仪式中调整仪式的效果。
source: Eventually, another crystal will form here within the bounds of the ritual. Once it has fully grown, the ritual will fragment it into its elemental essences, growing four new crystal types around it which may be harvested in the same way as the previous Demonic Will Crystals.

target: 意志结晶
source: Will Crystals

target: &9植物魔法
source: &9Botania

target: &3&l欢迎来到植物魔法
source: &3&lWelcome to Botania

target: *完成&b&l&o灌注石&r 任务后解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oInfused Rock&r quest*

target: 植物魔法是一个自然风格的魔法模组
source: Botania is a tech mod themed around natural magic.

target: 主要玩法是制造产能花产出魔力（mana）和制造功能花来达成某些目的
source: Gameplay is centered around creating magical flowers and devices using Mana, the power of the earth.

target: 植物魔法完全可以自成一体（虽然其本来就是），但是，它和其他模组的兼容性一向很好
source: Botania is fully playable as a standalone mod (and is designed as such), but it functions just well in conjunction with other mods.

target: 这是个专注于自动化的模组（机械动力：？），但是却没有那些死板的元素：自动化系统可以由玩家自己设计，而不是照抄jei或者蓝图
source: The mod focuses on automation, but without elements that make it feel grindy-- systems can be thought out and designed, rather than built blindly from blueprints in JEI or a wiki.

target: &3&l符文祭坛
source: &3&lRunic Altar

target: 符文是合成高级功能花和产能花的重要材料，它们在符文祭坛上制作
source: Runes are vital components of complex magical devices or flora, created on a Runic Altar

target: 为了合成符文，首先你要把合成符文的材料放入符文祭坛（q上去或者右击），符文祭坛将会显示你想制作的符文
source: To use a Runic Altar, start by placing (via either a right-click or a simple toss) the components of the rune you want to create upon the altar.

target: 给符文祭坛连上一个魔力发射器（你不会不知道怎么连，对吧），供应魔力，使用森林法杖可以很容易的知道还需要多少魔力，进度条也十分明显；当魔力足够，你只需要用一块活石右击（或者q上去）祭坛，就可以用森林法杖取下你的符文了
source: Point a Mana Spreader with a supply of Mana at the altar, and let the Mana flow.Your wand will show you the progress of the transfer; it should be apparent when the altar has received enough Mana. When that happens, just drop or right-click a piece of Livingrock upon the altar, then use the wand on it to collect your rune.

target: 如果符文祭坛没有接受魔力，那么shift右击符文祭坛可以取下上面的最后一个物品，接受魔力时，符文祭坛将发出等级为1的红石信号（需要红石比较器），准备合成符文时，则发出等级为2的红石信号
source: Sneak-right clicking the Runic Altar with an empty hand while it's not accepting mana will pull out the last item input.Additionally, an attached Comparator will emit signal strength 1 if the altar is accepting Mana, and signal strength 2 if it's ready to craft the rune.

target: &3&l火花们
source: &3&lSparks

target: 这是个有趣儿的东西……
source: Sparks are interesting things

target: 火花由最精纯的能量与魔法组成（不是友谊我不是很认可），它们只能放在特定的几个方块上，一些方块可以从火花里接收魔力，尤其是魔力池；一些方块可以通过火花主动吸收魔力，但是目前为止，它们没什么用
source: Created from a combination of raw energy and Mana, they can be placed only on a few specific Mana-containing or -accepting blocks (notably Mana Pools).Certain blocks have the ability to harness Mana from Sparks, but as of now their uses are sparse.

target: 将一个火花放在魔力池上，另一个放在可以放置火花的方块上，后者就会通过火花快速从魔力池里吸取魔力（比发射器快多了），如果你要移除火花，只需要用森林法杖shift右击它就行，普通的右击会显示火花的连接目标
source: Placing a Spark over a Mana Pool and another over a nearby block that can accept it will allow the latter to access the former's reserves on demand.To remove a Spark, simply sneak-right click it with a Wand of the Forest. Regular right-clicking will show which other Sparks this one can transfer to.

target: 火花可以被染料染色，不同色的火花之间老死不相往来，你也可以试试对它们使用幻影墨水，这可以让它们的不透明度降低到一个令人发指的地步，如果你真的觉得它们看起来太难看的话
source: Sparks can be dyed with Dye; sparks with different colors will never interact. They can also be splashed with a bit of Phantom Ink to make them highly translucent (in case you think they look too obtrusive).

target: &3&l盖亚仪式
source: &3&lRitual of Gaia

target: 盖亚仪式是精灵们家喻户晓的仪式
source: The Ritual of Gaia is a trial often undertaken by elves

target: 这场仪式将会召唤盖亚之灵（即盖亚守护者，作者硬要说是盖亚之灵我也没辙），它们是盖亚女神力量的碎片，这场仪式需要四个盖亚水晶和一个被激活的信标（详见：盖亚仪式），以及一个泰拉钢锭作为祭品
source: It yields Gaia Spirits, which are coveted as fragments of the power of the Goddess of Gaia herself.This ritual requires an Active Beacon with Gaia Pylons surrounding it (functioning as an altar), as well as a single Terrasteel Ingot (as a sacrifice).

target: 你只需要用泰拉钢锭shift右击信标，就可以启动仪式，接下来，为了财富与荣誉而战，孩子！注意，盖亚守护者的战斗可能比和凋灵战斗更加困难，在击杀盖亚守护者之后，一些盖亚之魂讲和战利品一起给予挑战者（场外摸鱼的也算）
source: To start the ritual, simply sneak-right click the Beacon with the Terrasteel Ingot, take a step back, and prepare to fight for your life. Preparation is absolutely required-- the fight with the Guardian of Gaia can be even harder than that with the Wither. Upon the Guardian's defeat, a handful of Spirits of Gaia is dropped as a prize.

target: 挑战盖亚守护者的标准装备是一套源质钢铠甲（正经人谁穿这玩意），一把泰拉之刃，一大堆药水和一堆饰品，盖亚守护者的血条很厚，所以饰品和药水是必要的（饰品可以，药水未必）
source: Standard gear for this ritual is a set of enchanted Elementium Armor, a Terra Blade, and a miscellany of Brews and Trinkets. Do note that the Beacon's effect is forcibly nullified during the battle.The Guardian has a massive pool of health, so preparing with Enchantments and Brews is a must!

target: 仪式的难度取决于参与者，超过五个人的盖亚仪式将会是一场毁灭性的灾难（这个包并不），最后，远离地上的紫色地雷！
source: The difficulty of (and reward yielded by) the ritual depends on the number of people participating. Performing the ritual with over five people in the vicinity can be a recipe for disaster with the chaos created, so rituals on that scale probably shouldn't be attempted.Lastly, it might be a good idea to stay away from the purple.

target: &3&l神秘花
source: &3&lMystical Flowers

target: 遍布世界各地，无处不在
source: Around the world, you may stumble upon a large variety of Mystical Flowers

target: 发现这些花非常容易，因为它们样貌和其他植物想比不能说是鹤立鸡群，也只能说是烘云托月
source: Spotting these flowers doesn't take much work, as they glow faintly and sparkle.They come in a total of 16 different colors. These flowers can also be grown with Floral Fertilizer.

target: 这些花的花瓣用于制作产能花和功能花，同时，你可以把花瓣种在地上，会散发出粒子效果
source: These flowers can be plucked for Mystical Petals, which are used in the creation of magical instruments and plants. Right-clicking a petal upon the ground will bury it, making it emit particles.

target: 世界上还有一类变种神秘花，它们高两格，想要采集它们必须使用剪刀，它们的产量是普通花的两倍，不过它们太大了，并不能做成荧光花
source: There're also some taller variants of the typical Mystical Flowers around the world. These can only be gathered with Shears, but can be plucked for twice the petals a normal flower would yield. They're a bit too big for dye, though.

target: 高神秘花可以通过对普通神秘花使用骨粉或者对种下的花瓣使用骨粉获得，如果你放心你缺某种颜色的花瓣，可以试试种点
source: Tall flower variants can be made manually by fertilizing a Mystical Flower or a Buried Petal with Bone Meal.If you find yourself running low on a particular color, try burying a petal of that color and using Bone Meal on it

target: &3&l花肥
source: &3&lFloral Fertilizer

target: 功如其名
source: This Floral Fertilizer will grow a few Mystical Flowers in the nearby vicinity, if you ever run low on those

target: 通过把骨粉和各种颜料混在一起，你就能得到花肥
source: By mixing Dye with some Bone Meal, you'll create a different type of fertilizer.

target: &3&l花药台
source: &3&lPetal Apothecary

target: 用于制造各种功能花
source: To create plant life that can do their bidding, a botanist needs a special means of infusing plants with mystical energy

target: 把这个方块放在地上并用你可以想到的办法给它点水（水桶右键，发射器供水，丢个水桶上去，海洋法杖），然后往里面扔神秘花花瓣之类的合成材料，当材料凑齐之后，往里面扔种子（小麦种子西瓜种子什么的都行）
source: This block, when placed in the world and given some water (by right-clicking or throwing in a Water Bucket), will accept any Mystical Petals thrown into it, absorbing their energies.Once the correct petals have been provided, throwing any Seeds in will finalize the crafting process.

target: &l白雏菊:
source: &lPure Daisy:

target: 你能获得的第一朵功能花，用于把原木与石头转化为活木，活石；这些材料都是植物魔法中最基础也是不可或缺的材料
source: Far from being just the most basic, the Pure Daisy is the most important flower a botanist can have.This flower will purify any adjacent Wood and Stone blocks (as seen on the next page) into their purified counterparts, Livingwood and Livingrock. These resources are important crafting materials throughout a botanist's career.

target: 白雏菊不止可以用于转化活木活石，还有一些其他的作用，那些配方虽然没那么重要，但是也可以提供一些帮助，如:下界岩转换为圆石，灵魂沙变成沙子，冰变成浮冰，水变成雪等
source: A few other blocks can also be purified by placing them around the flower. While not as unique and essential as the living blocks, these recipes still can come in handy: Netherrack purifies into Cobblestone, Soul Sand into Sand, Ice into Packed Ice, and Water into Snow.

target: &3&l活木 \\& 活石
source: &3&lLivingwood \\& Livingrock

target: 植物魔法中最基础也是最不可或缺的材料
source: These resources are important crafting materials throughout a botanist's career

target: 见白雏菊任务介绍
source: Pure Daisy will purify any adjacent Wood and Stone blocks into their purified counterparts, Livingwood and Livingrock.

target: &3&l魔力池
source: &3&lMana Pool

target: 功如其名
source: The Mana Pool is, simply put, a storage for Mana

target: 这需要一个魔力发射器来为魔力池充能，同时，任何紧贴着魔力池的魔力发射器都会从魔力池里提取魔力，功能花会从范围内的魔力池提取魔力供自己使用
source: It accepts mana from Mana Spreaders, and any adjacent ones will fill from it automatically.All Functional Flora require a nearby Mana Pool to draw power from.

target: 魔力池有两种版本，1是稀释魔力池，2是存量是稀释魔力池100倍的普通魔力池，在任何合成里提及的魔力池都是后者
source: Mana Pools come in two types: a weaker, Diluted variety which stores a very small amount of Mana, and a Normal variety, which stores a hundred times more than the diluted kind.Whenever \"Mana Pool\" is referred to elsewhere, it refers to a normal one.

target: 稀释魔力池可以作为一朵功能花或者一台不消耗很多魔力的机器的缓冲器，因为普通魔力池的存量太大了，导致其显示很不准，它的比例导致魔力条增长的异常缓慢
source: The Diluted Mana Pool can be useful as a small buffer for a flower or system that doesn't use much Mana, as a normal pool holds a lot of it. Thanks to that, Mana readings for a normal pool won't be very precise: due to its scale, the displayed bar's size on a normal pool will increase very slowly.

target: 魔力池可以用于合成物品，比如魔力钢和魔力珍珠，森林法杖可以读取魔力池内的魔力量，比较器也可以根据魔力量输出信号
source: Tossing certain resources into a Mana Pool will infuse them with Mana from the pool, turning them into more magically-useful forms, like Manasteel Ingots or Mana Pearls.A Wand of the Forest can read the Mana levels in a pool, much like a Mana Spreader. A Redstone Comparator can also output a signal based on percentage full.

target: &3&l森林法杖
source: &3&lWand of the Forest

target: 植物魔法里的扳手（工业模组石锤了）
source: A botanist's most important tool for manipulating flowers is the Wand of the Fores

target: 怎么制作这根法杖自己看jei
source: This wand, crafted from a pair of Mystical Petals strapped to a few Livingwood Twigs, is a must-have for a huge number of botanical tasks.

target: 有两种模式，一种是工作模式、还有一种是绑定模式，工作模式可以激活一些多方块结构，例如精灵门。或者更改魔力池的输入/输出模式。潜行右键魔力发射器可以快速校正发射方向。绑定模式下，手持森林法杖Shift+右键魔力发射器和魔力池能将魔力发射器绑定到魔力池。手持森林法杖Shift+右键产能花和魔力发射器能将产能花绑定到你所指定的魔力发射器。手持森林法杖Shift+右键功能花和魔力池能将功能花绑定到你所指定的魔力池。不管任何模式，都可以右键（无shift）查看可以存储魔力的方块/植物当时的魔力状态，但不能持续跟踪，也就是说，你想持续查看就必须不停的按右键
source: The wand has two modes, Bind Mode and Function Mode. In Bind Mode, sneak-right click it on a compatible block to select it, then sneak-right click elsewhere to bind the two blocks. In Function Mode it simply doesn't perform this function, freeing the sneak-right click action up for other tasks.The two modes can be switched between by sneak-right clicking the wand in the air.

target: 如果没有绑定到任何的方块，那么手持法杖潜行右击方块就可以旋转那些可以旋转的物品，甚至可以旋转其他模组的物品
source: Sneak-right clicking a block in Function Mode rotates the block around the axis of the side it was clicked on-- for example, using the wand on the top of a Chest will change the direction it faces. Most blocks with orientations can be reoriented this way.A Dispenser holding a wand will use the wand on the block it currently faces, when triggered.

target: &3&l魔力发射器
source: &3&lMana Spreader

target: 理解为植物魔法的导线，有线损
source: The Mana Spreader is the single most important tool a botanist needs to manipulate Mana

target: 用于把魔力从A处转移到B处，当它被放下时，它会有一个默认的面朝方向，使用森林法杖shift右键魔力发射器可以使其面相你自己，绑定模式下，可以使其对准其他方块
source: This block shoots Mana from point A to point B. It faces a cardinal direction when placed, but sneak-right clicking it with a Wand of the Forest on a face points it elsewhere. It can be aimed at other blocks with a wand in Bind Mode.

target: 魔力发射器拥有一个很小的魔力缓存，它会自动汲取放置在它周围的产能花生产的魔力，产能花放置后会自动绑定到离它最近的魔力发射器上
source: The Mana Spreader has a small internal buffer of Mana, which will get filled by Generating Flora bound to it. (Flowers, when placed, auto-bind to the nearest spreader.) This buffer can be viewed by hovering over the Spreader with a Wand of the Forest in hand.

target: 手持森林法杖可以看见魔力发射器的瞄准射线，同时，你可以看见发射出来的绿色光束开始断裂的地方，那里是魔力开始损耗的地方，也就是上文所说的线损，你可以试试多放几个发射器减少线损
source: Holding a Wand of the Forest makes nearby spreaders display aiming beams. Hovering over a spreader highlights its target. The sparkles show where Mana Loss begins to occur.As long as the target of the spreader can accept Mana (that is, can contain Mana and isn't full), the spreader will repeatedly fire Mana Bursts, which travel to their destination and transfer their Mana to it.

target: 你可以使用红石信号控制魔力发射器，但是如果你想要更精细的控制，你可以用红石魔力发射器.
source: Applying a Redstone Signal to a spreader will pause its firing of bursts. If finer control is required, a Pulse Mana Spreader is recommended, as it fires upon a redstone signal in lieu of a target.

target: 你可以给发射器套个羊毛，除了可以让魔力发射器看起来更……花里胡哨之外，还可以让魔力发射器静音运行，空手右击发射器可以移除羊毛
source: Right-clicking the spreader with a piece of Wool will sleeve it. In addition to making the spreader look fancier, it'll also muffle the sound when a burst is shot, reducing the potential noise of a large number of spreaders in one area.Right-clicking with an empty hand will remove the sleeve.

target: &3&l火红莲
source: &3&lEndoflame

target: 燃烧发电机——植魔版
source: The Endoflame is a very rudimentary generating flower

target: 它会燃烧掉它附近的燃料（掉落物形式）并产生魔力，燃烧时间为熔炉燃烧时间的一半
source: It'll absorb any combustible items or blocks dropped on the nearby vicinity, one at a time, and burn through them to generate Mana.The amount of time it takes to burn through an item is roughly half of the time a Furnace would.

target: 注意一下，它不会燃烧任何会留下副产物的燃料（比如熔岩桶），同时，它最多可以容纳4个煤炭块的燃烧时间，如果给予的燃料燃烧时间更长，多出去的燃烧时间会浪费掉
source: There're a few small caveats though: the Endoflame will not burn anything that leave byproducts in Furnaces (e.g. Lava Buckets, which leave Buckets behind).Furthermore, the flower can only burn around four Block of Coals' worth of fuel at once. If any single fuel item with a longer burn time is used, its full efficiency will be lost.

target: 通常来说，这将是你制作的第一个主动产能花（水绣球是被动，你应该知道），所以，你不应该让其一直手动运行，一个花格箱，一个漏斗，一个压力板，将会是不错的选择（都暗示到这个份儿上了你难道还不知道怎么做？）
source: As the Endoflame is often a botanist's first foray into proper automatable Generating Flora, it shouldn't be run manually forever. As the flower requires dropped items, an Open Crate (found in the Natural Apparatus section of this book) and some sort of output limiter (a timer or pressure plate) would be ideal for it.

target: &3&l魔力珍珠
source: &3&lMana Pearl

target: 把末影珍珠扔进魔力池制作
source: The Mana Pearl is a crafting component

target: 合成材料，没啥好说的
source: Tossing a ender pearl into a Mana Pool will infuse them with Mana from the pool, turning them into Mana Pearl.

target: &3&l魔力钻石
source: &3&lMana Diamond

target: 在魔力池扔钻石就行
source: The Mana Diamond is a crafting component

target: 合成材料，没啥好说的
source: Tossing a diamond into a Mana Pool will infuse them with Mana from the pool, turning them into Mana Diamond.

target: &3&l魔力尘
source: &3&lMana Powder

target: 在魔力池制造
source: The Mana Powder is a crafting component

target: 将红石、萤石粉、火药或者糖丢入魔力池可以制作，任意颜色的花粉花粉丢入魔力池也可以，前者消耗500Mana，后者400Mana
source: Tossing a gunpowder, glowstone dust, redstone dust, sugar or any of 16 dyes into a Mana Pool will infuse them with Mana from the pool, turning them into Mana Powder.

target: &3&l蕴魔丝线
source: &3&lMana Infused String

target: 创造于魔力池
source: The Mana Infused String is a crafting component

target: 把线扔进魔力池制造
source: Tossing a string into a Mana Pool will infuse them with Mana from the pool, turning them into Mana Infused String.

target: &3&l魔力之戒
source: &3&lBand of Mana

target: 通量容器。但是植物魔法
source: The Band of Mana is a bauble able to store Mana like the Mana Tablet

target: 相当于可以装在饰品栏的魔力石板
source: Putting a Mana Tablet on a Manasteel ring makes the Tablet wearable.

target: 和魔力石板没什么区别，不过，可以和泰拉钢锭合成，升级其储量（4倍）
source: The Band of Mana functions exactly as its component Tablet does, but can be worn as a Trinket as well.Upgrading the ring by plating it with an ingot of Terrasteel allows it to store about four times as much Mana.

target: &3&l魔力玻璃
source: &3&lManaglass

target: 制造于魔力池
source: The Managlass is a crafting component

target: 把玻璃扔进魔力池以制造
source: Tossing a glass into a Mana Pool will infuse them with Mana from the pool, turning them into Managlass.

target: &3&l魔力钢
source: &3&lManasteel Ingot

target: 制造于魔力池
source: The Manasteel Ingot is a crafting component

target: 把铁扔进魔力池制作
source: Tossing a iron ingot into a Mana Pool will infuse them with Mana from the pool, turning them into Manasteel Ingot.

target: &3&l元素符文
source: &3&lElemental Runes

target: R符文是合成高级功能花和产能花的重要材料，它们在符文祭坛上制作
source: Runes are vital components of complex magical devices or flora, created on a Runic Altar

target: 一共有16种符文，前四个以 &l四元素&r命名， 中间四个以 &l四季&r 命名，最后七个以 &l七宗罪&r命名，还有一个魔力符文独立于这个体系之外
source: A total of 16 Runes exist.The most elementary runes are named after the &lFour Elements&r, the intermediate runes are named after the &lFour Seasons&r, and the most advanced runes are named after the &lSeven Deadly Sins&r. A separate Rune of Mana also exists outside this progression.

target: &3&l畜牧花
source: &3&lPollidisiac

target: 动物最喜欢吃了
source: Animals love eating

target: 畜牧花通过消耗魔力向范围内的动物喂食合适的食物。用于喂食的食物需要处于掉落状态；花本体有120点魔力储存，每次喂食消耗12魔力，工作范围为半径6格的圆形区域
source: That's all they seem to do, really. Strangely enough, though, they only eat things that are fed to them.The Pollidisiac will simply do just that; it uses mana to feed nearby food items on the ground (Wheat, Carrots, etc.) to animals within range, putting them in better moods.

target: &3&l粘球草
source: &3&lNarslimmus

target: 宇宙中那些来源于虚空的力量与某些时刻创造了史莱姆，不过这似乎没什么规律
source: There's some unidentified power in the universe that creates Slimes at certain points, seemingly at random

target: 它们管这玩意叫啥来着……对，史莱姆区块，而粘球草这种花可以利用这种力量，它会吸收诞生于此的史莱姆并产出巨大的魔力，史莱姆越大，产能越大（这似乎有些棘手）（你去史莱姆区块放个史莱姆刷怪笼不就行了）
source: Slime Chunks, they call those points. The Narslimmus is a flower that has the ability to tap into that energy; it'll absorb Slimes created by that power and collect all the Mana generated by the destruction. The larger the Slime, the more Mana is created. (It also makes a bit of a sticky mess)

target: &3&l深渊法杖
source: &3&lRod of the Depths

target: 属于大地法杖的地质变体
source: The Rod of the Depths is a more geological variant to the Rod of the Lands

target: 消耗魔力，放置圆石，仅此而已……和它的兄弟大地法杖相差无几（以最炫酷的名字做最没用的事情）
source: It does exactly the same thing, but with Cobblestone and for a slightly higher price.For that same Mana cost, this item can provide Cobblestone to the Rod of the Shifting Crust.

target: &3&l海洋法杖
source: &3&lRod of the Seas

target: 大地法杖的结构变体
source: Similarly to its land-themed counterpart

target: 消耗75mana，放置一格水，或者填充花药台
source: The Rod of the Seas will (at the cost of some Mana) place a block of Water wherever it's used. Furthermore, it can refill a Petal Apothecary.

target: &3&l漏斗花
source: &3&lHopperhock

target: 漏斗花会捡拾附近掉落物品，并将其放入毗邻的容器，比如箱子内
source: The Hopperhock simply picks up items around it and put them in adjacent inventories (like Chests)

target: 它的运作并不一定需要魔力，通入魔力只会增加其范围，你可以通过把物品展示框放在漏斗花相邻的箱子上，并在展示框上放东西，以实现过滤
source: Mana is optional, but will increase its range if provided.Placing Item Frames on adjacent inventories will specify which items can or can't go in them.

target: 若无过滤器，漏斗花将会接收任何物品，但是标记的物品会优先，漏斗花具有三种工作模式，玩家可以使用森林法杖（Wand of the Forest）Shift+右击对其进行切换。
source: Any inventory with no adjacent Item Frame can accept any items, but labelled inventories will take priority.The rule used to sort items can be changed by sneak-right clicking (or using a Dispenser) on the flower with a Wand of the Forest in Function Mode.

target: &3&l粘土花
source: &3&lClayconia

target: 这是一种简单的花
source: The Clayconia is a simple flower

target: 把周围的沙子变成粘土（球），消耗一点点魔力，仅此而已
source: All it does is moisten nearby Sand, turning it into pellets of Clay. This process uses a decent amount of Mana, but won't break the bank (or pool, as it were).

target: &3&l阿卡纳蔷薇
source: &3&lRosa Arcana

target: 以经验换取魔力
source: Experience Points contain a magic of their own

target: 阿卡纳蔷薇可以通过吸取玩家经验来产生魔力，经验球实体，附魔物品也可以产生魔力（结合书在砂轮变成灵魂绑定的特性，无限魔力？）
source: The Rosa Arcana can tap into this magic, absorbing the experience of nearby players and turning it into Mana.It can also synthesize mana from experience orbs and enchanted items in the world; however, this method nets you a bit less mana for the same experience.

target: &3&l天空法杖
source: &3&lRod of the Skies

target: 消耗魔力，让你和天堂来一次亲密接触
source: The Rod of the Skies uses Mana to launch its user high in the air

target: 只需要简单的右击，天空法杖就可以让你原地起飞，直上九霄；不用担心自己会摔死，法杖会抵消摔落伤害（落下前不能再次使用）
source: To use it, simply right-click with it and watch yourself soar.The rod, after usage, will briefly enter a mode where it negates fall-damage, keeping its user safe.

target: 活木化身可以使用它，当活木化身持有天空法杖时，任何玩家在它附近跳跃都和使用了天空法杖一样
source: This rod can be given to a Livingwood Avatar. When so given, an avatar will use its Mana to launch any players that jump near the avatar as if they'd used the rod themselves.

target: &3&l大地法杖
source: &3&lRod of the Lands

target: 也许活木化身拿着它更有用
source: This rod can be given to a Livingwood Avatar

target: 大地法杖是个简单的工具：消耗一点点魔力，放置一个泥土，可以配合移壳杆使用
source: The Rod of the Lands is a simple tool: by drawing Mana from the user's inventory (sourced from a Mana Tablet or similar), it can conjure a Dirt block and place it in the world.For the same Mana cost, this item can provide Dirt to the Rod of the Shifting Crust.

target: 活木化身如果持有大地法杖，会在它面前放置一格泥土
source: An avatar holding this rod will periodically use its own Mana to place a block of Dirt before itself.

target: &3&l植物酿造台
source: &3&lBotanical Brewery

target: 它的作用和你能想出来的魔力的作用一样多
source: Given the versatility of Mana, its practicality in Potion-making should come as a surprise to nobody

target: 总而言之，植物酿造是原版炼药的变种，不同于原版，植物酿造需要魔力，且拥有固定的配方，而且一次产出的量更多
source: Brews are, simply put, variants on Potions. They're created using Mana as a base, but brewed with other ingredients.Unlike Potions, Brews have fixed multi-reagent recipes, and each vial brewed will contain multiple doses of product.

target: 其主要需要植物酿造台，精灵玻璃或者魔力玻璃做的烧瓶或小瓶，魔力，和酿造材料，为植物酿造台提供魔力（火花不行，必须是发射器），材料和容器，它将开始工作（使用森林法杖可以查看其进度）
source: The process of creating a Brew requires a Botanical Brewery, Vials, Mana, and (of course) the reagents themselves.The Mana functions as the solvent and energy source for a Brew and is drawn from Mana Bursts; simply pointing a Mana Spreader at the Brewery will work just fine.Additionally, partially empty Vials can be topped up with others containing the same Brew in a crafting grid.

target: 这是个操作起来很简单的机器，你只需要通过手持瓶子右击机器添加瓶子，在通过同样的办法添加试剂，最后提供魔力，几分钟后，药水酿造完成
source: Working with a Botanical Brewery is rather simple.Begin by adding a Vial (with a right-click or a drop) into the brewery. Add all required ingredients in a similar manner. Once a Brew has all necessary reagents, give it a few moments to accept the requisite Mana, and it should automatically drop into your inventory.

target: &3&l魔力透镜们
source: &3&lMana Lences

target: 魔力透镜可以用于升级魔力发射器
source: A Mana Spreader can be upgraded with Mana Lenses

target: 最基础的魔力透镜啥都不能干，也许你可以给他添加一些染料（即涂色透镜）使发射出来的魔力光束附带颜色，或者添加魔力珍珠使其变为彩虹（随机染色），怎样都好；（安装爆炸透镜时可能是bug，不显示射线）
