source: The most basic Mana Lens does absolutely nothing.A Lens can be dyed by crafting it with any color of dye to give it that color, or with a Mana Pearl to create a Rainbow Lens. These change the color of the fired burst.

target: &l速度透镜&r 会大幅度提高魔力射线的速度,但是也降低了魔力携带量，提升了魔力损耗时间
source: &lThe Velocity Lens&r will dramatically increase the speed at which a Mana Burst travels, but at the expense of initial capacity and faster Mana Loss.

target: &l强度透镜&r 会使脉冲能携带2倍的魔力量，但速度变为原来的85%，魔力流失速度也变为原来的2倍
source: &lThe Potency Lens&r will double the amount of Mana a Mana Burst can carry; however, the beam travels slower, and after it starts to lose mana, does so at a much faster rate.

target: &3&l泰拉凝聚板
source: &3&lTerrestrial Agglomeration Plate

target: 泰拉钢是个好东西
source: Terrasteel is a complex and useful magical alloy

target: 首先，自己看植物魔法辞典，泰拉凝聚板需要一个多方块结构才能工作
source: For starters, its creation requires a Terrestrial Agglomeration Plate placed over a checkerboard pattern of Lapis Lazuli Blocks and Livingrock (or Shimmerrock). This block then needs to be provided with Mana, with Sparks being the most efficient mode of transfer.

target: 搭建完成之后，在泰拉凝聚板上放置一个魔力钢，一个魔力珍珠，一个魔力钻石，并供给魔力（推荐使用火花），泰拉凝聚板会开始合成泰拉钢锭，此过程中，拾取任何物品将导致合成终端并损失巨量魔力，大约半池的魔力可以制作一个泰拉钢
source: After a plate is set up and ready to receive Mana, tossing one Manasteel Ingot, Mana Diamond and Mana Pearl each upon the plate will begin the infusion.Picking up any of the items will halt the infusion, causing severe Mana Loss (all mana transferred to the plate is lost). The infusion uses about half a Mana Pool's worth of Mana to create a single piece of Terrasteel; multiple Sparks passing it Mana will accelerate the process.

target: &3&l精灵传送门
source: &3&lThe Portal to Alfheim

target: 他们说，很久以前，精灵和我们待在同一片蓝天下
source: They say that once upon a time, Elves shared the world with us Minecraftians

target: 精灵们在一个我们不知道的时间点被驱逐回了他们原本待的世界，艾尔夫海姆；沟通两界的实验已经实施了很多次，在无数次实验中，这样一扇传送门应运而生
source: Due to events presently unknown to us, at some point they were banished back to their own world, Alfheim, never to return.Experiments have been performed in an attempt to re-establish a connection between the two worlds, and a theoretical procedure for creating such a portal has been devised.

target: 搭建这扇门并不是个容易的事情，你需要8个活木，3个微光活木，1个精灵门核心，还有两个魔力池和自然水晶
source: Actually creating this portal would prove to be an arduous task: quite a few unusual resources would be necessary. The net requirements come down to 8 Livingwood blocks, 3 Glimmering Livingwood blocks, an Elven Gateway Core , and at least 2 Mana Pools and Natura Pylons.

target: 在精灵门结构的11*11*11的范围内，至少要有两个魔力池（且上面要有自然水晶），使用森林法杖右击精灵门核心以开启传送门，开启时会消耗巨量的魔力，之后维持传送门的魔力会平均从所有的装了自然水晶的魔力池里抽取，如果魔力用完了，那么传送门将关闭
source: At least two Mana Pools with Natura Pylons directly above them would be needed within an 11x11x11 area around the Core. The initial activation of the portal, we believe, would cost a huge amount of Mana from said Pools, and would be performed by right-clicking the core with a Wand of the Forest.The portal is designed to draw Mana from all pools with Pylons equally; if any pool ran out, any connection a portal might have would close.

target: 在好不容易开启精灵门之后，仍然有一个不幸的消息要告诉你：生物无法通过精灵门（因此你无法去艾尔夫海姆度假，这可真是扫兴，我还想看看那些精灵是否真如传闻所言，都是金发碧眼的俊男靓女呢）但是物品还是可以的，尽管每一次让物品通过传送门都会消耗魔力
source: Even with all these preparations, any link the portal could establish would be too weak to transfer living beings (so an Alfheim vacation's off the table no matter what), but items might just make it through-- though Mana from the surrounding Mana Pools would be needed for items to survive a return trip.

target: 看看你的植物魔法辞典吧，上面关于精灵学的东西可以说是只有那么一星半点儿，现在，我们可以让精灵学描述的正主儿亲自帮我们补全关于他们的知识，不是吗
source: All knowledge about Alfheim in this lexicon is, at this point, limited to what you find in this entry-- it seems that Elven knowledge has been almost totally lost.Perhaps if the Elves could have a look at this book, they could provide further insight.

target: &3&l源质钢锭
source: &3&lElementium Ingot

target: 合成物品，不多赘述
source: Elementium Ingot is an item used to make many items

target: 这是植物魔法后期的资源，通过向精灵门投入两个魔力钢锭获得
source: It is an end-game resource created by throwing 2 Manasteel Ingots in a Portal to Alfheim.

target: &3&l龙石
source: &3&lDragonstone

target: 合成材料，不多赘述
source: Dragonstone is an item used to make many items

target: 这是植物魔法后期的资源，通过向精灵门投入两个魔力钢钻石获得
source: It is an end-game resource created by throwing Mana Diamond in a Portal to Alfheim.

target: &3&l精灵尘
source: &3&lPixie Dust

target: 合成材料，不多赘述
source: Pixie Dust is an item used to make many items

target: 这是植物魔法后期的资源，通过向精灵门投入两个魔力尘获得
source: It is an end-game resource created by throwing Mana Pearl in a Portal to Alfheim.

target: &3&l精灵魔力发射器
source: &3&lElven Mana Spreaders

target: 说道魔力亲和性这点上，梦之木比活木好多了
source: When it comes right down to it, Dreamwood simply conducts Mana better than Livingwood

target: 只需要对原魔力发射器的配方进行一些小小的调整……我们就可以得到一个全新的魔力发射器——精灵魔力发射器！它可以传输更多魔力，而且更快，更好，更强！（正经人这个时候早就用盖亚了谁用这玩意啊）
source: A few adjustments in recipe (like substituting Elementium for Gold) yield an Elven Mana Spreader, which conducts more Mana, faster, and for longer without Mana Loss.Unfortunately, these can't be turned into Pulse Mana Spreaders.

target: 精灵魔力发射器还有一种使用盖亚之魂和龙石改良的变种，它比精灵魔力发射器要更加强大，不过，因为其携带的魔力量比较大，因此不会经常发射魔力
source: Combining this already-powerful spreader with a Gaia Spirit and a Dragonstone gem yields an even more potent variant. The Gaia Spreader is the gold standard of Mana Spreaders, with upgrades pretty much all around.Do note that these spreaders fire larger payloads at once (and thus might fire less often).

target: &3&l多媒体网络
source: &3&lCorporea Networks

target: 多媒体网络通过元动能量和维度裂隙，把物品以极快的速度从A转移到B处
source: The Corporea system uses the energy of the End, and the void between worlds, to transport items from point A to point B instantly without intervening blocks

target: 使用说明：多媒体火花需要放置于能装东西的东西上，而不是那些魔力容器，多媒体火花有两种：普通的多媒体火花和主媒体火花；这些火花在多媒体网络里工作，且需要一个主媒体火花，每一个火花都可以和其他在网络里的火花连接
source: A few things to know: Corporea Sparks are placed over Inventories (like a Chest or Dispenser), as opposed to Mana Containers. There are two types of Corporea Sparks: the plain old Corporea Spark, and the Master Corporea Spark. These Sparks work in networks: each Corporea Network needs one Master Corporea Spark, but any spark can communicate with any other in the network.

target: 但多媒体网络有两个巨大的缺陷，这使其在众多物流体系中黯然失色：
source: The Master Corporea Spark, unfortunately, is too busy managing the network to see its own inventory.Furthermore, Corporea Sparks can't push items into their respective inventories; those should be added through means like Hoppers.

target: &3&l火花升级
source: &3&lSpark Augments

target: 火花可比你想的要有用的多，一些升级可以让它们大放异彩
source: Sparks seem to be more versatile than previously believed: a variety of Augments can be applied to them, enhancing their abilities

target: &l火花升级:扩散&r 可以将魔力传输到装有未升级或装有弥散升级的火花的魔力池之中。直到本身的魔力池完全变空
source: &lThe Recessive Augment&r makes a Spark distribute all of the Mana in its pool into any nearby non-augmented or Dispersive Sparks' pools, until its own is completely empty.

target: &l火花升级:聚集&r 可以将魔力从装有未升级或装有弥散升级的火花的魔力池吸取本身的魔力池中。直到本身的魔力池变满
source: &lThe Dominant Augment&r makes a Spark pull Mana from nearby non-augmented Sparks' pools into its own, until the latter is full.

target: &3&l盖亚之魂
source: &3&lGaia Spirit

target: 植物魔法的终极（？这玩意不是前期材料？）材料，用于合成很多东西
source: The Gaia Spirit is a powerful end-game crafting component

target: 击败盖亚守护者，一撮盖亚之魂匠魂和那些植物魔法的强力饰品和一些其他的掉落物一起给予玩家
source: It is dropped from the Gaia Guardian. Gaia Spirits can be used to craft powerful Baubles from Botania and more.

target: 盖亚守护者会掉落8个盖亚之魂，建议用4个做盖亚魂锭，这将可以召唤盖亚2，击败他可以掉落16个盖亚之魂（每个玩家都有）
source: Summoning the Gaia Guardian is necessary to acquire the first Gaia Spirits. The Gaia Guardian drops 8 Gaia Spirits. It is recommended to use half of these spirits to craft the Gaia Spirit Ingot, which can be used in place of Terrasteel to summon the Gaia Guardian II, which drops 16 Spirits on death.

target: &3&l黑洞护符
source: &3&lBlack Hole Talisman

target: 虚空，是一个装满了……啥都没装的巨大空间
source: The void is a massive space full of... nothing

target: 嘛，这里啥都没有，真的；但是只需要一点点的想象力，这里将成为你最大的方块存储空间，黑洞护符将为单一方块提供近乎无穷的存储空间
source: Really. There's nothing there. But with a bit of ingenuity, this nothingness can be exploited to store blocks for you to your heart's content. The Black Hole Talisman utilizes powerful Gaia and Ender magics to store a virtually infinite quantity of a single type of block.

target: 只有在空的时候对方块右键才能修改你想要储存的方块。当内部存储有方块时手持护符右击即可放置方块，可配合世界塑造者之星盘使用；如果想批量取出内部方块只需要把黑洞护符放入工作台或物品栏合成中可取出一组, 对空气方块Shift+右键可以开启或关闭
source: Right-clicking a block with an empty Talisman will set it to store that type of block, and sneak-right clicking the Talisman in the air will enable or disable it. When enabled, a Talisman will absorb any blocks of its given type from its user's inventory.Placing the item in a crafting grid will yield its stored blocks, a stack at a time.

target: 存储在护符里的方块可以通过手持护符右击放置，右击箱子可以把箱子通过存储的方块填满，其次，黑洞护身符可以配合移壳杆使用
source: Any blocks stored in a Talisman can be placed by simply right-clicking with it.Right-clicking the Talisman on an inventory will dump up to a stack of blocks into that inventory. Finally, a Talisman can provide a Rod of the Shifting Crust with the blocks it contains.

target: &3&l盖亚魔力发射器
source: &3&lGaia Mana Spreader

target: 目前最强大的魔力发射器……大概
source: The Gaia Mana spreader is functionally similar to the Elven Mana Spreader and standard Mana Spreader and is the highest upgraded Spreader available

target: 和普通魔力发射器一样的使用方式，只不过其各方面性能都远超普通的魔力发射器
source: Generating flowers must be placed within a 6 block radius to interact with this block and can be rebound using the Wand of the Forest. This Spreader can be turned OFF with redstone signal. It will not send mana bursts unless it detects a valid receiving block. It will not send a new burst until the last one sent has been received. Once the Spreader's mana burst range is reached it will start to lose mana in each subsequent block, there will always be a small loss of mana upon the burst entering a new Mana Spreader.

target: 盖亚魔力发射器拥有四倍于普通魔力发射器的单束魔力含量，长达48格的传输距离，和六倍于普通魔力发射器的内部存储
source: Each Gaia Spreader mana burst contains four times more mana than that of the standard Spreader. The mana burst range is increased to 48 blocks. The internal storage is much larger at over 6 times the storage capacity of the other Spreader types.

target: &3&l启命英
source: &3&lDandelifeon

target: 通过一场（或者多场）生命游戏，启命英将生产大量魔力（早就废了，现在的产量不如热爆花和勿落草了）
source: The Dandelifeon is not recommended for the faint of heart

target: 启命英的工作范围是以启命英为中心的25x25的区域，工作区域内的每一格都将被视为一个“细胞”，格内有细胞方块则这一格是存活细胞，格内是空气则为死亡细胞，其他方块不参与游戏过程。当启命英被红石信号激活，将对工作区域内的所有细胞以2次/秒的频率进行如下判定：
source: This flower's function is based on a cellular automaton known as Conway's Game of Life. The area for this procedure is a 25x25 square, centered around the Dandelifeon itself.As long as the flower receives a redstone signal, it'll step the automaton twice a second.Each location within the flower's 25x25 area of effect counts as a Cell. Cells may be alive or dead; a cell counts as alive if its respective block is a Cellular Block (read on), or dead if it's anything else. The Neighbors of a cell are the eight cells surrounding any cell.

target: 如果一个细胞周围8格内的存活细胞数量<2或>4，该细胞会死亡并且年龄归0；（即康威生命游戏中生命过少和过剩的情况）
source: All cells have an age; cells not created by the Dandelifeon start at zero. Whenever a cell survives a step, its age increases by one. Whenever a dead cell becomes a live cell, the age of the new live cell becomes the age of its oldest neighbour, plus one, capped at 100.

target: &3&l命运骰子
source: &3&lDice of Fate

target: 掉落于盖亚2
source: The Dice of Fate is dropped by the hard mode version of Gaia Guardian

target: 骰子只能被其绑定的玩家使用，此物品不会因为掉在地上而消失
source: The dice is bound to the player it dropped for, and cannot be used by others. This item doesn't despawn when dropped onto the ground.

target: 使用时，玩家会随机获得一件圣遗物，获得了对应圣遗物的玩家会取得对应进度，如果玩家取得了所有圣遗物，则骰子会消失
source: When used, the dice will turn into a random relic not yet obtained by the player. Upon obtaining a relic the player will be awarded its respective advancement. If the player already has all the relic advancements, the dice will disappear instead.

target: 据传说：同一个遗物不可能有两个主人，因此，保管好你的圣遗物是至关重要的，也许坚毅常春藤是个不错的选择，有趣的是，一个已获得的遗物的知识会被自动录入到植物魔法辞典，这可真方便
source: The legends say that the same Relic may not be awarded to the same person twice-- so keeping an earned Relic safe is high-priority; perhaps Resolute Ivy would make a good investment.Interestingly enough, an earned relic will transcribe the knowledge on its use into this lexicon. How convenient.

target: &3&l坚毅常春藤
source: &3&lResolute Ivy

target: 理解为削弱版本的灵魂绑定就好
source: A dying person's items splatter all over the ground, which is generally a massive nuisance for all involved

target: 其解决了一个重大难题：当一个物品与坚毅常春藤合成，该物品的持有者不幸殒命之后，坚毅常春藤会消耗自身，使该物品不掉落，当然，之后坚毅常春藤就消失了
source: This issue can be avoided quite simply: when a piece of Resolute Ivy is attached to an item in a crafting grid, the ivy will sacrifice itself at death to keep the item in its holder's inventory. Afterwards, another piece will be needed in the event of a second death.

target: 不过因为技术原因，常春藤不会附着于在合成表中合成后留下物品的东西上，如水桶
source: There is, however, one restriction on the items the ivy can protect.For technical reasons, the ivy will not attach to an item that leaves something behind when used in a crafting recipe (like a Bucket of Water or a Mortar and Pestle).

target: &3&l注魔板
source: &3&lMana-infuser

target: 神话植物学添加的制造精灵钢的机器
source: Mythic Botany mod adds to the Mana system with the Mana-Infuser

target: 自己看植物魔法辞典这玩意怎么摆的，使用方式同泰拉凝聚板.
source: It is an upgrade to the Terrestrial Agglomeration Plate that requires a gold shimmerock plate and allows the creation of Alfsteel, a higher-tiered material than Terrasteel.

target: &3&l精灵水晶
source: &3&lAlfsteel Pylon

target: 额外的水晶
source: Additional Pylons

target: 此物品很好的证明了魔力的自我修补能力，它可以修复那些魔力装备
source: It has been well established at this point that mana is excellent at performing spontaneous recombinations. Some limited magics have managed to harness this by absorbing the latent mana in the globules left behind when the living pass. The Alfsteel Pylon helps to speed that process along, injecting pure mana directly into these Mendable items.

target: 它接受来自魔力发射器的魔力来修复精灵钢制工具/盔甲或带有经验修补附魔的工具/盔甲
source: Use a Mana Spreader to send mana into the Pylon. Any items enchanted with Mending that find themselves atop the Pylon will rapidly repair at the cost of mana.

target: &5&l机械花药台
source: &5&lMechanical Apothecary

target: 机械药剂师
source: Auto Apothecary

target: 对于那些不会植物魔法自动化的人，这玩意是他们的救命稻草
source: An improved version of the Apothecary that uses water, seeds and ingredients to create all the flowers your heart desires.

target: &5&l机械白雏菊
source: &5&lMechanical Daisy

target: 自动化活木活石
source: Auto Living Wood/Rock

target: 对于那些不会植物魔法自动化的人，这玩意是他们的救命稻草
source: By planting a Floating Pure Daisy onto a platform made out of Elementium, it is capable of processing 8 blocks at once in only a single block space. It can also handle fluids.

target: &5&l机械魔力池
source: &5&lMechanical Mana Pool

target: 自动化魔力池
source: Auto Mana Pool

target: 内部可缓存100,000mana，只可以通过带有聚集升级的火花或魔力池上带有扩散升级的火花供能。从上方及四周输入物品，下方输出成品。（不用再烦恼转换速度过慢又吸回来了）内部gui下方格子放入炼金/炼造催化器可以进行炼金/炼造催化器相关的转换
source: Just like a regular Mana Pool, this can store quite some mana. It is also capable of mana infusion. As with any other pool, you can use catalysts. However, this pool requires you to put them into its inventory and not to place them below it.

target: &5&l机械符文祭坛
source: &5&lMechanical Runic Altar

target: 自动化符文
source: Auto Runes

target: 这让一切变得更加简单……但是你真的连这么容易的自动化都不会？
source: This device allows you to create runes a lot more easily. Really, it's nothing more than a normal Runic Altar, which can be automated using hoppers.

target: &5&l工业凝聚板
source: &5&lIndustrial Agglomeration Factory

target: 自动化泰拉钢
source: Auto Terrasteel

target: 不得不承认这是个好东西，免去了泰拉钢自动化的烦恼
source: The Agglomeration Plate usually requires a stabilising platform underneath it. Not anymore with this device. This machine is pretty unknown to the regular botanist, so give it a shot!

target: &5&l魔力存储盒
source: &5&lMechanical Brewery

target: 机械化魔力存储
source: Auto Potions

target: 魔力存储最多为10,000,000mana，让存储魔力更简单
source: An improved version of the Botanical Brewery that receives mana from sparks and lets you automate brews easily.

target: &5&l微型精灵门
source: &5&lAlfheim Market

target: 自动精灵门
source: Auto Alfheim Portal

target: 这个小玩意比那巨大笨重的精灵门好多了，只是，记得别扔面包进去
source: This single block has a tiny version of an Alfheim Portal inside. It allows for trade with the elves without the need of having a gigantic portal around. Just be careful not to put any bread inside...

target: &5&l机械植物学
source: &5&lBotanical Machinery

target: 众所周知，植物魔法是个科技模组
source: It's something that makes the mod magical

target: 尽人皆知，植物魔法是个科技模组，科技？魔法？管他呢，反正这个模组提供了自动化的方案
source: We all know, Botania is a tech mod. Magic mod. Tech mod. Magic mod? Tech mod!? It's a mod. A fancy mod with Mana, Mystical Flowers, Elves and the Gaia. Sometimes it can be hard or annoying to automate all the things in Botania.

target: 通过这些机器，你可以轻而易举地自动化精灵门交易、泰拉凝聚仪式、魔力池灌注、符文祭坛、白雏菊嬗变、植物酿造、花药台等各种植物磨法合成
source: Botanical Machinery will help you automate basically everything from Botania. Quite uncommon in the world of Botania, this mod adds plenty of machines. What machines? Find out below!

target: 通过火花给这些东西功能
source: Use Sparks to transfer mana from Mana Batery to Machines.

target: 所有机器都可以完美兼容应用能源或者精准存储
source: All machines are compatible with other mods. You can automate everything with Refined Storage or Applied Energistics.

target: &9幻梦
source: &9Eidolon

target: *完成任务&b&l&o签定合同&r以解锁 *
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oSign the contract&r quest*

source: Eidolon is a magic mod that draws on a lot of different inspirations, with aspects of alchemy and theurgy. It takes a bit of a dark perspective, also featuring mechanics themed around necromancy and soul manipulation.

target: &9&l时间之瓶
source: &9&lTime in a bottle

target: &o时间就是金钱！
source: &oTime is money!

target: 这个小瓶子可以使你加速方块更新速度。手持时间之瓶对方块右键使用，第一次消耗瓶内30秒，第二次60秒，第三次120秒，第四次240秒，第五次480秒。每次右击都会使方块增加一倍的更新速度，可叠加，持续30秒。
source: This item allows you to accelerate the rate at which blocks tick. It passively collects time while in your inventory which you can consume by right clicking a block with it. The first click requires 30 Seconds, the second 60, the third 120 the fourth 240 and the fifth 480. The speed at which the block ticks doubles with each click. The effect lasts 30 seconds.

source: &e&lFunace

target: 湿砖可以使农田湿润，将熔岩变成黑曜石或原石，就像水一样。
source: Wetsones can hydrate farmland and turns lava into obsidian or cobblestone just like water would.

target: Snad方块，能加快甘蔗、仙人掌和其他一些可种植的作物的生长。
source: Snad will increase the growth rate for sugarcane, cacti and any other plantable crop.

target: &a工具介绍

source: It is a crafting component

source: It is a crafting component

target: 它用于制作光伏电池II，太阳能电池板III和效率升级。
source: It is used to craft Photovoltaic Cell II, Solar Panel III and Efficiency Upgrade.

target: 它是一个制作组件
source: It is a crafting component

target: 它用于制作光伏电池III和太阳能电池板IV。
source: It is used to craft Photovoltaic Cell III and Solar Panel IV.

target: 它是一个制作组件
source: It is a crafting component

target: 它用于制作光伏电池IV和太阳能电池板V。
source: It is used to craft Photovoltaic Cell IV and Solar Panel V.

target: 它是一个制作组件
source: It is a crafting component

target: 它用于制作光伏电池V和太阳能电池板VI。
source: It is used to craft Photovoltaic Cell V and Solar Panel VI.

target: 它是一个制作组件
source: It is a crafting component

target: 它用于制作光伏电池VI和太阳能电池板VII。
source: It is used to craft Photovoltaic Cell VI and Solar Panel VII.

target: 它是一个制作组件
source: It is a crafting component

target: 它用于制作太阳能电池板VIII。
source: It is used to craft Solar Panel VIII.

target: 它可生成 1 个 RF/t，传输 8 个 RF/t，可存储 25，000 个 RF
source: It generates 1 RF/t, transfers 8 RF/t and can store 25,000 RF

target: 它可生成 8 个 RF/t，传输 64 个 RF/t，可存储 125，000 个 RF
source: It generates 8 RF/t, transfers 64 RF/t and can store 125,000 RF

target: 它产生32个RF / t，传输256个RF / t，可以存储425，000个RF
source: It generates 32 RF/t, transfers 256 RF/t and can store 425,000 RF

target: 它可产生 128 个 RF/t，传输 1，024 个 RF/t，可存储 2，000，000 个 RF
source: It generates 128 RF/t, transfers 1,024 RF/t and can store 2,000,000 RF

target: 它可生成 512 个 RF/t，传输 4，096 个 RF/t，可存储 8，000，000 个 RF
source: It generates 512 RF/t, transfers 4,096 RF/t and can store 8,000,000 RF

target: 它可产生 2，048 个 RF/t，传输 16，384 个 RF/t，可存储 32，000，000 个 RF
source: It generates 2,048 RF/t, transfers 16,384 RF/t and can store 32,000,000 RF

target: 它可生成 8，192 个 RF/t，传输 64，000 个 RF/t，可存储 64，000，000 个 RF
source: It generates 8,192 RF/t, transfers 64,000 RF/t and can store 64,000,000 RF

target: 它可生成 32，768 个 RF/t，传输 256，000 个 RF/t，可存储 128，000，000 个 RF
source: It generates 32,768 RF/t, transfers 256,000 RF/t and can store 128,000,000 RF

target: 它用于制作所有升级
source: It is used to craft all the upgrades

target: 最多 20， 20 = 2x gen
source: Up to 20, 20 = 2x gen
Up to 10, 10 = 2.5x transfer

target: 最多 10， 10 = 2x 容量
source: Up to 10, 10 = 2x capacity

target: 安装后，太阳能电池板将向彼此连接的机器输出能量，在5个块范围内
source: When installed, solar panel will output energy to machines attached to eachother, in 5 block range

target: 安装后，太阳能电池板将为附近的玩家充电
source: When installed, solar panel will charge players nearby

target: 在安装之前，您必须将其链接到它将向其发送能量的方块。安装后，太阳能电池板将向16个块范围内的连接块输出能量
source: Before installing, you must link it to the block it will send energy to. When installed, solar panel will output energy to linked block, within 16 block range

target: 安装后，为下面的熔炉充电
source: When installed, fuels the furnace below

target: *通过完成 &b&l&o铁镐&r 解锁任务*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oIron Pickaxe&r quest*

target: Solar Flux Reborn使用FE能源系统增加了8层太阳能电池板。
source: Solar Flux Reborn adds 8 tiers of solar panels using FE energy system.

target: 最低级可生产1 FE/t，最高级可生产32.768 FE/t。
source: The lowest tier can produce 1 FE/t and the highest tier can produce 32.768 FE/t.

target: &d循环
source: &dCyclic

target: &f&l循环
source: &f&lWelcome to Cyclic

target: *签订这一份&b&l&o合同以解锁&r 任务*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oSign the contract&r quest*

target: 按作者的话说（循环作者不是整合包作者）:
source: In the words of the author:

target: \"我只是想添加所有我想在游戏里实现的功能在这个模组里.
source: \"I just went ahead and added all the features that I wished were in the base game into one mod.  So just a ton of random items and changes that have no consistent theme other than I thought they would be fun\".

target: 循环提供了大量的机器，让你的游戏更加便捷
source: Cyclic adds a huge number of items to the game that serve all kinds of purposes.

target: &f&l方块放置器
source: &f&lBlock Placer

target: 功如其名
source: Place any type of block in the Block Placer’s inventory

target: 只要有可能，方块放置器都会把它内部存储的方块放在它的面前
source: The Block Placer will place a block from its inventory in front of it whenever it can.

target: &f&l方块挖掘机
source: &f&lBlock Breaker

target: 功如其名
source: Automatically breaks anything that is placed in front of it

target: 这东西挖方块可不带精准采集，挖玻璃不掉东西的
source: As if it was broken without silk touch (glass does not drop).

target: &f&l自动玩家模拟器
source: &f&lItem User

target: 模拟玩家的左右键行为
source: Can be set to right click or left click continuously in its range

target: 打开其GUI可以调节模拟器的左右键模式，以及使用频率和范围，模拟玩家行为所获得的产物将会存储在右下角的输出槽里，点击紫色方块按钮，可以看到其工作范围
source: You can set the range, which click (use/left or attack/right), and the delay using the GUI. The Automated user can also be given tools to use or attack with. Any products of the process will be moved to the output slots in the bottom right of the Automated User’s GUI. If you click the purple square you can see the range of the Automated User.

target: &f&l精准投掷器
source: &f&lPrecise Dropper

target: 可以完全控制投掷距离（0~16个方块），投掷数量（0~64物品），以及投掷延迟（0~64秒）
source: The Precise Dropper is exactly like an ordinary vanilla Dropper except you can set the exact block that you want it to drop items onto using the offset slider (0-16 blocks in front of the dropper), how many items you want to drop (1-64 at a time), and the delay between dropping items (0-64 ticks).

target: &f&l树场
source: &f&lForester

target: 在一定的范围内自动种树和砍树
source: The Forester will automatically place these saplings anywhere that it can within its range

target: 为其提供能量，树场将自动种植提供给它的任何树苗，当树苗长大后，树场会将其砍伐，不过，它并不会收集物品；工作范围砍伐高度之类的设置可以在GUI里控制
source: Requires energy. Supply the Forester with any kind of sapling. When the saplings grow up the Forester will chop down the trees. The Forester does not collect the items that drop however. The range and mining height can be set in the GUI.

target: &f&l挖掘器（如果你习惯1.12.2的话叫可控挖掘者也可以）
source: &f&lMiner

target: 随着时间的推移破坏一定范围内的方块
source: Breaks all blocks in its range over time

target: 挖掘器的工作范围可以在GUI里设置，你可以通过点击紫色方块按钮来看到挖掘器具体的工作范围，同时可以控制挖掘白名单/黑名单（需要方块状态数据卡）
source: The range and height to mine can be set in the GUI. You can click the purple square to get a visual of the range. You can also whitelist or blacklist blocks that you want to/don’t want to be broken.

target: &f&l样式生成器
source: &f&lShape Builder

target: 不同于其他的机器，启动它需要红石信号
source: This machine starts in requires redstone mode unlike the other machines

target: 这主要是为了防止机器失控，你知道的，如果不对一台建筑机器加以控制，后果是不堪设想的；你可以在GUI里选择建造的样式，比如球形，圆柱体之类的，通过GPS数据卡可以使建造的结构位置偏移置被GPS绑定的方块
source: That’s because it would really be a mess if this thing was spam building stuff. Select a shape that you want the Structure Builder to build. Your options are wall, square, solid square, diagonal, pyramid, circle - horizontal, circle - vertical, sphere, dome, cup. You can set the height and width of your structure using the sliders. You can also place a GPS in the top left slot of the Structure Builder to offset the build to whatever block the GPS is connected to.

target: &f&l收割机
source: &f&lHarvester

target: 短时间内收割范围内的所有种子（但是1.16.5的收割机并不会将收获的物品存储到自己的格子里，因为没格子了）
source: Harvests, collects, and replants all fully grown crops in its range every few seconds

target: 工作时间，工作范围都可以在GUI里控制，同样的，紫色方块按钮可以让你看见具体工作范围
source: The range can be set in the GUI. You can also click the purple square to get a visual of how big the range is.

target: &f&l物品收集器
source: &f&lItem Collector

target: 功如其名
source: Automatically collected any items in its range and stores them in its own inventory

target: 工作范围可以通过GUI设置，最小1*1，最大19*19，按紫色方块按钮可以显示其具体工作范围
source: You can set the range by entering the GUI and clicking the range button to cycle through the options (1x1 to 19x19). You can also press the purple square to turn on a visual which shows the exact collection range of the Item Collector.

target: &f&l流体收集器
source: &f&lFluid Collector

target: 在其左边的存储格子里放一些方块，并提供能量，它就会开始工作，范围是上下各4格，以自己为中心，直径15格，一旦它的方块用完了，或者流体存储槽满了，它都会停止工作
source: You will need to put some kind of block in its inventory as well. Once you do this, it will start replacing any fluid it can find below itself up to 7 blocks away horizontally and 5 blocks below vertically with the block you have given it. Once it fills up with liquid or runs out of blocks it will stop.

target: &f&l流体放置器
source: &f&lFluid Placer

target: 理解为只能装填并发射流体的发射器就行
source: Fill the Fluid Placer with any fluid. The Fluid Placer will place the fluid which it is storing in front of itself when it is powered by a redstone signal.

target: &f&l大储物袋
source: &f&lStorage Bag

target: 廉价且好用的大背包
source: A bag that you can use to carry items

target: 大储物袋是一个拥有7x11格的大号储物容器，每个袋子是独立的空间。手持袋子右击打开袋子进行交互。可点击GUI左上角的小方块切换交互械，一共拥有三种模式：
source: The bag can be colored by opening it up with right click and clicking one of the buttons on the left side of the GUI. You can also set the bag to automatically store anything that enters your inventory, only store things that enter your inventory that are already in the bag, or do nothing. There is also a hit mode; when you hit an inventory (such as a chest) with a Storage Bag, there are three things that can happen.

target: &f&l末影珍珠们
source: &f&lThe Pearls

target: &f&l火把发射器
source: &f&lTorch Launchers

target: &f&l管道
source: &f&lCables

target: &l能量管道:
source: &lEnergy Cable:

target: A 只能传输能量的管道，右击管道可以查询它的内部缓存
source: A simple cable that can only transport energy. Right click on an energy cable to see how much energy is inside.

target: &l物品管道:
source: &lItem Cable:

target: A 只能物品能量的管道，右击管道可以查询它的内部缓存
source: A  simple cable that can only transport items. Right click on an item cable to see what is inside.

target: &l流体管道:
source: &lFluid Cable:

target: A 只能传输流体的管道，右击管道可以查询它的内部缓存
source: A simple cable that can only transport fluids. Right click on a Fluid Cable to see how much energy is inside.

target: &f&l分解磨床
source: &f&lUncrafting Grinder

target: 消耗时间和能量分解物品成它们的合成材料
source: Place any item into the far left slot and hit the question mark button

target: 一个拆解台的究极低配版本，用于拆解物品，用时很久，且消耗能量，而且还有物品黑名单，黑名单里的物品无法被拆解，还有分解黑名单，黑名单里的物品如果是被拆解物品的合成物则不会出现
source: This will tell you if the item can be uncrafted. If it can be uncrafted, the Uncrafting Grinder will slowly turn the item into its components. Some recipes have been altered for balance. For example, the ardite sapling, which is easily farmable, contains a nether star in its crafting recipe. The nether star is not given back in the Uncrafting Grinder.

target: &f&l红石钟
source: &f&lRedstone Clock

target: 每隔一定间隔发送红石信号的机器。可以设置发送间隔、持续间隔以及发射信号面。右击打开GUI有详细的设置说明
source: he redstone clock can be configured to send out a redstone pulse on a timer from any (or all) of its 6 sides. The length of the pulse is configurable, as well as the delay between pulses. You can also change the strength of the redstone pulse and turn off certain sides so that they do not pulse.

target: &f&l无线发信器
source: &f&lWireless Redstone Transmitter

target: 与无线接收器配合使用。需要先手持发信器左击一下接收器存储坐标。之后会把传入发信器的红石信号传到接收器上
source: Two parts of one system. Place a Wireless Receiver somewhere in your world. Hit the Wireless Receiver with the Wireless Transmitter to save its location (left click). Now place the Wireless Transmitter somewhere else in the world. Any time that the Wireless Transmitter is powered, the Wireless Receiver which it is connected to will also be powered.

target: &f&l无线接收器
source: &f&lWireless Redstone Receiver

target: 与无线发信器配合使用。发出与传入发信器一致的红石信号
source: Two parts of one system. Place a Wireless Receiver somewhere in your world. Hit the Wireless Receiver with the Wireless Transmitter to save its location (left click). Now place the Wireless Transmitter somewhere else in the world. Any time that the Wireless Transmitter is powered, the Wireless Receiver which it is connected to will also be powered.

target: &f&l护符们
source: &f&lThe Charms

target: &f&l黑曜石水晶头盔
source: &f&lCrystallized Obsidian Helmet

target: *完成 &b&l&o黑曜石水晶&r 任务后解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oCrystallized Obsidian&r quest*

target: *完成 &b&l&o黑曜石水晶&r 任务后解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oCrystallized Obsidian&r quest*

target: *完成 &b&l&o黑曜石水晶&r 任务后解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oCrystallized Obsidian&r quest*

target: *完成 &b&l&o黑曜石水晶&r 任务后解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oCrystallized Obsidian&r quest*

source: &f&lCrystal Sword

target: &f&l冰霜制造器
source: &f&lFrost Bringer

target: 完成 &b&l&o黑曜石水晶&r 任务后解锁
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oCrystallized Amber&r quest*

target: &f&l黄昏魔杖
source: &f&lDuskflame Hex

target: *完成 &b&l&o黑曜石水晶&r 任务后解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oCrystallized Amber&r quest*

target: &d机械动力
source: &dCreate

target: &b&l机械动力！
source: &b&lWelcome to the Create

target: *完成任务&b&l&o签定合同&r以解锁 *
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oSign the contract&r quest*

target: 扳手用于旋转，调试，和拆卸
source: The Wrench is a tool used to rotate, dismantle and configure components.

target: 右击一个元件使元件面朝你
source: Right clicking a component with the Wrench will rotate the component toward or away the face with which you interacted.

target: shift右击元件可以快速拆卸
source: Right clicking a component while sneaking with the Wrench will dismantle the component and place it in your inventory.

target: 将鼠标悬停在某些元件上，可以使用鼠标滚轮控制某些东西
source: Hovering over certain configurable components will allow configuration by scrolling.

target: 对于一些特殊的原件，比如机壳底盘，扳手可以一次配置所有原件
source: For certain components such as the Linear Chassis, ctrl can be held to configure all connected components at once.

target: &b&l保存一张蓝图
source: &b&lSaving a Schematic

target: 在你的存档里使用蓝图
source: Used for saving a Structure in your world

target: 制作属于你自己的蓝图并把它放在你的主手
source: Craft yourself a Schematic and Quill and equip it in your main hand.

target: 1.使用[ 右键单击 ]在世界上选择两个大致包含你的结构的角点，要选择空中的角点，可以按住[ Ctrl ]并滚动以调整所选位置的距离，指向一侧并在按住[ Ctrl ]时滚动可在相应方向上移动侧面。
source: 1. Use [Right-Click] to select two corner points in the world that roughly contain your structure.To select corner points in the air, hold down [Ctrl] and Scroll to adjust the distance of the selected position.[Right-Click] while sneaking to reset the selection at any point.

target: 2. 指向一侧并在按住[ Ctrl ]时滚动可在相应方向上移动侧面。 这样，你可以使面尽可能靠近结构，同时保持其完全封闭
source: 2. The Selection will now stick around for further adjustments.Point at a side and hold [Ctrl] while Scrolling to move the face in the corresponding direction.This way you can bring in the faces as close to the structure as possible while keeping it fully contained.

target: 3. 对选择满意后，再次单击 [ 右键 ]确认并保存文件。原理图文件位于实例文件夹下的schematics/
source: 3. Once you're happy with the selection, [Right-Click] again to confirm and save the file.Schematic Files are found in your instance folder under  &oschematics/

target: 如果想知道更多可以去机械动力的GitHub上看看:
source: For other information visit the GitHub page from The Create mod:

target: &b&l加载蓝图
source: &b&lLoading a Schematic

target: 使用蓝图桌加载你的蓝图并把它们保存的建筑建造于你的存档
source: Using the Schematic module you can load Structures and bring them into the world

target: 要使用蓝图系统进行建造，需要将保存的蓝图数据写入到空白蓝图上并用其部署蓝图，这需要用到蓝图桌
source: Craft yourself a Schematic Table and place it in your workshop. Open it up and place the Empty Schematic in the input slot on the left. The checkered area shows the schematic file to be loaded onto the item.

target: 你可以在&b&o/schematics&r 文件夹里修改你的蓝图文件
source: You can change it to any of the files available in the &b&o/schematics&r folder:

target: 当这些都准备就绪,将蓝图放在你的主手，准备定位，你有两个选择：使用部署模式，或者直接输入坐标:
source: The processing time of this table depends on the size of the schematic you chose.On the technical side - the schematic is being uploaded onto the server in order to be place-able by server side actors.If your structure is very large, you can leave the Table interface while the upload is happening, and come back later.

target: - 如果你没有输入坐标，你可以自己框定两块地方（可稍后移动）
source: Once it finished, take the Schematic from the output slot and hold it in your main hand. For initial positioning, you have two options: Using the Deploy Mode, or to input coordinates directly.

target: &b&l打印蓝图
source: &b&lPrinting a Schematic

target: 蓝图加农炮用于建造被完成定位的蓝图上所呈现的建筑结构
source: The Schematicannon is required for building a loaded and positioned Schematic

target: 将建造蓝图能用到的材料和火药放到放在蓝图加农炮旁边的箱子里
source: It will use materials from adjacent inventories unless a Schematicannon Creatifier Crate has been placed next to it.

target: 当你确定你的蓝图已经准备的万无一失之后，你就该想想怎样让你的蓝图加农炮工作了，为了让蓝图加农炮工作，你需要这些东西：
source: Having prepared a Schematic for placement, you are now ready to consult the Schematicannon for the construction.For this Workflow you will need:

target: - 你确定准备的万无一失的蓝图 x1
source: - A deployed Schematic x1

target: - 蓝图加农炮 x1
source: - Schematicannon x1

target: - 箱子或者可调节板条箱x1-4
source: - Chests or other Inventories x1-4

target: - 火药(一个火药可以使加农炮工作399次，最多提供5个火药)
source: - Gunpowder (x1 for every 400 Blocks in the Schematic)

target: - 书 x1 (可选)
source: - Book x1 (Optional)

target: 如果你的蓝图实在太大了，到了未加载的区块，蓝图加农炮的运作可能就会出毛病了，因此保持区块加载非常重要
source: Place the Schematicannon near but outside of the boundaries of your Schematic. It is important that the target area is loaded and not too far away from the cannon.

target: 更多信息详见:
source: As usual for more informations:

target: &b&l风车
source: &b&lThe Windmill

target: 由程轴和帆（框架也行）组成
source: It is composed of a Windmill Bearing and Sails

target: 任何一种风帆的组成部分都可以装到风车程轴边上，每一块组成部分都会提供额外的动力.
source: Any block can be attached to the front of the Windmill Bearing but only Wool and Sails will produce power. The wool or sail can be placed in any configuration and shape does not matter.

target: 使用强力胶可以把风帆原件与其他的方块黏在一起
source: Super Glue is needed to attach blocks together. Sails will connect to each other and blocks that have already been attached without needing to use Super Glue the windmill bearing with an empty hand to start the windmill.

target: 如果你想让风车停下，空手右击风车程轴方块就行. 扳手可以改变风车的旋转方向（改变风向的扳手可太离谱了）
source: If you want to stop it to change the attached blocks, simply right-click on the block with an empty hand again. A Wrench can be used to change the spin direction of the windmill

target: &b&l工程师护目镜
source: &b&lEngineer's Goggles

target: 工程师护目镜占用头盔槽，他可以方便玩家查看他们机械的更多细节
source: Engineer's Goggles are a wearable item that allow the user to see more details about placed machines

target: 可以用来查看机械和动力源的具体数值，查看溜槽和隧道内的物品，查看流体元件中流体的具体数值，放置机械，传动结构和动力源时如果具有动力将会显示由粒子效果组成的光环，光环颜色和环绕速度取决于速度大小
source: The Engineer's Goggles will show the stress impact of the viewed machine while it is running. They will also give numbers and highlight the current rotation when looking at a Stressometer or Speedometer,. Additionally, they show how much fluid is in a tank along with the total storage capacity of the tank.

target: &b&l水车
source: &b&lThe Water Wheel

target: 水车是应力源之一
source: Water Wheel is a source of rotational power

target: 水车是游戏初期最好制造的应力源之一，其便宜的造价使其可以被大量制造，他可以通过堆叠来增加其产生的应力量
source: It generates rotational force when water flows over it. Due to the fact that the materials required to craft it are easily accessible in the early-game, the Water Wheel serves as the earliest generator that can be made. Total stress capacity can be increased by adding more wheels in sequence.

target: 当流动的水通过水车时，他将会开始产生应力，产生的应力将会带动与它相连的水车
source: When water flows over a Water Wheel, it will begin to rotate. This rotational power can be conveyed to other components from the Water Wheels' axis.

target: 覆盖水车的水流越多，水车产生的应力便越大，只有水流（流动的水）或气泡柱可以驱动水车
source: The more sides of the wheel the water covers, the faster the wheel will rotate and the more stress capacity it will provide. Only flowing water or source blocks with bubble columns counts toward the power generation.

target: 为了最大化水车的产能，应该尽可能使更多的水流通过水车
source: To maximize the output from a Water Wheel, have water flowing in the right direction around as much of the wheel as possible.

target: &b&l鼓风机
source: &b&lEncased Fan

target: 鼓风机是个作业原件，可以产生气流，也可以产出少得可怜的应力
source: The Encased Fan is a mechanical component that can create air streams and generate power.

target: 产生的气流可以用于批量洗涤，批量熔炼，批量烟熏
source: Its air streams are used for moving entities or for Bulk Washing, Bulk Blasting, and Bulk Smoking.

target: 当一个鼓风机正面朝下的摆放时，如果下方有热源（即火，篝火，熔岩，岩浆块，烈焰人燃烧室）并且鼓风机被红石激活，则会产生4RPM（少得可怜）的转速和64（依然少得可怜）的应力
source: When an Encased Fan is placed facedown directly over a heat source (Fire, Lava, Magma Block, active Blaze Burner, or a Campfire) and powered by Redstone, it will provide 64 units of Kinetic Stress at 4 RPM.

target: 当应力驱动鼓风机时，鼓风机会根据应力的大小，产生长数个方块的气流，气流会根据应力的方向推/拉实体，更大的应力产生的气流会更强，推拉速度更快
source: When powered by rotational force, an Encased Fan creates an air stream that extends several blocks in front of it. This air stream pushes entities away from the fan or pulls entities towards it depending on the direction of the rotation that the fan receives. Powering an Encased Fan with faster rotational force will cause its air stream to be stronger and faster.

target: 一台作为应力源的鼓风机产生的应力，和一台只有一个羊毛作为风帆的风车是一样的，是生存模式下可制作的最紧凑的动力源
source: This setup is tied with a Windmill Bearing attached to a single block of Wool as the most compact power source available in Survival mode.

target: &b&l熔炉引擎
source: &b&lThe Furnace Engine

target: 熔炉引擎安装于熔炉上，通过熔炉燃烧产生应力
source: Furnace Engine can be used to generate Rotational Force when a furnace burns

target: 为了让熔炉引擎正常工作，你需要把它安装在一台熔炉（高炉或者烟熏炉）上，并连接一台飞轮
source: In order to generate power, it must be connected to a Furnace, Smoker, or Blast Furnace, as well as a Flywheel.

target: 使用熔炉引擎右击熔炉（高炉或者烟熏炉）以安装，并在引擎的侧面安装飞轮，飞轮与引擎之间一定要有一格空气（总共占地四格：熔炉 熔炉引擎 空气 飞轮）
source: To generate power with a Furnace Engine, place it adjacent a Furnace block, then place the Flywheel one block away from the Furnace Engine (there must be air between the two).

target: 这些东西必须在同一条直线上，占地四格，普通熔炉或者烟熏炉可以产生16384的应力和32RPM的转速；高炉则可以产生32768的应力和64RPM的转速
source: They should be in a line, spanning 4 blocks in total. A Furnace/Smoker will generate 16384 SU at 16 RPM. Using a Blast Furnace will generate twice as much SU and RPM as the furnace and smoker at 32768 SU at 32 RPM.

target: 熔炉引擎只需要被绑定的熔炉处于燃烧状态就可以持续工作，一旦熔炉停止燃烧，就会停下（向您推荐外置加热器和外部火焰加热器，两者都可以持续让熔炉处于燃烧状态，但是很可惜，高炉不行）
source: The Furnace Engine will generate power so long as it is burning. When whatever fuel inside it stops burning, the generator will come to a halt.

target: &b&l传动杆
source: &b&lThe Shaft

target: 传动杆是创建一个动力结构的最基本的原件
source: The shaft is a basic mechanical component in Create

target: 传动杆可以用于连接两个作业原件，同时，可以用于放置传送带
source: A shaft can be used to connect two mechanical components such that the rotation of one rotates the other, and shafts serve as the only blocks upon which Mechanical Belts can be placed.

target: 当传动杆连接了两个或以上的作业原件，应力源将会提供与应力源相连的原件一样的应力给另外那些被连接的原件，因此，如果同时给两个被连接的或以上的原件提供应力，很有可能会导致机械过载
source: When two mechanical components are connected by a shaft, any rotational force provided to either component will also be provided to the other component at the same speed. As such, if both components provide stress, this can cause the machine to become overstressed.

target: &b&l传送带
source: &b&lMechanical Belt

target: 传送带是一种作业原件，可以传递物品和实体
source: A Mechanical Belt is a mechanical component that conveys rotation and moves items and entities

target: 放置传送带需要两个传动杆，两个传动杆必须处于同一平面内；使用传送带右击一个传动杆，然后再右击第二个完成放置，一个传送带最多五十格长
source: Placing a Belt requires two Shafts. Place the Belt by right-clicking on the first shaft and then right clicking the second. Both shafts must face the same direction. A mechanical belt can be up to 20 blocks long.

target: 传送带可以在任意数量的、处于同一水平面内的传动杆上安装，可以水平，垂直，或对角（y轴45°）安装，两根传动杆之间不能有障碍，同时，你可以使用安山岩机壳或者黄铜机壳装饰传送带
source: A Mechanical Belt can be placed over any number of Shafts arranged horizontally, vertically, or diagonally (45° towards the y axis) in a single line, provided that no obstructions are present and that the total length is no longer than twenty blocks. Andesite Casing and Brass Casing can be placed over any segment of a Belt.

target: 传送带可以染色，使用染料右击已安装的传送带即可，使用水桶可以洗去颜色
source: Mechanical Belts can be dyed be right clicking on them with a Dye. This will add colored stripes along the edges of the belt. To remove the dye, right click on the belt with a Water Bucket or Water Bottle.

target: &b&l链式传动箱
source: &b&lEncased Chain Drive

target: 链式传动箱和传送带类似，相连的链式传动箱可以共享转速
source: The Encased Chain Drive is a block that can transfer rotation much like the Mechanical Belt

target: 链式传动箱可以水平连接其他的链式传动箱，如果这个被连接的传动箱的方向不同，则会扭转传动杆的朝向
source: The Encased Chain Drive can connect to other drives either vertically or horizontally. If a connected chain drive is facing a different way, rotation will be relayed in that direction.

target: 链式传动箱也可以链接到可调节齿轮箱上进行转速控制和红石控制
source: Encased Chain Drives can also be connected to Adjustable Chain Gearshifts, which can change the speed based on the redstone power input.

target: &b&l安山岩隧道
source: &b&lAndesite Tunnel

target: &b&l黄铜隧道
source: &b&lBrass Tunnel

target: 黄铜隧道可以用来过滤和分流传送带上的物品
source: The Brass Tunnel is a machine that can only be placed on Mechanical Belts. It can sort items that pass through

target: 黄铜隧道的输入方向和输出方向都带有过滤插槽，如果黄铜隧道的输出端不止一个，则被传输的物品将被分流
source: Sides of the Brass Tunnel can be filtered to only allow certain items to pass. If multiple outputs are available, items will be split.

target: 黄铜隧道可以把物品分流到多个相邻的传送带上，也可以通过多个带有黄铜隧道的传送带进行分流
source: Items can be split by having multiple sides of the Tunnel connected to an outgoing belt, or through multiple adjacent tunnels with outgoing belts.

target: 使用扳手可以把隧道设置为一次输出所有物品，当物品穿过时，并联的隧道可能不会分流物品，因此，要在它们之间设置分流隧道
source: Using the Wrench, adjacent Tunnels can be set to output all at once, stalling when items are missing. Synchronized tunnels may not draw from adjacent tunnels, so it may be necessary to have splitting tunnels placed before them.

target: &b&l溜槽
source: &b&lChutes

target: 溜槽用于垂直或者斜着传送物品，类似传送带
source: Chutes transport items vertically, similarly to Mechanical Belts

target: 溜槽可以从它的上面，或下面的存储方块里提取或存入物品
source: Chutes can insert or extract from inventories above or below them.

target: 连接的溜槽可以像传送带那样传递物品，它们的对角可以连接其他溜槽
source: Connected chutes will pass items along, similarly to a Mechanical Belt. Chutes can be connected to other chutes diagonally.

target: 为了向上传递物品，在顶部的溜槽安装一个鼓风机是必须的.
source: To pull items up, an appropriately powered Encased Fan is needed on top of the chutes.

target: 使用扳手右击溜槽可以在上面开个窗
source: Chutes can be right clicked with a Wrench to be given windows.

target: 智能溜槽的运作方式类似于黄铜漏斗，它们可以过滤物品并且受红石控制，溜槽可以同时进行抽取和输出，这点与漏斗不同
source: Smart Chutes behave similarly to Brass Funnels. They can be filtered to only extract certain items, and be stopped with a redstone signal. Unlike funnels, they can insert and extract at the same time, but can only function vertically.

target: &b&l置物台
source: &b&lDepot

target: 置物台是一个可以被机械臂一类的传输原件交互的方块
source: The Depot is used as an interaction point for machines such as the Mechanical Arm

target: 你可以通过手持物品右击将物品放入置物台，同时置物台可以和动力辊压机等机械交互，这点和传送带类似
source: Items can be right clicked or inserted onto the depot. Machines such as Mechanical Presses will interact with the items the same way they would on a Mechanical Belt.

target: 被加工的物品会留在置物台上，直到他被另一个玩家取走或被另一个机器取走
source: Items will stay on a depot until a they are extracted by a player or another machine.

target: 置物台是机械臂的最佳搭档，因为机械臂的速度不够快，无法及时配合传送带拿去物品，而置物台可以弥补此缺陷
source: Mechanical Arms are best used with Depots, as they are not usually fast enough to grab items directly off Mechanical Belts at low speeds.

target: &b&l动力臂
source: &b&lThe Mechanical Arm

target: 动力臂是一个可以短距离传输物品的作业原件
source: The Mechanical Arm is a block used to transfer items

target: 手持动力臂，右击要设定的位置，右击一次设为蓝色输入，右击两次设为橙色输出
source: With the Mechanical Arm in hand, right clicking valid inventories will select them to be taken from, or deposited to if the inventory cannot be taken from.

target: 然后放下动力臂，动力臂就可以在两地之间传输物品了
source: From there, further right clicking will toggle between taking from and depositing to.

target: 在设定过程中左键点击可以取消设定
source: The Mechanical Arm can then be placed by right clicking on a block, and powered.

target: 动力臂有三种不同的形态，可以使用扳手切换：
source: The Mechanical Arm has three different behaviors which can be switched between with the Wrench:

target: ● 轮询调度 - 有多个输出时，轮流向每个输出移动物品，当输出被阻塞时跳过
source: ● Round Robin - The Mechanical Arm will take from and deposit to available inventories in the order of placement.

target: ●强制轮询调度 - 有多个输出时，轮流向每个输出移动物品，当输出被阻塞时等待。有多个输入时，轮流向每个输入拿取物品，当输入缺失时等待。
source: ● Forced Round Robin - The same function as Round Robin, but the Mechanical Arm will not move items until the next inventory in order of placement is available.

target: ●第一目标优先- 有多个输出时，优先向第一个输出移动物品，第一个输出被阻塞时向第二个输出移动物品，以此类推。
source: ● Prefer First - The Mechanical Arm will always take from and deposit to the first available inventory in order of placement.

target: &b&l齿轮们
source: &b&lThe Cogwheels

target: 齿轮是机械动力里最基本的传递旋转力的原件
source: The Cogwheels are a basic mechanical component in Create that relays rotation

target: 齿轮主要有三种连接方式:
source: Cogwheels have three main methods of interlocking:

target: ● 当两个齿轮相连时（不是对角相连）两个齿轮会咬合在一起，当其中一个齿轮被提供旋转力时，另一个与之相连的齿轮也会开始旋转，但是方向相反
source: ● Two Cogwheels interlock when placed next to each other (not diagonally) and facing the same direction. When rotational force is provided to one of the cogwheels, the force will be provided to the other Cogwheel at the same speed but in the opposite direction.

target: ● 两个大齿轮垂直放置时（就是成直角放置，不会有人不知道这是啥意思吧）可以改变旋转力的传动方向，但是速度不变（如果不理解，搜一下冠齿轮的作用你就明白了）
source: ● Two Large Cogwheels interlock when placed perpendicular to each other, effectively changing its axis and direction, but not its speed.

target: ● 当大齿轮与齿轮成对角线链接时，大齿轮将以齿轮的一半速度旋转（也就是说，大带小加速，小带大减速）
source: ● A Cogwheel and a Large Cogwheel interlock when placed diagonally to each other and facing the same direction. The Large Cogwheel will rotate at half the speed of the Cogwheel.

target: 齿轮可以在某些程度上代替传动轴，它们也可以连接机械，不过，它们可不能安装传送带
source: A cogwheel can also be used like a Shaft, conveying rotation from the ends of its axis. Mechanical components can be connected to each end, and several Cogwheels connected end-to-end function the same as multiple shafts would.

target: &b&l翻转齿轮箱
source: &b&lGearshift

target: 当翻转齿轮箱被红石信号激活时，它将翻转传入它的旋转力的方向
source: The Gearshift reverses outgoing Rotational Force when a Redstone signal is applied

target: &b&l离合器
source: &b&lClutch

target: 当离合器接受红石信号时，它会切断应力传输
source: The Clutch stops outgoing rotation when a redstone signal is applied

target: &b&l十字齿轮箱
source: &b&lGearbox

target: 十字齿轮箱是一个用来传递旋转力的方块
source: The Gearbox is a block used to transfer Rotational power

target: 十字齿轮箱可以将输入它的旋转力向四个方向输出.
source: The Gearbox can relay Rotational power in four horizontal directions.

target: 当在一条直线上使用时，十字齿轮箱会扭转旋转力方向再输出.
source: When used in a straight line, the Gearbox will reverse rotation.

target: &b&l支架们
source: &b&lThe Bratchets

target: 支架可以用于支撑齿轮，传动杆，流体管道和齿轮，也是一种很好的装饰
source: Brackets are decorative items used on Shafts, Cogwheels, and Fluid Pipes

target: 支架是一种让管道之间井水不犯河水的优秀选择.
source: Brackets can be used as one way to keep adjacent pipes separate from each other.

target: &b&l机壳们
source: &b&lThe Casings

target: 机壳可以用于合成，同时可以用于装饰（真的挺好看的）
source: Casings are blocks used for crafting, and for aesthetic purposes

target: &b&l动力泵
source: &b&lThe Mechanical Pump

target: 动力泵可以像真正的泵（mek机械泵）一样使用
source: Mechanical Pump can be used as a actual pump

target: 机械泵受到的旋转力越大，它抽取的速度就越快
source: The faster rotational speed it have inputted (using a small/large cogwheel), it can pump faster.

target: &b&l流体阀门
source: &b&lThe Fluid Valve

target: 流体阀门是一种可以控制的管道
source: Fluid Vavles may be opened and closed

target: 最佳驱动原件为阀门手轮
source: The best way to do this is to using a Valve Handle.

target: &b&l智能流体管道
source: &b&lThe Smart Fluid Pipe

target: 智能流体管道可以标记流体或插入过滤器
source: Smart Pipes can allow only a certain liquid to pass through them

target: &b&l流体管道
source: &b&lThe Fluid Pipes

target: 流体管道的作用如同他的名字一样
source: Fluid Pipes are blocks used to transport and deal with fluids

target: 流体管道需要动力泵泵入流体才能工作，一个动力泵可以将流体泵出16格远.
source: Fluid Pipes require Fluid Pumps to move liquid. Fluid Pumps have a maximum range of 16 blocks around them.

target: 流体管道一次只能传输一种流体，如果不同的流体在管道中撞车了，则会破坏管道，有的甚至会在破坏的地方生成一些方块
source: Fluid Pipes can only move one liquid at a time; if different liquids intersect, the pipe will clog.

target: 如果你使用了扳手给管道开了个窗或者用支架让它们断绝了来往，则管道之间不会连接
source: Fluid Pipes can be adjacent without connecting if they have been made transparent with a Wrench or have a Wooden or Metal Bracket.

target: 通过给予流体阀门一些旋转力就可以切换流体管道传输的流体
source: Fluid Valves can be given Rotational power to toggle a flow.

target: &b&l注液器
source: &b&lSpout

target: 注液器是一种用于进行流体装瓶或装桶，以及流体合成的机器
source: The Spout is a block used for filling liquid containers such as bottles or buckets, or crafting with liquids

target: 注液器只能被流体管道输入流体（其他模组的也行，但是就是不能手动，气不气），最多装一桶的量，它会将流体注入它下面的可以被注入物品的物品，当然，需要置物台或者传送带
source: The Spout can be filled with up to 1 bucket of any one liquid via Fluid Pipes. It will then spout the fluid at appropriate items that pass under it via a Conveyor Belt or Depot.

target: 注液器有八种特殊合成配方
source: The Spout has eight unique crafting recipes.

target: &b&l软管滑轮
source: &b&lHose Pulley

target: 软管滑轮会放下软管，并在被框定区域内放置流体源
source: The Hose Pulley lets down a hose that can drain bodies of liquids

target: 当软管滑轮被通入旋转力时，它将可以几乎无限长的伸出软管，若要泵出流体，则需要一个动力泵，它会将流体排放到软管的末端
source: When Rotational Force is given to the Hose Pully, it can extend the hose infinitely. A Fluid Pump is required for the hose to drain liquids. It will drain a body of liquid down to the level of the hose.

target: 抽取模式下，如果软管接触的流体源头有超过10000格和它相连的同种流体，软管滑轮将会认为这是一个无限大的流体源，可以无限抽取流体（也就是说，你如果要使用匠魂的熔融金属获得无限金属锭，你得先攒69445个锭，不多，对吧？也才1085组多5个）
source: If a liquid source is at least 10,000 blocks, the Hose Pulley considers it to be infinite, drawing the liquid from it without actually draining the source.

target: &b&l流体储罐
source: &b&lThe Fluid Tank

target: 流体储罐，功能如同它的名字
source: The Fluid Tank is a fluid storage mechanism

target: 每一个流体储罐可以装8桶单种流体，它可以和其他储罐合并以扩大储量，最大为3*32*3，可以存储2304桶流体
source: The Fluid Tank can store up to 8 buckets of fluid per block. Fluid tanks will also merge with adjacent tanks, up to 3x32x3, allowing to store up to 2,304 buckets of any fluid.

target: 流体储罐没有具体的输入输出端，它的每个面都可以输入输出
source: Fluids can be stored and extracted from fluid tanks via Fluid Pipe. The fluid pipes can be placed on any face of the fluid tank: top, bottom, or sides.

target: 流体管道中流体流动的方向可以表明流体是从储罐输出还是输入储罐的，如果流体流向储罐，则流体将输入进储罐，反之亦然
source: The direction of flow in the fluid pipe indicates whether fluids will be put into the tank or extracted from the tank; if fluid is flowing towards the tank, the fluid will be stored in the tank. Likewise, if a fluid pipe is flowing away from the tank (via Mechanical Pump), then fluid from the tank will be extracted into that pipe.

target: 流体在储罐内是否接触储罐壁并不妨碍流体管道输出流体，例如，即使一个储罐没有装满，你仍然可以在储罐顶部安装动力泵泵出流体
source: The placement of fluid pipe connections to the tank is not important for functionality. For instance, an extracting pipe can be placed at the top of a tank and still remove fluid from the tank, even if the fluid tank is not completely full.

target: &b&l可调节连携齿轮箱
source: &b&lAdjustable Chain Gearshift

target: 只不过是连携齿轮箱的红石控制版本
source: The Adjustable Chain Gearshift functions similarly to Encased Chain Drive, but can change the speed of the output with a redstone input

target: 两个在一条直线上的可调节连携齿轮箱的输入端受到红石信号时会加速旋转，最大两倍，输出端反之，最多减半
source: With a redstone signal on the input, adjacent Gearshifts will change speed output depending on the strength of the signal, maxing out at double. With a redstone signal on an output, the speed of said output will be decreased, being halved at most.

target: &b&l转速控制器
source: &b&lRotation Speed Controller

target: 转速控制器是一个运行玩家精确控制转速的传动原件
source: The Rotation Speed Controller is a mechanical component that allows the player to precisely control rotational speed

target: 为了驱动转速控制器，你需要在其上方放置一个大齿轮。准心指向转速控制器上的转速界面时滚动滚轮来调节输出的转速，可以设定为负值来反转旋转方向。
source: For the Rotation Speed Controller to work, it must be paired with a Large Cogwheel. The Rotation Speed Controller, when powered by the Large Cogwheel, outputs any desired speed of rotational force from its sides. It also does the opposite; when powered from its sides, it controls the speed of the Large Cogwheel.

target: 转速可以通过观察机器的正或后面显示，使用鼠标滚轮可以快速切换转速，最小为-256，最大为256
source: The rotation speed can be set by looking at the front or the back of the machine and scrolling up or down. Shifting while scrolling allows the player to have more precise control over the speed. The speed can be set to any integer from -256 to 256.

target: &b&l搅拌器
source: &b&lThe Whisk

target: 用于合成动力搅拌器
source: Whisk can be used to craft Mechanical Mixer

target: &b&l电子管
source: &b&lElectron Tube

target: 主要用作与制作部分高级机械以及智能元件
source: The Electron Tube is an item that is only used in crafting recipes

target: &b&l石磨
source: &b&lThe Millstone

target: 石磨是一种最基础的粉碎工具，至少，在你还没有获得粉碎轮的时候，它还是有那么一点的用处的；你可以使用管道从石磨的正上方输入物品
source: The Millstone is a more basic equivalent of the Crushing Wheels, capable of applying milling recipes to any items inserted from above.

target: 石磨可以通过下面连接传动杆或者在侧面装齿轮来驱动
source: A Millstone can be powered by a shaft from below or by a cogwheel from the side.

target: 一共有两种输入方式：
source: There are two ways to insert items into a Millstone:

target: ● 把东西扔到石磨正上方，如果石磨内部是空的，那么它将会和漏斗一样接收这些物品，当然，是可处理物品
source: ● Dropping items on top of it: anything that can be processed will be picked up if the input buffer is empty.

target: ● 一切可以传输物品的东西，包括漏斗，物品管道，溜槽，或者一些无线传输设备
source: ● Hoppers, Funnels, Transposers, and other inserters can directly feed it items from any side.

target: 石磨需要一些时间来处理配方，处理时，会产生一些粒子效果，处理完成时，石磨并不会自动输出，你需要通过以下两种方式导出物品：
source: A Millstone will take some time to process inserted ingredients and will show particles while it is working. Once finished, the Millstone will not drop or output the result by itself, but there are two ways to remove processed items:

target: ● 空手右击石磨（拿出所有）
source: ● Right-clicking the Millstone with an empty hand: this will manually pick up everything in the output buffer.

target: ● 一切可以传输物品的东西，包括漏斗，物品管道，溜槽，或者一些无线传输设备
source: ● Hoppers, Extractors, Transposers, and other exporters can pull items out of the output buffer from any side.

target: &b&l机械手
source: &b&lThe Deployer

target: 机械手可以在两个方块以内的距离模拟玩家操作
source: The Deployer simulates player actions on blocks up 2 to blocks away from it

target: 机械手默认情况下是右击模式，通过扳手可以调整为左击模式
source: The Deployer simulates right clicks by default. It can be adjusted to left click instead with a Wrench.

target: 砂纸是个好东西，它可以用于研磨玫瑰石英
source: Sand Paper is a tool used solely to create Polished Rose Quartz

target: 如果你要手动磨，那么请把砂纸拿在主手，玫瑰石英拿在附属，按住你的鼠标右键，此时，砂纸会抛光你副手的石英并使其掉落，如果你身上没有空位的话
source: To use Sand Paper, hold it in the offhand, and Rose Quartz in the main hand. The quartz will get polished, and drop on the ground. One durability will be used off the paper.

target: 如果装了砂纸，可以自动对放置在它下面的置物台（或者别的什么东西，掉落物也行）上的玫瑰石英进行处理
source: This process can be automated by putting the sand paper into a Deployer, powering it, and dropping the Rose Quartz in front of it.

target: 机械手有两个存储槽，第一个是它的手，第二个则是一个隐藏的内部存储，机械手的活动获得的一切物品将存储在那个槽里，如果那个槽满了，机械手将不再工作，直到物品被输出
source: The Deployer has 2 inventory slots; the held item and one extra internal slot. As well as unusable items, items harvested by the Deployer will be transferred to the extra slot to be removed by machines, during which time the Deployer will stall. Items cannot be extracted from the extra slot directly by the player.

target: &b&l玫瑰石英自动化
source: &b&lThe Polished Rose Quartz Factory

target: 你能做的么？（作者这是个专家包啊专家包！专家包真的有人做不到这个吗？）
source: Can you do that?

target: 现在，万事俱备，只欠东风。所有的材料已经准备完毕，你可以把他们拼起来，对吧？那么着手去做吧，你的第一台玫瑰石英自动化！
source: Now you have all you need. Can you put them togethr? All right then, create your first fully automatic Polished Rose Quatz factory.

target: &b&l动力辊压机
source: &b&lThe Mechanical Press

target: 动力辊压机是一种作业原件，提供应力可以让它进行金属压板或者打包合成
source: The Mechanical Press is a mechanical component that applies Pressing, Packing, and Compacting recipes to items below it

target: 这是个很早期也很重要的玩意儿，用于把金属压成片以合成一些高级货（但是我为什么不用工程师锤？）
source: It is an important early-game item, as it is used to press Ingots into Sheets, which are important ingredients for higher-level components.

target: 动力辊压机可以从两个方向接收应力，无论应力方向，它总会开始工作；收到更大的应力会加快处理速度
source: The Mechanical Press is powered by an internal Shaft, accessed from two opposite sides. Much like Shafts, Presses will relay rotation along their axis. It processes items faster when it receives faster rotational power.

target: 动力辊压机默认启用辊压模式，这可以通过两个方法实现：
source: By default, the Mechanical Press will apply Pressing recipes to items underneath it. This can be set up in two ways:

target: ● 随便放个什么方块在下面，当动力辊压机接收到应力和红石信号（比如拉杆）时，会处理一切能辊压的物品，不能的会忽视
source: ● When placed one space above any block, it will process all stacks of valid items on the block when given a rotational power and a redstone signal(like a lever). Items with no pressing recipe are unaffected.

target: ● 在下面放个传送带，它会压制所有传送带上的物品，不能压的忽略
source: ● When placed one space above a Mechanical Belt, it will automatically press stacks of incoming items, stalling the belt until each operation is done. Items with no pressing recipe are ignored.

target: &b&l动力搅拌器
source: &b&lThe Mechanical Mixer

target: 动力搅拌器是个作业原件，与工作盆配合使用，处理流体搅拌配方和无序合成
source: The Mechanical Mixer is a mechanical component that applies Mixing recipes and shapeless Crafting recipes to items in Basins.

target: 与动力辊压机一样，无论收到什么方向的应力都会工作.
source: The Mechanical Mixer is powered by an internal cogwheel, and will behave as one to any adjacent components, relaying and reversing rotation sideways.

target: 动力搅拌器需要的最低旋转力为32RPM，转速越高处理越快
source: The Mixer requires a minimum rotational speed of 32 RPM from its power source to work. Mixers will process ingredients faster the more speed it is given.

target: 为了让动力搅拌器正常工作，它必须放在一个工作盆的上方，与工作盆要有一格的距离，当工作盆里有可用配方时，且自身应力足够，会自动开始工作.
source: To work, a Mixer must be placed directly above a Basin, with a 1 block gap. When a valid recipe is inserted by throwing the ingredients in the Mixer, the Mixer will automatically combine the ingredients.

target: 动力搅拌器可进行混合搅拌，这是独一无二的
source: The Mechanical Mixer may be used to perform mixing recipes, which are not possible to make anywhere else.

target: &b&l烈焰人燃烧室
source: &b&lThe Blaze Burner

target: 烈焰人燃烧室是一个加热元件，是某些特殊配方的必须之物
source: A Blaze Burner is a heating component that is required for certain Mixing recipes

target: 一个空的烈焰人燃烧室起不到什么作用，它必须去捕捉一个可怜的烈焰人才能工作，你可以通过手持空的燃烧室右击烈焰人进行捕捉，或者直接右击烈焰人刷怪笼也行
source: Blaze Burners must have Blazes in them to function. To put a Blaze in an Empty Blaze Burner, right-click on a Blaze to capture it. Alternatively, Empty Blaze Burner can be filled by clicking on a Blaze Spawner.

target: &b&l建造工茶饮
source: &b&lThe Builder's Tea

target: 一种能回复1个鸡腿和0.6饱和度并给予饮用者三分钟急迫的药水
source: A potion that restores half a hunger point and grants the drinker haste for 3 minutes

target: 准备一个随便什么树的树叶，250mb水，250mb牛奶，然后把这些东西全部塞进工作盆，让动力搅拌器处理这些东西吧，注意，此配方需要一个普通燃烧状态的烈焰人燃烧室；随后，把获得的茶导入注液器，注入瓶子里
source: Put any Leaves, 250mb Water, and 250mb Milk in a heated Mechanical Mixer. Then, put the liquid in a bottle with a Spout.

target: 给你三分钟急迫，血赚不是吗.
source: Gives haste for 3 minutes when drank and restores half a hunger point.

target: &b&l烈焰蛋糕
source: &b&lThe Blaze Cake

target: 烈焰蛋糕是一种可以被喂给烈焰人燃烧室的‘食物’，可以让烈焰人燃烧室进入超级燃烧模式
source: Blaze Cake is an item that can be fed to a Blaze Burner in order to make it Super-Heated

target: 烈焰蛋糕可以被用于投喂烈焰人燃烧室，投喂之后，烈焰人燃烧室将进入50秒的超级燃烧模式（即蓝火状态），之后会变成普通燃烧状态，普通燃烧持续205秒.
source: Blaze Cake can be used to feed the Blaze Burner, making it Super-Heated. The Blaze becomes Super-Heated for 50 seconds. It then turns into standard blaze, lasting for 205 seconds.

target: 随后，烈焰人燃烧室进入‘衰退阶段’此状态下同普通燃烧模式，可以提供热量.
source: Then, it turns into the fading phase, lasting for 50 seconds. During this phase the Blaze still provides enough heat to make the Heated recipes.

target: 最后，燃烧室开始冒烟，不在提供热量
source: Finally, the Blaze becomes smouldering, and does not provide any heat to the basin.

target: &b&l动力合成器
source: &b&lThe Mechanical Crafter

target: 动力合成器是一种多方块形式的自动合成台
source: Mechanical Crafters are machines that can automatically craft items

target: 使用扳手右击动力合成器，改变摆放其上的物品在激活合成之后的运行方向，机械合成器必须通过这样的方式才能把物品拼起来
source: Right click the front of a Mechanical Crafter with a Wrench to change the direction it sends items during crafting. The Mechanical Crafters are only connected by this path.

target: 动力合成器可以自动填充机械动力添加的漏斗和原版漏斗
source: Mechanical Crafters can be automatically filled by Funnels or Hoppers.

target: 通过扳手，你可以在动力合成器的正/侧面断开合成器的存储连接，动力合成器可以共享其库存，同时不会处理同一个合成配方
source: On the back and sides of Mechanical Crafters, a Wrench can be used to connect or disconnect the inventory of two adjacent crafters. Crafters can share inventories while not participating in the same crafting recipe.

target: 你也可以直接用手把物品塞进去
source: Items can also be inserted or removed by hand.

target: 每一个动力合成器都内置一个齿轮，只能由齿轮或者其他合成器驱动
source: Each Mechanical Crafter has an internal gear that can only be powered by adjacent Mechanical Crafters or any size Cogwheel.

target: 当动力合成器接收到应力并且接收到红石信号时，它们会开始传输物品
source: When powered by rotational force, Mechanical Crafters will send their items to adjacent crafters.

target: 当所有的物品被成功拼在一起时，物品将会在一段动画后合成成功并掉落
source: Mechanical Crafters will start crafting once every Mechanical Crafter has been filled, or when they receive a redstone signal.

target: 动力合成器可以接收无效配方（即没有产物的，你瞎摆的配方），同样也会开始传输物品，但是当物品全部拼在一起时，只会炸开，散落一地，什么也不会合成.
source: Mechanical Crafters are able to assemble invalid crafting recipes, but will eject the items once they are together instead of turning them into the crafting product.

target: &b&l粉碎轮
source: &b&lThe Crushing Wheels

target: 粉碎轮是石磨的上位替代品
source: Crushing Wheels are the more advanced version of the Millstone

target: 它可以在任何方向上运作，当它/它们旋转时，会开始处理配方，旋转需要16RPM，最少128应力
source: It applies Crushing recipes to any items inserted from the direction they are spinning away from. At 16 RPM, 1 wheel uses 128 Stress units.

target: 两个粉碎轮之间必须格一格方块，同时，两个轮子获得的旋转力方向必须相反且必须保证是左轮顺时针旋转，右轮逆时针旋转，任何被处理的物品都必须放置在两个轮子之间的顶部
source: Two Crushing Wheels must be placed next to each other horizontally one block apart. Both wheels must be given equal and opposite rotational force, with the left wheel rotating clockwise and the right wheel rotating counterclockwise. Any items to be crushed must be inserted at the 'top' of the wheels.

target: 制作粉碎轮可以使用任何类型的‘石头’包括石头，三废石（安山岩不再是了好吧），但是圆石不行
source: When crafting Crushing Wheels you can use any kind of stone. This includes Andesite, Diorite and Granite but does not include Cobblestone.

target: &b&l安山岩漏斗
source: &b&lAndesite Funnel

target: 类似于黄铜漏斗，造价更低，功能更少，传递量更小（某些时候因为其特性不能被黄铜漏斗代替）
source: The Andesite Funnel is used to extract or insert materials into inventories, similar in nature to the Brass Funnel.

target: &b&l黄铜漏斗
source: &b&lBrass Funnel

target: 类似于安山岩漏斗，造价更高，功能更低，传输量更大
source: The Brass Funnel is a block that can extract or insert items into inventories, much like the Andesite Funnel

target: 和其他的黄铜机器一样，黄铜漏斗可以插过滤器，可以控制输入输出一次的传输量
source: Like other Brass machines, the Brass Funnel can be set to filter items. It can also output a set amount of items, as well as only input items stacked to the set amount.

target: 它可以通过扳手右击改变输入输出模式
source: It can be set to insert or extract with a Wrench.

target: 可被红石控制
source: It can be turned off with redstone.

target: &b&l动力活塞
source: &b&lThe Mechanical Piston

target: 动力活塞是个活塞（废话）可以通过加活塞杆来加长范围，接收到应力后激活
source: Mechanical Piston is a piston that can extend multiple blocks when powered with Rotational power

target: 为了加长长度，你需要在活塞末尾加活塞杆，并提供旋转力，最长长度为64格
source: To extend, the Piston must have Piston Extension Poles at the end as well as Rotational power. The maximum extension pole length is 64 blocks.

target: 当接收到相反的旋转力时，动力活塞会收缩，此时，如果不使用粘液球将其转换为粘性动力活塞，那么推出去的方块就回不来了
source: When the rotation is reversed, the piston will retract. The end must be made sticky with a Slimeball to bring the pushed blocks back with it.

target: 在动态结构里，可以通过强力胶把动力活塞和机壳底盘黏在一起，这种独特的结构类似于矿车结构和旋转结构
source: Multiple blocks can be pushed with the use of Linear Chassis, Radial Chassis, or Super Glue. Such structures function similarly to rotating structures and minecart contraptions.

target: &b&l矿车装配站
source: &b&lThe Cart Assembler

target: 功能和它名字一样，当内部存在矿车时被红石激活，会将上方连接的结构实体化并安装到矿车上。
source: Cart Assembler can attach a structure to carts that pass through it when supplied with a redstone signal

target: 使用扳手右击矿车装配站，可以打开其配置界面，配置可以用滚轮调整，分别是这仨：结构与矿车保持相同方向，转向时机器停止工作，结构方向保持不变
source: Using a Wrench, the Cart Assembler can be configured to set the movement of cart contraptions to \"Always face toward motion (default,)\" \"Pause actors while rotating,\" and \"Lock Rotation.\" On the second setting, actors such as a Deployer will not work while the cart rotates. On the third setting, the contraption will not change alignment along with the cart, and will retain the same rotation from when it was built, much like the effect of a Mechanical Bearing on a cart contraption.

target: &b&l动力程轴
source: &b&lThe Mechanical Bearing

target: 动力程轴用于创建旋转结构
source: Mechanical Bearing is meant to create and rotate moving structures

target: 如果将动力程轴正确的使用在一个结构里，结构会旋转，结构上的方块将保留它们的设置，作为结构的一部分使用
source: The structure will rotate. If another Mechanical Bearing is used within a Contraption, facing the same way as the original, the blocks attached to that bearing will keep their alignment as the rest of the structure moves.

target: 旧版本的时候，动力程轴也可以和风车程轴一样使用扳手改变方向
source: In older versions, the Mechanical Bearing also had the functionality of Windmill Bearings which could be scrolled through with a Wrench.

target: 使用扳手可以让动态结构重新变为一堆方块，且保持离停下的角度最近的方向的样子
source: The structure's behavior when ceasing movement can be adjusted with a Wrench. It can be told to place the blocks: always, only near the initial angle, or never.

target: &b&l绳索滑轮
source: &b&lRope Pulley

target: 就是个只能上下移动的粘性动力活塞，不过，不用装活塞杆就是了
source: The Rope Pulley functions much like a Mechanical Piston, but in only one direction and without the need for Piston Extension Poles

target: 绳索滑轮可以上下升降130格，通常用于挖掘或者作为起重机使用
source: The Rope Pulley can extend downwards 130 blocks before stopping. It is most commonly used for excavating or elevators.

target: 使用机壳底盘或者强力胶什么的东西可以连接更多方块
source: Use Linear Chassis, Radial Chassis, or Super Glue to push more blocks.

target: &b&l底盘们
source: &b&lChassis

target: 旋转底盘能在旋转结构中连接四面的方块，相当于旋转结构的轴。
source: The Radial Chassis is a block used to connect moving structures.

target: 会垂直与其他旋转底盆连接，成为动态结构时会带动所有连接的旋转底盆；使用粘液球右键将会变为粘性旋转底盘，不消耗粘液球。再次点击可以使四个面都带有粘性；当旋转时在工作范围内旋转所有连接到粘性面的方块，范围可以用扳手调整
source: Radial Chassis are used to rotate a cylinder of blocks around them when powered by a Bearing. You can right click on the sides while holding a Slimeball to make them sticky. The radius of affected blocks can be changed per chassis with a Wrench.

target: 机壳底盘适用于非旋转的动态结构，与旋转底盘类似
source: The Linear Chassis is one method of connecting up moving structures or minecart contraptions.

target: 使用黏液球（不消耗）或强力胶对机壳底盘的面右击，可将该面变为黏性面。再次右击则会将两面都变为黏性面。黏性面会粘连方块，每面最多可粘连16格。使用扳手指向机壳底盘会高亮该底盘粘连的方块，滑动滚轮可调整。
source: Linear Chassis will automatically connect to adjacent and equally aligned chassis. Slime is needed to connect a column of other blocks to their piston-like surface. A Wrench can be used to adjust the size of the column. Hold ctrl with a Wrench to adjust all connected Chassis at once. Secondary Linear Chassis can be used to have adjacent chassis that don't connect to each other.

target: &b&l移动存储端口们
source: &b&lThe Portable Interfaces

target: 移动式流体端口是一种为动态结构量身定做的一种流体接收器，他可以在动态结构还是方块的时候把流体接入结构，当动态结构移动时和储罐一起被带走，适用于旋转结构，活塞结构，矿车等
source: The Portable Fluid Interface is the fluid version of the Portable Storage Interface. It is used to insert or extract from the fluid inventory of a moving structure made by a Cart Assembler, Mechanical Piston, Gantry Carriage, or Bearing.

target: 接口之间的距离不能大于2，不能小于1，一个安装于动态结构的流体储罐上，一个安装在固定结构上，它需要一个泵来提取流体，可以使用红石信号提早断开链接
source: The Interfaces must be placed facing each other at 1-2 blocks apart, one on a moving structure with a Fluid Tank and one stationary. A Fluid Pump is required to insert or extract liquid from the moving structure. Moving structures will automatically stall for an Interface. A Redstone signal can be applied to break off the connection early.

target: 移动式存储端口是一个可以让动态结构访问固定结构存储系统的方块.
source: The Portable Storage Interface is a block that allows stationary contraptions to directly interact with onboard inventories.

target: 和流体版本的类似，不过不需要泵，也不需要流体储罐，它所需要的只是一个装在动态结构上的储存系统
source: Portable Storage Interfaces are used on moving contraptions including Mechanical Pistons, Bearings, or Cart Contraptions. For Portable Storage Interfaces to interact they must face each other at 1-2 blocks apart. The moving interface must have an onboard inventory while the stationary interface has something inserting or extracting directly from it, such as a Mechanical Belt or Funnel. Inventory will then be exchanged at the rate of the inserting or extracting component.

target: 当两个端口连接时，动态结构会失速，使用红石信号可以断开连接
source: Moving structures will stall when interfaces meet. A redstone signal can be applied to break off the connection.

target: 可以使用扳手快速拆卸
source: Shift-right-clicking on a Portable Storage Interface with a Wrench will destroy the Portable Storage Interface and place it in your inventory.

target: &b&l动力收割机
source: &b&lMechanical Harvester

target: 动力收割机是用来收割作物的作业原件
source: The Mechanical Harvester is a component used to harvest crops

target: 在处于动态结构中，动力收割机会收割一切它所接触的作物，并把它们放在自己动态结构的储存原件里，如果没有储存原件，则把物品掉落在地上
source: The Mechanical Harvester will harvest all mature crops it comes in contact with while moving. It will then either deposit the items to an inventory on the moving structure, or, if no inventories are available, it will drop the items on to the ground.

target: 与大多数机械原件不同，静止状态下的动力收割机没有任何用处，这可能是因为其作用不能再静态结构下完成
source: Unlike most components, the Mechanical Harvester cannot be powered while stationary. This is likely due to the fact that in order for the Harvester to work, it must be within the same block as the mature crop to harvest, which could not happen with a stationary component.

target: &b&l动力钻头
source: &b&lMechanical Drill

target: 动力钻头用于挖掘方块
source: The Mechanical Drill is a block used to break blocks

target: 动力钻头会花上一点点时间去破坏他面前的方块（时间计算公式 方块硬度*45/RPM）并伤害触碰到的生物
source: A stationary Mechanical Drill will break blocks in the block in front of it with a time in seconds of (45 x Hardness)/RPM and will hurt entities in an area around it.

target: 处于各种动态结构上时，动力钻头不需要通入旋转力就能工作，工作时，它装载的动态结构会停下，但是仍保持实体状态，工作完成后动态结构才会继续运行；工作时间取决于方块硬度
source: A Mechanical Drill moved by components such as a Mechanical Bearing or Mechanical Piston will break blocks and damage entities with which it collides. Mechanical Drills moving as such, or those part of a larger contraption through the use of Chassis or Super Glue do not need to receive a rotational force to mine, and instead break blocks at a constant rate when in contact with said block. The entire construction the Mechanical Drill is placed on will freeze in place (and remain an entity) while the Mechanical Drill digs the block; for example, a Mechanical Drill will pause the extension of a Mechanical Piston when it drills a block, and the extension will resume once the block is broken. The time it takes for a Mechanical Drill to break a block is based on the block's Hardness value.

target: 可以使用扳手快速拆卸
source: Shift-right-clicking on a Mechanical Drill with a Wrench will destroy the Mechanical Drill and place it in your inventory.

target: &b&l动力锯
source: &b&lMechanical Saw

target: 动力锯是一种旋转力驱动的伐木工具，当面向一侧放下时，它们会破坏面前的木质方块，如果用于砍树，则可以瞬间破坏一整棵树，这对2*2生长的树也生效，不过，需要2*2的底盘的最后一个方块被动力锯破坏才行
source: Mechanical Saws are powered through rotational force, and when placed down facing to the side they will automatically chop down wood blocks in front of them. When chopping down a tree, it will automatically destroy the entire tree by only destroying the bottom-most block. This also works with 2x2 trees as long as at least the last block (horizontally) is mined using the saw.

target: 当动力锯面朝上放置时，它就是台锯木机，用于处理木头
source: When mechanical saws are placed facing upwards, logs and woods can be dropped on top of them to make them into stripped logs and stripped woods respectively.

target: 当动力锯在动态结构上时，额……你可以试试开动脑筋，比如做点什么动力活塞？动力程轴？动力锯可以被使用镐或斧开采
source: Mechanical saws are automatically powered when on a create contraption (cart, piston, pulley, ext.). You can mine a saw with either an axe or a pickaxe.

target: &b&l动力犁
source: &b&lMechanical Plough

target: 动力犁是一种作业原件，用于破坏无碰撞体积的方块
source: The Mechanical Plough is a component used to break non-collidable blocks

target: 当连接到动态结构上时，它可以和动力钻头一样破坏方块，不过，是那种没有碰撞体积的（火把什么的），同时，动力犁可用于移动（打飞）实体或者犁地
source: While attached to a moving structure, the Mechanical Plough will break non-collidable blocks it comes in contact with (ex. snow layers). The Mechanical Plough will also move entities and till soil blocks.

target: &b&l动态结构
source: &b&lMoving Contraptions

target: 无论长得什么样都能动起来……大概
source: Create allows you to move and animate block structures of any shape or form

target: 机械动力独一无二的特性，在很多领域都有很深的造诣，包括但不限于自动化，运输物品，装饰等
source: This feature is extremely powerful as it proves useful in the field of automation, transportation and aesthetics.

target: &b&l玫瑰石英
source: &b&lRose Quartz

target: 用砂纸打磨成磨制玫瑰石英
source: Rose Quartz is a material used to create Polished Rose Quartz

target: 参考机械手章节我是怎么教你磨石英的
source: Rose Quartz may be used to make Polished Rose Quartz. To do this, the player must hold Sand Paper in their offhand, Rose Quartz in their main hand, and right click. The polished version will drop on the ground.

target: &d龙之研究
source: &dDraconic Evolution

target: &l&9欢迎来到龙之研究
source: &l&9Welcome to Draconic Evolution

target: *完成任务 &b&l&o电力熔炼炉&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oEnergized Smelter&r quest*

target: 该模组以龙为主要线索，增加了许多后期用的工具以及设备，昂贵却也实用。
source: Draconic Evolution adds  powerful tools, machines, and items. The mod's content is based around its ore block, Draconium Ore.

target: &l基础聚合注入器
source: &lThe Fusion Crafting

target: 聚合制作是一种类似仪式的制作方法，用于创建更高等级的材料和工具/盔甲
source: Fusion Crafting is a ritual-like method of crafting to create higher tier materials and tools/armor

target: 构成方式：由一个聚合核心和若干个注入合成装置构成。摆放方式相对自由，放置的注入合成装置满足构成要求，数量足够放置材料即可工作。且注入合成装置可被多个聚合核心公用。
source: At the center of the crafting setup is the Fusion Crafting Core. Arranged around the outside, pointing towards the core, are a number of Fusion Crafting Injectors. Crafting ingredients are placed in the injectors with a right-click, and a focus item is placed in the core via the GUI. When crafting commences, the injectors begin to draw RF power. Sparks appear around the Fusion Crafting Injectors and bubbles of energy around the held items. When sufficient RF power has been absorbed, the bubbles of energy swarm around the Fusion Crafting Core. When the crafting is complete, the item can be removed from the core. The Fusion Crafting Core retains information when harvested, thus if the process is disturbed prior to completion, neither the ingredients nor energy are lost.

target: 要开始聚合制作，你至少需要准备：
source: To get started the player will need at least 3 things:

target: - 大量的RF能量。聚合制作需要大量的能量
source: - A substantial RF power source. Fusion crafting requires a lot of energy

target: - 一个聚合核心
source: - A Fusion Crafting Core

target: - 4–10 聚合注入器，具体取决于配方
source: - 4–10 Fusion Crafting Injectors depending on the recipe

target: - 聚合的主体
source: - The focus item to be fused

target: - 聚合的其他成分
source: - The ingredients for the fusion

target: 以聚合核心为中心，聚合核心六个面向外延长16格，除最近一格外，这条延长线周围一圈包括延长线一共9个格子放置的面向聚合核心的注入合成装置都有效。
source: After placing the Fusion Crafting Core in a convenient location, place the Fusion Crafting Injectors around the core, pointing towards it. Injectors must be a minimum of 1 block from the core, and up to 16 blocks away.

target: 神龙聚合
source: The Draconic Tier

target: 在聚合核心中放入飞龙聚合注入器，在聚合注入器一侧放置2颗钻石和2个飞龙核心，在另一侧放置2颗钻石和1个觉醒龙块进行合成
source: Transformed using 2 Diamond and 2 Wyvern Core in the injectors one side, a Wyvern Fusion Crafting Injector in the Fusion Crafting Core, 2 Diamond and 1 Awakened Draconium Block in the Crafting injectors on the other.

target: 飞龙聚合
source: The Wyvern Tier

target: 通过用聚合合成来改造基础聚合注入器。除了需要将基础聚合注入器放置在聚合制作核心中外，该转换还使用1个飞龙核心，2个龙芯 和1个龙块放置在聚合注入器一侧，4个钻石放置在聚合注入器注入器中。
source: Created by transforming a Basic Fusion Crafting Injector with Fusion Crafting. Aside from requiring the Basic Fusion Crafting Injector placed in the Fusion Crafting Core, the transformation uses 1 Wyvern Core, 2 Draconic Core, and 1 Draconium Block placed in the Fusion Crafting Injectors one side and 4 Diamond in the Injectors on the other.

target: 混沌聚合
source: The Chaotic Tier

target: 在聚合核心中放入神龙聚合注入器，在聚合注入器一侧放入2颗钻石和1个混沌核心，在另一侧放入2颗钻石和1个龙蛋进行合成
