source: Transformed using 2 Diamond and 1 Chaotic Core in the injectors one side, a Draconic Fusion Crafting Injector in the Fusion Crafting Core, 2 Diamond and 1 Dragon Egg in the Crafting injectors on the other.

target: 高级传送符咒是一种传送装置
source: The Advanced Dislocator is a teleportation device

target: 它是传送符咒的增强版。它可以存储多达100个不同的航点，这些航点还可以跨维度使用。它使用末影珍珠作为燃料。
source: It is the enhanced version of the Dislocator. It can store up to 100 different waypoints, which can additionally be used across dimensions. It uses Ender Pearls as fuel.

target: 传送符咒是一种传送装置
source: The Dislocator is a transportation device

target: 手持时按下Shift+右键可以绑定当前所在路径点，之后再次右键可以传送到之前绑定的路径点，有耐久，一共可以使用20次，不是非常值得，建议直接将它升级为高级传送符咒。使用一次扣除5点生命值（2.5心，当生命值小于或等于2.5心时提示生命值过低且无法使用。
source: It is first bound to a location by shift right-clicking. Right-clicking the Charm of Dislocation will teleport the user to the bound location. It has 20 uses and after every use it will deplete 2 (Heart.svg) health points which cannot be avoided. The Charm will not work if the player has less than 3 (Heart.svgHalf Heart.svg) health points. It can teleport players across dimensions

target: &l能量核心
source: &lThe Energy Core

target: &l&b能量核心&r 用于储存RF能量
source: The &l&bEnergy Core&r is a energy storage system

target: 当完全组装时，可以通过使用能量塔将RF引入结构并从中提取。这些可以放置在核心16个方块内的任何地方，并通过在塔架上方或下方放置一块玻璃来激活（分别取决于它是在核心下方还是上方），这将变成一个蓝色的球体。通过右键单击球体，可以在输入和输出模式之间切换塔架，并且每面可以输出2,147,483,647 RF / t。
source: When fully assembled, RF can be introduced to and extracted from the structure through the use of Energy Pylons. These can be placed anywhere within 16 blocks of the Core, and are activated by placing a block of Glass either above or below the Pylon (depending if it is below or above the Core, respectively), which will turn into a blue orb. Pylons can be toggled between input and output mode by right clicking the orb, and can move 2,147,483,647 RF/t per face.

target: 可以存储在能量核心内的RF量为：
source: The amount of RF that can be stored inside an Energy Core of a given tier is:

target: 你猜怎么着？我们将构建等级 7，是的，20亿RF应该足够开始了。
source: Guess what? We are gonna build Tier 7, yeah 2 billion RF should be enough to start with.

target: 好吧，我们还需要一些材料来构建那个东西：
source: OK we'll be needed some of materials to build that thing as well:

target: 1x 能量核心
source: 1x Energy Core

target: 36x 能量核心稳定器
source: 36x Energy Core Stabilizers

target: 210x 龙块
source: 210x Draconium Blocks

target: 328x 红石块
source: 328x Blocks of Redstone

target: 2x 能量塔
source: 2x Energy Pylons

target: &d合成拓展
source: &dExtended Crafting

target: &5&l&o把他们混~合~在~一~起~
source: &5&l&oOne to rule them all

target: *完成任务&b&l&o基础工具&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oBasic Tools&r quest*

target: &5&l&o合！成！拓！展！
source: &5&l&oWelcome to Extended Crafting

target: &d沉浸工程
source: &dImmersive Engineering

target: &a&l欢迎来到沉浸工程
source: &a&lWelcome to Immersive Engineering

target: *完成任务&b&l&o接触式红石信号发生器&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oRedstone Contact&r quest*

target: 沉浸工程是一个科技模组
source: Immersive Engineering is a tech mod.

target: 总的来说，这是由现实启发的技术。它增加了许多多方快结构，为使用RF系统的发电创造了更真实的设置。沉浸工程是一个科技模块
source: Overall, it's about realism-inspired technology. It adds a number of structures that create a more realistic setting for power generation using the RF system.Immersive Engineering is a tech mod

target: 它以其多方块机器而闻名，其特点是其工业外观。单方块和多方块机器均采用三档功率运行，低压为256 RF / t，中为1024 RF / t，高压对应于4096 RF / t。
source: It is best known for its multiblock machines, characterized by their industrial look. Both single and multiblock machines operate on three tiers of power, low voltage being 256 RF/t, medium being 1024 RF/t and high corresponding to 4096 RF/t.

target: &a&l焦炉
source: &a&lCoke Oven

target: 焦炉是一个3x3x3多方块结构
source: Coke Oven is a 3x3x3 multi-block machine

target: 用工程师之锤点击中间的方块，创建焦炉。
source: Click on a middle block with the Engineer's Hammer to create the Coke Oven.

target: &a&l高炉
source: &a&lBlast Furnace

target: 高炉是一个3x3x3多方块结构
source: The Blast Furnace is a 3x3x3 multi-block machine

target: 完成后，用工程师之锤右击侧面中间以激活。如果成功的话一个小的黑色门廊形状会显示高炉的开口。如果没有发生这种情况，请检查所有砖块都已放置。它应该是一个实心的3x3x3块，中间没有间隙。高炉只接收焦煤和木炭（不是普通煤炭）。
source: Once completed, hit the side middle with an Engineers Hammer to activate. A small black doorway shape will show, the opening for the blast furnace, if successful. If this does not happen then check all the bricks are placed. It should be a solid 3x3x3 block with no gap in the middle layer. The Blast Furnace takes coal coke and charcoal only (not regular coal).

target: &a&l合金窑
source: &a&lAlloy Kiln

target: 合金窑是一个2×2×2的多方块结构
source: The Alloy Kiln is a 2x2x2 multi-block machine

target: 是的，它用两种不同的材料生产合金。
source: Yeah, it produces alloys from two different materials.

target: &a&l精制高炉
source: &a&lImproved Blast Furnace

target: 精制高炉是一个 3x4x3 的多方块结构
source: The Improved Blast Furnace is a 3x4x3 multi-block machine

target: 它使用铁和焦煤来产生钢锭和炉渣。与高炉不同，物品可以通过管道进出。从后面除去炉渣，将物品装入顶部，高炉鼓风机可以放置在两侧以加快制造速度。
source: It uses Iron and Coal Coke to generate Steel Ingots and Slag. Unlike with the Blast Furnace, items are able to be piped in and out. Slag is removed from the back, items are loaded into the top and Blast Furnace Preheaters may be placed on either side to speed up manufacture.

target: &a&l金属冲压机
source: &a&lMetal Press

target: 金属冲压机是一个 3x1x3 多方块结构
source: The Metal Press is a 3x1x3 multi-block

target: 搭建方式参考游戏中的工程师手册；传送带、活塞必须朝正确方向，全部正确后用工程师锤右击中间的活塞
source: After it is fully arranged, shift right-click the left or right side of the Piston with an Engineer's Hammer to complete the multiblock.

target: &a&l柴油发电机
source: &a&lDiesel Generator

target: 柴油发电机是一个 3x5x3 多方块结构
source: The Diesel Generator is a 3x5x3 multi-block

target: 放置完成后，玩家必须用工程师锤子右击正面的顶部中心方块（应该是生成器块)
source: After it is fully arranged, the player must right-click the top-center block of the front side (which should be a Generator Block) with an Engineer's Hammer, then the multi-block is complete.

target: &a&l电弧炉
source: &a&lArc Furnace

target: 电弧炉是一个 5x5x5 多方块结构
source: The Arc Furnace is a 5x5x5 Multiblock machine

target: 放置结构后，用工程师之锤右击以构建机器
source: After building the structure, right-click the Cauldron with an Engineer's Hammer to complete it.

target: &a&l粉碎机
source: &a&lCrusher

target: 粉碎机是一个 3x5x3 多方块结构
source: The Crusher is a 3x5x3 multi-block

target: 在放置完成后，玩家必须用工程师锤子右击较长边前面的中心（应该是一个钢栅栏，上面有一个漏斗），然后构建就完成了。
source: After it is fully arranged, the player must right-click the center of the front of the longer side (which should be a Steel Fence with a Hopper above it) with an Engineer's Hammer, then the multi-block is complete.

target: &a&l斗轮式挖掘机
source: &a&lExcavator

target: 斗轮式挖掘机是一个 8x3x7 多方块结构
source: The Excavator is a 8x3x7 multi-block

target: 斗轮式挖掘机可谓现代机械的巅峰之作，它能将正常挖矿采集不到的矿物从矿脉中挖掘出来，消耗 4096RF/t 的能量来维持运作（正好一台柴油发电机的发电量）。
source: It is used to extract Mineral Deposits from chunks.

target: 当你有了一台斗轮式挖掘机，你将迈入一个新的时代。这台机器全速工作时每分钟能挖掘 27 块矿石。
source: It requires a minimum of 175 Steel Ingots, making this a late-game machine.

target: 挖掘机由两部分组成。“轮子”是中心部分，通过工程师锤右击隐藏的钢块构建。“挖掘机”是另一部分，通过工程师锤右击背面中心重型工程块构建。
source: The Excavator is made of two parts. The \"Wheel\" is the center part, and is formed by right-clicking with an Engineers Hammer on the the hidden Block of Steel. The \"Engine\" is the other part, and is formed by right-clicking the Engineers Hammer on the Heavy Engineering Block in the center of the back side.

target: &a&l岩芯钻井
source: &a&lCore Sample Drill

target: 岩芯钻井用于检测区块内的矿脉，拿在手上或放下并悬停在岩芯钻井上会显示区块边界。
source: It is used to detect and analyze Mineral Deposits that can be extracted by an Excavator

target: 一次运作需要消耗 8000RF（它缓存的电量恰好也是 8000RF），钻探完成后，右击钻井取出岩芯样本。矿脉内的矿是无法人工挖掘的，需要斗轮式挖掘机。
source: The Core Sample Drill is placed as a single block but stands three blocks tall. The bottom block accepts Redstone Flux (RF) energy. The Core Sample Drill has no GUI. The Core Sample Drill takes 10 seconds by default to do its work (200 ticks, 8000 RF per use), which can be changed via the configuration file. When complete, it can be right-clicked to receive a Core Sample. The sample shows that how much water, lava or oil does this chunk have in mB, and what type of deposit the chunk has. It is possible that the chunk does not have any of the liquids or minerals.

target: &d工业先锋
source: &dIndustrial Foregoing

target: &3&l工业先锋
source: &3&lWelcome to Industrial Foregoing

target: *完成任务&b&l&o红石工程块&r 以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oRedstone Engineering Block&r quest*

target: 工业先锋它为游戏增加了许多机器，这些机器具有多种用途。这些机器在很大程度上帮助玩家自动化在普通Minecraft中难以或不可能自动化的过程，例如熔岩生产，作物种植，畜牧业和矿石收集。
source: Industrial Foregoing is a mod that adds many machines to the game which serve a wide variety of purposes. These machines largely help the player to automate processes which are difficult or impossible to automate in vanilla Minecraft such as lava production, crop farming, animal husbandry, and ore collection.

target: &d超限存储
source: &dOverloaded

target: &b&l欢迎来到超限存储
source: &b&lWelcome to Overloaded

target: *完成任务&b&l&o钢制机壳&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oSteel Casing&r quest*

target: 这个mod被设计成一个终极游戏mod，具有非常昂贵和强大的方块和物品。
source: This mod is designed to be an endgame mod that has very expensive and powerful blocks and items.

target: &b&l超级链接卡
source: &b&lHyper Linking Card

target: 用于链接超传输节点
source: Used to link Hyper Transfer Nodes

target: 单击接收器以将位置存储到卡中。然后单击发送器以绑定配对。
source: Click on a receiver to store the location to the card. Then click on a sender to bind the pair.

target: &b&l多功能工具
source: &b&lMulti Tool

target: 多功能工具被设计为游戏末的构建工具。它可以在128格的范围内摧毁方块（最大距离可在配置中编辑）。它也可以在该距离放置方块。在按住shift并右键单击时，它会将方块放在您单击的方块的侧面的一条线上，直到它到达玩家附近为止。要选择要放置的方块，请点击左键。
source: The Multi Tool is designed as an end-game building tool. It is able to break blocks up to a range of 128 blocks (max distance is editable in the config). It can also place blocks at that distance also. While holding sneak and right clicking it will place blocks in a line in the side of the block you click until it reaches you. To select what block to place sneak left click.

target: 几乎无尽的储物桶
source: Barrel stores Items

target: 真正无尽的储物桶
source: Barrel stores Items

target: 存储给定类型的 2^63-1 （9，223，372，036，854，775，807）。与大多数容器不同，这个容器不会打勾，因此几乎没有性能成本。
source: Stores 2^63-1 (9,223,372,036,854,775,807) of its given type. Unlike most Containers this one does not tick so it has almost no performance cost.

target: 几乎无尽的储液罐
source: Tank stores Liquids

target: 真正无尽的储液罐
source: Tank stores Liquids

target: 存储给定类型的 2^63-1 （9，223，372，036，854，775，807）。与大多数容器不同，这个容器不会打勾，因此几乎没有性能成本。
source: Stores 2^63-1 (9,223,372,036,854,775,807) of its given type. Unlike most Containers this one does not tick so it has almost no performance cost.

target: 几乎无尽的电容
source: Capacitor stores Forge Energy / RF

target: 真正无尽的电容
source: Capacitor stores Forge Energy / RF

target: 对于电容器，当通过The One Probe查看它时，它将它的存储报告为容量的百分比，而不是其实际的当前存储。
source: For the Capacitor when looking at it via The One Probe it reports its storage as a percent of capacity not its actual current storage.

target: 没有运输成本，它可以跨维度（只需要将其全部块加载）。
source: There is no transport cost and it can go cross-dimensional (just need to chunkload it all).

target: 没有运输成本，它可以跨维度（只需要将其全部块加载）。
source: There is no transport cost and it can go cross-dimensional (just need to chunkload it all).

target: 要将接收器绑定到发送器，请使用超级链接卡。单击接收器，然后单击发送器。多个发送器可以链接到同一个接收器。
source: To bind a receiver to a sender use an Hyper Linking Card. Click on the receiver then the sender. Multiple Senders can be linked to the same receiver.

target: 它们移动容器的全部物品，但每次间隔几秒钟（在配置中设置）。
source: They move the entire contents of the Container but only every few seconds (will be in the config eventually).

target: 没有运输成本，它可以跨维度（只需要将其全部块加载）。
source: There is no transport cost and it can go cross-dimensional (just need to chunkload it all).

target: 要将接收器绑定到发送器，请使用超级链接卡。单击接收器，然后单击发送器。多个发送器可以链接到同一个接收器。
source: To bind a receiver to a sender use an Hyper Linking Card. Click on the receiver then the sender. Multiple Senders can be linked to the same receiver.

target: 它们移动容器的全部物品，但每次间隔几秒钟（在配置中设置）。
source: They move the entire contents of the Container but only every few seconds (will be in the config eventually).

target: 没有运输成本，它可以跨维度（只需要将其全部块加载）。
source: There is no transport cost and it can go cross-dimensional (just need to chunkload it all).

target: 要将接收器绑定到发送器，请使用超级链接卡。单击接收器，然后单击发送器。多个发送器可以链接到同一个接收器。
source: To bind a receiver to a sender use an Hyper Linking Card. Click on the receiver then the sender. Multiple Senders can be linked to the same receiver.

target: &b&l无限水源
source: &b&lInfinite Water Source

target: 这个方块是一个无尽的水箱
source: This block is an endless tank of water

target: 你可以快速地把水拉出来。对于那些需要大量水并且不想用泵卡死服务器的大型反应堆来说，这很好。
source: You can get water as fast as you can pull it out. Good for those Big Reactors that need a lot of water and don't want to kill the server with pumps.

target: &b&l能量提取器
source: &b&lEnergy Extractor

target: 对于无限电容器，它不会将能量推入附近的管道和机器。它必须由其他块从电容器中拉出。例如，Flux Network 的 Flux Nodes。
source: For the Infinite Capacitor it will not push energy into nearby conduits and machines. It must be pulled out of the Capacitor by some other block. For example Flux Network's Flux Nodes.

target: 对于无限电容器，它不会将能量推入附近的管道和机器。它必须由其他块从电容器中拉出。例如，Flux Network 的 Flux Nodes。
source: For the Infinite Capacitor it will not push energy into nearby conduits and machines. It must be pulled out of the Capacitor by some other block. For example Flux Network's Flux Nodes.

target: &b&l玩家接口
source: &b&lPlayer Interface

target: 与放置它的人连接的方块
source: Block that connects to the person who placed it

target: 允许将物品拉/推到玩家的物品栏中。它也与任何为玩家添加额外功能的模组兼容。
source: Allows for pulling / pushing items to the player's inventory. It is also compatibly with any mods that add extra capabilities to a player.

target: &b&l物品接口
source: &b&lItem Interface

target: 此方块具有其内部物品的任何功能
source: This block takes on any capabilities of the item that is inside of it

target: 因此，如果您的物品需要充电，则该方块将接受该物品能够获得的电力。
source: So if your item is chargeable this block will accept power that the item is capable of taking.

target: &dRF工具箱
source: &dRFTools

target: &c&l欢迎来到RF工具箱
source: &c&lWelcome to RFTools

target: *完成任务&b&l&o能量网络控制器&r 以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oFlux Controller&r quest*

target: RF工具箱是一种技术模块，其主要功能是能够使用RF能量创建和维护尺寸。
source: RFTools is a technological mod which main feature is the ability to create and maintain dimensions using RF energy.

target: 这包括：
source: This includes:

target: - RFTools 效用
source: - RFTools Utility

target: - RFTools 功率
source: - RFTools Power

target: - RFTools 制作
source: - RFTools Builder

target: &c&l机器框架
source: &c&lMachine Frame

target: 机器框架是RFTools mod添加的基本成分
source: The Machine Frame is a basic ingredient added by RFTools mod

target: 它用于在此mod中制作各种机器
source: It is used to craft various machines in this mod

target: XNet是一种关于效率的物品，流体，能源和信息运输mod。
source: XNet is an item, fluid, energy, and information transportation mod that is all about efficiency

target: 电缆系统的设计方式使您应该能够在没有任何架空的情况下制造巨大的电缆系统。电缆（例如）不是实体，并且具有非常简单的模型。这使得通过12000块的电缆传输物品与在5块长的电缆上传输物品一样有效。
source: The cable system is designed in such way that you should be able to make huge cable systems without any overhead. Cables (for example) are not tile entities and have very simply models. This makes transporting items accross a cable of 12000 blocks long just as efficient as doing it on a 5 block long cable.

target: 这个mod的核心是一个网络。网络基本上是一段连接的电缆（通过连接器）连接到各种块（箱体，机器等）和一个控制器。控制器是为该网络执行实际工作的方块。
source: At the core of this mod is a network. A network is basically a single section of connected cables connected (via connectors) to various blocks (chests, machines, ...) and one controller. The controller is the block that does the actual work for that network.

target: 每个网络最多可以有 8 个通道。每个通道都有一个类型（能量、项目、流体、逻辑等），您可以在控制器中配置这些类型。根据通道的类型和连接到该通道的计算机，可能会发生各种事情。
source: Every network can have 8 channels maximum. Every channel has a type (energy, item, fluid, logic, ...) that you can configure in the controller. Depending on the type of a channel and the machines that are connected to that channel various things can happen.

target: 如果您想超越8通道限制，或者想要连接多个不同的网络，则可以使用路由器创建“路由网络”。单个路由器已经足以连接多达六个（路由器的六个侧面）通道，但使用路由电缆和路由连接器，您也可以从路由器中建立路由网络。请注意，在单个路由网络上，您只能有 32 个已发布的通道。
source: If you want to go beyond the 8 channel limit or you want to connect multiple distinct networks you can make a 'routing network' using routers. A single router is already sufficient to connect up to six (six sides of the router) channels but using routing cables and routing connectors you can also make a routing network out of routers. Note that on a single routing network you can only have 32 published channels.

target: &d热力膨胀
source: &dThermal Series

target: &9&l热力膨！胀！
source: &9&lWelcome to Thermal Series

target: *完成任务&b&l&o低级机器框架&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oPity Machine Frame&r quest*

target: &9&l主要材料
source: &9&lThe Main Ingredients

target: &e应用能源
source: &eApplied Energistics

target: &e&l应 用 能 源
source: &e&lWelcome to Applied Energistics

target: *完成任务&b&l&o合成存储终端&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oStorage Request Table&r quest*

target: &e&l压印模板
source: &e&lThe Inscriber Presses

target: &e基础存储
source: &eBasic Storage

target: &f&l欢迎来到储存部分！
source: &f&lWelcome to Storage Section

target: *完成任务&b&l&o箱子&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oChest&r quest*

target: 1x1木抽屉
source: Storage Drawers 1x1

target: 1x2木抽屉
source: Storage Drawes 1x2

target: 2x2 大的木抽屉
source: Storage Drawes 2x2

target: 桥接
source: Trim

target: &f&l坞
source: &f&lDock

target: 它们都具有IItemHandler（物品处理）功能，因此可以通过任何形式来存储/取出它们，而且与简单存储和精致存储/应用能源2兼容
source: They have the IItemHandler capability so they can be inserted/extracted with any form of item transport, and is compatible with Simple Storage Network and RS/AE2.

target: 这个mod增加了7个新的容器，既可以作为方块存储，也可以用作背包。
source: This mod adds 7 new containers that function as both storage, and backpacks and so much more

target: 每个等级都有可配置的堆叠大小，并在物品提示中列出。也可以通过颜色来区分不同的等级，以下是默认值。
source: 1(black): 9 slots, 256 items

target: 1（黑色）：9个格子，256 物品；
source: 2(red): 18 slots, 1024 items
3(gold): 27 slots, 4096 items
4(green): 36 slots, 16384 items
5(cyan): 45 slots, 65536 items
6(purple): 54 slots, 262144 items
7(rainbow): 81 slots, Integer.MAX_VALUE items

target: 铁桶
source: Iron Barrel

target: 金桶
source: Gold Barrel

target: 钻石桶
source: Diamond Barrel

target: 黑曜石桶
source: Obsidian Barrel

target: 下界合金桶
source: Netherite Barrel

target: 这个袋子有104个格子！
source: Each bag holds up to 104 stacks.

target: &9神秘遗物
source: &9Enigmatic Legacy

target: 你看，我非常有磁性...
source: You see, I am a very magnetic personality...

target: 吸引8方块内的物品，按住shift时不生效
source: When worn in the Ring slot, it will move any dropped items within 8 blocks radius towards the wearer, leaving trail of violet particles behind them.

target: 在末地城的战利品箱子内可以找到。
source: It's truly curious how it came to existence, given that it never appears naturally across any of the reaches of The End.

target: 烧炼后可以得到以太锭。
source: It can be relatively rarely found in chests generated within End Cities.

target: 用于合成以太系列装备。
source: Don't let this name confuse you. It is physically solid. Very.

target: 以太代表 \"比钻石更好\" 的装备等级
source: Etherium represents \"better than diamond\" tier of equipment, available in endgame stages of progression, after reaching the Outer Islands in The End. Tools and armor made of Etherium not only have high durability and effectiveness on their own, but also possess unique abilities that make them incomparably more powerful than anything vanilla Minecraft has to offer.

target: 下一代盔甲
source: Next generation of bikini armor.

target: 套装效果：生命值低于40%时，生成一个强力护盾并会反弹大多数弹射物，提供50%伤害抗性，攻击你的生物会被击退。
source: When worn, etherium armor will provide the player with high defensive stats and unlike other armor, will not be visible on them.

target: 下一代盔甲
source: Next generation of bikini armor.

target: 套装效果：生命值低于40%时，生成一个强力护盾并会反弹大多数弹射物，提供50%伤害抗性，攻击你的生物会被击退。
source: Etherium gear has exceptionally high durability as for armor, with the helmet having 1452 durability points, cuirass having 2112, greaves having 1980 and boots having 1716. It has protection stats noticeably better than that of a diamond armor, an is also not displayed on a player when they are wearing it, providing additional advantage in PvP encounters.

target: 下一代盔甲
source: Next generation of bikini armor.

target: 套装效果：生命值低于40%时，生成一个强力护盾并会反弹大多数弹射物，提供50%伤害抗性，攻击你的生物会被击退。
source: But the greatest power of etherium armor lies in it's set bonus. Set bonus is activated when wearing all four pieces of the armor simultaneously. When that happens, additional text describing it will be seen when viewing the tooltip of any of those pieces.

target: 下一代盔甲
source: Next generation of bikini armor.

target: 套装效果：生命值低于40%时，生成一个强力护盾并会反弹大多数弹射物，提供50%伤害抗性，攻击你的生物会被击退。
source: The bonus will generate a shield around the player, whenever their health drops below 40%. Health calculations consider maximum amount of health player can have at the moment, so if they have any effects that increase or decrease maximum health they can have, the amount of health required to generate a shield will change respectively.

target: 所有经典中的经典。
source: Classic of all classics.

target: 效果：挖掘3*3*1范围内的方块，按住shift时不生效。
source: When mining a block that pickaxe is effective on, it will break additional such blocks in 3x3x1 area centered around the broken block, orientated respectively to the player's sight. This effect will not trigger if they are holding Shift, however, allowing to mine individual blocks if it's required.

target: 真正的维京人武器...或者一个真正的伐木工人。其中一个家伙应该足够了。
source: A weapon worthy of true viking... or a true lumberjack. One of these guys should suffice.

target: 砍伐3*3*3范围内的木头和树叶，按住shift时不生效。
source: When mining a block that waraxe is effective on, it will break additional such blocks in 3x3x3 area centered around the broken block. This effect will not trigger if player is holding Shift, however, allowing to mine individual blocks if it's required.

target: 这是一台紧凑而便携的挖掘机。
source: That's one compact and portable excavator.

target: 效果：挖掘3*3*1范围内的方块，按住shift时不生效。
source: When mining a block that shovel is effective on, it will break additional such blocks in 3x3x1 area centered around the broken block, orientated respectively to the player's sight. This effect will not trigger if they are holding Shift, however, allowing to mine individual blocks if it's required.

target: 一个大男孩的大刀片...哦，等等，你是个女孩？
source: A big blade for a big boy... Oh, wait, you're a girl?

target: 拿着剑时按右键可以向后跳跃，这个效果有2.0秒的冷却。
source: Pressing Right-Click while holding Etherium Broadsword in mainhand will throw it's user back a few blocks. This ability could be used again after 2 seconds cooldown expires.

target: 在这里插入过度夸大的传说。
source: Insert overthinked lore stuff here.

target: 效果：破坏3*3*1范围的方块，按住shift时不生效，shift+右键切换范围挖掘和单个挖掘，对大多数方块有效。
source: When mining a block that breaker is effective on, it will break additional such blocks in 3x3x1 area centered around the broken block, orientated respectively to the player's sight. This effect will not trigger if they are holding Shift, however, allowing to mine individual blocks if it's required.

target: 从宇宙时间之井的深处散落的尘埃。
source: Shamelessly stolen from the very depths of cosmic well of time.

target: 可以在末地城找到或是在带上七咒之戒后击杀潜影贝低概率获得，是本模组重要的合成材料。
source: It can be commonly found in chests generated within End Cities.

target: 是的，它正好盯着你的眼睛，一直都是。
source: Yes, it stares right in your eyes. Always.

target: 效果：绑定指定位置需要按住shift+右键然后站在那里然后你可以拿着它左键点击将生物传送到绑定位置，在同一维度里生效
source: After being bound to a location, it will teleport any entity the player Left-Clicks on to that location, vanishing from their inventory right after.

target: 不要让这个东西无人看管。如果有足够的时间，它将吸干整个海洋。
source: Don't leave this thing unattended. Given enough time, it will drain entire oceans.

target: 当你进入水里时，立即吸收周围小范围内的水。
source: When worn in the Charm slot, it will consume the water in a radius and shape similar to that of a regular Sponge, if you come in contact with any water block.

target: 邪恶的武器对抗邪恶的生物。我敢打赌它将完美地工作。
source: Evil weapon against evil creatures. I bet this will work perfectly.

target: 有10%的几率斩首杀死的怪物。每级抢夺增加+5%斩首几率
source: Has a 10% chance to behead monsters slain with this weapon. Each level of Looting enchantment applied to it increases the probability by another 5%.

target: 我把这个卷轴放在哪里?..我不记得我把这个卷轴放在哪里！
source: Where do I put this scroll?.. I can't remember where I put this scroll!

target: 效果：可以存储无限经验值，拿着它的时候按shift+右键来激活它。按右键切换模式，你也可以绑定按键
source: When equipped in the Arcane Scroll slot and activated, it will quickly consume or retreive player's experience, depending on the mode chosen. It will also collect any experience orb in the radius of 16 blocks from it's bearer. If deactivated, all of it's effects will be disabled.

target: 看起来他们已经确保翅膀这次不会在阳光下融化。
source: Looks like they've made sure that the wings won't meltdown in the sunlight this time.

target: 效果：让你拥有自由飞行的能力但是会缓慢消耗经验值。需要在信标附近范围内可以以飞行，超出一定范围会失去飞行能力，会获得一个8秒的缓降BUFF，
source: When equipped in the Arcane Scroll slot, it will provide the bearer with an ability to freely fly, at the cost of slowly consuming their experience. When flying, it will also compensate mining speed penalty, boosting block breaking rate back to regular value.

target: 在世界中死亡的同时，还有一个特殊步骤，我敢肯定。
source: There is a special advancement for dying while having it equipped in a hardcore world. I am sure.

target: 效果：当你死亡时将你传送到床的位置，如果你没有床那会将你传送到世界中心，会记忆死亡位置
source: When equpped in the Arcane Scroll slot, it will return the bearer to their respawn point within the current world in an instant of their death. The scroll itself will be dropped at the initial position of death.

target: 赋予你飞行能力。
source: Grants you the ability to fly.

target: 给予你飞行的能力；飞行会快速消耗你的经验；在 信标范围内飞行不消耗经验；补偿飞行时的挖掘速度损失。
source: Flying will quickly drain your experience. Flying within the range of the beacon does not drain experience. Compensates for the loss of mining speed while flying.

target: 在这里插入过度夸大的传说。
source: Insert overthinked lore stuff here.

target: 效果：与任意附魔物品合成将物品的全部附魔转移到此书上然后这本书会变成附魔书
source: Allows you to transfer enchantments from any item, by combining the tome with it in a crafting grid.

target: 有用的东西，也许会防止你的手指有一天被切断
source: Useful thing to protect your finger from being cut off some day. Perhaps.

target: 装备时猪灵变得中立，幸运加一。
source: Piglins become neutral when equipped, increasing luck by one.

target: &5&l欢迎来到神秘遗物
source: &5&lWelcome to Enigmatic Legacy

target: 这个mod旨在提供帮助你探索一望无际的Minecraft世界的工具。
source: This mod is designed to provide tools that will aid you in exploring seemingly endless reaches of Minecraft's worlds.

target: &5&l七咒之戒
source: &5&lRing of the Seven Curses

target: \"它曾经被一位神所锻造，它以无尽的财富和不可估量的力量向凡人和更高位的生物招手......无论是傲慢还是无知，导致他们相信自己可以利用戒指的力量，两者都是在痛苦中得到回报的，其程度是无法描述的。\"
source: \"Once forged by an antediluvian god, it beckons mortals and higher beings alike with promise of untold riches and immeasurable might... Be it arrogance or ignorance that leads them to believe they can harness ring's power, both are paid for in suffering the extent of which defies description.\"

target: 一旦佩戴，它便成为你的一部分。这枚戒指将永远陪伴着你。为佩戴者带来七重魔咒与七层祝福
source: The Ring of Seven curses is a wearable item that can be equipped in the Curios ring slot. Once it is put on, it cannot be removed. Wearing it significantly and permanently changes gameplay to be extremely challenging.

target: 奥术卷轴
source: Arcane Scroll

target: 基础加成:
source: Basic bonus:

target: +4% 攻击伤害
source: +4% Attack Damage

target: +7% 挖掘速度
source: +7% Mining Speed

target: +4% 生命恢复
source: +4% Health Regeneration

target: 上述的基础加成将乘以你所有装备物品中诅咒附魔项数。（注意是项数）七咒之戒的七个诅咒也被计算在内。
source: The base bonus above will be multiplied by the number of cursed enchantments in all your equipment items  (note the number of items). The seven curses of the Ring of Seven Curses are also counted.

target: 唯承受七咒之人，才配承载此物品。
source: Only those who bear the seven curses are worthy of carrying this item.

target: 奥术卷轴
source: Arcane Scroll

target: 只有承受七咒的人才能使用该物品。
source: Only those who bear the Seven Curses can use this item.

target: +1 时运等级。
source: +1 Fortune Level.

target: 猪灵对你中立，即使有第二诅咒，物资将增加100%的收益。
source: Piglins are neutral to you , even if there is a second curse, supplies will increase the yield by 100% .

target: 杀死任意生物额外提供15%的几率掉落一枚绿宝石。
source: Killing any mob provides an additional 15% chance to drop an emerald.

target: 村民交易提供35%的折扣（感觉好赚就是得承受七个负面效果。）
source: Villager trading offers a 35% discount, and if you feel good, you have to suffer seven negative effects.

target: 治愈
source: The Cure

target: 摘下七咒之戒除创造的唯一方式，就是拿着这块石头与一块灵魂水晶前往下界并跳进一个足够大的岩浆湖中来消耗这块石头和灵魂水晶以摧毁七咒之戒，
source: The only way to take off the Ring of Seven Curses is to go to the Nether with this stone and a soul crystal and jump into a lava lake big enough to consume this stone and soul crystal to destroy the Ring of Seven Curses.

target: 如果岩浆湖不够大的话就算跳进去后死亡也不会摧毁七咒之戒而且也会消耗邪恶之石（不消耗灵魂水晶），
source: If the lava lake is not big enough, even if you jump into it and die, it will not destroy the Ring of Seven Curses and it will also consume the evil stone (does not consume the soul crystal).

target: 当一切顺利时玩家会在死亡时听见凋零死亡产生的轰鸣声并在复生后发现七咒之戒永远的从饰品栏中消失。
source: When all goes well, the player will hear the roar of wither death upon death and find that the Ring of Seven Curses has permanently disappeared from the accessories slot upon resurrection.

target: 此过程不可逆转！
source: This process is irreversible!

target: 由于七咒之戒无法合成，当七咒之戒被摧毁后玩家除了作弊外再也无法获得。
source: Since the Ring of Seven Curses cannot be crafted, when the Ring of Seven Curses is destroyed, players can no longer obtain it except by cheating.

target: 如果你这样做就很无趣了，不是吗？
source: It would be boring if you did that, wouldn't it?

target: 护身符
source: Talisman

target: 基础加成:
source: Basic bonus:

target: +1% 攻击伤害
source: +1% Attack Damage

target: +1% 攻击速度
source: +1% Attack Speed

target: +0.5% 移动速度
source: +0.5% Movement Speed

target: +0.5% 伤害抵抗
source: +0.5% Damage Resistance

target: 这些属性乘以你所有装备/效果的总量
source: These attributes are multiplied by the total of all your gear/effects.

target: 只有那些背负七咒的人才有能力得到这个东西。
source: Only those who bear the seven mantras have the ability to obtain this thing.

target: 只有戒指栏佩戴了七诅咒之戒的玩家才能制作/使用这个物品。
source: This item can only be crafted/used by players wearing the Ring of Seven Curses in the Ring Bar.

target: 此物品不能被火或岩浆烧毁。
source: This item cannot burn in fire or lava.

target: 承受七咒之人才能使用该物品。
source: When equipped in the Charm slot or in your inventory, the player receives greater amount and power of enchantments when using an Enchanting Table. Enchanting has the chance to produce both treasure and curse enchants.

target: 当你装备或者放在物品栏时，如果你使用附魔台，你所附魔的数量会更多且威力更甚。
source: This is a cursed item, meaning that can only be used when the Ring of Seven Curses is equipped.

target: 并有机会出现诅咒与宝藏附魔，附魔操作不再需要青金石。
source: Due to the ability to get curse enchants with this item, it works well in conjunction with the Scroll of a Thousand Curses

target: &e精致存储
source: &eRefined Storage

target: &e&l精  致  存  储
source: &e&lWelcome to Refined Storage

target: *完成任务&b&l&o合成存储终端&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oStorage Request Table&r quest*

target: &e简单存储
source: &eSimple Storage Network

target: &f&l简 单 存 储 ！
source: &f&lWelcome to Simple Storage Network

target: *完成任务&b&l&o钻石箱子&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oDiamond Chest&r quest*

target: &d通用机械
source: &dMekanism

target: &e&lM!E!K!通 用 机 械
source: &e&lWelcome to Mekanism

target: *完成任务&b&l&o高级机器框架&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oAdvanced Machine Frame&r quest*

target: 通用机械是一个独立的科技mod，为Minecraft带来了低，中，高级机械。
source: Mekanism is an independent tech mod that brings low, mid, and high tier machinery to Minecraft.

target: 该mod没有实际目标，当您看到通用机械包含的所有随机的（随意的）内容（从喷气背包到气球）时，您会明白这一点。但是我可以保证，当你将所有内容混合在一起，你就会更了解这个mod！
source: The mod doesn't have an actual goal, and you'll understand this when you see all the random content Mekanism contains, from jetpacks to balloons. However, I can assure you that you'll notice all the content blend together as you get to know the mod better!

target: &e&l聚变反应堆
source: &e&lThe Fusion Reactor

target: 聚变反应堆是一个多方块结构
source: The Fusion Reactor is a multiblock structure

target: 聚变反应堆是一种使用氘和氚（或者D-T燃料）产生大量电力/热量、蒸汽的高效发电装置。
source: The Fusion Reactor allows for variable input rates of 3 types of fuel: Deuterium, Tritium, and D-T Fuel. By water cooling the structure, steam can be produced alongside power, which is useful for powering an Industrial Turbine.

target: 让我们来建造它：
source: Let's build it:

target: 1) 用反应堆框架搭一个星形
source: 1) Build a diamond shape out of Reactor Frame.

target: 2) 用反应堆框架搭一个没有角的正方形
source: 2) A square without corners, also made out of Frame. The centers of the sides can be Reactor Ports.

target: 3) 用反应堆框架搭一个完整的正方形，把其中两条对应边的中间的方块换成反应堆端口，把剩下两条边中其中一条边中间的方块换成激光聚焦矩阵
source: 3) A complete square of Reactor Frame but withReactor Ports for input/output and a Laser Focus Matrix for the laser. The corners cannot be ports.

target: 4) 和步骤2相同
source: 4) Same as step 2.

target: 5) 和步骤1相同，把中间的方块换成反应控制器
source: 5) Same as Level 1 but with oneReactor Controller in the middle.

target: 通过右击聚变反应堆的反应堆控制器，可以访问该反应堆的 GUI。
source: You access the GUI of the Fusion Reactor by right-clicking the reactor's Reactor Controller.

target: 聚变反应堆不会自行启动。它需要来自激光增幅器的外部能量爆发和少量的D-T燃料才能开始聚变过程。一旦反应开始，它将开始消耗供应的氘和氚，产生等离子体并产生电力。
source: The Fusion Reactor will not start on its own. It requires an outside burst of energy from a charged Laser Amplifier and a small amount of D-T Fuel to begin the fusion process. Once the reaction is jump started, it will begin consuming supplied Deuterium and Tritium, creating plasma and generating power.

target: &b&l初始燃料:&r 黑体辐射腔储存了初始反应所需的10个D-T燃料。要将其填充，请将其放入含有氘和氚化学灌注器中。当黑体辐射腔包含所需的D-T燃料时放入反应堆控制器中。
source: &b&lInitial Fuel:&r The Hohlraum stores 10 units of D-T Fuel required for the initial reaction. To fill it up, place it into a Chemical Infuser which is combining Deuterium and Tritium. Place the Hohlraum into the Reactor Controller when it contains the required D-T Fuel.

target: &b&l点火:&r将激光对准增幅器，开始为增幅器充能，建议充到至少400MRF（多了浪费），即1GJ。当达到一定能量时，打开红石信号，增幅器就会发出强激光照射进激光聚焦矩阵中，与此同时黑体辐射腔会消失为反应堆点火，反应开始。
source: &b&lIgnition:&rThe statistics tab details the required ignition temperature for the reaction to begin. To reach this temperature, a Laser Amplifier must be charged with energy from several Lasers feeding into it, and fired into the Laser Focus Matrix. The energy required to start the reaction can range from 600M RF - 800M RF. It must be injected in one big burst to prevent temperature from dissipating, so adding Redstone sensitivity or increasing the minimum energy required by the Amplifier will prevent it from firing prematurely.

target: 为了维持反应，温度不得低于点火温度。确保喷射速率足够高，并且不断供应燃料。
source: With the Hohlraum in the Reactor Controller and enough energy stored in the Amplifier, fire the laser to begin the fusion reaction. If a high enough temperature was achieved, you should immediately see and hear the reactor running. To sustain the reaction, the temperature must not drop below the ignition temperature. Make sure the injection rate is high enough and fuel is constantly being supplied.

target: &e&l数字型采矿机
source: &e&lThe Digital Miner

target: 数字型采矿机是通用机械的大规模采矿机
source: Digital Miner is the scale mining machine of Mekanism

target: 数字型采矿机可以配置为仅在特定区域内开采矿石。数字型采矿机也可以设置为精准采集矿石，但这会导致更高的功耗。像所有其他通用机械机器一样，数字型采矿机可以自动从其库存中移出矿石，以便其他机器进行自动处理。
source: The Digital Miner can be configured to mine ores only within a certain area. The Digital Miner can also be set to silk touch ores, but this results in higher power consumption. Like all other Mekanism machines, the Digital Miner can automatically remove ores from its inventory for automated processing by other machines.

target: &e&l电动泵
source: &e&lElectric Pump

target: 抽水机，需要放在液体上方。
source: The Electric Pump is a powered pump with an internal buffer of 10000mB worth of fluids

target: 默认参数下抽取水时不会消耗下方的水方块，可通过PumpWaterSources项目修改
source: It can pump any fluid that is covered in the forge fluid dictionary and can be placed on a shoreline and will pump the fluid under it and anything fluid under it.

target: 使用过滤升级可以获取重水（D2O）。仅一个侧面可输入电力，上面输出流体。
source: Place the pump 1 block above or adjacent to a source block of any fluid you desire. From then on the pump will collect any source block of the fluid it can find, checking any block it can reach going along all flowing blocks of the liquid. In the end, the pump collects all source blocks originally connected to the block it was placed near. It collects 2000mb/s (100mb/t) of water and 20mb/s (1mb/t) of heavy water for a cost of 100 Jouls per operation (10 Jouls/t).

target: 当使用旅行者背包 (Traveller's Backpack)模组中的水管shift右键点击该方块时，会导致服务器崩溃
source: To collect heavy water, a Filter Upgrade must be installed into the pump.

target: &e&l热力蒸馏塔
source: &e&lThermal Evaporation Plant

target: 热力蒸馏塔是一个多方块结构
source: The Thermal Evaporation Plant is a multiblock structure

target: 升温后将水蒸馏为盐水，将盐水蒸馏为液态锂。使用高级太阳能发电机，可以在白天供热；使用电阻加热装置、木料加热器、热力发电机或聚变反应堆，可以全天供热。两种方式可以搭配使用。
source: The Thermal Evaporation Plant has purpose of converting Water to Brine, which can be further converted to Lithium by the use of a second Thermal Evaporation Plant.

target: 第一步：使用热力蒸馏方块建出4x4空间大小的底座
source: The structure has a 4 by 4 block base with a height of 3 blocks to a maximum height of 18, where the base is made with only Thermal Evaporation Blocks, and the walls contains a Thermal Evaporation Controller, and at least 2 Thermal Evaporation Valves. The structure has no solid roof, and instead can be capped by removing the 4 top corners of the multiblock with Advanced Solar Generators.

target: 第二步：在4x4的侧边上继续堆积热力蒸馏方块(算底座高度为3-18)
source: The simple version only runs on ambient temperature. For example, if the plant is standing in a desert, the internal temperature and the resulting production is higher compared to if the plant is standing in a snow biome.

target: 第三步：把任意热力蒸馏方块替换为热力蒸馏阀门，热力蒸馏阀门既可以接入升温设备、接入水，还可以导出处理产物(注意热力蒸馏塔的产物都是液体)
source: The advanced version works independently from the ambient temperature, and achieves much higher temperatures and production rates thanks to the energy of the solar modules. Either version, however, may have heat imported to the structure via Thermodynamic Conductors connected to the Thermal Evaporation Valves. The power from the solar modules of the advanced version is still available when they form part of the structure. If the power from the four solar modules is used in a resistive heater, the heat generated is more than enough to reach the maximum possible evaporation rate (of 1080mB/t) if imported to the structure.

target: 第四步：把任意热力蒸馏方块替换为热力蒸馏控制器，这时会发出红色粒子效果控制器会变亮，说明多方块结构成立
source: The structure requires no further external energy source. To start the production of Brine, input Water into the Plant via Basic Mechanical Pipes and Electric Pumps.

target: 第五步：将任意热力蒸馏阀门直接或通过热导线缆连接木料/电阻加热器给热力蒸馏塔提供热量(可以不进行升温,热力蒸馏塔的速度会只有1mb/t)，如需使用高级太阳能则把最上层边角的热力蒸馏方块替换为高级太阳能发电机  PS：热力发电机热力输出在底面
source: The produced Brine can be extracted via Basic Mechanical Pipes and the second Thermal Evaporation Valve. To start the extraction the connection between valve and pipe must be configured with a Configurator.

target: &e&l盐水
source: &e&lBrine

target: 盐水用于矿石精炼过程并产生各种化学品
source: Brine is used in the ore refining process and to create various chemicals

target: 通过热力蒸馏将水转化为盐水。可电离为氯气和钠蒸汽，也可再次热力蒸馏变为液态锂。
source: Liquid Lithium is used in the creation of Tritium, which is used with Deuterium as the Fuel in a Mekanism Fusion Reactor.

target: 热蒸发设备可存储高达 10，000 mB 的盐水，可用储水量为 高度x 64，000mB。
source: The Thermal Evaporation Plant can store up to 10,000 mB of brine and the amount of water storage available is height x 64,000mB.

target: &e&l液态锂
source: &e&lLiquid Lithium

target: 液态锂
source: Liquid Lithium can be obtained by a Thermal Evaporation Plant using Brine

target: 在热力蒸馏塔中盐化盐水获得。
source: It is fed into a Rotary Condensentrator to make Lithium which can later be crystallized into Lithium Dust or fed into a Solar Neutron Activator to make Tritium.

target: 氚用于聚变反应堆。您需要10mb的盐水才能产生1mb的液态锂。
source: Tritium is used in the Fusion Reactor. You need 10mb of Brine to create 1mb of Liquid Lithium.

target: &e&l裂变燃料
source: &e&lFissile Fuel

target: 裂变燃料由六氟化铀同位素离心获得，或由再处理裂变碎片氧化获得。可作为裂变反应堆的燃料燃烧。
source: Fissile Fuel is \"burned\" in a Fission Reactor to produce Nuclear Waste and heated coolant

target: 裂变燃料生产链：
source: Fissile Fuel Production Chain:

target: 1) 将铀矿石精炼成铀锭，最好通过4倍矿石处理流程。
source: 1) Refine Uranium Ore into Uranium Ingots, preferably by the Tier 4 ore quintupling process.

target: 2) 在富集仓中处理铀锭以生产铀黄饼。
source: 2) Process the Uranium Ingots in an Enrichment Chamber to produce Yellow Cake Uranium.

target: 3) 在化学氧化机中处理铀黄饼以产生氧化铀。
source: 3) Process the Yellow Cake Uranium in a Chemical Oxidizer to produce Uranium Oxide.

target: 4) 在化学溶解室中用硫酸处理萤石以产生氢氟酸。
source: 4) Process Fluorite with Sulfuric Acid (such as from the Tier 4 ore process) in a Chemical Dissolution Chamber to produce Hydrofluoric Acid.

target: 5) 在化学灌注器中将氢氟酸和氧化铀混合在一起，生产六氟化铀。
source: 5) Combine the Hydrofluoric Acid and Uranium Oxide in a Chemical Infuser to produce Uranium Hexafluoride.

target: 6) 在同位素离心机中处理六氟化铀以获得裂变燃料。
source: 6) Process the Uranium Hexafluoride in an Isotopic Centrifuge to get Fissile Fuel.

target: &e&l回旋式气液转换机
source: &e&lRotary Condensentrator

target: 以1:1凝聚液体，生成气体。简单说就是气液相互转换。
source: The Rotary Condensentrator (pronounced \"con-DEN-sen-traitor\") is used for converting substances between liquid and gaseous forms at a rate of 1:1

target: 可按左上角的“T”切换操作，默认为凝聚液体模式。当摆放在地面后左端为气体交互端，右端为流体交互端。它本身不会自动输出流体，所以需要用调整器潜行右击加压管道与流体交互端接触的那端为拉取模式。
source: It has two modes: Decondensentrating, which turns Liquids into Gases, and Condensentrating, which turns Gases into Liquids.

target: 由液态锂在回旋式气液转换机内转换得到锂。
source: Lithium is made by putting Liquid Lithium into a Rotary Condensentrator

target: 锂可用于太阳能中子活化器以产生氚（聚变反应堆的燃料）或放入化学结晶器中以产生锂粉尘（用于感应矩阵储能多方块结构组件的合成材料）。
source: Lithium can be used in a Solar Neutron Activator to create Tritium (fuel for the Fusion Reactor) or put into a Chemical Crystallizer to produce Lithium Dust (a crafting material used for components of the Induction Matrix energy storage multiblock structure).

target: &e&l重水
source: &e&lHeavy Water

target: 在水方块上方摆放电动泵后插入过滤升级，即可抽取重水。
source: Heavy water is produced by an Electric Pump with Filter Upgrade

target: 重水（氧化氘，D2O）是生产氘（聚变反应堆的燃料）的中间步骤.
source: Heavy Water (Deuteriumoxide, D2O) is an intermediate step in the production of Deuterium (a fuel for the Fusion Reactor).

target: 四个电动泵可以维持一个电离分解器的运行
source: 4 Electric Pumps are required to keep an Electrolytic Separator running.

target: &e&l太阳能中子活化器
source: &e&lSolar Neutron Activator

target: 太阳能中子活化器是一种将太阳的中子辐射引导到其内部储层的机器，允许缓慢产生各种同位素
source: The Solar Neutron Activator is a machine that directs the neutron radiation of the sun into its internal reservoir, allowing for the slow creation of various isotopes

target: 底部输入，正面输出。它不需要能量，只在白天工作，而且机器正上方不能有任何非透明方块阻挡阳光
source: The input is at the bottom, the output is at the front. It does not need energy except for direct sunlight which can be intercepted by transparent blocks such as glass, cables, pipes, etc.

target: &e&l电解分离器
source: &e&lElectrolytic Separator

target: 将液体电解成两种气体的机器，两种气体都可以分别调节“闲置”“排出”“过量排出”。
source: The Electrolytic Separator sends controlled amounts of direct current into a fluid

target: 闲置情况下，气体会正常产出；过量排出情况下，多于机器缓存的气体会被排出；排出情况下，气体根本不会产生，适于排除一些电解中会产生的杂质气体，比如气态钠。
source: The Electrolytic Separator requires a constant supply of power and must have a source of a suitable liquid in order to produce the gases. As the liquid is electrolyzed, the component gases will be stored in its internal tanks. Should either tank fill completely, the Separator will turn off. Connecting a Pressurized Tube or other compatible pipe to both tanks will remove the gas. If you are only using a single gas, selecting \"dump\" for the unused gas will vent it to the environment, preventing that internal tank from filling completely and stopping the Separator.

target: &e&l点火部件
source: &e&lIgnition Parts

target: &e&lD-T 燃料
source: &e&lD-T Fuel

target: 它可以用作聚变反应堆的燃料
source: It can be used as fuel in a Fusion Reactor

target: D-T燃料是通过在化学灌注器中注入氚和氘而产生的。
source: D-T Fuel is created by infusing Tritium and Deuterium in a Chemical Infuser.

target: &e&l化学灌注器
source: &e&lChemical Infuser

target: 化学灌注器将两种气体结合或反应以产生另一种气体
source: The Chemical Infuser combines or reacts two gases to create another gas

target: GUI左侧的容器只能由左侧的通道注入气体，右侧同理。无法通过GUI设置各个面的输入输出。Mek V10中，不再有此限制。
source: The gas gauges on the left and right side of its GUI are the input tanks, and correspond to correspond with the left and right sides of the machine. The gauge in the middle is for the resulting gas, which likewise is output through the front of the machine.

target: &e&l氘
source: &e&lDeuterium

target: 使用电解分离器从重水中获得的气体
source: A gas obtained from Heavy Water using Electrolytic Separator

target: 可以直接用作聚变反应堆中的燃料，或与化学灌注器中的氚结合使用以制造D-T燃料。
source: Can be used directly as fuel in a Fusion Reactor or combined with Tritium in a Chemical Infuser to make D-T Fuel.

target: &e&l氚
source: &e&lTritium

target: 氚是通过将锂放入太阳中子活化器中而产生的
source: Tritium is created by putting Lithium into a Solar Neutron Activator

target: 它可以直接放入聚变反应堆中，也可以与化学灌注器中的氘结合以制造D-T燃料。
source: It can be put directly into a Fusion Reactor or combined with Deuterium in a Chemical Infuser to make D-T Fuel.

target: &e&l聚变反应堆零件
source: &e&lFusion Reactor Parts

target: 准备这些材料：
source: Prepare those materials:

target: - 反应器框架 75x （构建 + 其他反应器部件）
source: - Reactor Frame 75x (Build + other reactorparts)

target: - 反应堆端口 2x
source: - Reactor Port 2x

target: - 反应控制器 1x
source: - Reactor Controller 1x

target: - 强化玻璃 8x
source: - Reactor Glass 8x

target: - 激光聚焦矩阵 1x
source: - Laser Focus Matrix 1x

target: &e&l裂变反应堆
source: &e&lThe Fission Reactor

target: 裂变反应堆是一种多方块结构，可产生大量热量，但不会自行产生电力。
source: A Fission Reactor is a multiblock structure that generates massive amounts of heat but does not produce power on its own

target: .产生多少热量取决于它燃烧裂变燃料的速度。将这种热量转化为动力的唯一方法是将“新鲜”冷却剂注入反应堆，并使用加热的冷却剂产生动力。对于水冷反应堆，电力是通过直接将蒸汽输送到工业涡轮机中来产生的。钠冷反应堆使用热电锅炉作为热交换器来冷却过热的钠并将水加热成蒸汽，然后送往工业涡轮机。
source: How much heat is generated depends on the rate at which it burns Fissile Fuel. The only way to transform this heat into power is to inject \"fresh\" coolant into the reactor and use the heated coolant that comes out to generate power. With water cooled reactors, power is generated by directly piping steam into an Industrial Turbine. Sodium cooled reactors use a Thermoelectric Boiler as a heat-exchanger to cool down the Superheated sodium and heat up water into Steam that is in turn sent to an Industrial Turbine.

target: - 结构必须是最小尺寸为3x4x3（沿X，Y和Z）的长方体，最大尺寸为18x18x18。
source: - The structure must be a cuboid of minimum size 3x4x3 (along X, Y and Z), up to 18x18x18.

target: - 外壳的边缘必须由裂变反应堆外壳制成。
source: -The edges of the outer shell must be made of Fission Reactor Casing.

target: - 外壳的面可以是裂变反应堆外壳，强化玻璃，裂变反应堆接口或裂变反应堆逻辑适配器。
source: - The faces of the outer shell can be either Fission Reactor Casing, Reactor Glass, Fission Reactor Port or Fission Reactor Logic Adapter.

target: - 立方体的内部可以是空气或裂变控制棒：
source: - The interior of the cube can be either air or fission control rods:

target: - 控制杆由1x1块宽的柱子组成，该柱由1至15个裂变燃料组件和顶部的单个控制组件组成。
source: - A control rod is formed by a 1x1 block wide column made of 1 to 15 Fission Fuel Assembly and a single Control Assembly at the top.

target: - 控制棒不得相互接触。通过将它们放置在棋盘图案中，可以实现最大的控制杆密度。
source: - Control rods must not touch each other. Maximum control rod density can be achieved by placing them in a checkerboard pattern.

target: 输出端口必须配置为正确的输出类型，方法是蹲下并用配置器右键单击它们。
source: Output ports must be configured to the proper output type by crouching and right-clicking them with a Configurator.

target: &e&l安全第一！
source: &e&lSafety First!

target: 可能发生的最糟糕的事情是裂变反应堆崩溃，这在通用机械中会导致大爆炸（真的很大）。然后是超过5个区块半径（即80个方块）的致命辐射，这将持续数周。
source: The worst thing that can happen is a core meltdown, which in Mekanism results in a big explosion. Big. Really big. Followed by lethal radiations over a 5 chunks radius (that's 80 blocks) that will last for several in-game weeks.

target: 每个反应堆都应该有一个断路器，在许多情况下，可以防止意外熔毁。这可以通过红石电路（如RS锁存器或边缘检测器）来完成。
source: Every reactor should have a circuit breaker that will, in many cases, prevent accidental meltdown. This can be done with redstone circuits like RS-latches or edge-detectors.

target: 有关链接的更多信息，请参见下文：
source: More information on linke below:

target: &e&l核废料
source: &e&lNuclear Waste

target: 放射性废料桶用于储存（或作为缓冲）放射性物质
source: Radioactive Waste Barrels are used to store (or as buffer for) radioactive materials

target: 玩家可以通过蹲下并用空手右击来检查放射性废物桶的存储状态。当桶充满时，会出现绿色辐射粒子（这些只是桶填充率的粗略视觉指标，而不是实际的辐射）。
source: The player can check the storage status of Radioactive Waste Barrels by crouching and right-clicking it with an empty hand. Green radiation particles start to appear as a barrel fills up (these are just a rough visual indicator of a barrel's fill ratio, not actual radiations).

target: 放射性废料桶不能以任何方式移动（活塞，纸板箱等）。此外，由于含有任何放射性废料的桶无法安全破碎，因此安全移动非空桶的唯一方法是在破碎之前将其内容物转移到另一个桶中。这可以通过在拉动模式下将加压管连接到其顶部或底部来完成。
source: Radioactive Waste barrels cannot be moved by any means (pistons, cardboard box, etc.). Also because barrels containing any radioactive waste cannot be broken safely, the only way to safely move a non empty barrel is to transfer its contents to another barrel before breaking it. This can be done by connecting a Pressurized Tube to its top or bottom side in pull mode.

target: 即使放射性废物桶具有一定的抗爆炸性，但向它们输送废物的加压管则不是。根据经验，不要让爬行者在裂变反应堆或废物转化或处置装置周围徘徊。
source: Even if Radioactive Waste Barrels are somewhat blast resistant, pressurized tubes carrying waste to them are not. As a rule of thumb, do not allow creepers wandering around a fission reactor or waste transformation or disposal units.

target: &e&l工业蒸汽涡轮
source: &e&lThe Industrial Turbine

target: 工业蒸汽涡轮是一种多块发电机，用于在提供大量蒸汽的情况下产生能量
source: Industrial Turbine is a multiblock generator used to produce energy if supplied with big quantity of Steam

target: 由于消耗了大量的蒸汽，聚变反应堆是生产它的绝佳方式。
source: Because of the enormous quantity of Steam consumed, the Fusion Reactor is an excellent way to produce it.

target: 聚变反应堆单独产生蒸汽，具有供水。蒸汽的产生速率取决于聚变反应堆的燃料输入速率，这使得达到高度生产非常困难。
source: Fusion Reactor alone producing Steam by itself, with a Water supply. The Steam production rate depends on the fuel input rate of the Fusion Reactor, making it extremely hard to reach height production.

target: 此外，还需要大量的水来填充聚变反应堆或锅炉。获得足够水的最简单方法是将工业蒸汽涡轮中的蒸汽回收为水。每个涡轮通风口将水推到相邻的水箱或管道。流体输送速率是一大难点。2种流体（水或蒸汽）中的一种可以直接发送到另一台机器，方法是将排出流体的阀门直接放在接收流体的阀门上。另一个需要使用容量有限的管道进行运输。这个问题可以通过使用通用机械管道特性来避免：它们的传输速率是累加的
source: Moreover, an enormous quantity of Water is needed as well to fill the Fusion Reactor or the Boiler. The easiest way to get enough Water is to recover the Steam from the Industrial Turbine as Water. Each Turbine Vent will push water to an adjacent tank or pipe.Fluid transport rate is a major difficulty. One of the 2 fluids (Water or Steam) can be directly send to the other machine by placing the valve expulsing the fluid directly against the valve receiving it. The other one will need to be transport with pipes that have limited capacities. This problem can be avoid by using Mekanism pipes properties : their transport rate is cumulative.

target: 例如：要输送 3，000，000 mB/t 的水，至少必须将 47 个 终极机械管道（每个管道 64，000 mB/t）连接在一起，即使管道正在形成回路。
source: Example : to transport 3,000,000 mB/t of Water, at least 47 Ultimate Mechanical Pipes (64,000 mB/t each) must be connected together, even if the pipes are making loops.

target: &e&l加压反应室
source: &e&lPressurized Reaction Chamber

target: 加压反应室（PRC）主要用于制造基质（用于制造HDPE颗粒），HDPE颗粒（用于制造HDPE片材）和乙烯（气体燃烧发电机中使用的有效燃料来源）
source: The Pressurized Reaction Chamber (PRC) is used primarily to create Substrate (to create HDPE Pellets), HDPE Pellets (to create HDPE Sheets), and Ethylene (an efficient source of fuel used in the Gas-Burning Generator)

target: 加压反应室接受液体，气体和材料;它使用这三种物质来产生另一种材料和一些剩余的气体。像许多其他通用机械机器一样，它具有可配置的侧面;默认情况下，它接受来自左侧的气体，从背面接受液体，并在右侧输出气体。
source: The Pressurized Reaction Chamber accepts a liquid, a gas, and a material(s); it uses these three substances to create another material(s) and some leftover gas. Like many other Mekanism machines, it has configurable sides; by default, it accepts gas from the left, accepts liquid from the back, and outputs gas on the right.

target: &e&l辐射 ! ! !
source: &e&lRadiation ! ! !

target: 在加压反应室（PRC）中由1 x萤石粉尘，1000mB水和1000mB钋（也是1000mB作为副产品产生的废核废料）制成
source: Created in Pressurized Reaction Chamber (PRC) from 1 x Fluorite Dust, 1000mB Water and 1000mB Polonium (also 1000mB Spent Nuclear Waste created as side-product)

target: &e&l改造站
source: &e&lModification Station

target: 将升级组件装进meka装备。大小为4个方块，底面为2格，高为2格。
source: The Modification Station is used for applying modular upgrades to the Meka-Suit in exchange for energy

target: 它的功能类似于模块化动力套装mod中的铁砧或动力装甲修补工表。
source: A part of the Meka-Suit (which the upgrade is compatible with) is inserted into the station along with the upgrade, resulting in the upgrade being applied to the Meka-Suit.

target: &e&l模块单元
source: &e&lModul Units

target: 模块（或单元）是可以应用于改装站的MekaSuit和Meka工具的升级。
source: Modules (or units, as they're called in-game) are upgrades that can be applied to the MekaSuit and the Meka-Tool at a Modification Station.

target: 每个模块的效果都可以通过按  \"\\\" (反斜杠)进行调整.
source: Each module's effects can be tuned by pressing \"\\\" (backslash).

target: &6模拟殖民地
source: &6MineColonies

target: &a&l欢迎来到你的殖民地！
source: &a&lWelcome to MineColonies

target: MineColonies是一个可以进行互动的城镇建设建设Mod，允许玩家在MineCraft中创建自己繁荣的城镇。
source: Minecolonies is an interactive Town building mod that allows you to create your own thriving Town within Minecraft

target: 它通过为玩家提供不同的可操作选项来创建玩家自己的城市，来增强游戏对于真实生活场景的体验感。Mod拥有许多NPC工人，如：建筑师、工匠、农民、渔民、警卫、军人、矿工、冶炼工、焙烤工、厨师/餐厅、递送员、牧民以及许多未就业人员等，同时也有新附魔：入侵者之终焉。同时Mod拥有这些工人专门的建筑，如：仓库、市民小屋、市政厅等。MineColonies给玩家创造了一个玩法丰富独特的殖民地玩法。
source: It depicts real-life scenarios by providing you with different craftable options to build your own Town and enhance your gaming experience. Featuring many NPC workers such as: Builders, Crafters, Farmers, Fishermen, Guards, Barracks, Miners, Smeltery, Baker, Cook/Restuarant, Deliveryman, Animal Herders and many more planned for development. As well as a specialized buildings such as: Warehouse, Citizen Huts and a Townhall. Minecolonies gives you the ability to create a colony as rich and unique as every player

target: 玩家可以在游戏里完全掌控应该如何发展玩家的城镇。自己决定你需要多少员工，什么类型的员工，他们将住在哪里，甚至哪一个员工应该在哪一个岗位上。可以根据自己的节奏来创建自己的城镇。玩家自己掌控了城镇的设计与发展的方向，真正实现了自己是设计者、管理员、员工老板。
source: You have full control of how to build your Town. You determine how many workers you want or need, what type of workers, where they will live, and hire or fire as you see fit. Creating a Town at your own pace. It is your Town to design and develop, you are the designer, administrator and boss.

target: 自己的城镇应该得到最高级的安全保障。多建造几个卫兵塔及兵营，用来保护自己的城市免遭怪物和野蛮人不定时造成的伤害。（野蛮人多在夜里出没）给予卫兵们最好的武器以及盔甲。并且要给予你城镇的人们足够的食物。要做到整个城镇不挨饿，你需要建造农场、焙烤师、厨师等，这样就不会再有人挨饿了。
source: Your Town deserves the best security you can have. Strategically add Guard Towers or Tower Barracks to protect your Town from hostile mobs and barbarians that will attack on random nights. Give them the best weapons and armour your Town has to offer. They need to be fed well to work and protect it better. Keep a busy farmer to supply the baker and the cook at the restaurant, so no one goes hungry.

target: &a&l补给船或补给车
source: &a&lThe Supply Ship or Supply Camp

target: 第一步：补给船/补给车
source: Step 1: Supply Camp/Supply Ship

target: 正常情况下你需要先合成/获得一个补给营地/补给船，将其放置在任意符合条件的位置上，你将会会在里面获得建筑权杖和市政厅；在你提前找好的场地上放下市政厅，右键市政厅选择建立殖民地
source: Once you have chosen a location for your colony, you must place a Supply Ship or Supply Camp. You can only place one of these per world. The Supply Camp/Ship gives you the Town Hall block you need to officially start your colony. They also have some other supplies you may need during the building of your colony. Once you have the Town Hall block and the build tool, the remaining camp/ship is just decoration. You can leave it or tear it down.

target: 拿着补给船右击放置在一处宽阔的水域内，会生成一艘船。船外面的箱子有市政厅和建筑工具，船内的床可供玩家跳过夜晚，而船内的箱子都是空的。
source: Before you place the Supply Camp, you need to have a large enough flat, clear piece of land that is as large as the camp area.

target: 拿着补给车右击放置后会生成一个营地，有多种不同建筑风格的营地。营地内一般有工作台、熔炉、床等，部分建筑风格会有营火。
source: For the Supply Ship, you need an area of water at least one block larger than the build area. Not all Camps or Ships are the same size.

target: &a&l镇中心
source: &a&lThe Town Hall

target: Step 2: 镇中心
source: Step 2: Town Hall

target: 市政厅方块可以通过合成得到，但只能在在补给营地或补给船处获得后合成，也可以在创造模式获得。当首次用建筑权杖放置市政厅时会取得进度：开始你劳苦的一生。
source: The Town Hall block is what actually creates the colony. It also functions as the center of it. This is where you start using the build tool to place buildings. Using the build tool ensures you can see exactly where the building will be, which direction it will face, and if it is at the right Y level (some buildings need to be raised to the correct Y level).

target: 你想要放置你的市政厅之前，你要仔细观察附近的地形，可能会包括山脉、丘陵、湖泊、海洋、洞穴、世界生成的建筑等。因为一旦市政厅被放置，你的殖民地的领地范围是半径为8个区块（不包括市政厅功能方块所在区块），竖直方向从基岩到最高层的的正方形。
source: Make sure you scout your area carefully before you decide where you want to place your Town Hall. Your colony will start with a 4 chunk radius (4 chunks in each direction) from the Town Hall block. Make sure this is where you want your colony to be.

target: &a&l建筑工
source: &a&lThe Builder

target: Step 3: 建筑小屋
source: Step 3: Builder’s Hut

target: 在任何功能性建筑物建造之前，你必须制作一个建筑师小屋，并且使用你的建筑工具来放置这个建筑。一旦这个建筑物建筑完成，你可以选择一名属性较高（智慧、力量）的员工来工作。
source: Before anything can be built, you need a Builder. The Builder must build their own Builder’s Hut before building any other huts, and they cannot build or upgrade a hut to a higher level than their own hut level.

target: 在你选择建造建造者小屋的地点之前，要考虑到其他可能的建筑地点和障碍物(如水、树、洞穴、山、岩浆等)之间的距离。当你选择了一个地方的小屋，你必须建造建设者的小屋块，并用你的建造工具。一旦小屋被放置，建造者将被自动分配(或者你可以手动分配一个具有最佳特征的建造者，但是你必须在gui自己改手动
source: Before you choose a place to build the Builder’s Hut, take into account the distances among the other possible building sites and obstacles like water, trees, caves, mountains, lava sources, etc. After you have selected a place for the hut, you have to craft the Builder’s Hut block and place it with your build tool. Once the hut is placed, the Builder will be automatically assigned (or you can manually assign one with the best Traits for a Builder if you changed this in the settings tab in the Town Hall’s GUI.

target: 现在你必须发布建造建造者小屋任务，这样建造者会优先建造他们自己的小屋。建造者会要求提供他们需要的材料。看看第二页，以查看建设者任何建造/升级请求的材料。清单中任何未找到的材料将用红色字母标出。建造者小屋完成之后，你可以建造任何你想要的东西.
source: Now you will have to issue the build assignment so the Builder can build their own hut first. The Builder will ask for the materials they need. Make sure to check the Resource Scroll or the second page of the Builder’s Hut GUI to see what materials the Builder is requesting for any build/upgrade. Any material in the list that is still missing will be in red letters. Once the Builder’s Hut is built you can now build anything you want, like worker huts, buildings, decorations, or your own schematics.

target: &lNote:&r 建造者只能建造升级与自己小屋相同的等级的建筑。所以，为了让建造者升级其他建筑，建造者的小屋必须先升级。然后，建造者才能够升级其他建筑。
source: &lNote:&r The Builder can only build or upgrade any other hut up to the level of their own hut. So, in order for the Builder to upgrade any building, the Builder’s Hut must be upgraded first. Then the Builder will be able to upgrade any other building(s).

target: 酒馆
source: Tavern

target: 在这里可以招募到属性值比初始市民高很多的市民，而且还提供了四个居住空间。虽然所需建筑材料在初期不易收集，但仍然非常推荐在初期建造。
source: Your colonists will need a place to sleep and a house, so it is recommended to build a Tavern next. The Tavern also allows visitors to come to your colony, and you can recruit them to stay as citizens.

target: 一个殖民地只能建造一个酒馆。此外，与其他建筑不同，酒馆只能升到三级。酒馆等级越高，客人等级和属性越高。
source: The Tavern is like a House in that it houses citizens, however, the Tavern houses four instead of one and can’t be upgraded to house more.Every so often, visitors will come to the Tavern. You can recruit these visitors (with items) to live and work in your colony. Don’t attack them, they’ll fight back! Upgrading the Tavern will garner more and better visitors.Recruiting used to be part of the Town Hall but has been moved here.

target: 护林人小屋
source: Forester’s Hut

target: 护林人小屋是护林人砍树的地方
source: The Forester’s Hut is where the Forester will go in between chopping down trees

target: 护林人会砍掉大约150格内(从他们自己算起)的任何一棵树，这些树不在小屋建筑时示意图中。
source: The Forester will cut down any tree in an approximate 150 block area (from themselves) that is not in a hut schematic and doesn’t have cobblestone placed beneath it.

target: 曲逸：砍光所有树！就不会有树生病了！！！！！
source: &lNote:&r Foresters require hoes (for breaking leaves).

target: 矿井
source: Mine

target: 矿山是矿工开采矿石和材料的地方
source: The Mine is where the Miner will mine for ores and materials

target: 其次矿井内矿工不会在矿道中放置火把，因此需要在守卫塔中安排守卫巡逻矿井，避免矿工在和平模式以外受到怪物攻击。
source: The shaft the Miner creates downwards will go to a specific depth depending on the level of the Mine:

target: 注：升级可以提升挖掘的深度，三级能挖到基岩层
source: Mine Level 1 - Y level 50

target: 仓库
source: Warehouse

target: 仓库是一个中央储存点，快递员会往那里存储物品，给你的工人运送所需的物品。
source: The Warehouse is the central storage from where a Courier will store and retrieve everything your workers harvest, craft, or need

target: 升级会提高仓库内架子的数量，从而提升库存空间。3级以后会解锁一键整理功能。
source: &lNote:&r You can only have one Warehouse per colony.

target: &a&l 大学
source: &a&lThe University

target: 大学是模拟殖民地中最重要而且是材料需要最多的建筑，如果没有它，你就不能建造殖民地的特殊建筑！每当大学升一级时，就会多一个研究员，也能解锁更多东西。
source: The University is where a Researcher will research various upgrades to your colony.

target: 曲逸：这个任务的所有分支内容都需要在大学研究后才能建筑，（作者给每个都写了这段话，我就把重复的删了）
source: As you level up the University, you can hire more researchers.

target: 渔夫小屋
source: Fisher’s Hut

target: 渔夫小屋是渔夫捕鱼的地方
source: The Fisher’s Hut is where the Fisher will catch fish

target: 需要附近有至少 7*7*1的水池以供钓鱼。
source: The Fisher requires a fishing rod and a body of water of a minimum of 7 blocks wide x 7 blocks long x 1 block tall to be able to work, and the water must be near his hut.

target: 升级渔夫小屋可以扩大渔夫的捕鱼范围，渔夫小屋的等级越高，渔人捞出的战利品就越多(不是鱼)。这包括海晶石粒和海绵!
source: Upgrading the Fisher’s Hut will expand the range at which the Fisher can fish, and the higher the level of the Fisher’s Hut, the more loot the Fisher will be fishing out (instead of fish). This includes prismarine and sponges!

target: 餐厅
source: Restaurant

target: 餐厅是厨师烹饪食物的地方，前提是他们有必要的食材和燃料
source: The Restaurant is where the Cook will cook food, provided they have the necessary ingredients and fuel

target: 市民饱食度低于10（5格）时会自动前往餐馆，餐馆工作人员在餐馆内储存有食物的情况下给市民（或饱食度低于10的玩家）发放食物，
source: When citizens are hungry, they will come to the Restaurant and the Cook will give them food. The Assistant Cook also works at the Restaurant. They craft needed food to help supply the colony.

target: 可自动烧炼一些食物（烤土豆，烤猪排之类的） 每级增加1个熔炉以提高烧炼效率。只有在燃料界面打开特定的燃料才能让此建筑正常执行。
source: &lNote:&r You can only hire an Assistant Cook when the Restaurant is level 3 or higher.

target: 农场 \\& 农田
source: Farm \\& Fields

target: 农场是农民为你的殖民地种植作物的地方
source: The Farm is where the Farmer will grow crops for your colony

target: 农民会耕种农田正下方一层高度的耕地，种植范围取决于水的滋润范围，最大不超过以农田为中心的 11×11 的正方形。一个农夫小屋支持农民耕种多个农田，最大农田数量在数值上等于当前农夫小屋等级。然而实际上一般来说一个农民只有足够的时间管理一片农田，所以还是要多造农夫小屋
source: The crops the Farmer currently cultivates are wheat, carrots, potatoes, beets, melons, pumpkins, and most crops from other mods (as long as they have normal growth behavior). Before the Farmer can start, you will have to give the Farmer a hoe, an axe (for harvesting crops), and the crop you want to cultivate.

target: 农田需配合农夫小屋使用，用来标记可耕作的区域，最大范围是以农田为中心 11×11 的正方形，且最大数量依农夫小屋等级决定。右击农田方块可访问其 GUI，放入种子标记农夫需要种植的作物。
source: The Farmer will also craft seeds, carved pumpkins, hay bales, composted dirt, and coarse dirt. They will only make items when they have been taught the recipes, receive a request for an item, and have the needed materials.

target: 邮递员小屋
source: Courier’s Hut

target: 快递员从仓库跑到你的殖民地的所有工人的小屋，把材料送到工人手中并把成品放入仓库
source: The Courier runs back and forth from the Warehouse to all the worker huts in your colony, delivering materials to workers and putting finished products in the Warehouse

target: 快递员可以携带的物品数量取决于小屋等级。
source: The level of the Courier’s Hut will dictate how many items the Courier can deliver, so if you want them to carry more materials/tools, upgrade their hut. Upgrading the hut will also increase the amount of requests they can keep track of at a time.

target: 等级1：1组
source: The greater a Courier’s Agility skill, the faster they’ll run. The greater their Adaptability skill, the more huts they can visit before going back to the Warehouse.

target: 等级3：4组
source: &lNote:&r You MUST build the Warehouse to at least level 1 so the Courier can do their work.

target: 堆肥小屋
source: Composter’s Hut

target: 堆肥小屋是堆肥小屋工人将有机物转化为骨粉的地方，农民或花商可以使用这些骨粉来给作物或花卉施肥
source: The Composter’s Hut is where the Composter will turn organic materials into compost, which can be used by the Farmer or Florist to fertilize crops or flowers

target: 如果你启用了特殊设置，他们就可以制作泥土！有了这些建筑师就可以在建筑中使用（就不用你像个工具人一样去刨泥土了）。
source: They can also create dirt if you have the setting enabled, which the Builder can use in buildings. The Composter uses compost barrels to make compost or dirt.

target: 养鸡人小屋是养鸡人养鸡、收集鸡蛋和屠宰鸡的地方
source: The Chicken Farmer’s Hut is where the Chicken Farmer will raise chickens, collect eggs, and butcher chickens for food

target: 你必须自己捕捉两只鸡并把它们带到养鸡人小屋，因为养鸡人是不会捕捉鸡的。
source: You will have to capture and bring in two chickens to the Chicken Farmer’s Hut, as the Chicken Farmer will not catch and bring in any chickens.

target: 养猪人小屋是养猪人饲养和屠宰猪的地方 （这样就不用杀生啦！！！！）
source: The Swineherd’s Hut is where the Swineherd will breed and butcher pigs for food

target: 你必须自己抓住两只猪，把它们带进养猪人小屋，因为养猪人是不会把猪抓进来的。
source: You will have to capture and bring in two pigs to the Swineherd’s Hut, as the Swineherd will not catch and bring in any pigs.

target: 牧羊人小屋是牧羊人繁殖和屠宰羊的地方
source: The Shepherd’s Hut is where the Shepherd will breed and butcher sheep for food and wool

target: 你必须自己抓两只羊，带进牧羊人的小屋，因为牧羊人是不会抓羊的。
source: You will have to capture and bring in two sheep to the Shepherd’s Hut, as the Shepherd will not catch and bring in any sheep.

target: 牧牛工小屋是牧牛工繁殖、屠宰牛和挤奶的地方(如果你有这个选项的话)
source: The Cowhand’s Hut is where the Cowhand will breed, butcher, and milk (if you have the option enabled) cows for food and leather

target: 你必须自己抓住两只牛，把它们带到牧牛工小屋，因为牧牛工是不会把牛抓回来的。
source: You will have to capture and bring in two cows to the Cowhand’s Hut, as the Cowhand will not catch and bring in any cows.

target: 花卉小屋
source: Flower Shop

target: 花店可以为你的殖民地种植鲜花
source: The Flower Shop is where your Florist will grow flowers for your colony, if given compost and an axe

target: 图书馆
source: Library

target: 图书馆是你提高市民属性点的唯一途径
source: The Library is a way for you to raise your adult citizens’ Intelligence skill, which influences all other skill increases (at other jobs)

target: 初始属性点低的市民可以分配到图书馆学习，最大人数=2×图书馆等级。一旦有市民被分配到图书馆，你需要为他们提供纸。
source: A citizen will randomly level up their Intelligence as long as they’re assigned to the Library. Being a Library Student is their full-time job, so you can’t have one citizen work at the Library and another worker hut at the same time.

target: 粉碎工小屋
source: Crusher’s Hut

target: 它可以用来粉碎物品。
source: The Crusher’s Hut is where the Crusher will take items and crush them into other blocks

target: &lNote:&r 这个殖民地建筑需要研究才能建筑
source: &lNote:&r The Crusher’s Hut cannot be built until you have a level 1 Stonemason’s Hut and have finished the research in the University.

target: 铁匠铺
source: Blacksmith’s Hut

target: 铁匠铺可以3x3合成全部工具、以及所有全部用金属合成的物品。
source: The Blacksmith is a 3x3 crafter and can make any vanilla tools, armor, swords, and shields (no bows or redstone items)

target: 面包店
source: Bakery

target: 面包房目前可制作曲奇，蛋糕，面包，南瓜派
source: The Baker will craft bread dough, cookie dough, cake dough, and raw pumpkin pie, then bake these in a furnace to create bread, cookies, cakes, and pumpkin pies

target: 面包师也可以制作一些非香子兰面包: （是不是像机翻，我故意把香草改成香子兰的哦）(所以为什么是香草面包啊)
source: They will only do this upon request, whether from the Cook, the postbox, or as a minimum stock in the Warehouse.

target: -甜面包，由小麦和一个蜂蜜瓶。面包店3级才可制作。可获得的饱和度比普通面包稍高，还可以给你一个速度提升并且清除负面效果。
source: The Baker can also craft some non-vanilla breads:

target: -牛奶面包，由小麦和牛奶制成。面包店四级才可制作。能移除所有药水效果(就像牛奶一样)。
source: - Sweet bread, made from wheat and a honey bottle. Available at Bakery level 3. Has slightly higher saturation than normal bread, also gives you a speed boost and removes poison.

target: -黄金面包，由小麦和金锭制成。在面包店五级才能制作。可获得瞬间治愈I（两颗心）。
source: - Milk-infused bread, made from wheat and a milk bucket. Available at Bakery level 4. Removes all potion effects (like milk buckets do).

target: -紫颂果面包，由小麦和紫颂果制成。在大学完成“了解末地”研究后即可使用。比普通面包有更高的饱和度，吃了它后将你传送到地表。
source: - Golden bread, made from wheat and a gold ingot. Available at Bakery level 5. Instantly heals 2 hearts.

target: 锯木厂
source: Sawmill

target: 锯木机可存储 3×3 的合成表，点击其 GUI 中的“教学配方”即可，要求木材总数量占所有合成材料的 75% 以上。
source: The Sawmill is where the Carpenter will craft any items made of at least 75% wood that do not include ingots, stone, redstone (or produce a redstone signal), or string

target: 这个东西能省不少木头！！！自然环保！
source: The Carpenter will also craft a few other items, including cactus planks, shingles, timber frames, compost barrels, and racks. For them to do this, you must teach the Sawmill the recipes and the Carpenter must receive a request for an item from another worker.

target: 筛子工小屋
source: Sifter’s Hut

target: 该建筑可供筛子工人从泥土、沙砾、沙子或者灵魂沙中进行「筛沙淘金」
source: The Sifter’s Hut is where the Sifter will sift through dirt, gravel, sand, or soul sand to find loot

target: 筛沙的过程会消耗相应的方块。
source: Doing this will make the block the Sifter is sifting disappear.

target: 冶炼厂
source: Smeltery

target: 你可以在这里冶炼你所需的矿物
source: The Smeltery is where the Smelter will smelt ores into ingots

target: 提供燃料和矿石,冶炼矿物工作效率和建筑等级相关，每级多一个熔炉并且还有概率双倍甚至三倍产出
source: The higher the level of the Smeltery, the more furnaces the Smelter will be able to use. A higher level will also have a higher chance to double and even triple the ingot output per block of ore. The Smelter’s Strength level will sometimes determine the chance to double or triple the ingot output of ores, according to the Smeltery level.

target: &lNote:&r 你需要在大学中研究它才能制作
source: &lNote:&r The Smeltery cannot be built until you have a level 2 Mine (or two level 1 Mines) and have finished the research in the University.

target: 石材冶炼厂
source: Stone Smeltery

target: 把圆石变成石头，石砖变成裂石砖，粘土变成红砖，粘土块变成陶瓦，满足你所有殖民地的需要。该建筑同样可以利用各类原木烧制木炭供其他工人使用
source: The Stone Smeltery is where the Stone Smelter will smelt cobblestone into stone, stone bricks into cracked stone bricks, clay balls into bricks, clay blocks into terracotta, terracotta into glazed terracotta, all types of stone into all types of smooth stone, and logs into charcoal

target: 只有当他们学会了配方，收到了另一个工人的请求，并有了所需的材料时，石冶炼厂才会工作。
source: They can also pop chorus fruits! The Stone Smelter will only work when they have been taught the recipe, receive a request from another worker, and have the needed materials.

target: 石匠铺
source: Stonemason’s Hut

target: 采石场可存储 3×3 的合成表，点击其 GUI 中的“教学配方”即可，要求合成表必须包含圆石、石头、安山岩、闪长岩、花岗岩、砂岩或者矿物词典是“stone”的石头，石英块、紫珀块和末地石不算。
source: The Stonemason’s Hut is where the Stonemason will craft 3x3 recipes made entirely out of cobblestone, stone, andesite, diorite, granite, quartz, purpur, nether bricks, prismarine, sandstones, blackstone, basalt, and/or ores (no ingots or redstone items)

target: 采石场收到任何这些物品的需求时将会工作，以满足殖民地的所有需要。
source: They can also craft end stone from cobblestone and an ender pearl, but only if you have completed the Know the End research in the University. The Stonemason will only work when they receive a request from another worker and have the needed materials. You will also need to teach the Stonemason’s Hut the recipes you want the Stonemason to craft.

target: 卫兵塔
source: Guard Tower

target: 卫兵塔里的卫兵能够在一定范围内巡逻，最大范围取决于卫兵塔等级。
source: The Guard Tower will employ and house 1 Guard to protect your colony

target: 每个守卫需要在这里面有一张床获得工作。当他们被雇佣到兵营塔，那里将成为他们的新住所，原先住所里的床将为其他新公民(儿童或新兵)开放。
source: The new Guard will need a bed in a house in order to spawn. However, once they are hired at the Guard Tower, that becomes their new residence and the bed in the house will open up for another new citizen (child or recruit).

target: &a&l兵营
source: &a&lThe Military

target: Step 5: 守卫是你的殖民地的保护力量
source: Step 5: Guards are the protecting force for your colony

target: 兵营塔每级提供一个额外的市民（不计入市民小屋计算的人口数量） 5级后可招募5个守卫。打开后和守卫塔一致，但是守卫塔只有一个守卫。升级依旧需要居住市民小屋（这意味着在4个满级兵营塔的情况下 额外20个人口 会导致你永远有20个市民无家可归）
source: The Barracks is the ultimate protection for your colony. The Barracks will hold 4 Barracks Towers within its structure. The Barracks Towers (unlike the normal Guard Towers) will employ and house 1 Guard for every level built! Each new Guard will need a bed in a house in order to spawn. However, once they are hired at the Barracks Tower, that becomes their new residence and the bed in the house will open up for another new citizen. Each Barracks Tower can house and employ 5 Guards for a total of 20 Guards for your colony.

target: 作者原话，但是这是1.14.4版本前的bug
source: &lNote:&r The Barracks cannot be built until you have a level 3 Guard Tower (or three level 1 Guard Towers, or another equivalent) and have finished the research in the University.

target: 巨型要塞
source: Build all 4 Barracks Towers

target: 卫兵塔里的卫兵能够在一定范围内巡逻，最大范围取决于卫兵塔等级。
source: The Barracks Towers will employ and house 1 Guard for every level built (unlike the normal Guard Towers, which can only have 1 Guard at a time)

target: 每个守卫需要在这里面有一张床获得工作。当他们被雇佣到兵营塔，那里将成为他们的新住所，原先住所里的床将为其他新公民(儿童或新兵)开放。
source: Each new Guard will need a bed in a house in order to spawn. However, once they are hired at the Barracks Tower, that becomes their new residence and the bed in the house will open up for another new citizen (child or recruit).

target: 靶场
source: Archery

target: 靶场是您的弓箭手训练成为射手守卫的地方
source: The Archery is where your Archers in Training will train to become Archer Guards

target: 靶场可供市民练习射箭，从而转职为弓箭手守卫。该建筑同样可让弓箭手守卫无需冒着杀怪死亡的风险来获得升级。获得一名弓箭手守卫之前，需要殖民地中存在一个空余的床位，这样才能够生成一名「训练中的弓箭手」。一旦弓箭手完成训练，他将会被靶场所雇佣。由于弓箭手是住在靶场里面的，因此之前占用的床位将会空闲出来，可供其他市民（包括孩子或者新招募的市民）居住。
source: This also allows them to level up without a risk of dying to mobs. A new Archer in Training will need a bed in a house in order to spawn. However, once they are hired at the Archery, that becomes their new residence and the bed in the house will open up for another new citizen (child or recruit).

target: 战斗学院
source: Combat Academy

target: 战斗研究所供市民练习剑术
source: The Combat Academy is where your Knights in Training will train to become Knight Guards

target: 让他们升级后能降低他们被怪物杀死的风险。一个被训练的公民需要在其中的房间里有一个床，以便重生（？作者原话）。然而，一旦他们被战斗学院雇佣，那里就会成为他们的新住所，他原本房子里的床会为其他新公民(孩子或新兵)开放。
source: This also allows them to level up without a risk of dying to mobs. A new Knight in Training will need a bed in a house in order to spawn. However, once they are hired at the Combat Academy, that becomes their new residence and the bed in the house will open up for another new citizen (child or recruit).

target: 最大人数在数值上等于当前战斗研究所等级。
source: The number of students that can be trained at a time depends on the level of the Academy.

target: 神秘之地
source: Mystical Site

target: 神秘之地是一个用来增加居民幸福度的好东西！
source: The Mystical Site is a simple building to increase a colony’s overall happiness level

target: 它不需要任何npc，只是通过存在来增加公民的幸福。当没有公民趋势时，殡仪会来到神秘地点。这样做将增加他们的法力，这样，他们有可能复活一个死去公民
source: It has no worker, and increases colonists’ happiness just by existing.The Undertaker will visit the Mystical Site when there are no colonists to bury. Doing so will increase their Mana skill, and as such, their chance of resurrecting a killed citizen.

target: 养蜂场是养蜂人工作的地方
source: The Apiary is where the Beekeeper works

target: 在养蜂场中的蜂巢需要玩家自行提供，摆在其范围内后，需要通过与该方块右键，打开GUI第二页获取工具，并右键放置的蜂巢即将其添加为工人的工作对象，工人就会开始工作。
source: he Beekeeper breeds bees and harvests honeycombs or honey bottles (you can choose which on the second page of the Apiary’s GUI).The level of the Apiary determines the max number of hives the Beekeeper can take care of.

target: 等级越高，工人可工作的对象蜂巢数量越多
source: &lNote:&r If the Beekeeper is asking for hives but there are some nearby, make sure you’ve set the hives for them to take care of with the hive tool. This tool is accessed from the second page of the Apiary GUI

target: 可进行混凝土粉末和混凝土的制作。
source: The Concrete Mixer will craft all types of concrete powder and place them in flowing water (built in to their hut), then mine the resulting concrete

target: 染色坊可供染色工制作染料，以及对物品进行染色，此外还可以制作红色下界砖块和暗海晶石。染色工无法对混凝土和混凝土粉末进行染色。
source: The Dyer’s Hut is where the Dyer will craft dyes and dye other items, including red nether bricks and dark prismarine

target: 只有染色工收到来自其他工人的物品请求，并且持有必须的材料时，染色工才会进行染色。染色坊的初始配方包含了如何制作绿色染料和红沙，其余的配方需要玩家主动教会染色工。
source: They won’t dye concrete or concrete powder, though. The Dyer will only do this if they receive a request from another worker and have the necessary materials. The Dyer’s Hut automatically knows how to make green dye and red sand, but you must teach it the recipes for the other dyes and the dyed items.

target: 此外，染色工的灵巧属性越高，染色和制作染料的速度也就越快。随着等级的不断升高，染色工的速度甚至能超过玩家！
source: &lNote:&r The Dyer cannot be built until you have a level 3 Flower Shop (or three level 1 Flower Shops, or another equivalent) and have finished the research in the University.

target: 附魔师之塔
source: Enchanter’s Tower

target: 附魔者之塔是附魔者制作附魔书的地方
source: The Enchanter’s Tower is where the Enchanter will create enchanted books, as long as they have Ancient Tomes

target: 附魔师在制作附魔书的时候，会从其他工人那里收集经验值 (XP)。附魔师的法力等级越高，每次收集的经验值也越多。附魔师无法为工具和武器附魔，这项工作只能玩家自己进行。
source: The Enchanter will collect XP from other workers to create the enchanted books. The higher their Mana level, the more XP they will collect per trip. They will not apply the enchanted books to tools and armor, you must do that yourself.

target: 附魔小屋的等级决定了附魔师制作的附魔书等级（此外，附魔师的智力属性也会有所影响）
source: The higher the level of the Enchanter’s Tower, the higher the level of the enchanted books the Enchanter will produce (the Enchanter’s Knowledge level also contributes to this).

target: 此外，玩家还可以请求附魔师制作魔法卷轴，包括：
source: The Enchanter can also craft some magical scrolls upon request:

target: * 超安全的殖民地传送卷轴：使用 3 张纸，1 个指南针以及 1 个建筑工具制作（产出 3 张卷轴）。
source: - The Ultrasafe Colony Teleport Scroll, crafted with 3 paper, a compass, and the build tool. (Outputs 3 scrolls).

target: * 超安全的殖民地集体传送卷轴：使用 3 个超安全的殖民地传送卷轴制作，要求附魔小屋的等级至少为 2 级。
source: - The Ultrasafe Colony Group Teleport Scroll, crafted with 3 Ultrasafe Colony Teleport Scrolls. The Enchanter’s Tower must be at least level 2 for the Enchanter to craft this scroll.

target: * 守卫集体增强卷轴：使用 1 个超安全的殖民地传送卷轴，5 个青金石、1 个末影珍珠和 1 张纸制作（产出 2 张卷轴）。必须要完成大学中的「更多卷轴」研究。
source: - The Spatial Guard Reinforcements Scroll, crafted with 1 Ultrasafe Colony Teleport Scroll, 5 lapis lazuli, 1 ender pearl, and 1 paper. (Outputs 2 scrolls). The More Scrolls research in the University must be completed for the Enchanter to craft this scroll.

target: * 寻人卷轴：使用 1 个超安全的殖民地传送卷轴、6 个荧石粉荧和 2 张纸制作（产出 5 张卷轴）。必须要完成大学中的「更多卷轴」研究。
source: - The Worker-Where-Are-You Scroll, crafted with 1 Ultrasafe Colony Teleport Scroll, 6 glowstone dust, and 2 paper. (Outputs 5 scrolls.) The More Scrolls research in the University must be completed for the Enchanter to craft this scroll.

target: 纺织工小屋是纺织工制作箭或需要用到绳子或羊毛的物品的地方，比如弓、鱼竿和绘画
