source: The Fletcher’s Hut is where the Fletcher will craft arrows and items that use string or wool, such as bows, fishing poles, and paintings

target: 为了让纺织工工作，他们必须收到另一个工人的请求，拥有必要的材料，而且纺织工小屋也必须学会所要制作的配方。
source: For the Fletcher to work, they must receive a request from another worker and have the necessary materials. The Fletcher’s Hut must also have been taught the crafting recipes for all the items you want the Fletcher to be able to craft.

target: 玻璃匠可以将沙子融化成玻璃，并且可以把玻璃方块制作成玻璃板。
source: The Glassblower’s Hut is where the Glassblower will smelt sand into glass and make glass panes from glass blocks

target: 要让玻璃匠开始工作，他们必须先接收到其他工人的请求，并持有必要的材料（沙子，以及烧制沙子所需的燃料）。此外，玩家还需要为玻璃厂添加制作玻璃板的配方。
source: For the Glassblower to work, they must receive a request from another worker and have the necessary materials, including fuel if they’re smelting sand into glass. The Glassblower’s Hut must also have been taught the crafting recipe for glass panes.

target: 墓地是埋葬你死去的公民的地方
source: The Graveyard is where the Undertaker will bury your deceased citizens

target: 医院可以治疗受伤和染疾的病人。
source: The Hospital is where injured or sick citizens go

target: 医生通过各式各样的物品来治疗这些病人。
source: The Healer will heal them with various items.

target: 住宅
source: House

target: 公民们会在晚上回到他们的家睡觉
source: Citizens will go to the House they are assigned to at night to sleep

target: 住宅每提升一个等级，可提供一个可居住人口。
source: The House is also a way to get more citizens for your colony.Each level of the House will house one citizen.

target: 为了使殖民地有更多居民，你首先必须有足够的空间容纳你的前四个公民。当你为最初的四个公民创造了足够的空间后，你有两个选择来让你的殖民地成长。第一种：去酒馆，等待一个旅行者出现，然后给他们所需的物品来招募他们。
source: For additional citizens to spawn, you first have to have enough space in your House(s) to house your first four citizens. After you have created enough space for your initial four citizens, you have two options for your colony to grow. The first way is to have at least one House at least level 2 that houses a male and a female citizen, which will allow a child to be born in the colony when there is room. You can also make space for a new citizen, go to the Tavern, wait for a traveler to show up, and then give them the items they request to recruit them.

target: 养兔场是养兔人饲养和屠宰兔子的地方
source: The Rabbit Hutch is where the Rabbit Herder will raise and butcher rabbits

target: 你必须自己抓住两只兔子，把它们带到养兔场，因为养兔人是不会把兔子抓回来的。
source: You will have to capture and bring in two rabbits to the Rabbit Hutch, as the Rabbit Herder will not catch and bring in any rabbits.

target: 机械师是你的殖民地供应生产的一部分
source: The Mechanic is part of the supply production of your colony

target: 完成红石机械工坊的建造后，机械师可在其中制作红石制品、铁轨、矿车、钟、指南针、海晶灯、火把、灯笼、南瓜灯、压缩方块（例如铁块、煤炭块、石英块等等）、蓝冰、浮冰、附魔台、末影箱、绊线钩、粘性活塞、门、荧石块、多向活塞、烈焰棒相关制品以及其他只有机械师能制造的物品！只有拥有足够的材料，并收到其他工人的制作请求后，机械师才会开始工作。在机械师制作物品前，还需要将所需制作物品的配方教给机械师。
source: The Mechanic’s Hut is where the Mechanic will craft redstone items, rails, minecarts, clocks, compasses, sea lanterns, torches, lanterns, jack-o-lanterns, storage blocks (like blocks of iron, coal, quartz, etc), dried kelp blocks, blue ice, packed ice, enchantment tables, ender chests, tripwire hooks, sticky pistons, gates, multi-pistons, glowstone blocks, anything made with blaze rods, and many other items that no other crafter can make. For the Mechanic to work, they must receive a request from another worker and have the necessary materials. The Mechanic’s Hut must also have been taught the crafting recipes for all the items you want the Mechanic to be able to craft.

target: 种植园是工人种植甘蔗、竹子或仙人掌的地方
source: The Plantation is where the Planter will grow either sugar cane, bamboo, or cactus

target: 种植园的等级决定了工人一次可以种植多少作物。
source: The Plantation’s level determines how many crops the Planter can plant at a time.

target: 种植园的工人还可以制作纸、书、糖和任何用竹子制成的东西。工人只有在掌握了配方、并且拥有足够的材料才会做这些东西
source: The Planter can also craft paper, books, sugar, and anything made with bamboo. The Planter will only make these items when they have been taught the recipes, receive a request for an item, and have the needed materials.

target: 建造学校后，教师可以帮助提升孩子们的属性。
source: The School is where the Teacher will level up the Pupils’ (children) skills

target: 使用纸可以加快孩子们升级的速度。
source: Paper will increase the leveling speed of the Pupils.The level of the School determines how many Pupils can be taught at a time.

target: 殖民地人口到达25人
source: Reach colony population of 25 citizens

target: 殖民地人口到达50人
source: Reach colony population of 50 citizens

target: 殖民地人口到达75人
source: Reach colony population of 75 citizens

target: 军队士兵达到30名士兵
source: Reach army of 30 soldiers

target: 军队士兵达到80名士兵
source: Reach army of 80 soldiers

target: 将市政厅升级到等级5
source: Build Town Hall to level 5

target: 将冶炼厂升级到等级5
source: Build Smeltery to level 5

target: 将神秘之地升级到等级5
source: Build Mystical Site to level 5

target: 军队士兵达到8名士兵
source: Reach army of 8 soldiers

target: 有一个矿工矿到基岩
source: Have a Miner mine to bedrock

target: &d模块化路由器
source: &dModular Routers

target: &2&l欢迎来到模块化路由器
source: &2&lWelcome to Modular Routers

target: *完成任务&b&l&o签订合同&r以解锁*
source: *Unlocked by completing the &b&l&oSign the contract&r quest*

target: 这是一个灵活的mod，可以以多种方式移动物品
source: This is a flexible mod for moving items around in numerous ways

target: 物品路由器是系统的中心：它有一个用于物品的缓冲槽，九个模块插槽和五个升级插槽。您可以右键单击项目路由器以打开其 GUI。
source: The Item Router is the centre of the system: it has a single buffer slot for items, nine module slots, and five upgrade slots. You can right-click an Item Router to open its GUI.

target: 路由器旨在移动物品，而不是存储它们。
source: The router is intended to move items around, not store them. However, if you want to use it as a 1-slot chest, you can; its inventory is fully accessible by vanilla hoppers and any other mods piping systems.

target: 但是要妥善使用路由器，您需要 &b&l模块&r.
source: But to properly use a router, you need &b&lModules&r.

target: 模块指定路由器的功能。路由器最多可以安装九个模块，并且每个路由器刻（默认情况下为每20个服务器刻度或1秒），从左到右依次执行每个已安装的模块一次
source: Modules specify what an Item Router does. A router can have up to nine modules installed, and every router tick (which is every 20 server ticks or 1 second by default), it executes every installed module once, from the leftmost module to the rightmost.

target: 模块有许多类型，每种类型都以特定的方式在路由器的缓冲区上运行。所有模块都有一个通用的配置界面，可以通过在手上的模块上单击鼠标右键，或者当鼠标悬停在项目路由器GUI中已安装的模块上时按“C”键（可配置）或中键来访问该接口。
source: There are many module types, each of which operate on the router's buffer in a specific way. All modules have a common configuration interface, which can be accessed by right-clicking with the module in hand, or by pressing the 'C' key (configurable) or middle-clicking while the mouse is over an installed module in the item router's GUI.

target: 虽然模块定义了路由器做什么，但有 9 种不同的升级类型会影响路由器是否这样做。
source: While modules define &owhat&r a router does, upgrades affect &ohow&r the router does it. There are 9 different upgrade types.

target: 增强是可制作的物品，可以插入（和删除）模块。在mod的v3.0.0中引入了增强功能，并取代了旧的模块增强系统。模块具有最多四个增强的插槽（尽管某些增强可堆叠，并且可以在一个插槽中放置多个增强）。
source: Augments are craftable items which can be inserted into (and removed from) modules. Augments were introduced in v3.0.0 of the mod, and replace the older module enhancement system. Modules have slots for up to four augments (although some augments stack, and multiple augments can be placed in one slot).

target: 装入虚空模块使用，允许虚空模块无视一般情况下捡起掉落物的延迟时间。
source: This augment can only be added to the Vacuum Module. It allows the Vacuum Module to ignore the normal pickup delay on dropped items - 40 ticks for items dropped by players, and 10 ticks for items dropped by other means (e.g. sheep shearing) - and pick up items as soon as it sees them.

target: 添加多个快速拾取拓展是没有用的。
source: It is not useful to add more than one Fast Pickup augment.

target: 这种拓展只能添加到投掷和投掷器模块中。
source: This augment can only be added to the Dropper and Flinger modules.

target: 每个拓展会增加 10 tick 捡起掉落物品的延迟时间。
source: It can be stacked; each augment added will increase the pickup delay on dropped/flung items by 10 ticks (0.5 sec). This can be useful if you don't want players accidentally picking up nearby dropped items, for example.

target: 这种拓展可以添加到任何具有范围的模块（发送 Mk1 / Mk2，抽取 Mk1 / Mk2，造桥 Mk1 / Mk2，虚空）。
source: This augment can be added to any module which has a range (Sender Mk1/Mk2, Puller Mk1/Mk2, Extruder Mk1/Mk2, Vacuum).

target: 每个拓展会将模块的作用范围减少 1 方块，最小减小至1。。
source: It can be stacked; each augment will reduce the range of the module by one block. This is probably only useful in conjunction with the Vacuum Module, to control the range it scans for items.

target: 这种拓展可以添加到任何具有范围的模块（发送 Mk1 / Mk2，抽取 Mk1 / Mk2，造桥 Mk1 / Mk2，虚空）。
source: This augment can be added to any module which has a range (Sender Mk1/Mk2, Puller Mk1/Mk2, Extruder Mk1/Mk2, Vacuum).

target: 每个拓展会将模块的作用范围增加 1 方块（直到达到模块提示信息中描述的最大值）。
source: It can be stacked; each augment will increase the range of the module by one block.

target: 允许模块指定自身的红石特性，这会无视路由器的红石特性。红石信号控制选项有：“始终工作”“无红石信号工作”“收到红石信号工作”“从不工作”“红石脉冲”五个模式。
source: This augment can be added to any module. Normally, modules are run when the router runs, no questions asked. However, if this augment is added to a module, that module can define its own redstone behaviour; an extra button is added to the module's GUI to control this.

target: 添加多个 红石拓展 是没有用的。
source: It is not useful to add more than one Redstone Augment.

target: 允许预先设置在容器中保留多少物品。低于设置数量就不会进行操作。
source: The Regulator Augment allows for precise control over how many items may be sent to or pulled from an inventory, or the router's buffer.

target: 添加多个调节拓展是没有用的。
source: When a module has the Regulator Augment activated, you will see an extra numeric textfield in its GUI where you can configure a limit. The module's tooltip text will also show the limit. This limit is interpreted differently depending on the particular module:

target: 允许模块在每 tick 中处理多个物品。这会无视路由器中的堆叠升级。
source: This module can be added to any module which handles items (as opposed to &oblocks&r or &ofluids&r).

target: 每增加一个升级，每次操作数量 = 堆叠拓展数量^2。增加至64时继续放置不会增加数值了。
source: Adding Stack Augments to a module increases the number of items it can process per tick; each Stack Augment doubles the number of items, up to a maximum of the item's natural stack size (64 for most items).

target: 请勿增加至7个及以上数量使用，1.12.2版本增加至31个会变为-2147483648。
source: If the router also has Stack Upgrades installed, the module's Stack Augments will override that; e.g. if a router has 6 Stack Upgrades, and a module has 2 Stack Augments, the module will process 4 items per tick, not 64.

target: 允许虚空模块收集经验球而不是物品。经验球可以被转化为各种物品或流体。
source: This augment can only added to a Vacuum Module.

target: 可用的选项受其他mod和经验流体影响，但是原版的附魔之瓶总是可用的。
source: When this augment is added, the Vacuum Module will absorb experience orbs instead of items. The orbs will be converted into Bottles o' Enchanting at the rate of 7XP per bottle (which is the average amount of XP gained by breaking a Bottle o' Enchanting).

target: 如果要将经验转化为流体，那么你必须在路由器的缓冲区中放置一个可以以mB为单位储存流体的物品，或者在路由器旁边放置一个流体容器（并在模块GUI中打开输出模式）。
source: If XP Juice is available (as added by EnderIO), and the router holds a fluid-containing item, orbs will instead be converted to XP Juice at the rate of 20mB per 1XP and stored in the fluid container.

target: 让路由器抵御来自爆炸或者boss级生物的破坏。(安装一个即可)
source: This upgrade makes the router fully immune to explosion damage, and also to being destroyed by boss mobs.

target: 使路由器看起来像另一个方块。
source: This upgrade allows you to disguise the router as another block. Sneak+Right-click the module against a block to record that block on the camouflage upgrade. When inserted into a router, that router will take on the appearance of the recorded block.

target: &l●&r  并非所有方块都可以使用.。手持该升级，潜行+右键单击任意方块记录该方块外观。将其装入物品路由器自动生效。
source: &l●&r  Not all blocks can be used. In general, any block with a simple model (doesn't have to be a full cube) will work, but some more complex block models will either refuse to copy or render as a empty cube.

target: 增加物品路由器可以传输（在每个方向）上的10 mB/tick单位的流体量。(默认传输量为50 mB/tick)，上限400 mB/tick。（物品路由器需要安装有流体模块才可以传输流体。）
source: This upgrade only affects the Fluid Module. It increases the overall fluid transfer rate of the Item Router (in each direction; to the router and from the router) from the base rate of 50mB/tick by 10mB/tick, up to a maximum of 400mB/tick (all configurable). Therefore the maximum useful number of Fluid Transfer Upgrades in a router is 35.

target: 保护路由器; 只有列出的玩家可以访问路由器。
source: This upgrade, when inserted, will restrict the players who can open the router's GUI. By default, it only permits the player who crafted the upgrade.

target: &l●&r  右键单击玩家：记录到模块。
source: &l●&r  You can add extra players to a Security Upgrade by right-clicking the player with the upgrade in your main hand.

target: &l●&r  潜行+右键单击玩家：删除他们的配置。
source: &l●&r  You can remove players from a Security Upgrade by shift-right-clicking the player.

target: &l●&r  潜行+右键对空单击：记录自己。
source: &l●&r  There is a maximum of 6 additional players per Security Upgrade (so 7 in total, including the creator), but you can install more than one Security Upgrade in a router if necessary.

target: &l●&r  需要将其装入物品路由器的升级放置区使用。
source: &l●&r  The Security Upgrade does not prevent a router being broken by a player; but since upgrades and modules remain in a broken router, players can't break a router to steal modules/upgrades or reconfigure the router (when the router is placed back down, the Security Upgrade remains installed). If you want to prevent a router being broken, you may wish to explore other mods' block protection capabilities.

target: 提高路由器工作间隔的速度(默认每秒工作一次)。
source: By default, a router ticks every 20 server ticks, or once per second. On each tick, every installed module is executed in order, left to right.

target: 每安装一个速度升级，物品路由器操作间隔减少0.1秒(-2 Ticks)。升级最多可以放置:9个
source: If you need a router to run faster than this, you can add Speed Upgrades; each Speed Upgrade reduces the tick interval by 2 server ticks, down to a minimum of every 2 server ticks (or 10 times per second).

target: 鼠标指向至安装该速度升级的方格时并且按住Ctrl键，会显示当前物品路由器操作间隔。
source: &l●&r  &bFor performance reasons, Stack Upgrades should be preferred over Speed Upgrades where possible; use Speed Upgrades judiciously and only where absolutely required for maximum item transfer rate.&r &6Be Kind To Your Server (tm)&r.

target: 增加路由器每个tick处理的物品数。
source: Modules in a router operate on a single item at a time: e.g. a Sender module will send a single item from the router's buffer, regardless of how many items are in the buffer.

target: 增加每个tick可以处理的物品数目:1个。升级最多可以放置:6个。
source: By adding Stack Upgrades to a router, this can be increased. Each Stack Upgrade doubles the number of items that can be processed by each module, up to a maximum of 64, or the item's native stack size. It therefore follows that 6 is the maximum number of useful Stack Upgrades which can be installed in one router.

target: 同步激活路由器。所有具有相同调整值的同步升级（和相同数量的速度升级）的路由器将以相同的频率运行。
source: This upgrade is used to guarantee that two or more routers run at the same time. The Sync Upgrade has a tuning value of 0 .. 19 (i.e. 1 less than the base router tick rate of 20). This tuning value can be set by right-clicking the Sync Upgrade to open its GUI, or quickly set to a random value by sneak-right-clicking the upgrade.

target: 手持该物品右键单击：打开调整GUI。可以直接填写数据，也可以使用鼠标滚轮或上下键调整；范围是0~19。
source: Any routers with this upgrade installed, with same the tuning value, and with the same number of Speed Upgrades installed, will &oalways&r run on the same tick. Note that the actual tuning value doesn't matter; it only matters that the value is consistent across the routers you want to synchronise.

target: 手持该物品潜行+右键单击：调整为随机值。
source: This is particularly useful if you have a group of routers with Extruder Modules installed, and want to ensure all modules extend/retract at the same time for a pleasing visual appearance.

target: 功能：在模块配置的方向上，破坏前方一格的方块并存入物品路由器缓冲区中。
source: This module tries to break a block, adjacent to the router in the module's configured direction. Most blocks are breakable, although anything with an unbreakable hardness (e.g. vanilla Bedrock or End Portal) can not be broken, nor can any fluid blocks. If the block is broken, its primary drop(s) will be pulled into the item router's buffer.

target: &l●&r  仅支持调节拓展、红石拓展。
source: &l●&r  If there's already something else in the buffer, or the buffer is full, the block will not be broken.

target: &l●&r  若破坏的方块与物品缓冲区存放的方块不同，则不会存入缓冲区，而是保持为掉落物。
source: &l●&r  If breaking the block yields more than one type of drop (e.g. mature wheat drops both wheat and seeds), only the first drop will be pulled into the buffer and other items will be left as items on the ground. In this case, you might also want a Vacuum Module to pull in the extra drops. If there are multiple drops of the same type (e.g. redstone ore dropping several redstone dust), all stackable drops will be pulled into the buffer where possible.

target: &l●&r  手持该模块并右键可以打开配置GUI。或在物品路由器中对其按下C键或鼠标中键打开配置GUI。
source: &l●&r  The Breaker Module may be crafted with either a Fortune or Silk Touch enchanted book to gain those enchantments' abilities.

target: 功能：如果物品路由器缓冲区中的物品与模块的过滤名单中配置的物品一致，则在模块配置的方向上从路由器发出红石信号。
source: This module doesn't actually manipulate items, but instead detects specific items in the router's buffer. If the buffer contents are matched by the module's filter, it will make the router emit a redstone signal in the configured direction, or all directions if the configured direction is None. The signal level (default: 15) and signal type (default: weak) can be adjust via the module GUI.

target: 功能：在模块配置的方向上，将物品路由器缓冲区中的物品投掷到世界上。
source: This module tries to drop an item from the router's buffer as an item entity in the world. The drop will be adjacent to the router in the module's configured direction. The item entity will be placed with a zero velocity, unlike the vanilla Dropper which adds an irritating random velocity to the item.

target: &l●&r  只能投掷到前方1格，仅支持红石拓展、调节拓展、堆叠拓展、延迟拾取拓展。若投掷出得物品没有被其他机器或玩家拾取，则会自动拾取并再次掷出。
source: &l●&r  This is one of the few ways I'm aware of in modded Minecraft to drop a stack of items at a time (think bulk in-world crafting for AE2 crystal seeds...) Most dropper devices drop only a single item at a time, but the Item Router can drop up to a stack of items at a time if you use Stack Upgrades.

target: 功能：根据红石信号控制，将物品路由器缓冲区中的物品在模块设定的方向上呈直线放置或收回。
source: This module extends and withdraws a row of blocks (from the router's buffer) in the module's configured direction. By default, the module extends blocks when the router has a redstone signal, and withdraws them when the router has no signal, but a Redstone Enhancement can be added to the module to customise this behaviour.

target: &l●&r  默认为信号开放置，信号关收回。物品路由器的红石控制需要处于“始终工作”模式。
source: &l●&r  See also the Camouflage Upgrade, which may be useful to hide the router.

target: &l●&r  放置时，放置路线上遇到任何方块都会停止工作。
source: &l●&r  The default range (i.e. number of blocks which can be placed) is 12, but this can be increased up to 24 with Range Upgrades.

target: &l●&r  收回时，如果有方块替换了模块放置的方块，则会尝试使其变为掉落物；失败的场合，模块会暂时停止工作。
source: &l●&r  If you change the module's direction while it has blocks extended, you may get the router a little confused. In this case, breaking and replacing the router will help.

target: &l●&r  默认范围：12，可升级至最大范围：24。
source: &l●&r  If you break the router while blocks are extended, it won't remember that, and you'll need to manually remove those blocks.

target: &l●&r  添加红石拓展到模块可以进行自定义设置
source: &l●&r  If you have multiple routers together with Extruder Modules installed (e.g. for a wide door or bridge), you may find the Sync Upgrade useful to ensure they all run on the same tick.

target: &l●&r  支持范围升级拓展、范围降级拓展、红石拓展、调节拓展、推动拓展。
source: &l●&r  The Extruder (like the Placer) can also plant crop seeds on farmland, and cocoa beans on an adjacent jungle log.

target: 该模块的行为与造桥模块Mk1非常相似，但有一些重要的区别：
source: This module behaves rather like the Extruder Module Mk1, but with some important differences:

target: &l●&r 需要在模块配置GUI中的模板栏标记放置的方块类型。该模块放置的方块实际是模板框架方块。
source: &l●&r  The Mk2 module doesn't place items from the router's buffer, but rather from a template defined within the module itself.

target: &l●&r  此模板显示在模块 GUI 的右侧，有 9 个插槽，每个插槽可以有多个项目。放置在模板中的项是\"幽灵\"项。
source: &l●&r  This template appears on the right-hand side of the module's GUI, has 9 slots, and can have multiple items per slot. Items placed in the template are \"ghost\" items.

target: &l●&r  收回时，如果有方块替换了模块放置的方块，则会跳过该位置。
source: &l●&r  Blocks extruded are \"virtual\" - effectively created out of nowhere, but drop nothing when broken and can't be crafted normally.

target: &l●&r  默认范围：24，可升级至最大范围：48。
source: &l●&r  Therefore, this module isn't suitable for farming like the Extruder Mk1, but can be used to place doors/bridges etc. with more complex patterns than the Mk1 could.

target: 功能：将物品路由器缓冲区的物品投掷到世界上。
source: This module behaves like the dropper module, except that it also imparts a configurable velocity to the dropped item, potentially throwing the item a considerable distance. You can adjust the item's speed, pitch and yaw via the module's GUI.

target: &l●&r  独有配置功能：配置投掷距离、上下偏转、左右偏转。可以直接输入数值调整，或者使用鼠标滚轮等方式。
source: &l●&r  Pitch and Yaw are in degrees, relative to a base pitch or yaw.

target: &l●&r  投掷距离：其他两项为0，数值=5时，投掷物距离物品路由器32格。调整范围：0 ~ 20.0。
source: &l●&r  If the module ejects Up or Down, the base pitch is +90° or -90°, respectively. Otherwise, the base pitch is 0°.

target: &l●&r  上下偏转：调整范围为-90° ~ 90°。
source: &l●&r  If the module ejects Up or Down, the base yaw is the router's facing direction. Otherwise the base yaw is taken from the module's direction.

target: &l●&r  左右偏转：调整范围为-60° ~ 60°。
source: &l●&r  Example: a speed of 1.0, pitch/yaw of 0°, and a horizontal module direction, will throw an item along the ground for a distance of about 7 blocks.

target: 功能：在模块配置的方向上，将邻近流体容器中的流体抽入物品路由器缓冲区中的流体容器中。
source: While Item Routers can't handle fluids directly (they don't have an internal tank), they can manipulate fluids if there is a (single) fluid container item in the buffer. This includes buckets and any fluid containers added by other mods.

target: 配置GUI独有功能，从上到下分别是：
source: The Fluid Module's GUI allows the transfer direction to be set:

target: &l●&r  流量控制：1000表示每秒传输1000mB流体到路由器的流体容器中，实际传输速率受到路由器的传输上限限制。无升级的情况下上限是50 mB/tick，可升级至400 mB/tick。
source: &l●&r  Transfer To Router means the router will try to pull fluids from an adjacent block (either a fluid in the world or a fluid-holding block) into a fluid-holding item in the buffer.

target: &l●&r  传输方向：在“从路由器提取”“传输到路由器”两个模式中切换。
source: &l●&r  Transfer From Router means the router will try to push fluids from a fluid-holding item in the buffer to the world; either pouring fluid out, or putting fluid into an adjacent tank.

target: &l●&r  强制清空：传输方向处于“从来路由器提取”模式时显示。启用的场合，如果配置方向的流体容器已满，仍会继续导出流体，无法装入接收容器的场合，流体会被销毁。
source: The GUI also allows the maximum transfer rate to be set. Note this is the maximum that will be attempted, and is still limited by the router's overall transfer rate, which is 1 bucket per second, and the transfer rate of the external fluid or fluid container.

target: &l●&r  需要在路由器缓冲区放置一个流体容器，比如：桶。
source: The Fluid Module's filter slots will only accept fluid-containing items, and will filter by the contained fluid, not by the container item.

target: &l●&r  支持红石拓展、调节拓展。
source: &l●&r  Adding Speed Upgrades will not transfer fluids any faster, only more often. A router with 9 speed upgrades will still only transfer 1 bucket per second, just more often and in smaller quantities. To increase the overall transfer rate, add Fluid Transfer Upgrades.

target: 功能：将物品路由器缓冲区的方块放置在设定方向正前方一格处。
source: This module tries to place an item from the router's buffer as a block, adjacent to the router in the module's configured direction.

target: &l●&r  需要先在方向控制配置方向才可以工作。
source: &l●&r  If the item isn't a block or the destination block is obstructed, nothing will be done.

target: &l●&r  方向为“无”时不会工作。
source: &l●&r  Normal Minecraft placement rules are followed; e.g. sugar cane can only be placed next to water on sand/dirt.

target: &l●&r  流体将被替换，可替换方块（如高草）将被替换。
source: &l●&r  Fluid blocks will be replaced, as will replaceable blocks such as tall grass.

target: &l●&r  仅支持调节拓展和红石拓展。
source: &l●&r  The Placer module can plant seeds on farmland, and cocoa beans on an adjacent jungle log.

target: 功能：在玩家的个人存储列表和物品路由器的缓冲区之间远程传输物品。
source: This module tries to transfer items between the router and a player's own inventory. The player can be anywhere in any dimension, making this a rather powerful module.

target: &l●&r  该模块可以将物品从玩家或向玩家转移;您可以在模块的 GUI 中设置此设置。
source: &l●&r  The module can transfer items either from or to the player; you can set this in the module's GUI.

target: &l●&r  支持红石拓展、调节拓展、堆叠拓展。
source: &l●&r  The module can operate on either the player's main 36-slot inventory, their 4-slot armor inventory, their offhand slot, or their Ender inventory (as shown by vanilla Ender Chests). This can also be set in the module's GUI.

target: &l●&r  合成它的玩家会被记录为所有者。可以通过无序合成清空数据的方式变更所有者。
source: &l●&r  Extracted/inserted items can, of course, be filtered by the module.

target: 这个模块的一个很好的用例是从玩家的物品栏中提取矿石/原石/泥土等，并将其发送到玩家基地的主存储系统。通过一点设计，应该可以构建一个系统来自动交换你的盔甲套装（甚至可能在现场，使用来自另一个mod的一些无线红石......
source: A good use-case for this module would be to extract ores/cobblestone/dirt etc. from the player's inventory, and send it on to the player's main storage system in their base. With a little design, it should be possible to build a system to auto-swap your armor sets (maybe even in the field, with some wireless redstone from another mod...)

target: 功能：在模块配置的方向上，抽取前方一格的容器中的物品并存入物品路由器缓冲区。要对流体容器进行操作的场合，功能由流体模块提供，该模块仅操作物品。
source: This module tries to pull the first eligible item from the adjacent inventory in its configured direction into the router's buffer. If the buffer is full or contains something that stacks with nothing in the inventory, nothing will be pulled.

target: 这类似于抽取模块 Mk1，但可以从非相邻存储中提取物品：
source: This behaves like the Puller Mk1, but can pull items from non-adjacent inventories:

target: &l●&r  默认范围：12，可升级至最大范围：24。不会受方块阻挡影响。
source: &l●&r  The inventory can be up to 12 blocks away (up to 24 with Range Upgrades).

target: &l●&r  需要先手持抽取模块 Mk2对容器按下潜行+右键来绑定容器。对非容器方块按下潜行+右键清除绑定。
source: &l●&r  Clear line of sight is not required.

target: &l●&r  进行抽取时，会出现闪烁的紫色光带指向绑定容器。
source: &l●&r  To select the target inventory, Sneak-Right-click the target with the Puller Mk2 module in hand. You will get a confirmation message.

target: &l●&r  不支持延迟拾取拓展、快速拾取拓展、经验吸收拓展、模仿拓展、推动拓展。
source: &l●&r  If you need to check where a Puller Mk2 is configured to, Left-click with the module in hand, and a particle effect will stream toward the target inventory (the co-ordinates of the target are also shown in the module item's tooltip).

target: 这个更强大的发送模块尝试将物品从路由器的缓冲区发送到附近的存储：
source: This more powerful sender module tries to send an item from the router's buffer to a nearby inventory:

target: &l●&r  默认范围：24，可升级至最大范围：48。不会受方块阻挡影响。
source: &l●&r  The target inventory can be up to 24 blocks away (up to 48 with Range Upgrades )

target: &l●&r  需要先手持发送模块 Mk2对容器按下潜行+右键来绑定容器。对非容器方块按下潜行+右键清除绑定。
source: &l●&r  Clear line of sight is &onot&r required

target: &l●&r  进行发送时，会出现闪烁的黄色光带指向接收容器。
source: &l●&r  To select the target inventory, Sneak-Right-click the target with the Sender Mk2 module in hand. You will get a confirmation message.

target: &l●&r  不支持延迟拾取拓展、快速拾取拓展、经验吸收拓展、模仿拓展、推动拓展。
source: &l●&r  If you need to check where a Sender Mk2 is configured to, Left-click with the module in hand, and a particle effect will stream toward the target inventory (the co-ordinates of the target are also shown in the module item's tooltip).

target: 功能：在模块配置的方向上，将物品路由器缓冲区中的物品发送到该朝向距离路由器最近的容器中。
source: This module tries to send an item from the router's buffer to an inventory in the module's configured direction:

target: &l●&r  不能有方块阻隔；不透明的方块将阻止发送。
source: &l●&r  The target inventory can be up to 8 blocks away (up to 16 with Range Upgrades )

target: &l●&r  目标物品必须直接沿 X、Y 或 Z 轴。
source: &l●&r  The target inventory must be directly along the X, Y, or Z axis.

target: &l●&r  不支持延迟拾取拓展、快速拾取拓展、经验吸收拓展、模仿拓展、推动拓展
source: &l●&r  The router must have clear line of sight to the target inventory; no opaque blocks, but blocks such as glass, fences, iron bars etc. are OK.

target: 功能与发送模块 Mk2相同，但是没有距离限制，并且可以传送物品至其他维度。仅支持堆叠拓展、调节拓展、红石拓展。
source: This top-end sender module operates very much like the Mk2 Sender, but can send to any inventory (in any dimension) with no restrictions! Note: the target inventory must be chunk-loaded; Modular Routers will not do this for you.

target: 功能：将世界中掉落的物品吸收到路由器的缓冲区中。
source: This module scans for dropped items in a 13x13x13 cubic area around the router (i.e. up to 6 blocks in each direction), and absorbs them into the router's buffer, if possible.

target: &l●&r  仅在配置的方向上收集掉落物，如果方向为“无”，则收集任何方向。默认范围为6，可以安装范围升级拓展来增加范围。最大增加至12。
source: &l●&r  The range can be increased up to 25x25x25 (12 blocks in each direction) with Range Upgrades. Each Range Upgrade increases the distance by 1 block, so up to 6 Range Upgrades can be usefully installed.

target: &l●&r  不支持延迟拾取拓展、模仿拓展、推动拓展。
source: &l●&r  The scanned area is centered on the router if the module's direction is &lNone&r. If the module has an actual direction configured, the area is offset in that direction by 6 blocks (plus one for each Range Upgrade installed). E.g. with a direction of UP, the module will only scan an area directly above the router.

target: 功能：永久销毁物品路由器缓冲区的物品。支持红石拓展、调节拓展、堆叠拓展。
source: This dangerous module permanently destroys items in the router's buffer! It is strongly recommended to configure this module with a Whitelist to prevent accidental deletion of valuable items...

target: 抑制来自路由器/模块的声音和粒子效果：
source: This upgrade can be used to suppress sounds and particle effects made by item routers, and can be useful if a noisy module is regularly running in a place where a player often is.

target: &l●&r  1个升级会抑制声音效果。
source: &l●&r  One or more Muffler Upgrades in a router will disable all audible effects

target: &l●&r  2个或更多个会抑制更多粒子效果。
source: &l●&r  Two or more will also disable all particle effects

target: &l●&r  3个或更多个则会抑制路由器的运行动画。
source: &l●&r  Three or more will also disable the router's active animation; the rotating texture on the front face of the router block

target: &l●&r  请注意，所有声音和粒子效果也可以在mod配置中禁用;仅当声音/效果尚未禁用时，此升级才有用。
source: &l●&r  Note that all sounds and particle effects can also be disabled in the mod config; this upgrade is only useful if sounds/effects have not been disabled.

target: &b&l&o模组流程树
source: &b&l&oProgression Tree
