source: &2&l&oThe Progression Tree

target: 这是这个整合包的流程树哦
source: Here is the progression tree for this modpack

target: 所有你需要知道的都在这张图里
source: All you need to know is in this picture.

target: &b&l&o奇怪但是有用的一些小玩意
source: &b&l&oRandom But Useful Stuff

target: 这就是假装玩家点击的机器
source: Click Machine is a standalone auto-clicker.

target: 范围泵用于抽取一定范围内的某一特定的流体
source: Ranged Pumps just pumps liquids in a range.

target: 扫描器是一个智能探测的一个小工具。同时,华而不实。扫描结果以一种清晰易读的方式在短时间内显示出来，要么突出显示，要么是适当位置的叠加。我提到华而不实了吗?显示的结果取决于扫描器中装载的模块。最多可同时安装3个模块。
source: Scanner is a small addition to the smart explorer's tool.

target: 默认的模块包括:
source: What results are shown depends on the modules in the scanner. Up to three modules may be installed at the same time.

target: - 怪物探测(如僵尸、爬行者)
source: Default modules include:

target: - 实体探测(可对特定实体进行探测)
source: - Animal detection

target: - 常见矿石探测(如煤、铁)
source: - Monster detection

target: - 稀有矿石探测(如金、钻石)
source: - Entity detection

target: - 流体探测(如水、熔岩)
source: - Common ore detection

target: - 方块探测(可对特定方块进行探测)
source: - Rare ore detection

target: - 范围探测
source: - Fluid detection

target: 光源只会在手持魔杖或 Psi CAD 时显形。
source: Lighting Wand can place invisible light source.

target: 使用照明魔杖点击方块可在其表面放置隐形光源，未点击方块则会发射光束，光束在碰撞到实体或方块后便会在碰撞位置创建光源。手持照明魔杖时左击可以破坏隐形光源。
source: Only if you have the wand in hand can you see the block bound.

target: 微光苋
source: Faint Amaranth

target: 微光苋自然生成于Extreme Hills生物群系的草方块上，挖掘后掉落荧石粉，受时运加成。使用剪刀会掉落自身。
source: The Faint Amaranth is a flower added by Astral Sorcery. It can be found at higher altitudes, particularly in Extreme Hills biomes. Breaking it drops Glowstone Dust.

target: 小石子
source: Small Stones

target: 棍棒或石头也许会损伤你的骨头，但是破坏它们能让你获得资源！
source: Sticks and Stones may break your bones, but breaking these give resources.

target: 隐形披风
source: Invisible Cloaks

target: 暮光斗篷只能让你在黑暗中隐身。
source: The Twilight Cloak makes you invisible only in darkness.

target: 而这个隐身斗篷能让你完全隐身。
source: The Invisibility Cloak makes you completely invinsible

target: 这个方块是建筑党最好的朋友之一。当处在空中或者海平面时，通常无法直接放置方块。而天使方块可以凭空放置在空中或者液体表面。
source: This block makes it easier to build in midair as it can be placed anywhere without requiring a backing block.

target: 左击一下可直接破坏该方块，被破坏时该方块不会掉落而是直接进入破坏者的背包中。
source: The block can be broken instantly without any tools and will attempt to go into the player's inventory.

target: 指南针
source: The Compasses

target: 自然指南针一个很有用的辅助工具。拿在手中时右击可以打开GUI，从中你可以搜索，选中并查看一个生物群系的信息。
source: Nature's Compass is a utility item that allows you to search for a biome's location anywhere in the world and view information about it.

target: 探险家指南针是一个允许玩家定位在世界上任何结构的物品
source: Explorer's Compass is an item that allows you to locate structures anywhere in the world.

target: 右键单击指南针以打开一个GUI，通过该GUI您可以选择要搜索的结构/群系或者查看它的详细信息。
source: Right-clicking with Compass in hand will open the selection GUI, from which you can search for a biome/structure or view information about it.

target: shift -右击重置罗盘状态;
source: Shift-right-clicking will reset the compass's state.

target: 骨粉功能拓展
source: Extended Bone Meal

target: Extended Bone Meal 是一个扩展骨粉功能的简易模组。利用骨粉种植地狱疣、仙人掌、藤蔓、甘蔗。按住“shift”按钮即可快速种植作物。
source: Extended Bone Meal is a minimalistic mod which extends bone meal behaviour.

target: 物品收集器
source: Item Collectors

target: 物品收集器增加了收集指定范围内物品收集器，物品收集的范围可以更改，可以自定义物品白名单或黑名单。
source: Item Collectors adds Collectors which collect items in a specified range! Item Collectors range can be changed and items can be whitelisted or blacklisted!

target: &l基本物品收集器
source: &lBasic Item Collector

target: - 基本物品收集器最多可收集 5 格范围内的物品。
source: - The Basic Item Collector has a range of up to 5 blocks!

target: - 右键单击​​基本物品收集器以打开其 GUI。
source: - Right-click a Basic Item Collector to open its GUI.

target: &l高级物品收集器
source: &lAdvanced Item Collector

target: - 高级物品收集器的范围可达 7 个方块。
source: - The Advanced Item Collector has a range of up to 7 blocks!

target: - 右键单击​​高级物品收集器以打开其 GUI。
source: - Right-click an Advanced Item Collector to open its GUI.

target: - 高级物品收集器可以过滤物品。
source: - The Advanced Item Collector can filter items

target: 变形工具能模仿任何mod的扳手、螺丝刀、锤子或是魔杖生成的枝条、花瓣。
source: The Morphing Tool can mimic any wrench, screwdriver, hammer or wand made of twigs and petals you throw at it, making it the perfect \"omni-wrench\" style item.

target: 例如，你可以将变形工具与IC2青铜扳手无序合成。
source: - To add a wrench style item to it, craft the Morph-o-Tool alongside the item.

target: 当你看着IC2的机器时，变形工具就会变成IC2青铜扳手。
source: -Whenever you look at a block from the mod that adds that item, the Morphing Tool will turn into the item you added.

target: Notes是一款为游戏引入了用途广泛的备忘录功能的客户端模组。
source: Notes provides a fully functional in-game notepad.

target: - 默认按下N键打开备忘录GUI；
source: - Open the Notes GUI by pressing by default N

target: - 轻松阅览当前世界或服务器下的所有笔记条目与内容；
source: - View all notes relevant to your current world or server

target: - 通过简单易用的游戏内界面创建与编辑笔记；
source: - Create and edit notes through a simple in-game GUI

target: - 分世界、分服务器，或在全局下存储笔记内容；
source: - Save notes per-world, per-server, or globally

target: - 在HUD中置顶所标记的重要笔记条目。
source: - Pin important notes to the HUD

target: 个人缩放装置可以使玩家改变自身的大小。
source: Shrink allows players to change their player's size.

target: 缩小玩家的体型可以使他们能够探索那些不破坏方块通常不能探索的地方
source: Shrinking to a smaller size allows the player to access places that they could normally not access without breaking blocks.

target: Shift右键这个装置会让你的体型变为半个方块大
source: By Shift-right clicking this item will cause your player to shrink down to about the size of a quarter of a block.

target: 这个训练人偶可以放置在任何地方，它会静静的站在哪儿， 观察你的每一个动作， 当你向他发动攻击时，它会滑稽的扭动身子并向你大喊出伤害的数值。 你可以打扮它让它看起来更棒！ 这会使人偶更加抗打, 使收到伤害的数值变小.
source: The dummy can be placed in the world, where it'll stand silently, judging your every action. It'll wiggle funny if you hit it, screaming large numbers of damage at you. It can be dressed up to look even more awesome. This will please the dummy, making the numbers smaller.

target: 你可以给这个小家伙装备上任何盔甲。 这只需要拿着你需要装备的盔甲右键他。如果需要将这个装备扒下来，只需要空手对你所要扒下的装备右键即可。
source: You can start dressing the little dude with all kind of armors and equipment. Just right click him with the desired item. To unequip a certain armor piece just click on his corresponding body part.

target: 如果你需要重新将它拿起，只需要空着手对它左键
source: You can remove the dummy just by shift left clicking him with an empty hand!

target: 一些小玩意
source: The Gadgets

target: 建筑小帮手允许你在一定范围内快速建筑。
source: The Building Gadget allows you to build structures using a set of different Building Modes.

target: 更替小帮手可以在在一定范围内更替同种方块
source: The Exchanging Gadget provides basic exchanging abilities using a set of different Exchanging Modes.

target: 允许您选择较大的半径以复制并粘贴到其他位置
source: The Copy Paste Gadget allows you to select a large radius to copy and paste in a different location.

target: 破坏小帮手可以让你一键破坏一定范围内的方块。
source: The Destruction Gadget allows you to void a large area.

target: 英雄之章可以用来储存经验。SHIFT+右键切换状态，当处于附魔状态时，将会从玩家身上吸取经验。当处于普通模式时右键方块放出经验，右键空气放出勋章中的最上面一层经验。
source: Hero's Medallion stores experience. When turned on it drains it from player. When turned off player can take one level out of it per right click.

target: 结构方块
source: Framed Blocks

target: 结构方块添加了许多种能替换纹理的框架方块，可以面朝任意方向。
source: FramedBlocks adds blocks of various shapes that can be made to look like almost any other block in the game.

target: 1.手持完整方块（脚手架、栅栏等不算）右击框架方块可以替换纹理；
source: Usage:

target: 2.用荧石粉右击框架方块能使其发光
source: Right click the block with almost any solid block to make it look alike.

target: 3.用锤子右击框架方块能移除其纹理，同时掉落物品；
source: Right click the block with Glowstone Dust to make it produce light.

target: 3.用扳手右击框架方块能够切换框架形态；
source: Right click the block with a Framed Hammer to remove the camo.

target: 4.蓝图能复制框架方块的纹理和发光状态；
source: Framed Prism, Inner Prism and Double Prism Corners automatically activate a texture offset depending on their position when placed. This fixes the issue of prism corners not fitting together properly when building a larger surface out of these blocks. If this behaviour is not desired, you can toggle the offset state by left clicking the block with the Framed Hammer.

target: 5.大多数方块可用幻翼膜右击隐藏，以允许你穿过它
source: The Framed Wrench can be used to cycle through different states of the camo block.

target: &l潜行右击框架箱子时，能切换箱子上的锁，有以下三种状态：
source: The Framed Blueprint allows copying Framed Blocks including their camo and glowing state. The rotation of the Framed Block itself is not copied.

target: 1.默认箱子锁（默认状态）；
source: The Framed Collapsible Block can be modified to create arbitrary slopes by changing the height of the four corners of a single block face with the Framed Hammer. Left click the corner on the face you want to change to move the face inward and left click the corner while sneaking to move the face outward.

target: Tesseract模组提供了一个可以&b&l跨越维度&r、&b&l无限距离&r运输物品，&b&l流体&r和&b&l能量&r的“超立方体”方块。它可以使用多种运输通道。
source: Tesseract allows you to transport &b&lItems&r, &b&lFluid&r and &b&lEnergy&r. Tesseracts work at &b&lany distance&r and even &b&lacross dimensions&r! Use multiple channels to have &b&ldifferent groups&r of Tesseracts!

target: &l添加通道:
source: &lAdding a channel:

target: 1. 右击超立方体以打开它的GUI。
source: 1. Right-Click a Tesseract to open its gui

target: 2. 单击 GUI 顶部的 desired category 按钮。
source: 2. Click on the desired category tab at the top of the gui

target: 3. 在按钮处选择文本字段并输入通道名称。
source: 3. Click the 'Create' button to open a new gui

target: 4. 你可以锁定它，锁定表示私有。
source: 4. Select the text field and enter the channel name

target: 5. 你也可以解锁它，解锁表示公共。
source: 5. Set the lock button to the desired state, locked means private, unlocked means public

target: 6. 单击 ADD 按钮。
source: 6. Click the 'Create' button to confirm

target: &l删除通道:
source: &lRemoving a channel:

target: 1. 右击超立方体 ，打开它的GUI。
source: 1. Right-Click a Tesseract to open its gui

target: 2. 单击 GUI 顶部通道对应的 desired category 选项。
source: 2. Click on the category tab corresponding to the channel at the top of the gui

target: 3. 点击列表中的通道。
source: 3. Click on the channel in the list

target: 4. 单击 REMOVE 按钮。
source: 4. Click the REMOVE button

target: &l在超立方体上设计通道:
source: &lSetting the channel on a Tesseract:

target: 1. 右键超立方体以打开它的GUI
source: 1. Right-Click a Tesseract to open its gui

target: 2. 单击GUI顶部的“desired category”按钮
source: 2. Click on the desired category tab at the top of the gui

target: 3. 单击列表中所需的通道
source: 3. Click on the desired channel in the list

target: 4. 单击 SET 按钮
source: 4. Click the SET button

target: 这个Mod把旅行锚从EnderlO变成一个独立的Mod。它可以使你在两个方块之间传送。
source: The &b&lTravel Anchor&r is a Block that allows for teleportation over greater distances when you stand on it, even throughobstacles as long as the anchor can be selected.

target: 你可以用你手边的任何块右键点击Travelanchor来改变它的外观和模型。
source: You can rightclick the Travel Anchor with any block in you offhand to change it's appearance and model.

target: 瞄准旅行锚，传送到它上面。
source: The &b&lTravel Staff&r allows the Player to teleport by using \"Shift+Rightclick\" and aiming at the desired location.

target: 纠缠模组为您提供了可以实现用一个方块来操作另一个方块的六个面所需的材料，允许您与任何一个交互，就好像他们是相同的块!这将允许你转移物品，能量，液体或任何你想要的瞬间，你可以有超过六面工作或你可以只是隐藏你的凌乱的电缆，可能性是无限的!
source: Entangled gives you the materials needed to bind two blocks together, allowing you to interact with either one as if they were the same block! This will allow you to transfer items, energy, fluids or whatever you want instantly, you can have more than six sides to work with or you could just hide your messy cables, the possibilities are endless!

target: 这个模组拥有大量的装饰。 涵盖东亚文明、西方文明、玛雅文明等古代文明的建筑结构和装饰。
source: Large amount of decorative blocks. Covering architectural components and decorations of ancient civilizations such as East Asian civilizations, Western civilizations, and Mayan civilizations.

target: 也有常见的装饰和科幻朋克装饰。
source: There are also common decorations as well as sci-fi punk decorations.

target: 经验方尖碑允许你随时储存或取出经验,当然它也可以吸收环境中你所遗漏的经验 。这个模组是从末影接口中分离出来的，它独立与末影接口互不联动
source: The Experience Obelisk  allows you to conveniently store and retrieve XP, as well as passively collect experience orbs from the environment. This is a standalone version of EnderIO's experience obelisk (with the XP vacuum functionality).

target: 这之中储存的xp将作为流体存在 （Raw Experience fluid）, 你可以使用任意一个模组的机器将其装罐（如流体罐装机，匠魂铸造台，机械动力注液器）
source: As the block stores XP as Raw Experience fluid, you should be able to extract it via any mod that has fluid handling options with an extraction function and store it similarly using general fluid tanks.

target: 你可以用它来测量能量的传输速率
source: You can use it for measuring energy transfer rates.

target: 方块有一个屏幕，显示实时的当前速率。
source: The screen always displaying the current rate in order to keep you up-to-date.

target: &3老鼠：鼠西洲
source: &3Ratlantis

target: 小心野生老鼠，因为听说有些携带致命病毒。这些老鼠有发光的红眼珠，还有肮脏的绿毛。它们一旦看到玩家就会攻击，而且遇到玩家会发出刺耳的噪音。
source: Lore says that Ratlantis was Millenia ago home to a civilization known as the Ratlanteans. The Ratlanteans were great builders, engineers and even wizards. It seems that they had a greek/\\roman lifestyle and probably worshiped the same gods that the romans/\\greeks did. However, due to their dark magic, marvelous tech and natural selection, their people turned into monsters and beasts, which marked the downfall of the Ratlantean society. One fact to note is that Ratlantean Officer hats create Rat \\& Sickle banners pattern, which are a clear spoof of the Hammer \\& Sickle communist symbol, this may suggest that they were communists probably, or at one point abandoned their greek/roman lifestyle to a more modern tech one.

target: 又有传言说一种稀少又邪恶的刌民魔笛人掌握了用鼠笛控制老鼠的能力。魔笛人用他的音乐魔咒控制━小阵凶残的老鼠，来攻击他的敌人。所有闯入黑森林或魔法森林的人都要警觉。
source: Pirats and their Deceased Counterparts along with their Captain are probably indicating that once the downfall began, some smaller rats decided to sail the seas and abandon their crazed brothers, and since they have Ratlantean blood, the beasts of Ratlantis are friendly. However, since Dutchrat ships are way bigger than a average Pirat's one, it may suggest that the Dutchrat crew(s) had a different goal in mind, or they simply had larger boats at their disposal. While yes, The Flying Dutchrat is a clear reference to Spongebob, it can still be assumed that he was simply a dutch rat who sailed the seas, and died.

target: 甚至更无端的传言说，大地的边缘有一片鼠特兰蒂斯。这片充满传说、危险生物和敌意的土地，可能可以用—枚魔法令牌开启，那是一种极其稀有的老鼠掉落物。那些述说鼠特兰蒂斯的人带回了超强的老鼠升级。但这当然是传说啦.……除非?(传言都是真的)
source: Runways are always generating with air-raid sirens, suggesting some kind of conflict was going on and the Ratlanteans used these incase any-rats come bombarding their lands.

target: 或许通过大块奶酪令牌生成的鼠西洲传送门可以抵达那里。
source: Another interesting fact is that Marbled Cheese requires nether quartz, a material only obtainable in the nether, which isn't accessible in Ratlantis, suggesting some kind of other method to marble cheese.

target: 进入维度: &2鼠西洲
source: Visit Dimension: &2Ratlantis

target: 鼠特兰蒂斯精神火焰充满了鼠特兰蒂斯人的古老灵魂......和奶酪
source: A Ratlantean Spirit Flame is imbued with the ancient souls of a Ratlantean... and Cheese

target: 击杀鼠西族精灵会掉落0~1个（受抢夺影响）。也可以使用考古学家鼠将烈焰粉转化获得。
source: This item is dropped from the Ratlantean Spirit in the Ratlantis dimension.

target: 可用与合成知性小瓶，鼠西族的降灵，鼠西族弓。
source: This item is used to craft Avatar of Ratlantis and the Vial of Consciousness.

target: 一块奶酪可以通过使用一桶牛奶与炼药锅互动来制作
source: A Block of Cheese can be made by interacting with an empty cauldron using a Bucket of Milk

target: 回复饥饿度和饱食度各三点，用来驯服老鼠，不管是放在箱子里还是捕鼠夹或地上，都可以被老鼠立刻察觉。也是游戏最基本的合成材料。
source: Cheese is used to tame rats. On average, it takes anywhere from 11 to 32 pieces of cheese to tame a wild rat. Cheese is used in a multitude of crafting recipes, most notably the Cheese Staff and Rat Upgrade: Basic. As a food item, Cheese can be eaten for 3 hunger points and 0.5 saturation. It can also be given to a rat with a Rat Upgrade: Chef in order to cook String Cheese.

target: 和普通的老鼠相比要大上许多，两眼发出黄色的光芒，哪怕是在白天也一样，长了尖利的獠牙，身穿残破的托加，嘴巴一张一合，时不时发出沉重的低吼声。
source: Feral Ratlanteans are giant rats with tattered Togas and big glowing eyes

target: 野蛮鼠西族死亡时掉落
source: On death, the Feral Ratlantean drops:

target: - 10%几率在被玩家杀死时掉落鼠西族战机头颅
source: - 10% chance to drop a Ratlantean Automaton Head when killed by a player

target: - 50%几率掉落野鼠爪
source: - 50% chance to drop Rat Claws

target: - 25%几率掉落老鼠托加
source: - 25% chance to drop it's Toga

target: &6鼠西族战机
source: &6Ratlantean Automaton

target: 鼠西族战机是由鼠西族人创造的古老机器
source: Ratlantean Automatons are ancient machines created by the Ratlanteans

target: 使用任意奶酪大理石围住鼠西族战机核心，之后放置头颅，可以召唤鼠西族战机。（类似铁傀儡）
source: The automaton must be created using Ratlantean Automaton Core and a Ratlantean Automaton Head. It also requires 3 Marbled Cheese, of any kind. It is assembled in the same way a vanilla Iron Golem is.

target: 鼠西洲的降灵是鼠西洲的力量化身.....传说是这样说的
source: The Avatar of Ratlantis is the power incarnate of Ratlantis... or so the lore says

target: 此物品用于制作老鼠升级：非信者
source: This item is used to craft Rat Upgrade: Nonbeliever, Rat Upgrade: Ratinator.

target: 奥术科技从西鼠族战机中掉落，也可由考古学家升级转化信标获得。
source: The Arcane Technology drops from the Ratlantean Automaton

target: 可用于合成老鼠升级，制作鼠西洲胸甲和鼠西洲弓。
source: The Arcane Technology can be used in crafting the Rat upgrade: Ratinator, Rat Upgrade: Nonbeliever, and the Avatar of Ratlantis.

target: 使老鼠获得30点生命值，90点护甲，以及发射光束的能力。
source: It lets the rat with the upgrade shoot lasers

target: 像所有老鼠升级一样，它可以应用于老鼠，方法是将其放置在老鼠菜单的升级插槽中。
source: Like all Rat Upgrades, it can be applied to a rat by placing it in the upgrade slot in the Rat Menu.

target: 使用鼠西族魂火，野蛮鼠爪，鼠袋花花瓣合成。
source: The Vial Of Consciousness is an Item used to summon the Neo-Ratlantean

target: 投掷使用召唤一片粒子效果云，可以将范围内的野蛮鼠西族转化成新·鼠西族。
source: A serum that can, In Theory, Reverse the De-Evolution of a Ratlantean.

target: 击杀新鼠西族固定掉落一个。也可以使用考古学家鼠将龙息转化获得。
source: A Psionic Rat Brain is a powerful mind capable of tinkering with the very fabric of reality

target: &o\"我内心的阴谋诡计是一个谜。\"
source: &o\"The inner machinations of my mind are an enigma.\"

target: &5&l&o- 帕特里克·斯塔
source: &5&l&o- Patrick Star

target: 可用于合成鼠铜装备，鼠西族的降灵以及老鼠升级。
source: This powerful and capable mind is used in the crafting recipe for the Avatar of Ratlantis and Rat Upgrade: Neo-Ratlantean.

target: 这是一个结合了老鼠升级的制作站
source: This is a crafting station that combines rat upgrades

target: 用来把任意老鼠升级组合到【老鼠升级：组合】上，消耗老鼠兰蒂斯石作为燃料。
source: Put a rat upgrade: combined in the left side and the upgrade you wish to combine it with on the right side. This crafting station uses the Gem of Ratlantis as fuel, and consumes two to add a single upgrade together.

target: 把组合过的老鼠升级（也就是通过老鼠升级组合器组合的老鼠升级），丢（注意：这里是丢，并非打错）在上面可以把它拆开。
source: Rat Upgrade Separator can be used to split combined rat upgrades

target: 作为基础的白板在老鼠升级组合器上组合其他升级。
source: This is an upgrade used in the Rat Upgrade Combiner to combine upgrades with this one

target: 成品具有所有组件的相同属性。
source: The result has the same properties of all of the components.

target: 像所有老鼠升级一样，它可以应用于老鼠，方法是将其放置在老鼠菜单的升级插槽中。
source: Like all Rat Upgrades, it can be applied to a rat by placing it in the upgrade slot in the Rat Menu.

target: 研究持有的物品，并在可能的情况下将其转化成鼠西族文物
source: The Rat Upgrade: Archeologist allows rats to research a held item and possibly transforms it into Ratlantian artifact

target: 有一些只能在鼠西洲获取的资源，可以在主世界获取，而且要便宜很多。
source: To get the hat that craft The Rat Upgrade: Archeologist, you need to find either a Skeleton (Jungle and Desert Spawn) or Husk with the hat on them, and kill it so you may have a very rare chance to get it. It is noted that husks in the desert seem to be easier to get the hat from due to the sheer amount of them.

target: 没有效果，其他升级的合成材料。
source: Rat Upgrade: Basic is a Rat Upgrade with no unique abilities

target: 用于制作其他老鼠升级
source: Rat Upgrade: Basicis is used as a crafting ingredient to make more advanced Rat Upgrades.

target: 像所有老鼠升级一样，它可以应用于老鼠，方法是将其放置在老鼠菜单的升级插槽中
source: Like all Rat Upgrades, it can be applied to a rat by placing it in the upgrade slot in the Rat Menu

target: 有厨师升级的老鼠会烤熟任何持有的物品，且支持其他模组的食物。烹饪完成后，他们会尝试将其放入其下方的容器中，或者只是将其扔在地上。此升级还为老鼠解锁了制作特殊美食所需的技能。
source: This upgrade allows the rat to act as a sped up furnace and allows you to cook 3 new foods, Confit Byaldi, Potato Knishes and String Cheese.

target: 像所有老鼠升级一样，它可以应用于老鼠，方法是将其放置在老鼠菜单的升级插槽中
source: Like all Rat Upgrades, it can be applied to a rat by placing it in the upgrade slot in the Rat Menu

target: 当设置为“采收”命令时伐木。
source: Must be used in conjunction with White List upgrade to function.

target: 老鼠升级：矿工。当设置为“采收”命令时，老鼠将尝试挖掘列表中的目标方块。
source: The Rat Upgrade: Miner allows rats to attempt to mine targeted blocks in the list when the rat is set to the \"Harvest\" command

target: &l在老鼠开始采矿之前&r 你需要将材料分配给老鼠升级：矿工，让老鼠挖矿。
source: &lBefore&r the rat can start mining, you will need to assign materials to the Rat Upgrade: Miner for the rat to mine up.

target: 像所有老鼠升级一样，它可以应用于老鼠，方法是将其放置在老鼠菜单的升级插槽中
source: Like all Rat Upgrades, it can be applied to a rat by placing it in the upgrade slot in the Rat Menu.

target: 当设置为“采收”命令时，老鼠将种植任意持有种子，老鼠也会在农作物和树苗上使用骨粉。
source: Must be use in conduction with the White List upgrade to function.

target: 老鼠升级：动物饲养员将允许持有食物的老鼠繁殖动物
source: The Rat Upgrade: Animal Breeder will allow a rat holding food to breed animals

target: 老鼠的命令需要在老鼠菜单中设置为“收获”才能繁殖动物。老鼠会从箱子里捡起食物，或者像存放物品一样，它一定会使用奶酪杖。像所有老鼠升级一样，它可以应用于老鼠，方法是将其放置在老鼠菜单的升级插槽中.
source: The rat's command needs to set to \"Harvest\" in the Rat Menu to breed animals. Rats will pickup food items from chests or like storage that it is bound to using a Cheese Staff. Like all Rat Upgrades, it can be applied to a rat by placing it in the upgrade slot in the Rat Menu.

target: 老鼠升级：动物饲养员将尝试用相应的食物喂养最近的动物.
source: Rats with the Rat Upgrade: Animal Breeder will attempt to feed the closest animal with the corresponding food.

target: 像所有老鼠升级一样，它可以应用于老鼠，方法是将其放置在老鼠菜单的升级插槽中
source: Like all Rat Upgrades, it can be applied to a rat by placing it in the upgrade slot in the Rat Menu

target: 确保你的老鼠靠近水。使用奶酪魔杖给老鼠一个家用箱子之后你可以把老鼠设置为“收获”，老鼠就会开始钓鱼。一旦老鼠抓住了一条鱼，它就会把鱼放入箱子。
source: Make sure your rat is near water. Use the cheese staff to give the rat a home chest. Once the rat has a home chest, you can set the rat to \"Harvest\" and the rat will begin to fish. Once the rat catches a fish, it will insert the fish into its' home chest.

target: 像所有老鼠升级一样，它可以应用于老鼠，方法是将其放置在老鼠菜单的升级插槽中
source: Like all Rat Upgrades, it can be applied to a rat by placing it in the upgrade slot in the Rat Menu

target: 老鼠可以附魔它持有的任何物品。
source: A rat can enchant any item it holds.

target: 附近的书架可以提高附魔等级。
source: Nearby bookshelves can increase the level.

target: 老鼠长笛的主要目的是一次指挥多只大鼠
source: The Rat flute primary purpose is to command multiple rats at once

target: 右键使用可以命令所有已加载区块中的老鼠。潜行+右击改变将要实施的命令。
source: Clicking with the Rat flute will make a flute noise and command all rats within the local area. Sneak+Clicking will cycle through and change the command the flute gives.

target: 奶酪魔杖的目的是配置老鼠的命令和行为
source: The Cheese Staff purpose is to configure Rat commands and behavior

target: 绑定老鼠的提取容器、存放容器、以及家的坐标。使用奶酪魔杖右击训服的老鼠，之后右击任意方块可以打开绑定菜单。
source: In order to use the Cheese Staff, it must be \"bound\" to a rat. This is done by &l&oRight-Clicking&r the rat with the cheese staff in hand. Once bound to a rat, the cheese staff can then be clicked on any block.

target: 如果对容器使用魔杖可以设置存放或提取物品的位置，
source: Click on a chest or container block with the bound staff in hand to open up the Cheese Staff Menu. Here the player can mark the container as either a pick-up or drop off a container for the rat's various commands.

target: 任何方块都可以设置老鼠家的坐标，对于已经设置过家的老鼠可以去除家的坐标。
source: The Staff can also be used to set a home point for the rat. The home point is the block that the rat will wander around when set to \"Wander\" command.

target: &3隐光之域
source: &3The Afterlight

target: 进入维度: &2隐光之域
source: Visit Dimension: &2The Afterlight

target: &3末地
source: &3The End

target: 访问群系: &2末地高地
source: Visit Biome: &2End Highlands

target: 它们也像主世界的猪一样被骑乘。只要你准备好了鞍，你就可以在装上鞍后使用紫颂果钓竿来控制末影缓步兽。你可以使用紫颂果让末影缓步兽进行繁殖，或者用来吸引末影缓步兽。末影缓步兽十分有用，你可以乘骑它们躲避潜影贝的攻击或者飞上很高的高度，虽然它们真的很慢。
source: The endergrade are flying end creatures that can be found in the end islands. They can be found eating chorus fruit, You can ride them with a saddle and chorus fruit on a stick, Although slow they can be useful when traversing the treacherous landscape, Although they aren't very useful anywhere else as they are very slow and weak.

target: 虚空石
source: Voidstone

target: 末影灵晶 \\& 末影魔晶粉
source: Endimium Shard \\& Endimium Dust

target: 复刻怪是史莱姆和岩浆怪的亲戚，这些怪物经常被发现守卫着末地城。
source: Mimicubes are relatives of the slimes of the Overworld and the Magma Cubes of the Nether. These monsters can often be found guarding end cities. Unlike their slimy cousins, these gelatinous creatures possess a more powerful magic than almost any other known beast.

target: 当被攻击时，复刻怪会试图复制攻击者的武器和盔甲，这意味着任何戴着头盔和挥舞着剑的人都会发现自己被一个装备完全相同的复刻怪攻击。复刻怪可以复刻并使用盾牌、剑、弓、弩、三叉戟、食物等等。在对付复刻怪时要小心，因为使用强大的盾牌或剑来对付复刻怪可能会使它成为一个难以战胜的敌人。
source: When attacked, Mimicubes will attempt to mimic the weapons and armor of their attacker. This can mean that anyone wearing a helmet and brandishing a sword can find themselves being attacked by a Mimicube with the exact same equipment.

target: 当被杀死时，复刻怪会掉落一些魔法凝胶，被称为复刻凝胶。玩家可以在工作台上合成任何可损坏的物品加上8个复刻凝胶来创造出一个复刻的物品。复刻的物品几乎拥有原物品的所有属性，包括附魔。需要注意的是，这个复刻品的耐久度为零，需要修复才能使用。复刻凝胶也可以被喂给拟态章鱼以增强它的拟态能力。
source: Mimicubes can drop some of their magical gel, called Mimicream. One can harness the natural shape-shifting magic of the mimicream by using eight mimicream and any damageable item in the crafting grid. With a few limitations, this can effectively create a mimiced, copied tool or equipment, with almost all the enchantments of the original.

target: 末影噬菌体火箭
source: Enteriophage Rocket

target: 龙筋
source: Dragon Sinew

target: 龙鳞
source: Dragon Scale

target: 龙蛋
source: Dragon Egg

target: 末影粘液块
source: Enderslime Block

target: &3下界
source: &3The Nether

target: 这是下界的生物群系之一。这个生物群落生成的生物有恶魂、猪灵、僵尸猪灵以及少量的岩浆史莱姆和末影人。某些结构，如下界石英矿石和萤石，和下界要塞等只在下界中生成。如果在超平坦预设中使用下界，水(和其他主世界结构)就可以生成。而在这个生物群落中，使用床会爆炸。
source: This is one of the biomes used to generate the Nether. Within this biome mobs such as ghasts, packs of piglins, zombified piglins and the occasional magma cubes and endermen spawn. Certain structures, such as Nether quartz ore \\& glowstone blobs, and Nether fortresses generate only in the Nether. Water lakes (and other Overworld structures) can still generate if the Nether is used in a superflat preset. Beds explode when used in this biome.

target: 访问群系: &2下界荒地
source: Visit Biome: &2Nether Wastes

target: 一个相对平坦的下界生物群系。地面由地狱岩和灵魂沙混合而成。在这个群系生长着各种各样的下界植物，包括荆棘，火焰花和地狱皮树。
source: A relatively flat Nether biome. The ground consists of mixed Netherrack and Soul Sand. It is covered in various Nether plants, including Bramble, Burning Blossoms and Hellbark Trees.

target: 如果你没有适当的准备，这个生物群系会比其它的下界生物群系更加危险(尽管没有岩浆)。当你在躲避恶魂时，这个花园可能看起来非常诱人，但里面的许多植物是非常危险的:
source: This biome can be much more dangerous than other Nether biomes (despite the lack of lava) if you are not properly prepared. The garden may look extremely inviting if you've been on the run from Ghasts, but many of the plants are very dangerous:

target: ●如果你站在荆棘上面或碰到它，那么它会对玩家造成每秒1点伤害
source: ● Bramble thorns will deal 1 heart of damage to the player if they stand on top or next to it.

target: ●烈焰花会在玩家破坏它或跨过它时，在短时间内点燃玩家。
source: ● Burning Blossoms will light the player on fire for a short period of time if broken or walked through by the player.

target: 当然这里也有很多物品是有用的，你可以从地狱皮树获得大量木材，也可以找到大量的蘑菇做蘑菇煲。
source: This can also be very useful, however, with an abundance of wood from the Hellbark Trees, lots of mushrooms for food.

target: 访问群系: &2地下花园
source: Visit Biome: &2Undergrowth

target: 玄武岩三角洲是一个灰色的生物群系，它据说是古代火山爆发的遗迹。（有没有可能是哪位兄弟头皮屑太多了？）
source: A gray biome, the basalt deltas are said to be the remnant of ancient volcanic eruptions.

target: 地表由玄武岩和黑石组成，大部分区域遍布熔岩浅池与岩浆块。复杂的地形，遍布的熔岩池以及较大的落差，使它有点难以通过和被改造。与下界的其他生物群系不同，下界要塞并不生成于玄武岩三角洲。当这个生物群系靠近岩浆湖时，玄武岩三角洲一般就会在附近形成。
source: The ground consists of basalt and blackstone blocks, with small patches of netherrack and pools of lava. The shape of the terrain is chaotic and uneven, making it somewhat difficult to traverse and build on. Unlike the other biomes in the Nether, Bastion remnants do not generate in basalt deltas. When this biome borders a lava ocean, clusters of basalt form near the coast.

target: 岩浆怪在这个生物群系中刷新率极高，使玄武岩三角洲成为建造岩浆膏农场的好地方。这个生物群系包含了比其他下界生物群系更丰富的黑石。（好像黑石只能当石头用吧）
source: Magma cubes have a high spawn rate in this biome, making the Basalt Deltas the best place to farm Magma Cream. This biome also contains a much higher abundance of blackstone compared to other Nether biomes.

target: 访问群系: &2玄武岩三角洲
source: Visit Biome: &2Basalt Deltas

target: 灵魂沙峡谷是大型的类洞窟地形，地貌广阔且与下界平常的地域有明显的分界。这个群系显著的特征是：暴露在外、形态各异的下界化石，大量的熔岩，蓝色的迷雾，由玄武岩组成的巨柱，在地表燃烧的灵魂火，以及偶尔生成的下界要塞。生物群系本身由灵魂沙、玄武岩和灵魂土组成。
source: The soul sand valley is a large grotto that is extensive and cuts through the Nether's usual terrain. Notable features of the biome are exposed nether fossils in various shapes and sizes, large amounts of lava, blue fog, large spires made of basalt, soul fire, and the occasional Nether fortress or Bastion remnant. The biome itself consists of soul sand, basalt and soul soil.

target: 在灵魂沙峡谷中，恶魂有很高的生成概率，骷髅和末影人会频繁成群生成，恶魂会与骷髅联合使用远程攻击打玩家个措手不及，并造成灵魂火的大量产生。再加上灵魂沙会降低玩家的移动速度，这些因素使得穿过该群系是极其危险的一件事。建议避开该群系，除非玩家有足够的装备或策略来探索这一领域
source: This biome is extremely dangerous to traverse due to the combination of ghasts and skeletons spawning here and soul sand slowing down the player's movement speed, making it easy for a player to get overwhelmed by projectile attacks. In addition, ghasts fireballs impacting soul sand or soul soil can create soul fire, which is more harmful than regular fire if players get caught in it. It is recommended to avoid this biome unless players have sufficient equipment/strategies to navigate the terrain. The Soul Speed enchantment is especially helpful for traveling through this biome.

target: 访问群系: &2灵魂沙峡谷
source: Visit Biome: &2Soul Sand Valley

target: 内脏堆生物群系是由大量的肉块组成，同时有大量由肉块和菌光体组成的条状物从空中垂下。
source: The floor of the Visceral Heap biome is made of Flesh with Flesh Tendons hanging from the ceiling and bone columns on the ground.

target: 首先，你不应该试图在这里生存，除非你是一个非常有经验的深度模组玩家，对下界的了解超过一般玩家。但是你一定要知道，肉块是很好的建筑材料（作者口味舒适异于常人）。如果你一定想来的话我建议你一定要带很多原石来阻挡那些恶魂火球的爆炸。
source: First of all, you shouldn't be attempting to survive here, unless you are an incredibly experienced player with good knowledge of the Nether. But if you must know, Flesh makes a great building block. The Nether is not the place to be surviving, so make sure you bring a lot of cobblestone to block out those ghast's blasts.

target: 访问群系: &2内脏堆
source: Visit Biome: &2Visceral Heap

target: 绯红森林是红色调的生物群系，绯红菌和绯红巨型菌散布在其环境之中，偶尔会生成诡异菌。
source: The Crimson Forest is a “red” crimson-themed biome, with warped and crimson fungus as well as huge crimson fungus scattered around the environment.

target: 这里分布着巨型的菌类结构，垂泪藤悬挂在菌块下方，有时菌光体也会伴其生成。群系地表覆满绯红菌岩，其上生长着绯红菌索。偶尔下界岩会呈斑块状分散在地表，下界疣块也会在群系中散乱分布。在顶部的岩壁上，除了常见的荧石簇，下界疣块也会成堆生成，垂泪藤则会像钟乳石一样生长在它们的底部。
source: There are huge fungus structures that contain weeping vines hanging off them and may also have a few blocks of shroomlight. The floor of the biome is covered in crimson nylium, with crimson roots growing. Occasional patches of netherrack and red nether wart blocks are found scattered throughout the biome. In the ceiling, apart from glowstone clusters, there are sparse nether wart block stalactites with vines growing.

target: 疣猪兽只能在该生物群系中生成，而猪灵会较为频繁地生成在这里，少量的僵尸猪灵会在此生成。玩家可以在这里方便地与猪灵进行以物易物，并通过疣猪兽获取大量生猪排，但疣猪兽和猪灵是不容小觑的危险因素。
source: Piglins, zombified piglins and hoglins naturally spawn in this biome. As long as players equip at least one piece of gold armor, piglins should not cause any trouble. Hoglins can also be repelled by staying close to warped fungus. However, without these countermeasures, this biome can be fairly hostile to navigate. Nevertheless, the abundance of hoglins in this biome makes it a great source of food in the Nether, and the high population of piglins makes this biome an ideal location to barter with them.

target: 访问群系: &2绯红森林
source: Visit Biome: &2Crimson Forest

target: 诡异森林是茂密的青色调生物群系，绯红菌、诡异菌和诡异巨型菌散布其中。
source: The warped forest is a dense, “cyan” warped-themed biome, with warped and crimson fungus as well as huge warped fungus scattered around.

target: 这里分布着巨型的菌类结构，菌光体有时会生长在菌块周围。群系地表覆满诡异菌岩，其上生长着不同规模的诡异菌索。偶尔地，下界岩会呈斑块状分散在地表，诡异疣块也会在群系中散乱分布。
source: The huge fungus structures may have a few blocks of shroomlight scattered around them. The floor of the biome is covered in warped nylium, with warped roots and nether sprouts growing. Occasional patches of raw netherrack and warped wart blocks can be found scattered throughout the biome.

target: 末影人是该群系中生成的唯一生物，并且生成得非常频繁。这使得诡异森林成为了收集末影珍珠以抵达末地的理想地点。该群系由于没有非条件敌对生物生成，是下界相对安全的生物群系。
source: Apart from Striders, Endermen are the only mobs that spawn in this biome, making the warped forest an ideal location to collect ender pearls to access the End. This biome is also a relatively safe place to reside in the Nether, due to the fact that no hostile mobs spawn here. However, do note that other hostile mobs can still spawn from Bastion remnants that generate here, as well as from Nether fortresses that have cut into a warped forest after generating in another biome.

target: 访问群系: &2诡异森林
source: Visit Biome: &2Warped Forest

target: 结晶裂谷是一个下界生物群系。它被粉红色烟雾所笼盖，地面上生成着许多下界水晶，天花板上倒挂着巨型下界水晶。在这你还能看见更多的荧石
source: Crystalline Chasm is a Nether biome. It has a pink fog, small Nether Crystals on the ground, sides and the ceiling. Nether Crystal spikes made of Nether Crystal Blocks also generate, but only on the ceiling. Piles of Glowstone are also much more common.

target: 访问群系: &2结晶裂谷
source: Visit Biome: &2Crystalline Chasm

target: 凋零深渊是一个被紫色浓雾包裹的下界生物群系，由黑石，少量下界岩，偶尔出现的黑曜石和哭泣的黑曜石组成。几乎不存在荧石。
source: Withered Abyss is a very dark Nether biome and is a boiling biome with a black fog and the ground is made out of Blackstone with some very small patches of Obsidian and some Crying Obsidian. It lacks piles of Glowstone.

target: 这里会生成大量末影人和凋灵骷髅。
source: Only Enderman and Wither Skeletons spawn.

target: 如果你是第一次探索下界，一定要避开这个生物群系，因为那里很黑,光照等级几乎为零，除非你携带了足够的火把和荧石。虽然哭泣黑曜石确实提供了一点光，但是约等于没有。同时也要确保穿戴护甲，因为凋零骷髅会大量生成，所以你很容易在没有盔甲的情况离开人世。凋零骷髅和几乎没有亮光使得通过这个群系非常危险。末影人并不会影响你，除非你非要看它的眼睛。
source: If you are going to the Nether for the first time, make sure to avoid this biome, because it is very dark to see unless you bring torches or Glowstone. Crying Obsidian, however, does provide a little bit of light. Also make sure to wear some armor, because Wither Skeletons spawn naturally and can easily take you out without armor. Wither Skeletons along with no Glowstone piles will make it very dangerous to travel through this biome. Enderman are fine unless you look in their eyes. Nether beginners, beware!

target: 访问群系: &2凋零深渊
source: Visit Biome: &2Withered Abyss

target: &2找到下界要塞
source: &2Find Nether Fortress

target: &2尝试找到堡垒遗迹
source: &2Try to find Bastion Remnant

target: 除了玄武岩三角洲之外，在下界的所有生物群系中都能找到这种堡垒遗迹。它们会生成4种不同的变体，每种变体都有独特的结构和战利品。（我觉得这里不应该用尝试找到，因为我感觉下界要塞比这玩意难找多了）
source: Bastion remnants are large, castle-like generated structures found in the Nether in all of the biomes except basalt deltas. They generate in four distinct variants, each with a unique structure and set of loot.

target: 堡垒遗迹会生成 4 种类型的结构：桥、疣猪兽棚、居住区和藏宝室，如果这些结构全部生成在同一个堡垒遗迹中，这个堡垒遗迹会十分庞大且壮观。但不是所有的结构类型都会在同一个堡垒遗迹中生成。猪灵和疣猪兽会在此间频繁生成（作者这段说了跟没说一样，所以还是我来补充罢  内容选自mcwiki）
source: Piglins and piglin brutes spawn in these structures on generation, and hoglins may also spawn on generation in the bridge and hoglin stables variants.

target: 堡垒遗迹是唯一可以找到pigstep音乐唱片，猪灵旗帜图案，和岩浆怪刷怪笼的地方。
source: Bastion remnants are the only place to find the Pigstep music disc, the snout banner pattern, and the magma cube spawner.

target: &2见鬼去吧@恶魂！！！！！
source: &2Kill Ghast with his own weapon

target: 远古残骸是只能在下界发现的一种罕见矿石，是下界合金碎片的主要来源。它的高抗爆炸性使它对普通爆炸免疫。当它作为实体掉落物时，它可以漂浮在熔岩上，不会因为燃烧而消失。
source: Ancient debris is a rare ore found in the Nether, and is the main source of netherite scraps. Its high blast resistance makes it immune to normal explosions. In item form, it floats on lava and cannot be burned by any form of fire.

target: 自然生成于下界 Y 坐标 8~119 的空间，生成数量服从正态分布。生成时连锁数量最大为 3，但相当罕见，以连锁为 2 居多，但同样少见，多为单矿。同时，远古残骸不会裸露生成，否则判定生成失败。每个区块最多生成两个矿脉，最多生成5个远古残骸（2+3个）当生成于岩层中时，在 Y=15 处分布最为密集，Y=13~18范围内有广泛的分布。
source: Ancient debris generates in the Nether in the form of blobs. Up to two blobs may generate per chunk: one blob of 1–3 ancient debris attempts to generate with a periodic normal distribution (similarly to lapis lazuli ore) from levels 8 to 22, and an additional blob of 0–2 ancient debris attempts to generate randomly from levels 8 to 119. On average, Y-level 15 has the most ancient debris.

target: &2找到远古残骸
source: &2Find Ancient Debris

target: 下界合金碎片是一种从远古残骸中烧炼而成的材料，你能在下界发现他。它只用于制作下界合金锭。和大多数与下界合金相关的物品一样，它不会被熔岩和火焰烧毁。 （曲逸：但是爆炸和仙人掌依然能够销毁该物品。小声bb）
source: Netherite scrap is a material smelted from ancient debris, which is found in the Nether. It is used solely for crafting netherite ingots. Like most netherite-related items, it is not flammable.

target: 下界合金锭是由下界合金碎片和金锭合成的物品，它有概率在下界的堡垒遗迹的宝藏室箱子中找到。与其他物品不同，它对熔岩和火免疫。他可以用于在锻造台中将钻石制品升级为下界合金制品或者合成磁石
source: Netherite ingots are items obtained from crafting netherite scraps and gold ingots together, as well as loot from bastion remnant loot chests. Unlike other items, they are immune to fire and lava damage. They are primarily used to upgrade diamond gear and craft lodestones.

target: 由 9 个下界合金锭合成。不会被岩浆和火焰烧毁，但爆炸和仙人掌依然能够销毁该物品。可以当作信标底座使用。
source: A block of netherite is a precious metal block made from nine netherite ingots. Unlike most items, it is resistant to fire and lava.

target: 灵魂沙 \\& 灵魂土
source: Soul Sand \\& Soul Soil

target: 灵魂沙是下界的一种方块。灵魂沙会减慢怪物和玩家在上面行走的速度（如果你有灵魂急行就会加速）。它也用于种植地狱疣和生成凋零。
source: Soul sand is a block found naturally only in the Nether. Soul sand usually slows down the movement of mobs and players walking on it. It is also used for growing nether wart and for constructing a Wither.

target: 灵魂土是一种只有在灵魂沙峡谷才能找到的方块。
source: Soul soil is a block naturally found only in the soul sand valley.

target: 与灵魂沙不同的是灵魂土不会减慢生物速度，也不会产生气泡柱。
source: Unlike soul sand, soul soil does not slow mobs down and does not create bubble columns.

target: &2下界化石
source: &2Nether Fossil

target: &3暮色森林
source: &3The Twilight Forest

target: 此模组增加了一个被永恒之夜笼罩的森林世界，这个世界充满了新的生物与植物以及各种探险要素，还增加了许多强大的BOSS以及有趣的物品与道具。如，曲折复杂的黑暗迷宫，充满怪物的富饶矿山，深不见底的大峡谷，耸入云霄的高塔，位于冰川的极光宫殿，栖息着巨龙的庞大洞穴，还有各种新奇的地形与新地牢等你探索。[TF]暮色森林 (The Twilight Forest)-第2张图片进入暮色森林维度的方法如下：做一个2×2的小水池，水池旁边放满植物（包括枯死的灌木，树叶，草，蕨类等，以及其它模组的植物），再向水池中扔一个钻石。只见一道闪电劈过，暮色世界的传送门便会打开！这里曾孕育了十分繁荣的文明，但是你未能亲眼目睹。如今永恒之夜笼罩着这里，森林中仅存着一些遗迹、葱郁的树木，及奇怪的生物。你决心揭开暮色森林的神秘面纱，但是你很快发现，遗迹拥有了新的主人。并非所有森林居民都对入侵者十分友好！
source: The canopy is pierced only occasionally by massive trees that rise to the ceiling of the world. The terrain is flatter, or at least less mountainous than regular Minecraft, but you will occasionally encounter Hills, sometimes rising far above the canopy level. These hills are hollow too, containing Caves filled with valuable ores, treasure and dangerous monsters.

target: 魔法地图
source: The Magic Map

target: &3深暗之园
source: &3The Undergarden

target: 深暗之园是一个位于主世界基岩深处的黑暗地下维度。那里的植物适应了黑暗，无需阳光即可生长，怪异的生物以此为家，各种来自一个混沌而黑暗的领域的腐衰生物将自己传播到各处以便入侵这里……
source: The Undergarden is a dark, subterranean world located deep below the bedrock of the Overworld. The flora here has adapted to their conditions and can grow anywhere, independent of light. Strange creatures call these dark lands home, and are plagued by the invasive Rotspawn, monsters originating from a chaotic, mysterious realm.

target: 完整的mod教程: &9&o&nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eucjADqqNrY
source: Full mod tutorial: &9&o&nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eucjADqqNrY

target: 访问维度: &2深暗之园
source: Visit Dimension: &2The Undergarden

target: 一种坚硬，光滑的金属，因其减速能力而得名
source: A tough, slippery metal, defined by its slowing capabilities

target: 一种由灭绝物种的化石制成的奇怪金属
source: An odd metal crafted from the fossils of extinct species

target: 一种据说来自异面的金属
source: A metal said to have come from the Otherside

target: 贵豪锭一种软而有光泽的金属，用于与石生体交易
source: A soft, lustrous metal used for trading with Stoneborn

target: 一种不可靠，但很坚固的金属，由遗忆守卫的掉落物遗忆粒合成
source: A unreliable, yet strong metal, forged from the remains of a Forgotten Guardian

target: 一种光滑的深色石头，可用于充当渊邃弹弓的弹药
source: A smooth piece of Depthrock, the perfect ammunition for a Slingshot

target: 强力的炸弹，扔出后可造成较高的爆炸伤害并破坏方块
source: A makeshift projectile explosive, often sold by shady Stoneborn

target: 遗忆守卫是一个小boss
source: The Forgotten Guardian is a mini-boss mob

target: 遗忆守卫是一个守护着下僻巢穴的金属怪物。
source: The Forgotten Guardian can only be found naturally in the catacombs, spawning with the generation of the world.

target: 在主世界使用会引起剧烈的爆炸
source: Using it in the Overworld will cause a violent explosion

target: 深暗之园特有的床，作用与特性同原版床。它可以让你在深暗之园记录下记录点
source: A bed unique to the Undergarden, with the same functions and features as the original bed in Overworld it saves your spawn point in the Undergarden.

target: 腐衰凶兽是原产于异面的腐衰生物中最强的一种。
source: The Rotbeast is a hostile mobs native to The Otherside

target: 腐衰凶兽会生成在深暗之园中任何光照等级<7的实体方块上，同时在贫瘠深渊群系中生成的概率增大。
source: The Rotbeast can spawn on any solid block with a light level below 7. They have an increased chance of spawning in the Barren Abyss.

target: 石匐鬼是深暗之园的矿洞生物之一
source: Nargoyle is a Cavern Creatur hostile mob who dwell at the deepest depths

target: 它是一只深暗之园特有的蝙蝠。
source: The Nargoyle will wander around. When it spots a player, it will run towards them and attack by leaping at them.

target: 石匐鬼可以在Y=32以下任何亮度等级低于7的实体方块上生成。
source: Cavern Creatures can spawn on any solid block with a light level below 7 below Y 32.

target: &a匠魂
source: &aTinkers Construct

target: &2&l欢迎来到匠魂的世界！
source: &2&lWelcome to Tinkers' Construct

target: *制作出所有&b&l&o石制工具&r以解锁任务*
source: *Unlocked by crafting all the &b&l&oStone Tools&r quest*

target: 匠魂为 Minecraft 增加了一整套从模具制造、金属冶炼到工具打造的工艺系统。
source: The Tinkers' Construct mod focuses on weapon and tool manufacturing.

target: 合成站
source: Crafting Station

target: 工具组装台
source: Tinker Station

target: 模具加工台
source: Part Builder

target: 水晶们
source: Crystals

target: 一些大板
source: Reinforcements

target: 更多大板
source: More Reinforcements

target: &l&5史 莱 姆 合 集
source: &l&5Slime Set

target: 铸造工具和武器
source: Tool and Weapon Casts

target: 有用的铸模
source: Useful Casts

target: 工  匠  砧
source: Tinker's Anvil

target: 物流
source: Logistics

target: 资源
source: Resources

target: 科技
source: Tech

target: 魔法
source: Magic

target: 在Y轴5到45之间的任何海洋生物群落中找到这种矿石。
source: Find this ore in any ocean biome between Y5 to Y45.

target: 在Y轴107到113之间的下界扭曲森林和深红森林中找到这种矿石。
source: Find this ore in the Nethers Warped Forests and Crimson Forests between Y107 to Y113.

target: 在末地高地生物群落中找到这种可获得的矿石。
source: Find this obtainable ore in the End Highlands biome.

target: 这是一个快速的熔炉!
source: Now that is a fast furnace!

target: 建议您使用此药剂与您的第一个锭。
source: It is recommended to use this potion with your first ingot.

target: 不要低估我的能力!
source: Don't underestimate my power!

target: 这种太阳能电池板的产能为2,048 FE/Tick。
source: This solar panel produces 2,048 FE/Tick.

target: 建议您使用此药剂与您的第一个锭。
source: It is recommended to use this potion with your first ingot.

target: 建议您使用此药剂与您的第一个锭。
source: It is recommended to use this potion with your first ingot.

target: 伴随着强大的力量…好东西。
source: With great power comes.. well something.

target: 这能有多快!?
source: How fast can this possibly get!?

target: 这个太阳能电池板的产能为8129 FE/Tick。
source: This solar panel produces 8,129 FE/Tick.

target: 这个太阳能电池板的产能为32,768 FE/Tick。
source: This solar panel produces 32,768 FE/Tick.

target: 现在你只是在炫耀。
source: Now you are just showing off.

target: 在这一点上几乎是作弊。
source: Almost cheating at this point.

target: 我的天，这东西比我想象的要普通得多。
source: My god this stuff is a lot more commen then I thought.

target: 为什么我不能拥有所有这些东西。
source: Why cant I hold all these things.

target: 蜜蜂吗?
source: Bees?

target: 看起来像糖果。
source: Looks like candy.

target: 我们现在处于最后阶段。
source: We are in the endgame now.

target: 不过味道不太好。
source: Doesn't taste good though.

target: Allthemodium的详细指南。
source: Detailed Guide to Allthemodium.

target: 挖坑挖坑！
source: Diggy Diggy Hole!

target: 猪灵家园
source: Piglin Homeworld

target: 应用能源2
source: Applied Energistics 2

target: 欢迎来到 &a应用能源2&f！
source: Welcome to &aApplied Energistics 2&f!

target: 应用能源 2
source: Applied Energistics 2

target: 压印模板
source: Inscriber Presses

target: ME系统最重要的部分
source: The most important part of the ME system

target: 放置您的&e存储元件&f的地方。
source: A place to put your &estorage cells&f.

target: 我不知道空间存储是如何工作的
source: I have no idea how spatial storage works

target: 这些将允许您以无线方式访问您的存储系统。
source: These will allow you to access your storage system, wirelessly.

target: 这些将扩大&e无线访问接口&f的范围。 最多可堆叠 64。
source: These will boost the range of the &ewireless access port&f. Stacks up to 64.

target: 基础卡
source: Basic Cards

target: 高级卡
source: Advanced Cards

target: 其他工具
source: Other Tools

target: 其他机器
source: Other Machines

target: 新生魔艺
source: Ars Nouveau

target: 新生魔艺
source: Ars Nouveau

target: 用于制作2级魔符的材料。
source: Tier 2 crafting material for Glyphs.

target: 用于制作1级魔符的材料。
source: Tier 1 crafting material for Glyphs.

target: 用于制作3级魔符的材料。
source: Tier 3 crafting material for Glyphs.

target: 星辉魔法
source: Astral Sorcery

target: 星辉魔法
source: Astral Sorcery

target: 观星
source: Stargazing

target: 欢迎来到星辉魔法！
source: Welcome to Astral Sorcery!

target: 该模组将永远改变您玩 Minecraft 的方式，同时还具有令人惊叹的视觉效果。
source: The mod that will forever change the way you play Minecraft, while also having stunning visuals.

target: 观星
source: Stargazing

target: 勘探
source: Exploration

target: 正如标题所暗示的，AS 的第一部分包括探索。
source: As the title suggests, the first part of AS consists of exploration.

target: 出去寻找散落在世界各地的白色大理石结构。 它们可以在地表，也可以在地下，但仍然可见。
source: Head out and look for white marble structures scattered around the world. They can be on surface, or just under, but still visible.

target: 继续寻找，直到你找到一个中间有一个漂浮的聚能水晶，然后在它下面的某个地方放一个原版工作台。
source: Keep looking until you find one with a floating Collector Crystal in the middle and put a vanilla Crafting Table somewhere under it.

target: 确保水晶能清晰的看到天空，否则什么都不会发生！
source: Make sure the Crystal has a clear view of the sky, otherwise nothing will happen!

target: 调谐
source: Attunement

target: 升级你的 Luminout Table，将提升你的魔法技能并开辟新的可能性。
source: Upgrading your Luminout Table, will advance your sorcery skills and open up new possibilities.

target: 与Luminous Crafting Table不同，这个祭坛需要你在它周围建造一个结构，这在书中显示或用你的魔杖右键单击祭坛。
source: This altar, unlike the Luminous Crafting Table, will require you to build a structure around it, which is shown in the book or by right-clicking the altar with your wand.

target: 星辉祭坛
source: Celestial Altar

target: 星座
source: Constellation

target: 天体调谐
source: Celestial Attunement

target: 五彩
source: Radiance

target: 共鸣祭坛是星辉魔法的下一个重要步骤。 它允许您将自己或水晶绑定到星座。
source: The Attunement Altar is the next big step in Astral Sorcery. It allows you to bind yourself or Rock Crystals to Constellations.

target: 将自己绑定到一个，将在你的星芒宝典中解锁一个带有星能力树的新标签，在那里你可以获得不同的能力或统计数据。
source: Binding yourself to one, will unlock a new tab in your Astral Tome with a perk tree, where you can get different abilities or stats.

target: 在夜间，当您拿着共鸣星杖时，您会发现一些地方从地面冒出一些白色颗粒。
source: During the night, while holding the Resonating Wand, you will spot some white particles coming out of the ground in some places.

target: 通过在这些颗粒附近挖掘，一直到基岩，您会发现水晶矿石。 这些水晶具有独特的属性，可以在以后的过程中为您提供帮助。
source: By digging down near those particles, all the way down to Bedrock, you will find Rock Crystal Ores. These crystals have unique attributes which will help you along the way later on.

target: 建议您在开采这些矿石时将共鸣星杖放在副手，因为这样会更容易。
source: It is recommended that you hold the Resonating Wand in your off-hand while mining for these ores, as it makes it a lot easier.

target: 这些水晶透镜可让您将聚能水晶的星光聚焦到祭坛上，或将其散布到整个基地。
source: These Crystal Lenses will allow you to focus the starlight from Collector Crystals to the Altar, or distribute it throughout your base.

target: 星辉
source: Starlight

target: 通过将水晶与一些大理石结合，您可以创建聚星缸，这是一个可以收集液态星光的坩埚。
source: By combining a Rock Crystal with some Marble, you can create the Lightwell, a cauldron that will collect starlight in liquid form.

target: 要开始收集，只需右键单击聚星缸上的海蓝宝石，它就会慢慢开始收集。 海蓝宝石会在一段时间后破裂，因此请务必更换它。
source: To begin collecting, simply right-click with an Aquamarine on the Lightwell and it will slowly start collecting. The Aquamarine will break after a while, so make sure you replace it.

target: 天文望远镜是望远镜的升级版，可以让您看到昏暗的星座。
source: The Telesope is an upgraded version of the Looking Glass and will allow you to see Dim Constellations.

target: 望远镜将成为您观星的起点。
source: The Looking Glass is going to be your starting item for stargazing.

target: 在夜晚，当星星出来时，通过望远镜看天空，直到你找到一个更大的星星星座。
source: During the night, when the stars are out, look at the sky through the Looking Glass until you find a constellation of larger stars.

target: 找到一个后，检查你的星座文件是否有一个看起来相似的。 回头看时，可以按住【Shift】开始绘制星座。
source: Upon finding one, check your constellation papers for one that looks similar. When you look back at it, you can hold [Shift] to start drawing the constellation.

target: 一旦您正确绘制了星座，它就会亮起，并且还会永久显示在天空中。
source: Once you drew the constellation correctly, it will light up and it will also permanently show up in the sky.

target: 星辉锭切削工具可让您分解星辉锭和水晶。
source: The Starmetal Cutting Tool allows you to break down Starmetal Ingots and Rock Crystals.

target: 放下这些物品然后用工具击打它们会使它们碎裂，从锭中获得星尘并将水晶石分裂成它们的基本元素。
source: Dropping these items and then hitting them with the Tool will fragment them, giving you Starmetal Dust from Ingots and splitting the Rock Crystals into their base elements.

target: 连接器将允许您从聚能水晶或水晶透镜中集中星光以进行嬗变，为制作祭坛赋予权力，以及许多其他东西。
source: The Linking Tool will allow you to concentrate starlight from Collector Crystals or Crystal Lenses for transmutation, empowering the Crafting Altars, and many other things.

target: 通过放置一个铁矿石并将一个聚能水晶连接到它上面，它会被注入星光，变成一个星辉矿石，然后可以熔炼成星辉锭。
source: By placing an Iron Ore block and linking a Collector Crystal to it, it will be infused with starlight, becoming a Starmetal Ore, which can then be smelted into Starmetal Ingots.

target: 星尘是通过用星辉锭切削工具撞击星辉锭而产生的。
source: Stardust is created by hitting a Starmetal Ingot with a Starmetal Cutting Tool.

target: 如果您希望在您的技能树中禁用您获得的一项统计数据，您可以使用封禁印章来实现。
source: If you wish to disable one of your gained stats in your perk tree, you may do so by using a Sealing Sigil.

target: 一旦你制作了一个，它就会出现在你的星能力树中。 您所要做的就是将其从左上角拖到您要暂时禁用的能力中。 印章在此过程中被消耗。
source: Once you crafted one, it will show up in your perk tree. All you have to do is drag it from the top left corner into the perk you want to temporarily disable. The Sigil is consumed in the process.

target: 这4 根魔杖将引导您了解每根魔杖及其用途。
source: This cluster of 4 wands will guide you through each wand and their uses.

target: 实用魔杖
source: Utility Wands

target: 排列星杖是您的标准建筑魔杖。 [Shift + 右键] 在任何方块上选择它，然后右键单击以放置方块。
source: The Formation Wand is your standard building wand. [Shift + Right-click] on any block to select it, and then right click to place the blocks.

target: 对空气[Shift + 右键] 改变模式。
source: [Shift + Right-click] in the air to change modes.

target: 更替星杖是您的标准替换魔杖。 对方块[Shift + 右键] 选择它，然后 [右键] 替换方块。
source: The Conversion Wand is your standard exchange wand. [Shift + Right-click] on a block to select it, then [Right-click] to replace blocks.

target: 对空气[Shift + 右键] 改变范围。
source: [Shift + Right-click] in the air to change size.

target: 冲击星杖会向你所面对的方向发射一束星能魔法束。 着陆后，它会将您拉向它。
source: The Impulsion Wand will throw a spectral rope in the direction you're facing. Upon landing, it will pull you towards it.

target: 越空星杖有两个功能，你可以用【Shift + 右键】在它们之间切换。
source: The Traversal Wand has two functions, you can switch between them with [Shift + Right-click].

target: 在闪现模式下，您将被传送到前方。 拿着它可以让你瞄准并看到你将被传送到的位置。
source: In blink mode, you will get teleported forward. Holding it will allow you to aim and see the location you'll be teleported to.

target: 在冲驰模式下，您可以通过按住 [右键] 来为魔杖充电。 释放它后，你会被冲向你正在看的方向。
source: In dash mode, you can charge the wand by holding [Right-click]. Upon releasing it, you will get knocked in the direction you're looking.

target: 水晶共鸣
source: Crystal Attunement

target: 洞穴照明器是一个方块，当放置在世界任何地方时，它会通过放置黄色光源慢慢照亮它下方的区域。
source: The Cave Illuminator is a block that, when placed anywhere in the world, will slowly light up the area below it by placing yellow light sources.

target: 非常适合防止怪物在基地或怪物农场下方的洞穴中生成！
source: Perfect for preventing mobs from spawning in the caves below your base or mob farm!

target: 天辉星门允许从一个点到另一个点的快速旅行。 只需将其中的 2 个放置在任何地方，围绕它们构建结构即可！
source: The Celestial Gateways allow fast travel from one point to another. Simply place 2 of them anywhere, build the structure around them and you're set!

target: 站在其中一个星门上，您会看到一片漆黑的天空，黄色的星星代表其他星门。 按住 [Shift]，同时注视其中一颗星星，会将您传送到它。
source: Standing on one of the Gateways, will show you a dark sky with yellow stars representing other gateways. Holding [Shift], while looking at one of these stars, will teleport you to it.

target: 机械动力
source: Create

target: &5&l欢迎来到机械动力！
source: &5&lWelcome To Create!

target: 机械动力是一款身临其境的科技模组，将真实感带入全新的 Minecraft！
source: Create is an immersive tech mod, bringing realism into Minecraft on a whole new level!

target: 如果您对任何方块或物品有疑问，请按住 W 思考并查看令人惊叹的 3D 游戏内WIKI！
source: If you have doubts about any blocks or items, hold W to ponder and see an amazing 3D in-game wiki!

target: 机械动力
source: Create

target: 这将是这个 mod 的大部分物品和方块的主要成分。
source: This will be the main ingredient for most of this mod's items and blocks.

target: &n&5传动杆&r 在不改变齿轮速度的情况下传递动力。
source: &n&5Shafts&r transfer rotational power without changing the speed of the gears.

target: &n&5齿轮&r不仅可以传递动力，还可以使旋转速度加倍或减半。
source: The &n&5Cogwheel&r transfers rotational power but also doubles or halves speed.

target: 速度加倍也会使系统中的应力加倍。
source: Doubling speed will also double the stress in the system.

target: &n&5齿轮&r不仅可以传递动力，还可以使旋转速度加倍或减半。
source: The &n&5Cogwheel&r transfers rotational power but also doubles or halves speed.

target: 速度加倍也会使系统中的应力加倍。
source: Doubling speed will also double the stress in the system.

target: &n&5水车&r 是产生动力的最基本方式之一。 您可以通过将多个水车并排放置来连接它们。
source: The &n&5Waterwheel&r is one of the most basic ways of generating rotational force. You can hook up multiple wheels by placing them next to each other.

target: 它的旋转速度是通过有多少流动的水接触到轮子来衡量的。
source: The speed it's rotating at is measured by how many flowing water blocks are touching the wheel.

target: &n&5鼓风机&r 有多种用途。 如果将其放置在热源（如熔岩）上方，则可用于产生少量动力。
source: The &n&5Encased Fan&r has multiple uses. It can be used to generate a low amount of rotational energy if it's placed above a heat source, like Lava.

target: 如果您旋转它，它还可以用于拉/推物品和实体。 箭头将显示它面向的方向，旋转方向将决定它是推还是拉。
source: It can also be used to pull/push items and entities if you spin it. The arrow will show you the direction it's facing and the rotation direction will determine if it pushes or pulls.

target: &n&5齿轮箱&r 可以将动力方向向任意方向旋转90度。
source: The &n&5Gearbox&r can rotate the direction of the rotation in any direction by 90 degrees.

target: 如果施加红石信号，&n&5离合器&r 将停止旋转。
source: The &n&5Clutch&r will stop any rotation if a redstone signal is applied.

target: 如果施加红石信号，&n&5反转齿轮箱&r 将反转旋转方向。
source: The &n&5Gearshift&r will reverse the direction of rotation if a redstone signal is applied.

target: &n&5链式传动箱&r可以在任何方向与其他传动箱连接，只要他们接触即可。 他们将从侧向传递动力。
source: The &n&5Chain Drive&r can be linked with others in any direction as long as they are touching. They will relay the rotation sideways.

target: &n&5可调节链式传动箱&r的工作原理与没有红石信号时的普通链式传动箱类似。
source: The &n&5Adjustable Chain Drive&r works similar to the normal Chain Drive when it has no redstone signal.

target: 当您施加红石信号并且它是接收动力的方块时，它将使连接的链式传动箱的旋转速度加倍。
source: When you apply a redstone signal and it is the block receiving the rotational force, it will double the speed for the connected Chain Drives.

target: 当您施加红石信号并且它不是接收动力的方块时，它会将连接的链式传动箱的旋转速度减半。
source: When you apply a redstone signal and it is not the block receiving the rotational force, it will half the speed for the connected Chain Drives.

target: &n&5动力辊压机&r 可用于创建金属板或块。
source: The &n&5Press&r can be used to create metal plates or blocks.

target: &n&5动力搅拌器&r 可以与工作盆结合使用来制作。
source: The &n&5Mixer&r can be used combined with the Basin to craft.

target: &n&5工作盆&r用于配方制作，主要包括&n&5动力辊压机&r 和&n&5动力搅拌器&r。
source: The &n&5Basin&r is used for recipes, mainly including the &n&5Mechanical Press&r and the &n&5Mechanical Mixer&r.

target: 要获得 &n&5烈焰人燃烧室&r，您需要制作一个空的 烈焰人燃烧室，然后对着烈焰人右键。
source: To get the &n&5Blaze Burner&r, you need to make an Empty Blaze Burner and R-Click it on a Blaze.

target: 这用于在工作盆下加热或超级加热以用于不同的配方。
source: This is used under a Basin to heat it or super-heat it for different recipes.

target: &n&5动力活塞&r类似于普通活塞，它可以推动方块，但您可以根据需要添加任意数量的活塞杆。
source: The &n&5Mechanical Piston&r is similar to the Piston, it can push blocks, but you can add as many Extension Poles as you wish.

target: 速度表将显示当前连接系统的动力转速。
source: The Speedometer will show you the speed of the currently connected gear.

target: 当您连接系统时，应力表会显示当前系统的应力。
source: The Stressometer will show you how stressed the system is when you connect it.

target: &n&5矿车装配站&r 可以放置在轨道上。 如果装配站有红石信号，你在它上面建造的任何东西都会被矿车捡起。
source: The &n&5Cart Assembler&r can be placed on tracks. Anything you build on top of it will be picked up by a Minecart if the Assembler has a redstone signal.

target: 方块必须粘在一起，任何需要动力的方块都会自动工作。
source: The blocks must be glued together and any blocks requiring rotational force will automatically be working.

target: 要从矿车上“卸载”方块，只需关闭红石信号并让矿车通过即可。
source: To \"unmount\" the blocks from the Minecart, simply turn off the redstone signal and let the Minecart ride through.

target: &n&5机壳底盘&r 的使用方法类似于 &n&5强力胶&r。 它将在不需要胶水的情况下将方块连接成一条线。
source: The &n&5Linear Chassis&r can be used similar to the &n&5Super Glue&r. It will connect blocks in a line without the need for glue.

target: &n&5旋转地盘&r 的使用方法类似于 &n&5强力胶&r。 它将在侧面将方块连接成一条线，而无需胶水。
source: The &n&5Radial Chassis&r can be used similar to the &n&5Super Glue&r. It will connect blocks in a line, on the sides, without the need for glue.

target: 与&n&5风车轴承&r结合，创造出一个非常强大的风车，具有很高的抗压能力。
source: Combine with &n&5Radial Chassis&r to create a very powerful windmill that has high stress capacity.

target: &n&5动力钻头&r 会破坏它前面的任何方块。 如果它有连接的容器，则物品将存储在其中。
source: The &n&5Drill&r will break any block in front of it. If it has a connected inventory, the items will be stored in it.

target: &n&5动力锯&r 将砍伐它前面的树木。 它也可以用作锯木厂。 如果它有连接的容器，则物品将存储在其中。
source: The &n&5Saw&r will harvest trees in front of it. It can also be used as a Sawmill. If it has a connected inventory, the items will be stored in it.

target: &n&5机械手&r 可用于放置物品/方块或使用诸如剑之类的物品。
source: The &n&5Deployer&r can be used to either place items/blocks or to use items like Swords.

target: &n&5移动式存储接口&r 成对工作。 您需要将一个放置在世界上，另一个放置在移动的实体上，例如矿车。
source: The &n&5Portable Interface&r works in pairs. You need to have one placed in the world and another one on a moving entity, like a Minecart.

target: 当两个接口面对面时，它们会在彼此之间连接和传输物品。
source: When the two interfaces are facing each other, they will link and transfer items between each other.

target: &n&5动力收割机&r 将收割它经过的任何作物。 如果它有连接的容器，则物品将存储在其中。
source: The &n&5Harvester&r will harvest any crops it goes over. If it has a connected inventory, the items will be stored in it.

target: &n&5动力犁&r 将摧毁任何非固体方块，将泥土变成农田，并在不造成伤害的情况下弹射实体。 如果它有连接的容器，则物品将存储在其中。
source: The &n&5Plough&r will destroy any non-solid block, turn dirt into farmland and launch entities without doing damage. If it has a connected inventory, the items will be stored in it.

target: &n&5安山机壳&r 被用作大多数方块的制作原料。
source: &n&5Casings&r are used as a crafting ingredient for most blocks.

target: &n&5黄铜机壳&r 被用作大多数方块的制作原料。
source: &n&5Casings&r are used as a crafting ingredient for most blocks.

target: &n&5铜机壳&r 被用作大多数方块的制作原料。
source: &n&5Casings&r are used as a crafting ingredient for most blocks.

target: &c目前这个物品没有用处。
source: &cCurrently this item has no uses.

target: &c目前这个物品没有用处。
source: &cCurrently this item has no uses.

target: &n&5熔炉引擎&r 必须放置在熔炉或高炉上。 高炉的效率更高。
source: The &n&5Furnace Engine&r must be placed on a Furnace or Blast Furnace. The Blast Furnace will be more efficient.

target: 您还必须将其连接到 &n&5飞轮&r。 将它们隔开一个方块，让它们连接起来。
source: You must also connect it to a &n&5Flywheel&r. Place them one block apart to have them connect.

target: 熔炉产生的热量将使飞轮旋转，从而产生具有非常高应力的动力。
source: The heat created by the furnaces will spin the Flywheel, creating rotational force with very high stress capacity.

target: &n&5动力臂&r是一种机器，可以从箱子或传送带中取出物品并将它们放入不同的箱子、传送带或合成器。
source: The &n&5Arm&r is a machine that can take items from a Depot or a Belt and place them into a different Depot, Belt or Crafter.

target: 要选择输入/输出，请将动力臂握在手中，然后按右键单击要分配的方块。
source: To select input/output hold the Arm in your hand and R-Click the blocks you want to assign.

target: 要取消选择一个方块，请用手中的机械臂左键单击它。
source: To deselect a block, L-Click it with the Arm in your hand.

target: &n&5安山岩漏斗&r 可以从连接的容器中输入或输出物品。
source: The &n&5Funnel&r can import or export items from connected inventories.

target: &n&5黄铜漏斗&r 可以从连接的容器中输入或输出物品。
source: The &n&5Funnel&r can import or export items from connected inventories.

target: &n&5安山岩隧道&r可以放在传送带上，它们会过滤穿过它们的物品。 您可以通过将多个隧道彼此相邻放置来连接多个隧道。
source: The &n&5Tunnels&r can be placed on belts and they will filter items that pass through them. You can link multiple tunnels by placing them next to each other.

target: &n&5黄铜隧道&r可以放在传送带上，它们会过滤穿过它们的物品。 您可以通过将多个隧道彼此相邻放置来连接多个隧道。
source: The &n&5Tunnels&r can be placed on belts and they will filter items that pass through them. You can link multiple tunnels by placing them next to each other.

target: &n&5置物台&r 用于存储物品，主要与注液器搭配使用。
source: The &n&5Depot&r is used to store items, mainly for the Spout.

target: &n&5溜槽&r用于从容器中输入/输出，或从传送带放置/取出物品。
source: The &n&5Chute&r is used to insert/extract from inventories, or to place/take items from a belt.

target: &n&5可调节板条箱&r 是一个有可调节槽的箱子。 您可以通过限制插槽数量来选择它可以容纳多少组物品。
source: The &n&5Adjustable Crate&r is a Chest that has adjustable slots. You can select how many stacks it can hold by limiting the number of slots.

target: 这个工程师护目镜可以让您更详细地看到机械动能信息。
source: These goggles will allow you to see your contrations in more detail.

target: 它将显示为动力转速和应力。
source: It will show things as rotation speed and stress.

target: 你可以通过制作玫瑰石英和砂纸来制作这个。
source: You can create this by making Rose Crystals and Sand Paper.

target: 你可以用副手拿着水晶，也可以把它们扔在地上，然后在拿着砂纸的同时按右键。
source: You can either hold the crystals in your off-hand, or throw them on the ground and then R-Click while holding Sand Paper.

target: 要制作 &n&5光辉石&r，只需将一个或多个 &n&5异彩化合物&r 扔进已激活的 &n&5信标&r 的光束中即可。
source: To craft &n&5Refined Radiance&r simply throw one or more &n&5Chromatic Compound&r into the beam of an active &n&5Beacon&r.

target: 它将被转换并开始悬浮。 强烈推荐磁铁！
source: It will be converted and will start levitating. A magnet is highly recommended!

target: &n&5烈焰蛋糕&r用于对烈焰人燃烧器进行超级加热，以制作异彩化合物。
source: The &n&5Blaze Cake&r is used to Super-Heat the Blaze Burner for crafting the Chromatic Compound.

target: 要制作 &n&5异彩化合物&r，将所有配方扔进 &n&5工作盆&r 和 &n&5超级加热&r 的&n&5烈焰人燃烧室&r中，并用 &n&5烈焰蛋糕&r 为它加油。
source: To craft the &n&5Chromatic Compound&r throw all the recipes inside the &n&5Basin&r and &n&5Super-Heat&r the &n&5Blaze Burner&r by fueling it with a &n&5Blaze Cake&r.

target: 要制作 &n&5暗影钢&r，只需将一个或多个 &n&5异彩化合物&r 扔进虚空即可。
source: To craft &n&5Shadow Steel&r simply throw one or more &n&5Chromatic Compound&r into the void.

target: 它将被转换并重新悬浮起来。 强烈推荐磁铁！
source: It will be converted and will levitate back up. A magnet is highly recommended!

target: &n&5对称之杖&r将在您按右键的任何位置放置一面镜子。您放置在镜子一侧的所有内容都将复制到另一侧。
source: The &n&5Wand of Symmetry&r will place down a mirror wherever you R-Click it. Everything you place on one side of the mirror, will be copied to the other side.

target: 您也可以Shift+右键访问一些设置。
source: You can also Shift + R-Click to access some settings.

target: &n&5动力合成器&r 可以相互连接，形成一个巨大的世界内工作台。
source: The &n&5Crafters&r can be connected to each other to form a huge in-world crafting table.

target: 合成器上的箭头必须最终汇聚在同一个合成器上才能完成配方。 您可以通过用扳手右键单击来转动箭头。
source: The arrows on the Crafters must eventually converge on the same Crafter to finish the recipe. You can turn the arrows by R-Clicking it with the Wrench.

target: &n&5起重机取物器&r可以连接到起重机杆，如果起重机杆正在旋转，它会沿着它移动取物器。
source: The &n&5Gantry Carriage&r can be attached to Gantry Shafts and if the Shaft is rotating, it will move the Carriage along it.

target: &n&5弹射置物台&r 可以将物品或实体弹射到选定的位置。
source: The &n&5Weighted Ejector&r can launch items or entities to a selected location.

target: &n&5智能溜槽&r与普通溜槽相同，但具有附加功能，例如堆叠数量和过滤器。
source: The &n&5Smart Chute&r is the same as the Chute but with additional functionalities, such as stack size and filters.

target: 蓝图桌将从您的蓝图中读取和写入结构。
source: The Schematic Table will read and write structures to/from your schematics.

target: 您可以使用它来复制建筑物或与他人分享！
source: You can use it to copy buildings or to share them with others!

target: 蓝图加农炮将根据蓝图建造结构，从附近的箱子中获取材料并使用火药作为燃料。
source: The Cannon will build the structures from Schematics, taking materials from nearby chests and using gunpowder as fuel.

target: &n&5绳索滑轮&r 可以上下移动方块，它们可以粘在一起。
source: The &n&5Rope Pulley&r can move blocks up or down, they can be glued together.

target: &n&5注液器&r 用于用液体填充物品。 最好在它下面使用一个置物台来存放物品。
source: The &n&5Spout&r is used to fill items with liquid. It is best to use a Depot under it to hold the items.

target: &n&5软管滑轮&r 是一种可以抽取液体或放置液体的泵。
source: The &n&5Hose Pulley&r is a pump that can extract liquids or place liquids in the world.

target: &n&5移动式流体接口&r 成对工作。 您需要将一个放置在世界上，另一个放置在移动的实体上，例如矿车。
source: The &n&5Portable Interface&r works in pairs. You need to have one placed in the world and another one on a moving entity, like a Minecart.

target: 当两个界面彼此面对时，它们将在彼此之间连接和传递液体。
source: When the two interfaces are facing each other, they will link and transfer liquids between each other.

target: &n&5强力胶&r可用于将方块彼此连接，以通过活塞或其他方式移动它们。
source: &n&5Super Glue&r can be used to attach blocks to each other to move them with pistons or other means.

target: &n&5传送带&r 可以放置在两个 &n&5传动杆&r 之间以传输生物/物品或简单地将动力从一个点传输到另一个点。
source: &n&5Belts&r can be placed between two &n&5Shafts&r to transfer mobs/items or to simply transfer rotational energy from one point to another.

target: &n&5传动杆&r之间的角度必须为45、90或180度。
source: The &n&5Shafts&r must be at either 45, 90 or 180 degrees from each other.

target: 创造
source: Creative

target: 建立世界（或一个方块）
source: &6The queen of all bees is now here!&r

target: 这根本没用...
source: Needed for crafting OP creative items

target: 谁不想要无限的魔力？
source: To get the Shards, you will have to build a 4 block tall structure as such:

target: 元素工艺
source: ElementalCraft

target: 元素碎片
source: Element Shards

target: 这些碎片是通过杀死特定的生物而掉落的。 JEI 可以告诉您要为哪个元素杀死哪些生物。
source: These shards are dropped by killing specific mobs. JEI can tell you which mobs to kill for which element.

target: 元素工艺
source: ElementalCraft

source: Welcome to &aElementalCraft&f!

source: The &eElementopedia&f in you &eAkashic Tome&f will guide you through the mod.

target: 获取元素
source: Getting Elements

target: &e元素提取器&f 将从世界各地生成的元素源中提取元素。 提取器必须直接放置在元素源下方，同时也位于 &e元素容器&f 的顶部。
source: The &eelement extractor&f will extract element out of the element sources that are generated throughout the world. The extractor must be placed directly below the source while also on top of an &eelement container&f.

target: &e元素蒸馏器&f 将元素碎片转化为元素。 必须放在容器上面
source: The &eelement evaporator&f turns elemental shards into element. Must be placed ontop of a container

target: 必须放置在元素容器的顶部。
source: Must be placed on top of an element container.

source: Small Elemental Storage

source: Bigger Elemental Storage

target: 像普通的熔炉一样烹饪，但使用火元素作为燃料。
source: Cooks like a normal furnace, but uses fire element for fuel.

target: 可以研磨材料
source: Can grind up materials

source: Allows you to move elemental sources.

source: Improved Source Receptacle

source: Same as the source receptacle, but with more durability.

source: Elemental Ore Doubling

source: Preservation Runes

target: 可以承受爆炸和凋灵。
source: Can withstand explosions and the Wither.

source: Industrial Foregoing

target: 欢迎来到&a工业先锋&f！
source: Welcome to &aIndustrial Foregoing&f!

target: 从原木中提取胶乳。
source: Extracts latex from logs.

target: 查看JEI 可提取的原木和胶乳量。
source: Check JEI for acceptable logs and latex amounts.

target: 物品 \\& 流体运输
source: Item \\& Fluid Transport

source: Common Black Hole Storage

target: 粉红史莱姆 \\& 肉汤
source: Pink Slime \\& Liquid Meat

source: Conveyor Insertion \\& Extraction

source: Other Conveyor Upgrades

source: Plants

source: Other Machines
