source: Simple Black Hole Storage

target: 建议:
source: Suggestion:

target: 使用某种防凋零玻璃。
source: Use some sort of wither-proof glass.

target: 基座
source: Pedestals

target: 欢迎来到&a基座&f！
source: Welcome to &aPedestals&f!

target: 连接工具
source: Linking Tool

target: 将在基座之间传递能量。
source: Will transfer energy between pedestals.

target: 将在基座之间传输流体。
source: Will transfer fluids between pedestals.

target: 将在基座之间传输经验。
source: Will transfer XP between pedestals.

target: 欢迎来到&aPsi&f，一个&2Vazkii&f的模组！
source: Welcome to &aPsi&f, a mod by &2Vazkii&f!

target: 包含在您的&e阿卡什宝典&f中，&ePsi百科全书&f将提供有关此mod中物品和功能的更多信息。
source: Contained in your &eAkashic Tome&f, the &eEncyclopaedia Psionica&f will provide more information about the items and features in this mod.

target: 您的第一个&e铸造助手设备(CAD)&f！
source: Your first &eCasting Assistant Device (CAD)&f!

target: CAD装配器将用于满足您所有的&eCAD&f装配需求。
source: This station will be used for all of your &eCAD&f assembling needs.

target: 将您的&e铁质CAD机体&f放入&fCAD装配器&f中
source: Plop your &eIron CAD Assembly&f into the &fCAD Assembler&f

target: 将一些&e红石&f扔在地上，然后在附近使用新的&eCAD&f右键单击
source: Throw some &eredstone&f on the ground and right-click using your new &ecasting assistant device&f while nearby

target: 术式编写台将用于满足您所有的&d术式&f创作需求。
source: This station will be used for all of your &dspell&f creation needs.

target: 右键单击&e术式弹药&f到&e术式编写台&f以加载带有该&d术式&f的&e弹药&f。
source: Right-click a &espell bullet&f onto the &espell programmer&f to load the &ebullet&f with that &dspell&f.

target: 只需更改它所放置的&eCAD&f的psi颜色。
source: Simply changes the psi color of the &eCAD&f it's put onto.

target: 这对于功能性&eCAD&f不是必需的，它纯粹是为了美观
source: This is not required for a functional &eCAD&f, it is purely aesthetic

target: 用你刚做的花哨的新零件，做一个新的CAD，只有这个会更好！
source: Using the fancy new parts you just made, make a new CAD, only this one will be better!

target: &d术式&f必须具有&b启动式：灌注&f并命名为“&5Infusion&f”。
source: &dSpell&f must have &bTrick: Infusion&f and be named \"&5Infusion&f\".

target: &d术式&f必须包含&b启动式：高级灌注&f并命名为            “&5Greater Infusion&f”。
source: &dSpell&f must contain &bTrick: Greater Infusion&f and be named \"&5Greater Infusion&f\".

target: 与&epsi粉末&f类似，&epsi金属&f需要在地面上放置一个&e金锭&f并且在靠近&e金锭&f时使用“&5Infusion&f”&d术式&f。
source: Created similarly to &epsidust&f, &epsimetal&f requires a &egold ingot&f on the ground and the casting of the \"&5Infusion&f\" &dspell&f while near the &egold ingots&f.

target: 这个&d术式&f也可以用来制作&epsi粉末&f。
source: This &dspell&f can also be used to make &epsidust&f.

target: 与&epsi粉末&f和&epsi金属&f相同，输入是&e钻石&f和\"&5高级灌注&f\" &d术式&f。
source: Same as &epsidust&f and &epsimetal&f, the input being &ediamond&f and the \"&5Greater Infusion&f\" &dspell&f.

target: 这个&d术式&f也可以用来制作&epsi粉末&f和 &epsi金属&f。
source: This &dspell&f can also be used to make &epsidust&f and &epsimetal&f.

target: 乌木色\\&象牙白物质
source: Ebony \\& Ivory Substance

target: 与&epsi粉末&f、&epsi金属&f和&epsi宝石&f相同，输入是&e煤&f或 &e石英&f和“&5阴阳变化&f”&d术式&f。
source: Same as &epsidust&f, &epsimetal&f, and &epsigems&f, the input being &ecoal&f or &equartz&f and the \"&5Evony \\& Ivory&f\" &dspell&f.

target: 这个&d术式&f也可以用来制作&epsi粉末&f、&epsi金属&f和&epsi宝石&f。
source: This &dspell&f can also be used to make &epsidust&f, &epsimetal&f, and &epsigems&f.

target: 你必须在末地才能让这个&d术式&f启动！
source: You must be in the end for this &dspell&f to work!

target: 是时候制作一些&eCAD&f零件了！
source: Time to make some &eCAD&f parts!

target: - 核心决定最大法术复杂度
source: - Cores determine max spell complexity

target: - 电池决定最大psi数量
source: - Batteries determine max psi

target: - 弹夹决定&d术式&f的数量
source: - Sockets determine number of slots for &dspells&f

target: 更好的 CAD 零件
source: Better CAD Parts

target: &d术式&f必须包含&b启动式：阴阳变化&f并命名为“&5Ebony \\& Ivory&f”。
source: &dSpell&f must contain &bTrick: Ebony \\& Ivory&f and be named \"&5Ebony \\& Ivory&f\".

target: Psi金属工具
source: Psimetal Tools

target: 这些工具可以像&eCAD&f一样施法！
source: These tools can cast spells just like a &eCAD&f can!

target: 一种测量矢量的工具
source: A tool for measuring vectors

target: Psi金属装甲
source: Psimetal Exosuit

target: 这些装甲可以像&eCAD&f一样施法！
source: This armor can cast spells just like a &eCAD&f can!

target: 使用“已加载”的&e弹药&f制作它会将&e弹药&f上的任何&d术式&f保存到&e术式存储器&f。
source: Crafting this with a \"loaded\" &ebullet&f will save whatever &dspell&f is on that &ebullet&f to the &espell drive&f.

target: 在潜行时，右键单击&e术式存储器&f到&e术式编写台&f 上以加载保存的&d术式&f进行编辑。
source: While sneaking, right-click the &espell drive&f onto a &espell programmer&f to load up the saved &dspell&f for editing.

target: 更好的 CAD 零件
source: Even Better CAD Parts

target: 这些是&eCAD机体&f的最高级组件。
source: These are the highest tier components for &eCAD Assemblies&f.

target: 您需要选择最适合您需要的&e弹夹&f和&e核心&f。
source: You will need to choose which &esocket&f and &ecore&f best suits your needs.

target: 装甲传感器
source: Exosuit Sensors

target: 精致存储
source: Refined Storage

target: 控制器是精致存储网络的核心。 您需要将所有精致存储设备连接到此方块。
source: The Controller is the core of the Refined Storage network. You need to connect all the Refined Storage devices to this block.

target: 磁盘驱动器是您存储存储磁盘或流体存储磁盘的方块。
source: The 1k Storage Disk can store 1000 items.

target: 终端是一个方块，允许访问存储网络中的物品和流体。 玩家可以从中央GUI中提取物品或流体。
source: The 4k Storage Disk can store 4000 items.

target: 合成终端与普通终端相同，但具有制作栏。 制作物品时，它不仅会清除制作栏，还会尝试再次从存储网络中检索相同的物品。
source: The 16k Storage Disk can store 16000 items.

target: 样板终端与普通终端相同，但也允许创建模板。
source: The 64k Storage Disk can store 64000 items.

target: 流体终端与普通终端相同，但用于查看存储网络的流体存储中的流体。
source: The 65536k Storage Disk can store 65536000 items.

target: 1k存储元件可以存储1000个物品。
source: The 256k Storage Disk can store 256000 items.

target: 存储磁盘是存储来自存储网络的物品的物品。 它必须放在磁盘驱动器中。 存储磁盘掉落在世界中时不会消失。
source: The 1024k Storage Disk can store 1024000 items.

target: 4k存储元件可存储4000个物品。
source: The 4096k Storage Disk can store 4096000 items.

target: 16k存储元件可存储16000个物品。
source: The 16384k Storage Disk can store 16384000 items.

target: 64k存储元件可存储64000个物品。
source: The 262m Storage Disk can store well 262m items.

target: 65536k存储元件可存储65536000个物品。
source: The 1048m Storage Disk can store well 1048m items.

target: 256k存储元件可存储256000个物品。
source: It's like the regular one but ADVANCED.

target: 1024k存储元件可存储1024000个物品。
source: The Crafter is a block that crafts items with patterns. It can take speed upgrades to increase the crafting speed.

target: 它就像普通的但高级的。
source: The Wrench in Refined Storage is a tool that can do two things. Rotate blocks and Break Refined Storage covers. Simply sneak and right click when using the Wrench.

target: 合成仓是一种可以制作带有配方的物品的方块。 可以通过速度升级来提高制作速度。
source: The 1024k Fluid Storage Part is used to craft the 1024k Fluid Storage Disk.

target: 无线发送器用于向精致存储中的无线网络发送物品。
source: The 1048m Fluid Storage Part is used to craft the 1048m Fluid Storage Disk.

target: 线缆用于将设备连接到控制器。电缆并不总是必需的，只要设备在任何方向上彼此相邻，也将建立连接。
source: Allows you to limit who can access your grid, and what permissions they have.

target: 64k 流体存储元件用于制作 64k 流体存储磁盘。
source: The Portable Grid is a portable storage that isn’t connected to a network. It allows you to interact with a Storage Disk while not being connected to a network.

target: 256k 流体存储元件用于制作256k 流体存储磁盘。
source: Same as normal, but doesn't require power.

target: 1024k 流体存储元件用于制作1024k 流体存储磁盘。
source: Put your storage disks in here to add storage to your grid!

target: 4096k 流体存储元件用于制作4096k 流体存储磁盘。
source: Allows you to take items and fluids from one disk into another grid's disks.

target: 16384k 流体存储元件用于制作16384k 流体存储磁盘。
source: Used to tell crafters how to carft items for auto-crafting.

target: 65536k 流体存储元件用于制作65536k 流体存储磁盘。
source: Allows you to monitor the number of a certain item in your grid.

target: 262m流体存储元件用于制作262m流体存储磁盘。
source: The Wireless Transmitter is used to send signals to wireless network items in Refined Storage.

target: 建造无用的方块
source: Infinite fluid storage!

target: 建造无用的方块
source: These can add different attributes to Deconstructors to effect what happens when they mine a block.

target: 建造无用的方块
source: This can make machines work faster, or automatically craft items that are requested to be outputted.

target: 神秘农业
source: Mystical Agriculture

target: 神秘之路
source: Mystical Path

target: 下级耕地
source: The Inferior Essence

target: 灵魂之环
source: Circle of Souls

target: 有些种子需要你杀死获得种子所需的生物。
source: Some seeds require you to kill the mobs needed to get the seeds.

target: 它确实需要4瓶相同的生物。 匕首在杀死被动生物时有很大帮助。
source: It does require 4 jars of the same creature. The dagger helps a lot when killing the passive mobs.

target: 也有经验瓶，专供经验种子使用。
source: There is also the experience jar, it's just for the experience seed.

target: 喵喵喵我是一头牛...不！
source: Meow Meow I'm a Cow... NO!

target: 哔哔哔我是羊
source: Beep Beep I'm a Sheep

target: 是制作更高阶精华所必需的。
source: Is required for making higher tiered essence.

target: 制作精华，无限使用！
source: Crafting essence with infinite uses!

target: 将这些堆放在农田下将提高作物的生长速度。
source: Stacking these beneath farmland will increase the speed of crops.

target: 更高的等级有更大的范围，但效果相同。
source: Higher tiers have a larger range, but same effect.

target: 在作物附近或在作物上使用它可以帮助作物生长得更快！
source: Using this near or on crops will help the crops grow faster!

target: 更高的等级有更大的影响范围。
source: Higher tiers have a larger area of effect.

target: 这可以将您拥有的任何额外种子转化为它们各自的精华，但需要消耗燃料。
source: This can turn any extra seeds you have into their respective essence, at the cost of fuel.

target: 更高的等级更快。
source: Higher tiers are faster.

target: 比金苹果还好吃，还有好吃的小吃！
source: Better than a golden apple, and a tasty snack!

target: 更高的等级会提供更多的饥饿感和饱和度，以及更多的增益。
source: Higher tiers give more hunger and saturation, as well as more buffs.

target: 存储
source: Storage

target: 原版
source: Vanilla

target: 原版箱子
source: Vanilla Chest

target: 原版桶
source: Vanilla Barrel

target: 末影存储
source: Ender Storage

target: 颜色编码的末影存储。
source: Color coded ender storage.

target: 存储
source: Storage

target: 垃圾桶
source: Trash Cans

target: 一种销毁不需要的物品、液体和能量的方法。
source: A way to destroy unwanted items, liquid, and power.

target: 通用机械存储
source: Mekanism Storage

target: QIO 驱动器阵列
source: QIO Drive Array

target: &a通用机械&f版本的存储网络。
source: &aMekanism&f's version of a storage network.

target: 原版+
source: Vanilla+

target: 一个&e末影箱子背包&f。
source: An &eender chest backpack&f.

target: 附魔存储
source: Dimensional Storage

target: 维度存储
source: Refined Storage

target: 精致存储
source: Applied Energistics 2

target: 前往&a精致存储&f任务章节了解更多关于这个模组的信息。
source: Go to the &aApplied Energistics 2&f quest chapter for more on this mod.

target: 前往&a应用能源2&f任务章节了解更多关于这个模组的信息。
source: Can store tons of &eenchantments&f, whilst also being able to give back different leveled enchantments.

target: 技巧和窍门
source: Tips \\& Tricks

target: 自动化无限水的简单物品。 需要更多的水吗？ 再做一个！
source: Easy item to automate infinite water. Need more water? Make another!

target: 使用此物品缩小。 有助于自动化工作，也只是整体乐趣。
source: Use this item to shrink. Helpful for working on automation and also just overall fun.

target: 当您的物品不足时，可制作的 X 射线药水非常有用。
source: Craftable X-Ray potions are very useful when you are running low on an item.

target: 无线电源来修复你的电线。
source: Wireless power to fix your direwire.

target: 使用市场获取种子或树苗。 还要尝试尽可能多地食用食物以改善您的健康。
source: Use the market to get seeds or saplings. Also try and eat as many foods as you can to improve your health.

target: 睡袋可让您在夜间入睡。
source: The sleeping bag lets you sleep during the night.

target: 吊床让您白天睡觉。
source: The hammock lets you sleep during the day.

target: 两者都不会重置您的重生点。
source: Neither will reset your spawn-point.

target: 这是一个方块内的整个房间！
source: It's an entire room in one block!

target: 层级更高的内部空间更大。
source: Higher tiers are even bigger on the inside.

target: 存储您需要的所有指南！
source: Stores all the guidebooks you'll ever need!

target: 可以用一根棍子重新制作。
source: Re-craftable with one stick.

target: 在工具之间切换的快速方法。
source: A quick way to switch between tools.

target: 使用铁砧中的腰带包升级以增加容量。
source: Upgrade with belt pouches in an anvil to increase capacity.

target: 允许您将多个工具合二为一！
source: Allows you to store multiple tools in one!

target: 当查看来自该模组的方块时，它会自动变形为该模组的工具。 您必须通过制作来添加工具。
source: It'll automatically morph in to a mod's tool when looking at a block from that mod. You must add tools via crafting.

target: 建筑小帮手
source: Building Gadgets

target: 一些有用的建造小工具。
source: Some useful gadgets for building.

target: &c破坏小帮手使方块消失！
source: &cDestruction Gadget voids blocks!

target: 其他小工具
source: Other Gadgets

target: 可以帮助建设。
source: Can be helpful for building.

target: 建造手杖可以在制作栏中添加核心。潜行对空气左键来切换核心。
source: The consruction wand has cores that can be added to it in crafting. Sneak left-click the air to switch between cores.

target: 自动化盖亚守护者
source: Automating the Gaia Guardian

target: 通常，您无法自动化盖亚守护者。 制作ATM Star需要大量的体力劳动！
source: Normally, you can't automate the Guardian. It's a lot of manual labor to make the ATM Star!

target: 好吧，我们已经解决了这个问题！ 您现在可以使用Woot模组为ATM Star自动化盖亚守护者。
source: Well, we've fixed that! You can now use Woot to automate* Guardian farming for the ATM Star.

target: *（守护者只会掉落盖亚之魂和意志——你不可能拥有一切！）
source: The Gaia Guardian requires a tier V Woot farm, and one Gaia Spirit Ingot per spawn.

target: 科技
source: Tech

target: 奴隶劳动
source: Slave Labour

target: 自动筛选是一种服务器友好型获取材料的方式，它通过一个小型工人来完成你的工作。
source: Auto-Sieves are a server friendly way to get material, and it contains a mini slave to do your bidding.

target: 你可以通过对着使用自动筛子使用命名牌来更换工人。
source: You can change the slave by using a name tag on the auto-sieve.

target: 我们有4个人给你作为奖励。一些开发人员和一名帮助完成任务的玩家。
source: We have 4 people for you as reward. Some of the devs, and a player that helped with the quests.

target: 给奴隶更多的权力！
source: More power to the slaves!

target: 与之前的自动筛选几乎相同。但它可以筛各种压缩方块。
source: Pretty much the same as the previous auto-sieve. But it can use compressed grounded up blocks.

target: 显然，你可以选择任何你想自动收集砂砾/沙子/尘土的方法，但是除了锤击之外，还有许多其他方法可以得到它们。
source: Obviously you could choose any method you want to auto collect your gravel/sand/dust, but there are many other ways to get them than just hammering.

target: 也许需要一些自动化。
source: Maybe some automation.

target: 这个管道模组是一个全方位的强者，从过滤选项到渲染效率都有极大的优化，所以给你的服务器所有者一个周末的假期并尝试试用一下吧；）
source: This pipe mod is an all round powerhouse, from filtering options to greatly optimised, so give your server owner the weekend off and try them out ;)

target: 动态熔岩动力
source: Dynamic Lava Power

target: 等一下，你在一个空岛包里，不打算用熔岩为你的基地供电？ 亵渎神明
source: Wait there a second, you are in a skyblock pack and not planning on powering your base with lava? BLASPHEMY

target: 你离天使戒指还有点远，所以喷气背包可能会防止你死于虚空......
source: You are a little far away from an angel ring, so a jetpack might stop you dying to the void...

target: 基座的力量！
source: The Power of Pedestal!

target: 基座是一个可以极大地接受新想法的模组。
source: Pedestal is a mod that greatly opens to new ideas.

target: 你可以通过Jei获得有关每个基座升级的信息。
source: With Jei you can get info on each pedestal upgrade.

target: 可以对升级进行附魔以获得更好的效果。
source: The Upgrades can be Enchanted for better results.

target: 任意连接工具
source: Any #pedestals:linkingtool

target: 有许多产生能量的模组，其中一些比其他的更好。
source: There are many mods that generates power, some of which are better then others.

target: 为此，你必须至少完成某些模组的基础发电机。
source: For this, you must do at least the basic generators of certain mods.

target: &c\"这些任务并不意味着需要在第一阶段完成。它们旨在教授它们所属模组的能量生产，并奖励你其模组的电池。我会做一些更多的可选任务。但奖励仍将与他们的模组有关。燃煤发电机除外。\"&r
source: &c\"These quest werent meant to be proportionate at 1st. They were meant for teaching the energy production of their mod, and reward you their mods battery. I will make some more optional. But the rewards will still be related to their mod. With the exception of coal generators.\"

target: 发电量
source: Generating Power

target: 我能在熔岩中游泳！
source: I can swim in lava!

target: 这是一种在被熔岩包围时才会工作的特殊机器。
source: This is one special machine that works when surrounded by lava.

target: 你甚至可以\"Lava-log\"它来产生更多的能量。
source: You can even \"Lava-log\" it to generate more power.

target: 它甚至可以填充\"MOAR POWAH!\"
source: It can also be filled for EVEN MOAR POWAH!

target: 火烧屁股？需要水吗？
source: Heated Bum? Need water?

target: 这个模组的发电机可以通过合成来升级。
source: The generators of this pack can be upgraded by crafting.

target: 该发电机将通过下方的热源产生电力，同时需要填充冷却剂，最常见的是水。
source: This generator will produce power with a heat source underneath and filling it up with a coolant, most commonly water.

target: 沉浸式扭转
source: Immersive Twist

target: 该发电机需要另一个为其提供旋转力的部件。
source: This generator, requires another part that gives a rotational force to it.

target: 值得庆幸的是它有两种工作方式，当你有更好的能量来源时，它们可以在不需要时用作装饰品。
source: Thankfully it has 2 ways for it, and they can be used as decorations when not needed when you get better power.

target: 但最棒的是，这个发电机不需要燃料。
source: But the best part of this, is that the generator doesn't need fuel.

target: 太多燃煤发电机了
source: Too Many Coal Generators

target: 基座升级：粉碎升级
source: Pedestal Upgrade: Crusher

target: 要找云母吗？
source: Looking for Mica?

target: 你必须在末地放置一个虚空采掘机。
source: You have to make a void miner in the End.

target: 一种动力发电机，可以使用大多数油类流体，甚至是来自沉浸工程高炉的杂酚油。
source: A dynamic generator that can use most oil type fluids, even the Creosole Oil from Immersive Engineering's Blast Furnace.

target: 这种动力发电机使用金属币来产生大量的电力。
source: This dynamic generator uses Metal coins to produce a large amount of power.

target: 这种动力发电机使用晶体作为动力源，例如钻石、青金石和石英。
source: This dynamic generator uses Crystals as a power source, such as diamonds, lapis, and quartz.

target: 冷和热
source: Hot and Cold

target: 该发电机两侧都需要一个热或冷源块。这不会消耗材料。
source: This generator requires both sides a hot and cold source block.

target: 所有4个面都可以使用，只要它们的相对面温度相反。
source: All 4 sides can be used as long as their opposite side is the opposite temperature.

target: 所以，这是另一种无限获得少量能量的方法。
source: This will not consume the materials. So it's another way for infinite source of low energy.

target: 风能
source: Power of the Wind

target: 与通用机械的风车不同，这款风车在任何高度的发电量都一样。
source: Unlike mekanism's windmill this one works the same at any hight.

target: 只要风车前面没有任何东西，它就会产生电力，在下雨天它会产生更多的电力。
source: As long as nothing is in front of the windmill it will produce power, it gains more power during rainy days.

target: 可以对其使用风车叶片来升级它。
source: It can be upgraded when using a Windmill sail on it.

target: 渴望熔岩
source: Thirsty for lava

target: 这台发电机需要熔岩来发电。
source: This generator requires molten lava to generate power.

target: 分层存储
source: Tiered Storage

target: 热力能量单元
source: Thermal Power Containment

target: 低压电池
source: Low Voltage Battery

target: 低压
source: Low Voltage

target: 来自天空的力量
source: Power from the skies

target: 这个模组的风力发电机放置得越高，效果越好。
source: The wind generators of this mod works best the higher up you place them.

target: 植物动力！
source: Plant Power!

target: 这使用生物燃料作为......以及燃料。
source: This uses Bio Fuel as... well Fuel.

target: 他只依赖生物燃料发电。
source: It's only dependant to it.

target: 洛基认为这是霜之哀伤
source: Loki though it was Frostmourn

target: 压力的世界。
source: The world of Pressure.

target: 欢迎来到科技模组的爆炸性一面&b&lPneumaticraft&r&f（&cP不发音&f）&r。
source: Welcome to the explosive side of the Tech mods, &b&lPneumaticraft&r &f(&cThe P is Silent&f).

target: 你实际上需要在地面上炸铁以获得压缩铁。
source: You actually need to blow up Iron on the ground to get compressed Iron.

target: 我会很慷慨的为这次爆炸提供32个压缩铁。
source: I feel generous and will give 32 compressed iron for this explosive effort.

target: 你必须有一块防爆地板，如黑曜石。最便宜的炸药是迷你TNT，它很管用。
source: You must have a blast resistant floor such as obsidian. The Cheapest explosive is Tiny TNT and it works.

target: 管道和……爆炸？
source: Pipes and... Explosions?

target: 许多人避免使用气动工艺的主要原因之一是……他甚至连管道都可以爆炸。但气动工艺有防止管道和机器爆炸的方法：
source: One of the main reasons that pneumaticraft was much avoided by many are that... they can explode even the pipes.

target: 但是气动工艺有办法防止管道和机器爆炸：
source: But pneumaticraft has ways to prevent the explosions for the pipes and machines:

target: - 放置在管道顶部的&c安全管道模块&r可以释放超过4.9的压力。
source: - The &cSafety Tube Modual &fin which you place on top of tubes to release pressure past 4.9.

target: - &c安全升级&r是一种可以放置在您的机器和压缩机中的升级。
source: - The &cSecurity Upgrade &fwhich is an upgrade for to be place inside your machines and generators.

target: 熔岩压力
source: Lava Pressured

target: 最好的早期机器，特别是如果你有办法获得无限量的熔岩。
source: The best early machine especially if you have a way to get indefinate quantities of lava.

target: 压缩空气
source: Stressing an Air Head

target: 第一台产生压力的压缩机。
source: The 1st generator to produce Pressure.

target: 它消耗煤炭等固体燃料。
source: It consumes solid fuel such as coal.

target: 冷和热
source: Hot and Cold

target: 该压缩机利用温差产生压力。这台发电机利用温差产生压力。
source: This generator uses heat difference to generate pressure.

target: 它会冷却热源，加热冷源，但有一些方法可以解决这个问题。
source: It will cool the heat, and heat the cold, but there are ways around that.

target: &a植物魔法&r和&b通用机械&r提供了可以帮助这台机器的无限热源和冷源。
source: &aBotania &fand &bMekanism &fdoes provide a indefinate source of heat and cold blocks that can help with this machine.

target: 还有，&b通用机械&r的管道适用于气动工艺。
source: And yes, &bMekanism &fpipes works on Pneumaticraft.

target: 在&a植物魔法&r里，你可以用白雏菊来制作冰。它会使水重新冻结成冰。&c确保气动工艺的涡流管连接到冰块上&r。
source: But for &aBotania&f, you need to make Ice with it's pure daisy. It will refreeze the ice. Pneumaticraft &cHeat pipes do connect to ice blocks&f.

target: 多段增压
source: Multiblock Pressurization

target: 这是气动工艺最核心的机器。
source: This is the main machine of the pneumaticraft mod.

target: 压力室。
source: The Pressure Chamber.

target: 不再需要让铁冒爆炸的风险，你可以按1比1的比例对铁加压。
source: No more need to risk your iron in explosions, you can pressurize the iron in a 1 by 1 ratio.

target: 它甚至可以用来为你的物品附魔，只需要它是有效的附魔而且不需要经验。但它不会升级你的附魔。换句话说：如果你添加另一个耐久2，它不会升级到耐久3。但它仍然可以接受其他不在装备上的附魔。
source: It can even be use to Enchant your items, as long as it's a valid enchantment and no experience cost. But it won't upgrade your enchantments. In other words: Unbreaking 2 won't upgrade to unbreaking 3 if you add another unbreaking 2. But it can still accept other enchantments that are not on the gear.

target: 该真空泵会将压力反转为负值。
source: This vacuum pump will reverse pressure into the negatives.

target: 当在压力室上使用时，它目前只能通过使用物品和书来从物品中提取附魔。
source: When used on a pressure chamber it currently only extract enchantments from items, by using the item and a book.

target: 气动工艺这个模组里有很多工具。但它们需要压力才能使用。
source: Pneumaticraft has many tools in their shed. But it requires pressure to be used.

target: 因此，最好拥有一个充气站来让它们顺利工作。如果从那时起你就有扳手的话，它会对你有所帮助。
source: So having a charging station is better to get things on the roll. But it helps if you have the wrench as well from then on.

target: 加工转化
source: Processing Transformation

target: 这台机器的工作方式与炼油厂相同，但需要额外的步骤。
source: This machine can work the same way as the Refinery but with extra steps.

target: 它是获得气动工艺的塑料的主要机器。
source: It is the main machine to get Pneumaticraft Plastic.

target: 亚马龙平板电脑可能可以获得润滑剂，但为了自动化，最好使用这台机器。
source: The Amadron Tablet might get Lubricant, but for automation, it is best to use this machine.

target: 另外，你不需要使用原油来获得塑料。因为它为流体混合器提供乙醇和植物油。
source: Plus you don't need to use crude oil to get to plastic using this. As it provides Ethenol, and Plant Oil for the Fluid Mixer.

target: 塑料，带有粉红色粘液。
source: Plastic, with pink slime.

target: 这台机器将原油加工成各种液体，如液化石油气，液化石油气是制造气动塑料的主要原料之一。
source: This machine will process crude oil into various liquids such as LPG which is the one of the main ingrediants to make Pneumaticraft Plastic.

target: 它还提供其他非常有用的液体。
source: It also gives other liquids that are very useful.

target: 速度升级就是由它制作的，它可以加快您所有的气动工艺机器的速度。
source: Speed Upgrade does what it does, it speeds up all your pneumaticraft machines at that they do.

target: 流体混合器是可选的，但它确实提供了一个副产品，可以使您获得的润滑油数量翻倍来用于制作速度升级。
source: Fluid Mixer is optional, but it does give a byproduct that can double the amount you get for crafting speed upgrades.

target: 塑料，没有粉红色粘液。
source: Plastic, without pink slime.

target: 这台机器将在不使用流体镭射钻的情况下提供塑料的主要成分。它确实为气动工艺的分支增加了更多步骤，但它仅适用于该分支，无需访问其他模组。
source: This machine will give the main ingrediant for Plastic without the use of the Fluid Mining Laser. It does give more steps to the pneumaticraft branch, but it's only for that branch without the need to visit other mods.

target: 它可以使用乙醇和植物/蔬菜油来制造生物柴油。生物柴油可用于制造润滑剂和塑料。
source: It can use Ethenol, and Plant/Vegetable Oil to make Biodiesel. Which can be use to make Lubricant and Plastic.

target: 一些必要的组装
source: Some assembly required

target: 无中生有
source: Ex Nihilo

target: 这是你将各种方块放进筛网筛选有效材料和获取资源的基本方法，就这么简单！
source: This is your basic way to get materials, insert mesh, sieve a valid material and get resources, its that simple!

target: 将多个筛子并排放置会变成一个多方块结构，它可以让你成组的筛。
source: Putting multiple sieves side by side acts as a multiblock structure, letting you sieve in bundles.

target: &6&l不要对它们使用自动点击器&r
source: &6&lDO NOT USE AN AUTO-CLICKER ON THEM

target: 因为游戏的原因，这将导致你出现卡顿。
source: This will cause server issues if you start getting an overflow.

target: 我们有自动筛子。
source: We do have Auto-Sieves.

target: 坩埚是关键
source: Crucial Crucible

target: 坩埚只是熔岩生产方面的冰山一角，在这种情况下也许是火山。
source: Crucible are the tip of the iceberg or in this case volcano when it comes to lava production.

target: 在其下方需要一个热源它才能发挥作用。
source: It needs a heat source under it to function.

target: 火把、火、熔岩和一些方块提供它们自身的热量等级。
source: Torch, Fire, Lava, and some blocks provide their own level of heat.

target: 加热后，你可以将材料手动放入或自动输入坩埚中，有些材料比其他材料产生更多的熔岩。
source: Once heated you can put or pump materials into the crucible(s), some materials provide more lava then others.

target: 这可能可以作为不需要电的自动熔岩制造机。
source: This can potentionally be use as a power free AFK lava generator.

target: 这甚至不是我的最终形态！
source: This is not even my final form!

target: 将尘土转化的唯一方法是要么筛成材料，要么将其变成粘土。
source: The only way to transform dust beyond, is to either sieve into materials, or turn it into clay.

target: 你也可以将其制成熔岩……但与圆石相比，尘土产生的熔岩量只有1/5。所以这不是个明智的选择。
source: You could also made it into lava... but compared to cobblestone, dust gives 1/5 the amount of lava. So not a wise choice.

target: 我不是骗子！等一下……
source: I am not a crook! Oh wait...

target: 木钩子是获取蚕的主要工具，并且有更高的几率从所有的树叶中获得树苗。
source: Wooden crooks are a staple to getting silk worms and higher chance for saplings from all trees.

target: 有许多不同耐久度的钩子。
source: There are many crooks with varying durability.

target: 研磨时间
source: Time to Grind

target: 要获得接下来的3种筛制材料，你必须锤击它们。
source: To get the next 3 sieving materials, you have to hammer them.

target: 只需将方块放下并用锤子打碎它们。压缩锤子会破坏压缩方块。
source: Simply place the block down and break them with the hammer. The Compact Hammer will break Compact Blocks.

target: Jei会显示可被破坏的方块。
source: Jei will show the blocks that can be broken.

target: 圆石>砂砾>沙子>尘土
source: Cobble > Gravel > Sand > Dust

target: 一个可以去末地的蛋糕。
source: A cake to drag-on.

target: 吃掉这个蛋糕会把你传送到末地。
source: This cake will teleport you to the end when eaten.

target: 这个蛋糕可以通过添加末影之眼来修复。
source: This cake can be fixed by adding an eye of ender to it.

target: 它特别引人注目。
source: It's especially Eye Catching.

target: 自从我们上次遇到筛网以来，筛网已经升级，现在可以升级到下界合金级别！下界合金网将是你获得ATM锭的方法
source: Meshes have been given an upgrade since we last encountered them, now going upto netherite! the netherite mesh will be your method into allthemodium

target: 请注意，绿宝石筛网不能升级到下界合金（？）。
source: Note that Emerald mesh won't upgrade to Netherite.

target: 有虫害！
source: There is an infestation!

target: 蚕从被钩子打碎的树叶上掉下来。
source: Silkworms drops from leaves that been broken by a crook.

target: 可以用来做饭，也可以用来感染感染树叶。
source: Can be cook for food, or used on leaves to infest them.

target: 被感染的树叶会掉落线，但不会掉树苗。
source: Infested leaves will drop strings, but no saplings.

target: 一个肮脏的想法。
source: A Dirt-y idea.

target: 筛泥土可以获得这些种子。
source: These seeds are from sieving dirt.

target: - 古代孢子会将泥土变成菌丝
source: - Ancient spores will turn dirt to Mycelium

target: - 草种子会将泥土变成草方块。
source: - Grass seed turns dirt to grass.

target: - 种植2x2的云杉树苗不仅会生成一棵巨树，还会将区域内的所有草和泥土变成灰化土
source: - Making a 2x2 of Spruce saplings not only spawns a giant tree but turns all grass and dirt to Podzol within an area

target: 所有的圆石制造机！
source: All the cobble gens!

target: 这个整合包里有很多圆石制造机。
source: There are many cobble generators in this modpack.

target: 从原版，到圆石制造机，甚至是基座。
source: From Vanilla, to Cobble Gens, to even Pedestals.

target: 随意选择你喜欢的。
source: Feel free to choose what you like.

target: 提示：要从\"CobbleForDays\"这个模组的机器中获取圆石，你只需在机器的顶部放置一个诸如箱子之类的存储装置。
source: Note: to get the cobble from the \"Cobble for days\" machines you just have to put a storage such as a chest on top.

target: 一切的开始
source: From the Beginning

target: 这个整合包中有2种空岛类型。
source: There are 2 skyblock types that exist in this pack.

target: 水晶花园：有水、草、泥土和活根。
source: Garden of Glass, with water, grass, dirt, and roots.

target: 水晶花园模组添加了卵石，你只需蹲下，然后（默认情况下）鼠标右键单击草地/泥土。活根可以制作成树苗。
source: There is stone from the GOG mod, you simply crouch and by default right mouse click on grass/dirt. Roots can be crafted into sapplings.

target: 还有经典的空岛一代。
source: There is also the Classic Skyblock generation.

target: 它有一棵树，种在草地和泥土上，还有一个装有熔岩桶和冰块的箱子。
source: It has a tree, on grass and dirt, plus a chest with a bucket of lava and an ice block.

target: 如果由于某种原因丢失了树苗，你可以在任务页面左上角的紧急物品中获得一些树苗。
source: If for some reason you lost sapplings, you can get some at the top left corner of the quest page in Emergency Items.

target: 任意原木
source: Any #minecraft:logs

target: 串起绳子
source: Strung for Strings

target: 尽早铺一张白床非常重要，尤其是在存在那些幻翼的情况下。
source: Quite important to make a White bed early, especially with those Phant0ms out there.

target: 简单的圆石
source: Simply Cobble

target: 圆石，对空岛来说从一开始就是最基本和最有用的方块。
source: Cobblestone, the most basic, and useful block for skyblock since it's beginning.

target: 桶的乐趣
source: Barrel of fun

target: 现在你有了一个筛子桶，这是迈向其他材料的重要一步！
source: Now you have a sieve the barrel is an important step towards other materials!

target: 把它放在菌丝的顶部可以吧水转化为巫水。巫水可以转化某些小怪，或者拿着沙子对着装满巫水的桶右键来获得灵魂沙。
source: Place it ontop of mycellium for witch water. Which can transform certain mobs, and it's to make soulsand if sand is used in the witch water filled barrel.

target: 拿着尘土对着装满水的桶右键，你会得到粘土。
source: Using dust in a water filled barrel and you will get clay.

target: 石桶可用于冷却或加热液体。
source: Stone Barrels can be used for both hot and cold liquids.

target: 早期刷石机?
source: Early Cobble Gen?

target: 对于不想浪费太多时间的人，或者水晶花园被移除或禁用。
source: For people who don't want to waste too much time, or if Garden of Glass is removed or broken.

target: 这里是一个熔岩桶和一个水桶，可以满足你对圆石的需求。
source: Here is a lava and water bucket for your cobble needs.

target: 热源
source: Heat Sources

target: 将鼠标悬停在坩埚上时按下U键（默认）可以看到热源。
source: Heat Sources can be seen from pressing U while hovering your mouse over a crucible.

target: 由于某些显示问题，x4热源将无法显示。所以我会在这里告诉你，它是火。
source: Due to some display problem, the x4 source won't display. So I will say it here, that it's fire.

target: 熔岩块？
source: Blocks for Lava?

target: 熔岩生产不仅需要热量，还需要方块。
source: Lava production not only needs heat, but also needs blocks for production.

target: 将鼠标悬停在物品栏中的坩埚上方时按U键（默认），将显示它可以转化的方块。
source: Pressing U while hovering over the crucible in the inventory, will show what it can take.

target: 圆石是过去最常见的用途，每块产生1/4桶熔岩。
source: Cobblestone is the most common use in the past that produces 1/4 bucket per block of lava.

target: 但是黑曜石和地狱岩可以制造一整桶熔岩。
source: But Obsidian and Netherrack makes a whole bucket of lava.

target: 流体转换
source: Fluid Transformation

target: 需要流体转换才能获得一些资源。
source: Fluid Transformation is required to receive some resources.

target: 对于这个任务，我将解释如何获得这些液体，至于接下来的任务，将解释它可以做什么。
source: For this quest, I will explain how to get those fluids, as for the next quests, will explain what it can do.

target: 要获得巫水，将装满水的桶放在菌丝体，海水同理，但需要放在在沙子上。
source: To get Witch Water, your barrel full of water must be on Mycelium, and as for Sea Water, same, but on sand instead.

target: 怪物召唤和转化
source: Mob Summoning and Changing

target: 刷怪蛋和怪物转化是无中生有模组的一项附加功能。
source: Mob spawning and changing is a bonus from the Ex Nihilo mod.

target: 怪物可以通过巫水转化：
source: Mobs can be transformed when doused, mainly by witch water:

target: - 村民 -> 女巫
source: - Villagers -> Witches

target: - 苦力怕 -> 闪电苦力怕
source: - Creepers -> Charged Creepers

target: - 鱿鱼 -> 恶魂
source: - Squids -> Ghasts

target: - 骷髅 -> 凋灵骷髅
source: - Skeletons -> Wither Skeletons

target: 你也可以使用人偶，从桶中召唤怪物。当你将鼠标悬停在物品上时，人偶会在提示里为你提供召唤它们所需的信息。
source: You can also use dolls, to summon mobs from barrels. The dolls required does give you what you need to summon them in their info when you hover your mouse over the item.

target: 然后带上鞘翅
source: Then drag-on the Elytra

target: 击败末影龙后，它会掉落一个鳞片，发生这种情况时随身携带一块磁铁会很有用。
source: With the dragon defeated, it will drop a scale, it would be useful to have a magnet with you when it happens.

target: 它会掉落一个夸克龙鳞，这是目标产物，
source: It will drop a Quark dragon scale, which it's goal of production,

target: 魔法的进化
source: Magical Advances

target: 这应该可以帮助您处理一些您还无法获得的物品
source: This should help you with some items you do not yet have access to

target: 这可以在草地上使用，以获得神秘花来开始植物魔法。
source: This can be used on grass, to produce Mystical Flowers to get started on Botania.

target: 这个配方是临时的，请不要批判，会令人害羞
source: The recipe is temporary, please do not judge it, it's shy

target: 助你发展的水晶
source: A crystal for your progression

target: 为了那些不想使用虚空矿物采掘机来获得星辉矿的人。
source: For those who doesn't want to use the void miner to get starmetal.

target: 最初需要的花。
source: The primary flower needed.

target: 你需要这朵花来制作白雏菊。
source: You need this flower to make a pure daisy.

target: 当原木和石头放在白雏菊周围时，它们将分别变成活木和活石。
source: In which when wood and stone are placed around the pure daisy it will change to Livingwood and livingstone respectively.

target: 最常用的产能花
source: The most commonly use Flower Generator

target: 对许多人来说，这是最基本的产能花，甚至在后期游戏中也被广泛使用。这朵花通过燃烧掉落在它附近的熔炉燃料来产生魔力。
source: The most basic, and hugely used even late game for many. This flower burns furnace fuels that are drop near it to produce mana.

target: 一些装置可用于自动化燃料，以使你的掉落物不会消失。
source: Some setups can be use to automate fuel so that your drops won't despawn.

target: 召唤盖亚
source: Summoning Gaia

target: 基座
source: Pedestals

target: 入门
source: Getting Started

target: 基座是一个有趣且非常有用的模组。
source: Pedestal is a fun and very useful mod to have.

target: 它可以做饭，它可以耕种，它可以杀人。
source: It can Cook, it can Farm, it can Kill.

target: JEI提供了许多细节及其用法。这将节省我的一些写作时间。
source: Many of the details are provided by JEI and their usage. Which will save me some writing time.

target: 任意连接工具
source: Any #pedestals:linkingtool

target: 能量转移
source: Energy Transfer

target: 农作物种植
source: Crop Farming

target: 流体传输
source: Fluid Transfer

target: 物品转运
source: Item Transfer

target: 伐木工……或蘑菇采集者……
source: Tree Feller... or Feeler...

target: 经验收集
source: Experience Gathering

target: 可过滤的采石场
source: A filtered Quarry

target: 血金属
source: Blood Metal

target: 烧它...
source: Furnace it...

target: 粉碎它...
source: Crush it...

target: 我看见尘埃...
source: I Saw Dust...

target: 附魔勋章
source: Enchanting Medal

target: 运输类型升级
source: Transport Type Upgrades

target: 农业类型升级
source: Farming Type Upgrades

target: 转换类型升级
source: Transformation Type Upgrades

target: 经验存储
source: XP Storage

target: 能量存储
source: Energy Storage

target: 流体储存
source: Fluid Storage

target: 至少不会降级
source: At least it doesn't degrade

target: 烧它！
source: Furnace it!

target: 粉碎它！
source: Crush it!

target: 我看到了尘埃！
source: I Saw Dust!

target: 方块破坏器
source: Block Breaker

target: 令资源丰富的方法
source: Resourceful Ways

target: 本页中的任务主要是蜜蜂和神秘农业
source: Incomming quests in this page will be mainly Bees, and Mystical Agriculture

target: 对于空岛，将有一个配方来制作蜜蜂刷怪蛋。
source: For Sky, the Natural spawning Bees will have a crafting recipe to spawn them.

target: 目前有石英,圆石,熔岩,水,彩虹,辉光,原木,骨,岩浆,末影,史莱姆,和蜂力怕.
source: Currently Quartz, Cobbee, Lava, Water, RGB, Glowing, Lumber, Spooky, Magma, Ender, Slimy, and Beeper.

target: 接地的怪物
source: Grounded Mobs

target: 神秘之路
source: Mystical Path

target: 危险，玩家！危险！
source: Danger, Player! Danger!

target: 多亏了匠魂，灵魂熔岩现在可以制作了。
source: Thanks to Tinker's Construct, Soul Lava is now craftable.

target: 请注意，灵魂熔岩的燃烧半径最大为10个方块，因此&c不要将它放在任何木质平台附近。&r
source: Take note, that Soul Lava has a burn radius of at most 10 blocks, so &cDON'T PUT IT NEAR ANY WOOD PLATFORMS.

target: 最好使用石制地板，因为火势会蔓延到所有方块。
source: It's best if you use bottom stone slabs, since the fire does spread on all blocks.

target: 灵魂熔岩与某些液体结合时具有一些特殊的属性。（主要是水和熔岩）
source: Soul Lava has some neat attributes when combined with certain liquids. (mainly water and lava)

target: 耶！
source: YEET!

target: 加入鸡蛋
source: Drag-in the Egg

target: 欢迎来到突变系第二只真正的突变蜜蜂。
source: Welcome to the true 2nd mutation bee of the mutation line.

target: 要得到这只蜜蜂，你必须用凋零蜜蜂给龙蛋授粉来变异龙蛋。
source: To get this bee, you have to mutate a dragon egg by pollinating it, with a wither bee.

target: 接着完成从龙到后续材料的突变任务吧。
source: Then from the Dragon to the next material and so on for these mutation quests.

target: 下级精华
source: The Inferior Essence

target: 灵魂之环
source: Circle of Souls

target: 有些种子需要你杀死获得种子所需的生物。
source: Some seeds require you to kill the mobs needed to get the seeds.

target: 它需要4罐相同生物的灵魂瓶。使用离魂匕首击杀有对应生物种子的生物时，物品栏中没有装满的灵魂瓶会收集其灵魂。
source: It does require 4 jars of the same creature. The dagger helps a lot when killing the passive mobs.

target: 还有经验胶囊，只是给经验种子用的。
source: There is also the experience jar, it's just for the experience seed.

target: 使我凋零
source: Wither me down

target: 这种玻璃可以阻止光线通过。
source: This glass prevents light to go through.

target: 然而令人惊讶的是，它同时能阻止凋灵破坏它。
source: Yet surprisingly it also prevents the wither boss to break it.

target: 刷怪塔实用设备
source: Mob Grinding utilities

target: 它会搅拌吗？
source: Will it blend?

target: 它需要红石信号才会工作，但它比锥刺更强大。
source: This works with redstone, but it's way more powerful then the spikes.

target: 它可以升级。这将在下一个任务中提供。
source: It can be upgraded. Which will be provided in the next quest.

target: 三重审判
source: Bad Time Trio

target: 这些是最受欢迎的怪物捣碎器升级。
source: These are the most popular to be added those bonified blenders.

target: 还有更多可以添加和组合的内容。
source: There are more that can be added and combined.

target: 额外的火力
source: Extra fire power

target: 与附魔不同，即使你有了锋利，你仍然可以添加另外两个特定的怪物伤害升级。
source: Unlike enchanting, even if you have sharpness you can still add the other two specific mob damage upgrade.

target: 火力升级……它几乎能秒杀怪物。
source: Fire upgrade... it pretty much cooks up your mobs to oblivion.

target: 这是末影人农场的必需品
source: This is a must for enderman farming

target: 因为我已经在提示和技巧中给你了一个，所以这只是针对刷怪塔实用设备的套装。
source: Since I already gave one in Tips and Tricks, this is just here for the mob grinding set.

target: 当你建立一个怪物农场时，一定要使用这些来防止末影人传送出你的农场。
source: When you make a mob farm do use these to prevent enderman from teleporting out of your farms.

target: 最大的怪物风扇
source: Mob's Biggest Fan

target: 就升级时的影响区域而言，这是游戏中最好的风扇。它需要被红石激活，但它可以将怪物推到比其他风扇更远的范围。
source: This is the best fan in the game in terms of area of effect when upgraded. It is redstone activated but it can push mobs at a wider range then other fans.

target: 就其本身而言，它会将怪物物推离自身5格方块
source: Just by itself it's pushes mobs 5 blocks from itself.

target: 升级你的粉丝群
source: Upgrading your fanbase

target: 这些升级将使风扇从1格宽5格远增加到完全升级后的7格宽15格远。
source: These upgrades will increase the fan from it's 1 block wide 5 blocks front, to when fully upgraded 7 blocks wide 15 blocks front.

target: 还有一个高度升级，仅对飞行生物和爬墙的蜘蛛有用。
source: There is also a hight upgrade which is only useful against flying mobs and spiders climbing the walls.

target: 升级可以调整，这样风扇的作用范围就不会重叠。
source: The upgrades can be adjusted so the fans don't overlap.

target: 这会将你的体验固化成一个坚实的状态。这意味着你甚至可以将其放入抽屉等存储设备中。作为奖励，它可以放入压缩抽屉中。
source: This will solidify your experience into a solid state. This means you can even put it into storage such as drawers. As a bonus, it can be put into a compact drawer.

target: 另请注意，它可以使用所有形式的液体体验，例如精华液、知识精华、液态经验等。
source: Also note that it can take all form of liquid experience, such as Essence, Knowledge Essence, Liquid Experience, and so on.

target: 收集物品和经验
source: Pulling in items and experience

target: 经典的真空吸尘器满足你怪物农场的需求，它可以吸收物品和经验。你只需设置吸收漏斗的输出。
source: The classic Vacuum for your mob grinding needs, it pulls in both items and experience. You just have to set up an output by \"using\" the Absorption Hopper.

target: 左侧图标显示输出，选择时将渲染漏斗。拖动漏斗将其转动，然后为其选择一侧输出（？）。
source: The left icons shows the output, when selected will show the hopper. Drag the hopper to turn it, and select a side for your output.

target: 鸡会诅咒大地
source: Chickens will Curse the Earth

target: 用这个饲料制造腐烂鸡蛋，在泥土上使用腐烂鸡蛋会把它变成诅咒之土。怪物将在那种土地上更多的生成。
source: Use this feed to create rotten eggs, using the egg on dirt will turn it into cursed earth. Mobs will spawn more on that earth.

target: 欢迎来到突变系的第二只蜜蜂……哦等等……不……你只需繁殖一只下界合金蜜蜂和一只凋零骷髅蜜蜂就可以得到这个。
source: Welcome to the 2nd bee in the Mutation Line... oh wait... no.. you simply breed a netherite bee and a withered bee to get this.

target: 下界合金
source: Nethermind the Error

target: 欢迎来到突变系的第一只蜜蜂。
source: Welcome to the 1st bee of the mutation line

target: 要获得这只蜜蜂，你需要让一只金蜜蜂在下界合金块上授粉。之后你会得到一个刷怪蛋。
source: To get this bee, you need a gold bee to pollinate on a netherite block. You will get a Spawn Egg.

target: 这里的3个任务，每个任务都有100%的几率获得一个增生之种来制作魔法土壤。
source: These are 3 quests given to receive a 100% chance of an Overgrowth Seed Each to craft magical soil.

target: 因此，如果您没有从随机奖励中获得增生之种，请不要随意用掉它们。
source: So don't go accidently spend them if you didn't get any from the random rewards.

target: &e&l夸克&r的一个实用功能是你可以将块放置在你看不到但够到的面上。
source: A useful feature of &e&lQuark &f&ris that you can place blocks on sides you can't see but reach.

target: 当你看到你的十字准心有一个[+]在方块的底部时，你将能够在你正在看的方块下面放置一个方块。
source: When you see your crosshair have [+] while sneaking at the bottom side of a block, you will be able to place a block under the block you are looking at.

target: 在看到<+>时，你将在你正在看的方块块的另一侧放置一个方块。
source: While seeing <+> you will put a block on the opposite side of the block you are looking at.

source: Reacharound Placing

target: 关于幻翼的问题?
source: Phantom Problem?

target: 整合包的测试人员看到的一个常见问题是在夜间面对幻翼。
source: A common problem seen by the testers of the pack is facing against phantoms at night.

target: 只有当玩家的头部高于海平面Y=64时幻翼才会生成
source: Phantoms will only spawn if the player's head is above sea level Y=64

target: 使岛屿位于最多Y=62或更少将有助于防止它们生成。
source: Making the island at most Y=62 or less will help prevent them from spawning.

target: 关于幻翼的问题
source: Phantom Problem

target: 怪物刷新提示
source: Mob spawning tips

target: 有多种方法可以防止怪物在你的岛上刷新，甚至会添加一些常识提示
source: There are Multiple ways to prevent mobs to spawn on your island, will even add some common knowledge tips

target: - &a亮度等级&r
source: - &aLightsources

target: 我们有显示刷怪区域模组，按F7将在方块上显示红色和黄色\"X\"。
source: We have more overlays mod, pressing F7 will show Red and Yellow \"X\" on blocks.

target: 敌对生物只会在夜间生成在那些黄色的\"X\"。
source: Hostile Mobs will spawn on those, in which the yellow \"X\" is only during the night.

target: - &a不完整方块&r
source: - &aNon-Full blocks

target: 敌对生物不会生成在下半砖、楼梯、玻璃类型的方块上面。
source: Mainly Bottom Slabs, Stairs, Glass type blocks hostile mobs will not spawn on.

target: - &a范围&r
source: - &aRange

target: 所有怪物只会在你的24格范围之外生成。
source: All Mobs will spawn only outside a range of 24 blocks.

target: - &b以及下一个提示显示的特殊方块&r
source: - &bAnd special blocks which shown as the next tip

target: 防止怪物刷新的方法
source: Ways to Prevent of spawning

target: 防敌对生物
source: Anti-Hostile Torch

target: &e&l火炬大师&r添加了4种物品，其中一种是巨型火把。
source: &e&lTorchmaster &rgives 4 items, one of which is a mega torch.

target: 默认情况下，此火炬将阻止64格半径内的敌对生物生成。
source: This torch will prevent hostile mobs within a 64 block radius by default to spawn.

target: &e最好用于开阔的草地，你不想在上面放一堆火把，也不想怪物更多的刷新。&r
source: &eBest used in Open grassy fields which you don't want a bunch of torches on them, and more chance for passive mobs to spawn.

target: 防中立生物
source: Anti-Passive Mobs

target: &e&l火炬大师&r有一个防止中立生物生成的物品。
source: &e&lTorchmaster &rhas an item that prevents passive mobs to spawn.

target: 默认情况下，恐惧之灯会阻止64格半径内的中立生物生成。
source: The Dread Lamp will prevent passive mobs within a 64 block radius by default to spawn.

target: &c它最好用于怪物农场以防止&b蝙蝠&c生成。&r
source: &cIt's best used in mob grinders to prevent &bbats &cfrom spawning.

target: 一旦你有足够的方块来建造一个怪物农场，它就是一个很好的资源来源。
source: Mob Farms are a great resource once you have enough blocks to build one.

target: 互联网上有很多农场模型，很难指出哪一个适合你的口味。
source: There are so many models of farms in the internet, it's hard to point out which fits your taste.

target: 插入此内容可能会适得其反，但是在互联网上搜索\"空岛怪物农场\"，您会得到一些复杂或简单的模型可供选择。
source: It might be counter productive to type this, but do some research on the internet for \"skyblock mob farms\" and you got some complicated and simple models to choose.

target: 但是对于大多数原版，一个简单的提示是与水有关。
source: But a simple modded tip will be related to water due to most vanilla builds.

target: 末影人会从水中传送出去，所以如果你有传送带或怪物风扇，你可以通过代替水来解决问题。
source: Enderman will teleport out of water, so if you got conveyor belts or fans, you can deal with them with those by replacing the water.

target: 怪物农场
source: Mob Farms

target: &a&l水晶花园&f&r添加了一个获取圆石的途径：通过在草地或泥土上潜行并\"使用\"（默认：鼠标右键），你会得到卵石。
source: &a&lGarden of Glass &f&rgives a function to get cobblestone. By crouching and \"using\" (default: Right mouse button) on Grass or dirt you will get pebbles.

target: 它适用于所有世界。
source: It works in all worlds.

target: 4颗卵石 = 1颗圆石
source: 4 pebbles = 1 cobblestone

target: 草是你的朋友，尤其是种子等，一旦你获得骨粉。
source: Grass is your friend, especially for seeds and such once you get bonemeal.

target: 草方块会随着时间蔓延到泥土上。
source: A Grass block will transfer to dirt with time.

target: 草可以通过筛泥土重新获得。
source: Grass can be regain by sieving dirt.

target: 牛、鸡、猪和羊只在草方块上生成。
source: Cows, Chicken, Pigs, and Sheeps only spawn on Grass Blocks.

target: 草地保护
source: Grass Preservation

target: 连锁挖矿对空岛来说是有风险的，不是因为它被削弱了，而是它可能会意外地摧毁你的岛屿。
source: Excavation mods is risky for skyblocks, not because it's overpowered, but it can destroy your island by accident.

target: 使用它需要你自己承担风险。
source: Use it at your own risk.

target: 使用此类模组的一个技巧是在瞄准另一个采矿速度较慢的方块时使用它。例如在砍树时瞄准圆石而不是泥土。
source: A tip for using such mod, will be using it while aiming at another block that has a slower mining speed. Such as cobblestone when mining a tree instead of dirt.

target: 任何矿脉/连锁模组
source: Any Veinmine/Excavation Mod

target: 这个包有墓碑模组，当你死时你会得到一把钥匙。
source: This pack has Corail Tombstones, when you die you will receive a Key.

target: 你可以将钥匙跟一颗末影珍珠合成来传送到你的坟墓，或者随机地获得已经被附魔的钥匙（需要相关技能）来传送到你的坟墓。
source: You can teleport to your grave by crafting an enderpearl to that key, or by random chance it will already be enchanted to teleport to your grave.

source: &cWarning: &eI do not deal with server issues, nor program recipes and such. I do know how mods work; code wise. So please, don't ask me about something I have no control over. Just ask me about Quests, or guides to mods. &cThe Quest bellow will is supposed to disclose you on how to report issues.

source: even for a fix, I am trying to add random rewards and stories as well. I do know how to balance them, yet with a huge modpack, it takes time to make decisions.

target: 我的弱点可能是魔法模组，所以我很希望收到一些建议。

source: And if you guys want, you can add your jokes in relation to some quests. Which will be credited if you want. I love adding a bit of humour. Even child friendly bad ones (puns lol).

target: 制作一个系统
source: To make a system

target: 这个抽屉控制器将连接到它的每个抽屉组合成一个。它可以通过抽屉和桥接方块连接所有抽屉组成一个系统，以查看整个库存。
source: This drawer block will combine every drawers attached to it as one. It can be connected by \"Storage plug\" type system to see the whole inventory.

target: 当在控制器上使用钥匙时，它将影响所有连接的抽屉。
source: When a key is used on a controller, it will affect all connected drawers.

target: 抽屉的附件
source: Slave to the drawers

target: 添加另一个与抽屉控制器交互的地方，以便在其他难以触及控制器的地方使用。
source: Adds another place to interact with a Drawer Controller for when it's hard to reach otherwise.

target: 自动压缩
source: Automatic Compactibility

target: 这个块将自动压缩任何可以压缩和恢复的东西。例如锭，粘土球等，以它们的方块形态，反之亦然。
source: This block will automatically compact anything that can be compacted and reverted. Such as ingots, clay balls, and such to their block version and vice versa.

target: 过滤抽屉的钥匙
source: The key to filtering a drawer

target: 这把钥匙有两种使用方式：
source: This key can be used in two ways:

target: 1-放在副手时；当放置抽屉时，它会自动锁定它们。如果你有一个连接到农场的抽屉系统并且你不想在放置时抽取任何东西，这将非常有用。
source: 1- When in offhand; When placing drawers it will automatically lock them. This is pretty useful if you have a drawer system connected to a farm and you don't want anything to pump while placing.

target: 2-对着抽屉使用钥匙将锁定/解锁它。
source: 2- Using key on drawer will lock/unlock it.

target: 当抽屉被锁定时，即使它存的物品数变成零，它也会将其记录在库存中。如果手动放置，带锁的空抽屉仍然可以装进物品。
source: When a drawer is lock it will save it's inventory in memory even when it hits zero. A lock drawer with an empty slot can still be filled if placed manually.

target: 目测计数
source: A visual count

target: 这把钥匙可以直接将库存数量在抽屉上显示。如果你想知道你有多少库存而不依赖jei，这非常有用。
source: This key pretty much adds inventory quantity directly to the drawers. This is pretty useful if you want to know how many you have without relying to jei to see.

target: 避免一团糟
source: To a-void a mess

target: 一个非常重要的升级，当它收到到超过它存储上限的物品时会将其销毁。
source: A very important upgrade when it comes as voiding stuff that surpasses it's limit.

target: 少即是多
source: Less is more

target: 最基本的功能是将存储降级到一组。对于具有红石升级的某些自动化非常有用。
source: Basically a storage downgrade to a stack. Very useful for certain automations with a redstone upgrade.

target: 绿色英里
source: The Green mile

target: 抽屉存储升级系列的一部分。
source: Part of a series of Storage upgrade for drawers.

target: 现在我明白了
source: And now I see

target: 这个抽屉升级将使它的物品图标发光。
source: This drawer upgrade will make it's display glow.

target: 输出你的存储
source: Emiting your Storage

target: 红石升级将使抽屉根据满载程度发出红石信号，当与存储降级结合使用时，对于某些自动化可能很有用。
source: Redstone upgrade will emit a signal depending on how full they are, it can be useful when combined with a storage downgrade, for certain automations.

target: 储罐供你选择
source: Tank you for your choice

target: 该方块存储液体……
source: This block stores liquid...

target: &c\"……我存不下流体了\"&r
source: &c\"... I didnt get the flow\"

target: 相当大的一个单位
source: Quite a Unit

target: 存储大量的同种物品。
source: Stores a very huge amount of one item.

target: 储存你的气体
source: Hold your Gasses

target: 这是储存气体的最佳方法之一，它甚至可以避免溢出。
source: This is one of the best ways to hold your gasses, it can even void overflows.

target: 潮湿库存
source: Dank Inventory

target: 这是一个可以容纳多种不同物品的存储空间。每次升级都会增加单个物品可以容纳的数量和库存大小。
source: This is a storage that can hold multiple items that can be voided. Each upgrade will increase how much individual items can hold, and inventory size.

target: 桶对此无能为力。
source: Buckets have nothing over this.

target: 与Dank版本类似，Tank可以容纳和排空超过其限制的液体。它还充当世界中的桶。
source: Similar to it's Dank version, Tank null can hold and void liquids surpassing it's limit. It also acts as a bucket in-world.

target: 现在到了游戏的最后……
source: Were in the Endgame now...

target: ATM套
source: AlltheArmor

target: 这是游戏中最好的盔甲套装的开始……除了通用机械之外。
source: This is the start on the best armor set in the game... well other then the MekaSuit.

target: 与通用机械不同的是，该套装提供了一些能力，例如仅靴子不会造成坠落伤害
source: Unlike the MekaSuit, the set provides abilities, such as No fall damage from just the boots

target: 震动的绿色盔甲
source: A Vibrant Green Armor

target: 等等，不是无法获得吗？
source: Wait it's not unobtainable?

target: 我有什么要选的吗？斧头。
source: I got something to Pick? Axe.

target: 不是Excalibur，但它是Calibur。
source: Not Excalibur, but it's a Calibur.

target: 有人用斧头战斗吗？
source: Did someone Axe for Battle?

target: 等等……那不是黄金？
source: Wait... That's not Gold?

target: 感受震动
source: Feel the vibrations

target: 一种从下界深处诞生的震动的的金属……或者干脆用粉碎的下界岩筛出来
source: A vibrant metal born from the depths of the nether... or simply use netherrack dust to a

target: 不可能！？……不
source: Impossible!?... nope

target: 融合！哈!
source: Fuuuusioooon HA!

target: MekaSuit套装
source: Exo-Tic Suit

target: 可以升级的强大盔甲。
source: A powerful armor that can be upgraded.

target: 创造的力量！
source: Creative Power!

target: 相当多的运动技能
source: Quite some Motor skills

target: 1台发动机为你的所有的机械动力机器提供动力
source: 1 engine to power all your Create machineries

target: 不用再管理魔力
source: No more Mana-gement

target: 无限的魔力池。
source: An infinite pool of mana.

target: 压倒性的压力
source: Pressure Overwhelming

target: 至尊盔甲
source: The Supreme Armor

target: 神秘农业模组的顶级盔甲。
source: Top grade armor, of the Mystical agriculture mod.

target: 每件盔甲都可以升级，其中一件可以进行创造飞行。
source: Each armor can be upgraded, one of which can give creative flight.

target: 超高速飞行
source: Super Fast Flight

target: 近乎无限的资源！
source: NEARLY INFINITE RESOURCES!

target: 无限资源！
source: INFINITE RESOURCES!

target: 无限育种！
source: INSTANT BREADING!
